description.en: With its 3-wheel layout, the Tricity 300 gives a new feeling of stability and confidence, making it an ideal vehicle for all year riding, even with cold and bad weather. So now you’ve got a scooter that you can use in a range of conditions, we thought we’d create the Winter Pack featuring a water-resistant apron as well as a grip heater. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Tricity 300 s 3 kolesi daje nov občutek stabilnosti in zaupanja, zaradi česar je idealno vozilo skozi celo leto, tudi v mrzlem in slabem vremenu. Torej zdaj je na voljo skuter, katerega lahko uporabljate v različnih razmerah. Zato smo pomislili, da bi razvili Zimski paket z vodoodpornim ščitnikom in grelcem ročk ki vas ščitijo pred vodo in grejejo. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity 300.

name.sl-SI: Vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins z 8,5 N/mm za komplet NIX30

description.en: Öhlins front fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge NIX30 kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and option to improve responsiveness and performance of the fork. Öhlins offers a wide range of linear springs to suit each individual type of bike, rider weight and personal preferences for installation into the standard front fork.
description.sl-SI: Vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins so zasnovane posebej za komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX30 in sprednje vilice. Poleg tega poskrbijo tudi za odlično nadgradnjo sprednjega dela ter možnost za izboljšanje odzivnosti in zmogljivosti vilice. Öhlins zagotavlja širok nabor linearnih vzmeti, ki so primerne za vsako posamezno vrsto motornega kolesa, težo voznika in osebne želje za namestitev v standardne sprednje vilice.
Pokrivalo za zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi.

name.sl-SI: Ploščice za zgornji del talne plošče NMAX

description.sl-SI: Yamahin skuter NMAX opremite s ploščicama za zgornji del talne plošče NMAX, za dodaten oprijem in slog. Ploščici sta izdelani iz eloksiranega aluminija s trpežnimi gumijastimi vložki ter se prilegata zgornjemu delu talne plošče za noge pri modelu NMAX, pri čemer izboljšata slog in funkcionalnost za mestno vožnjo.
description.en: Add grip and style to your Yamaha NMAX with the Foot Plates Top NMAX. Made from anodized aluminium with durable rubber inserts, these plates fit onto the top of the NMAX footboards, adding both style and functionality for urban riding.

description.sl-SI: Z UNIVERZALNIM OBLIKOM ZA TELEFON lahko uporabite skoraj vsak pametni telefon na katerem koli nosilcu SP Connect za pritrditev telefona na kolesa, avtomobile, motorna kolesa, vozičke za golf itd. z mehanizmom za zavijanje za namestitev. Pametni telefon preprosto potisnite v etui, zavihajte odprtino in zaprite jeziček. Tako telefon ostane zaščiten pred dežjem, znojem, udom in prahom, hkrati pa še vedno omogoča enako uporabnost zaslona na dotik.
description.en: With the UNIVERSAL PHONE CASE, you can use just about any smartphone on any SP Connect mount to secure your phone to bicycles, cars, motorbikes, golf carts, etc. with its twist-lock mechanism to install. Simply push the smartphone into the case roll up the opening and close the tab. This way your phone remains protected from rain, sweat, ud, and dust, still offering the same touchscreen usability.
High-quality black finished carrier for light luggage capacity.
description.sl-SI: Kakovostni nosilec v črni barvi za lahko prtljago.

name.sl-SI: Majica s kratkimi rokavi za odrasle (uniseks) kolekcije Hyper Naked

description.sl-SI: Temna, drzna in podrobna, Hyper Naked Unisex majica za odrasle je bistvenega pomena za člane temne plati Japonske. Izdelana iz težkega bombaža v prevelikem kroju, je ta majica v najboljšem grunge slogu, z vezenim logotipom Yamaha na prsih in vpadljivo tiskano grafiko MT in DSOJ na hrbtu. Temačen urbani videz za novo generacijo voznikov v slogu Hyper Naked.
description.en: Dark, edgy and detailed, the Hyper Naked Unisex Adults T-Shirt is essential for members of the Dark Side of Japan. Made from a heavy cotton in an oversized fit, this tee is grunge-styling at its best, featuring an embroidered Yamaha logo on the chest and a striking printed MT and DSOJ graphic on the back. A gritty urban look for the new generation of Hyper Naked rider.

name.sl-SI: Aluminijasto zadnje platišče Marchesini GYTR za R6 (črno)
name.en: GYTR Marchesini R6 Aluminium Rear Wheel (Black)

description.en: Forged aluminium rear wheel with low centre of gravity made for the R1 by Marchesini. The use of multi-directional aluminum alloy forging and the use of shapes optimized for the final geometry of the wheel make it possible to obtain a very light material with exceptional mechanical specifications.

This polycarbonate high screen ups the level of wind protection to cover a wider area, from the rider’s upper body all the way to their hands on the grips. It efficiently reduces the amount of rain and wind that hits the rider’s body when in motion, bringing a more comfortable ride whether touring or commuting.
description.sl-SI: Ta polikarbonatni visoki vizir izboljša zaščito pred vetrom in pokrije večjo površino, od zgornjega dela telesa voznika do rok na ročajih. S tem se zmanjša količina dežja in vetra, ki trči ob voznikovo telo med gibanjem, zaradi česar je vožnja udobnejša tako med potovanjem kot vožnjo v službo.
Zaščitite svoj motor pred padci in nesrečami s kompletom drsnika okvirja. Enostavna namestitev za zagotavljanje varnosti agregata CP2.

description.en: Drawing from our experience with Yamaha’s YXZ1000R light bars, we are proud to offer this LED light Bar for your Wolverine X4. You get the complete lighting solution you would expect from Genuine Yamaha accessories but at a fraction of the cost.

Keep your outboard engine protected from dirt and scratches when the boat is docking at the harbor or during winter storage. Stranske obloge iz ulite smole so trpežne in zasnovane za vrhunski oprijem, s čimer zagotavljajo boljši nadzor nad motornim kolesom in zaščitijo oklep pred praskami. Preprosto se namestijo in prinašajo zagotovljeno korist motornemu kolesu TRACER 9.
description.en: Durable and designed for supreme grip, the moulded resin Side Pads offer better bike control and protect bodywork from scratches. Easy to apply and guaranteed to benefit your TRACER 9.
8-step charger that can charge the battery of your Yamaha motorcycle, scooter, ATV, SMB and/or marine products.
description.sl-SI: Polnilnik z 8 stopnjami, ki lahko napolni akumulator Yamahinega motocikla, skuterja, ATV-ja, SMB-ja in/ali izdelke za pomorstvo.

Stranske kovčke Yamaha namestite s kompletom za pritrditev stranskih kovčkov za TRACER 7. Ta lahek komplet, ki ga je enostavno namestiti na okvir, omogoča preprosto montažo stranskih kovčkov in torb. Obvezno za motoriste, ki radi pakirajo za vsako priložnost.
description.en: Carry your Yamaha Side Cases on the road with the Side Case Stay Kit for the TRACER 7. Easy to fit on the frame, this lightweight stay kit allows effortless mounting of side cases and bags. A must for the riders that like to pack for every occasion.
The GYTR ABS emulator allows you to remove the ABS Pump and OEM brake lines

name.en: Sports Heritage Men’s Riding Cargo Pants
name.sl-SI: Motoristične kargo hlače Sports Heritage za moške

description.en: A stylish and effortless match for your Yamaha riding jackets, the Sports Heritage Men’s Riding Cargo Pants offer great versatility and comfort on and off the road. Made from hard-wearing but flexible cordura fabric in either khaki or black slim fit, the pants include adjustable Warrior knee protection for extra peace of mind. Pockets on the side, top and rear give ample room for belongings. Ideal for Sport Heritage riders looking for that extra riding flair.
description.sl-SI: Motoristične kargo hlače Sports Heritage za moške se stilsko povsem prilegajo Yamahinim motorističnim jaknam, so večnamenske in omogočajo udobje tako na cesti kot drugod. Izdelane so iz trpežne, toda fleksibilne tkanine cordura, na voljo so v ozkem kroju v črni ali kaki barvi in vključujejo nastavljiv komolčni ščitnik Warrior, da ste lahko čisto brez skrbi. Stranski, zgornji in zadnji žepi zagotavljajo veliko prostora za osebne predmete. Popolno za voznike motornih koles Sport Heritage, ki si želijo izpopolniti slog.

description.en: Top yoke for racing purpose

Conquer the urban landscape with the ΝΜΑΧ Urban Pack which consists of the most essential accessories to make your ride even more practical. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your ΝΜΑΧ.
description.sl-SI: Osvojite urbano pokrajino s kompletom ΝΜΑΧ 'Urban Pack', ki vključuje najbolj bistvene dodatke, s katerimi bo vaša vožnja še bolj praktična. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model ΝΜΑΧ.

description.en: Slick, eye-catching and urban, the Paddock Blue Women’s Jacket is the perfect outerwear layer for daily wear. 100% polyester pongee fabric construction ensures strength of the jacket, with racing blue, black and white coloured panels creating an iconic Yamaha style. Padded body tunnels deliver a soft feel in and out, with front pockets, a full-length zip and storm flap for weather protection. Retro style arm and shoulder tape captures the Streetwear feel with printed Yamaha Racing branding.
description.sl-SI: Elegantna in privlačna ženska jakna Paddock Blue v mestnem slogu je popolno zunanje oblačilo za vsakodnevno uporabo. Izdelana je iz 100-odstotnega poliestrskega tafta ter tako zagotavlja trpežnost, dirkaško modra barva in črno-beli deli pa ustvarjajo ikonski Yamahin slog. Podloženi deli na trupu zagotavljajo mehek občutek, poleg tega so vključeni sprednji žepi, zadrga po celotni dolžini in zapiralo za zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi. Trak na rokavih in ramenih v retro slogu odraža videz kolekcije Streetwear, na jakni je tudi tiskan logotip Yamaha Racing.

description.en: Specially formulated to meet Yamaha’s own very high standards, this advanced oil features additives to guard against friction, wear, foam and corrosion. The result is consistent protection for the suspension and the delivery of safer and more precise handling.
description.sl-SI: Posebej izdelano čistilo, ki izpolnjuje lastne visoke standarde družbe Yamaha. Napredni aditivi z lastnostmi olja preprečujejo trenje, obrabo, penjenje in korozijo. Rezultat je dosledna zaščita za vzmetenje in zagotavljanje bolj varnega ter natančnega delovanja.

S kovinskim pokrovom rezervoarja hladilne tekočine, ki poskrbi za eleganten pridih, zaščitite hladilno tekočino pri modelu MT-07. Izdelan je iz visokokakovostnega obdelanega črnega aluminija za izjemno privlačen videz.
description.en: Keep your MT-07 coolant protected and add a stylish accent with the Billet Coolant Reservoir Cover. Made from high quality billeted black aluminium for extra cool look.

description.sl-SI: Svojemu vozilu vdihnite edinstven videz in razkošnejši občutek z zamenjavo originalnih sedežev s temi elegantnimi, nadgrajenimi potovalnimi sedeži, skupaj s kontrastnimi šivi in reliefnimi logotipi.
description.en: Give your car a unique look and more luxurious feel by replacing your original seats with these stylish, upgraded touring seats, complete with contrast stitching and embossed tuning fork logos.
Our Brass Headlight Bezel adds a touch of retro-inspired personalization while delivering the subtle styling cues that make your XV950 model stand apart from the others.
Protects the units and the RecDeck during storage and transportation.
description.sl-SI: Ščiti enote in RecDeck med shranjevanjem in prevozom.
Adapter za namestitev torbe Explorer na nosilec stranskega kovčka
description.en: Adapter to mount Explorer Soft Bag on side case stay
Crown handle kit with bearing for Ténéré 700 World Raid GYTR
Infused with Dark Side of Japan DNA, this aluminum visor with the MT logo reinforces the aggressive and sporty look of your bike.
description.sl-SI: Ta aluminijasti vizir z logotipom MT, prežet z DNK temne plati Japonske, krepi agresiven in športen videz vašega motocikla.
Izberite iz naše nove široke ponudbe vlečnih tub ter uživajte z družino in prijatelji na svoji naslednji dogodivščini na vodi!
description.en: Choose from our new large range of towables to have fun with family and friends on your next trip on the water.

name.sl-SI: Polo majica Paddock Blue za ženske

description.en: The Paddock Blue Women’s Polo is a must-have for a smart casual look at events. Made in a 50/50 blend of cotton  and  polyester   with a pique finish, the polo features a specially engineered collar and  button closure, colour contrast arms and embroidered Yamaha branding. An absolute classic of Paddock Blue style.
description.sl-SI: Polo majica Paddock Blue za ženske je nepogrešljiv kos za športno eleganten videz na različnih dogodkih. Izdelana je iz 50 % bombaža in 50 % poliestra z zunanjo plastjo iz dvojno pletenega bombaža (pique) ter se ponaša s posebno zasnovanim ovratnikom, gumbi na izrezu, rokavi v kontrastni barvi in izvezenim logotipom Yamaha. Povsem klasični slog linije Paddock Blue.
Aluminijast spojler za motor za avanturistično vožnjo se namesti neposredno na zaščito motorja Explorer in ščiti motor pred kamenčki, ki priletijo s sprednjega kolesa na avanturističnih poteh.
description.en: Adventure style aluminium engine spoiler, mounts directly on Explorer Engine Guards, shields the engine partly from gravel from the front wheel when taking the adventurous route.

description.sl-SI: Naša tovarniška ekipa ga je razvila za maksimalno zaščito in izjemno majhno težo.
description.en: Developed by our factory team for maximum protection and extremely light weight.
Battery Charger for NEO's battery
description.sl-SI: Polnilnik za akumulator skuterja NEO's

description.en: High quality finished carrier to be mounted to the rear of the unit, to carry a topcase or other luggage.

Rain and wind shouldn't stop you from activities, and neither should they affect your riding pleasure and comfort. We developed the Apron, which uses special welding technology, to keep you warm and dry, so you can be more comfortable and safe during harsh weather conditions.
description.sl-SI: Dež in veter ne bi smela biti ovira pri aktivnostih, prav tako pa ne bi smela vplivati na vaš užitek in udobje pri vožnji. Razvili smo zaščito za sprednji del telesa, ki uporablja posebno tehnologijo varjenja, ki vas ščiti pred mrazom in dežjem, da vam bo tudi v težjih vremenskih pogojih udobno in boste ostali varni.

name.sl-SI: Paket 'Sport Pack Pro Titanium' za MT-09

description.sl-SI: Vrhunski videz in zmogljivosti so za MT-09 standardne, zdaj pa ga lahko nadgradite s paketom 'Sport Pack Pro Titanium', ki je zasnovan tako, da bo vaš motocikel še bolj izstopal. Za dopolnitev hitre in vznemirljive izkušnje vožnje z modelom MT-09, titanov popolni izpušni sistem Akrapovič poudarja ikonično rjovenje agregata CP3 ter čisti adrenalin, ki ga doživljamo z vsakim zasukom plina. Skupaj z ogledali na krmilu v obliki romba, črno obarvanim kratkim vizirjem in elegantnim nosilcem registrske tablice ti skrbno izbrani dodatki izboljšajo agresiven in športen videz vašega motornega kolesa. Blazinice za rezervoar in stranski oprijem – zasnovane posebej za MT-09 – izboljšajo nadzor in stabilnost pri vožnji v ovinkih, hkrati pa ščitijo rezervoar pred praskami. Ste pripravljeni, da svojo vožnjo popeljete na naslednjo raven?
description.en: Class-leading looks and performance are standard on the MT-09, but now you can take it to the next level with the Sport Pack Pro Titanium, designed to make your bike stand out from the crowd even more. To complement the fast and thrilling experience of riding the MT-09, the titanium Akrapovič Full Exhaust System accentuates the CP3’s iconic roar, emphasising the pure adrenaline delivered with every twist of the throttle. Together with the diamond-shaped bar end mirrors, black-tinted fly screen and a sleek licence plate holder, these carefully selected accessories enhance your bike’s sharp and sporty looks. Finally, the tank pad and side grip pads—designed specifically for the MT-09—improve control and stability when tackling corners, while also protecting the tank from scratches. Are you ready to push your ride to the next level?

You may want to use your NMAX throughout the year for your commutes. And we want to make sure you ride with utmost comfort, which not only makes your ride pleasurable but also a whole lot more comfortable. In order to keep you protected from the elements, we created the Winter pack for NMAX, consisting of an apron and a grip heater. While the Apron protects your feet from the rain and cold winds, it also has a reflective logo that increases your visibility. The grip heater get plenty warm, to keep your hands toasty. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your NMAX.
description.sl-SI: Mogoče se boste želeli s svojim NMAX voziti celo leto. Želimo poskrbeti, da se boste vozili kar se da udobno, zaradi česar ne bo vožnja le v užitek, ampak bo tudi precej bolj udobna. Da bi vas zaščitili pred vremenom, smo ustvarili zimski paket za NMAX, ki je sestavljen iz predpasnika in grelnika ročk. Predpasnik ščiti noge pred dežjem in hladnim vetrom ter je opremljen z odsevnim logotipom, zaradi katerega boste bolj opazni. Grelnik ročk pa se segreje in poskrbi, da so roke tople. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model NMAX.

name.sl-SI: Dirkaški komplet GYTR® prve stopnje – modelno leto 2019–trenutni model

description.en:
The GYTR® Racing Kit stage 1 (MY19-Current) includes all mandatory equipment based on the FIA (Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile) T4 regulations for Side-by-Sides. Equipped with this kit, the YXZ1000R is ready to compete in most competitions under National Sports Authorities and FIM.
Thanks to the plug-and-play design, no welding or modifications to the chassis are required. Together with the full assembly instructions, this allows any Yamaha SSV dealer or experienced mechanic to finish installation in about 16 hours.
The GYTR Racing Kit opens up a new world of Rally racing and offers a strong base for further improving skills and vehicle performance, for entry-level and experienced drivers.
This Stage 1 kit is developed for models with a rear-mounted radiator and is suitable for YXZ1000R models after and including MY2019.

The kit contains:
description.sl-SI:
Dirkaški komplet GYTR® prve stopnje (modelno leto 2019–trenutni model) vključuje vso potrebno opremo na osnovi FIA (Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile) pogojev T4 za modele Side-by-Side. Model YXZ1000R, opremljen s tem kompletom, je pripravljen za tekmovanje v večini tekmovanj pod okriljem nacionalnih športnih organov in FIM.
Zahvaljujoč preprosti zasnovi ni potrebno varjenje ali izvajanje modifikacij na šasiji. V kompletu s popolnimi navodili za sestavljanje lahko vsak prodajalec Yamahe SSV ali izkušen mehanik zaključi namestitev v približno 16-ih urah.
Dirkaški komplet GYTR odpira nov svet reli dirkanja ter ponuja močno podlago za nadaljnje izboljšanje spretnosti in zmogljivosti vozila, tako začetnikom kot tudi izkušenim voznikom.
Ta komplet prve stopnje je razvit za modele z zadaj nameščenim hladilnikom in je primeren za YXZ1000R od vključno modelnega leta 2019 naprej.

Komplet vsebuje:

Glavno stikalo akumulatorja je bilo preizkušeno in je združljivo z vsemi izvenkrmnimi motorji Yamaha.  Glede na dodatno električno opremo, ki jo lahko dodate, se lahko izbira stikala razlikuje glede na porabo amperaže in položaj (znotraj ali zunaj) na plovilu. To zmogljivo stikalo akumulatorja ima naslednje specifikacije: Vklop/izklop, s spodnjim pokrovom, za montažo na ploščo 48V ali 12V stikalo z neprekinjeno amperažo 300 A DC. 48 V ali 12 V z 1000 A DC zagonskih amperov (največ 5 sekund).

description.sl-SI: Komplet, ki je posebej razvit, da modelu YZ65 daje tovarniški tekmovalni videz "Yamaha Blue". Z logotipom GYTR® in izdelan, da prihrani težo. Vsebuje:

description.en: Attached to the standard camshaft, this sprocket changes the valve timing to improve the output.

The city is the XMAX's natural habitat and with the Urban Accessories Pack you can take the practicality of your XMAX a notch higher. Besides providing enhanced wind protection from the high screen, the pack also takes care of your luggage needs with a 45L top case with matching colour plate set and carrier – keeping your belonging safe and secure. And a backrest for the top case makes sure the passenger has an equally comfortable ride. To protect you from the scratches and the scruffs, the city throws up, the pack contains the XMAX scratch protector. Available from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your XMAX.
description.sl-SI: Mesto je XMAX-ovo naravno okolje, s kompletom dodatne opreme Urban pa lahko še bolje izkoristite XMAX-ovo praktičnost. Poleg izboljšane zaščite pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem paket poskrbi tudi za vaše potovalne potrebe s 45-litrskim zgornjim kovčkom z ujemajočim se kompletom barvnih ploščic in nosilcem, ki ščiti vaše osebne predmete. Naslon za zgornji kovček pa poskrbi, da bo tudi sopotnik užival v enako udobni vožnji. Za zaščito pred praskami in odrgninami komplet vključuje zaščito pred praskami XMAX. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše vozilo XMAX.

description.en: Side case stay set for Ténéré 700.

name.sl-SI: Polsintetično Olje Yamalube S4-M 10W30 Za Plovila
name.en: Yamalube S4-M 10W30 Semi Synthetic Marine Oil

description.en: YamalubeSynthetic 10W30 Marine Oil is a versatile, high-quality performance oil designed for the unique demands of Yamaha 4-stroke outboards and personal watercraft.

description.sl-SI: Olajšajte si vsakodnevno vožnjo s paketom TMAX Keyless Urban, ki vam ponuja dodatno udobje našega 45-litrskega zgornjega kovčka brez ključa, zadnji nosilec, nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, komplet brezstičnega mehanizma za zaklepanje in stikala, barvne ploščice za zgornji kovček in hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček.
description.en: Ease your commute with the TMAX Keyless Urban Pack, which gives you the added convenience of our Keyless Top Case 45L along with the Rear Carrier, Top Case Mounting Plate, Keyless locking Mechanism Kit and Switch, Top Case Coloured Plates and Top Case Backrest.

Keep your investment looking its best, and protect it from the elements. This cover provides the ultimate protection against fading and the elements. It comes with the Vacu-Hold strapless tow system, eliminating billowing and buffeting. Therefore, the cover conforms to the shape of your WaveRunner.
description.sl-SI: Ohranite svojo naložbo v najboljšem stanju in jo zaščitit pred vremenskimi vplivi. Ta prevleka zagotavlja neprekosljivo zaščito pred bledenjem in posledicami vremenskih dejavnikov. Ima sistem Vacu-Hold za pripenjanje brez trakov, ki odpravlja napihovanje in plapolanje prevleke. Zato se popolnoma prilega obliki vašega WaveRunnerja.

name.sl-SI: Kratka majica Paddock Blue za ženske

description.en: The ideal base to layer your Streetwear wardrobe with, the Paddock Blue Women’s T-Shirt offers classic Yamaha Racing and urban style. Made from a blend of cotton  and elastane for comfort and free movement, the tee is a three-tone design of racing blue, black and white panels with retro style arm and shoulder tape. A crew neck ensures a good fit, with centred Yamaha Racing branding on the chest.
description.sl-SI: Kratko majico Paddock Blue za ženske lahko popolno kombinirate z vsemi izdelki kolekcije Streetwear, saj ponuja klasični videz Yamaha Racing in mestni slog. Izdelana je iz bombaža in elastana za udobje in prosto gibanje, obarvana je v odtenke dirkaško modre, črne in bele ter ima trak v retro slogu na rokavu in ramenih. Okrogel izrez se lepo prilega telesu, na prsih pa je na sredini logotip Yamaha Racing.

description.en: Pre-muffler carbon fibre heat shield

name.sl-SI: OLJE ZA MENJALNIK YAMALUBE GL4 SAE 90

description.sl-SI: Olje Yamalube® GL4 je primerno za profesionalno ali sproščeno plovbo – gre za univerzalno olje izjemne kakovosti, ki je primerno za ohišja zobnikov pri vseh izvenkrmnih motorjih in motorjih za plovila s krmnim pogonom.
description.en: Yamalube  GL4 is the oil of choice for professional and leisure boating - an outstanding quality universal oil suitable for all outboard motor and sterndrive gear cases
Screen to be placed in front of the Ténéré 700's headlight.

description.en: Öhlins STX gives a smoother, more controlled and enjoyable ride when riding solo or with passenger/heavy load . The series are monotube high pressure gas type of shock absorber with external “piggy back” reservoir which provides a higher performance capability. This makes your ride more accurate and reliable. The Öhlins STX 36 shock absorber sets the standard for performance, quality and durability for your NMAX.
description.sl-SI: Öhlins STX omogoča bolj gladko, nadzorovano in prijetno vožnjo, bodisi ko ste sami na motociklu ali prevažate še kakšnega potnika/težak tovor. Serijo sestavljajo enocevni visokotlačni plinski blažilniki z zunanjim rezervoarjem plina, ki omogoča boljše zmogljivosti. S tem je vaša vožnja natančnejša in bolj zanesljiva. Blažilnik Öhlins STX 36 določa standard za zmogljivost, kakovost in vzdržljivost za vaš motocikel NMAX.

description.sl-SI: Z urbanim paketom 34L za Tricity 125, ki ga sestavljajo visok vizir, 34-litrski zgornji kovček s kompletom ključev in cilindrične ključavnice, nosilna plošča za zgornji kovček, barvna plošča za zgornji kovček in naslon za zgornji kovček, boste obvladali vsako mestno vožnjo. To je bistven paket za redne dnevne potnike, ki potrebujejo dodaten prostor za shranjevanje in funkcionalnost.
description.en: Conquer every urban ride with the Urban Pack 34L for Tricity 125, consisting of a high screen, 34L top case with key cylinder set, top case mounting plate, top case colour plate and top case backrest. It’s an essential pack for the regular commuter that needs extra storage and functionality.

Protect your WaveRunner or boat from bumps and scrapes with these high-quality fenders. Featuring 4 feet of rope for easy attachment, the fenders provide a safe and secure buffer when docked or alongside another vessel.

A staple item for Yamaha fans everywhere, the Paddock Blue Men’s T-Shirt is a simple and comfortable tee for wearing around home or race paddocks. Made from cotton and polyester  blend, this tee features colour contrasting raglan sleeves, a crew neck and all-around Yamaha branding for an easy-to-wear, everyday garment.
description.sl-SI: Kratka majica Paddock Blue za moške je preprosto in udobno oblačilo za nošnjo doma ali v dirkalnih boksih ter je nepogrešljiva za Yamahine navdušence po vsem svetu. Izdelana je iz bombaža in poliestra z raglan rokavi v kontrastni barvi, okroglim izrezom in Yamahinimi logotipi na več mestih ter omogoča preprosto, vsakodnevno uporabo.

Opremite svojo Yamaho TMAX za zimo z zimskim paketom TMAX, ki vključuje TMAX zaščito za sprednji del telesa in grelnik ročk. Bistveni pripomočki za vožnjo in udobje v zimskem vremenu in hladnejših mesecih.
description.en: Kit out your Yamaha TMAX for winter with the TMAX Winter Pack, featuring the Apron TMAX and Grip Heater TMAX. Essential items for riding and comfort in winter weather and colder months.

description.en: Take your VX wet storage capacity to the next level with our large VX Stern Mounted Storage solution. Mounts with no drilling required. Durable, weather resistant compression-molded black EVA foam. (2) Side rod- holders, custom styled exterior integrates with unit styling, Allows access to the stern tow point for watersports usage without removing the bag.

Trpežna črna pena EVA, tlačno lita in odporna na vremenske dejavnike. (2) stranska nosilca za palice, zunanjost v slogu po meri, skladna z videzom skuterja, in možnost dostopa do vlečne točke na krmi za vodne športe, ne da bi bilo treba torbo odstraniti.

description.sl-SI: Ženska jopica s kapuco na zadrgo kolekcije REVS v športnem slogu, izdelana iz mešanice bombaža in poliestra v črni, rdeči in sivi barvi, je hkrati modna in funkcionalna. Zadrga ¾ ponuja dodatno udobje, fiksna podložena kapuca in zaščita za brado pa ščitita pred zunanjimi vplivi. Vpadljiv izvezeni napis Yamaha na prsih, grafika navpične črte zadaj in obrobe na ramenih tvorijo privlačen videz v slogu REVS.
description.en: Crafted in black, red and grey from a blend of cotton and polyester, the sports-inspired REVS Women’s Zip Hoodie offers both fashion and function. A ¾ zip offers extra comfort, with a fixed lined hood and chin guard to keep the weather out. Strong embroidered Yamaha branding on the chest, backstripe graphic and shoulder piping combine for an eye-catching REVS look.

description.sl-SI: Hladilna torba je idealen za vzdrževanje temperature vaše pijače in prigrizkov, ko ste na vodi ali pri kateri koli drugi dejavnosti na prostem. V torbi je prostora za 18 pločevink in led, zapira pa se z zadrgo. Vodoodporna podloga in gosta plast izolacije zagotavljata hlajenje, primerljivo z izdelki vodilnih znamk na trgu. Poleg tega se prilega prostoru za shranjevanje v premcu WaveRunnerjev serij FX, VX in GP1800.
description.en: This cooler is ideal for keeping your beverages and snacks cool while on the water, or for any other outdoor activity. The zippered storage compartment easily holds 18 cans plus ice. The waterproof liner and high-density insulation keeps ice comparable to industry leading brands. It also fits in the bow storage compartment of the FX, VX, and GP1800 series WaveRunners..
Enhance the coolness of your Yamaha with this titanium slip-on muffler. It not only enhances the looks of the bike but also generates a performance increase.
description.sl-SI: Izboljša odličen videz vaše Yamahe.

description.en: By smoothing out the YZ250’s power delivery the GYTR® Heavy Flywheel delivers a less aggressive hit when you twist the throttle. Its increased inertia mass helps to keep momentum through corners and makes the bike more usable – especially in muddy and sandy conditions.
description.sl-SI: Težji vztrajnik GYTR® izravna moč vozila YZ250 in poskrbi za manj agresivno pospeševanje, kadar navijete ročico plina. Povečana vztrajnostna masa pomaga pri ohranjanju zagona skozi zavoje in tako je motor bolj uporaben – še posebej v blatnih in peščenih pogojih.

Elegantne moške motoristične hlače za skuter, ki so obvezni kos za vožnjo po mestu v vseh vremenskih razmerah, omogočajo prezračevanje in udobje ter so zasnovane tako, da jih lahko oblečete čez kavbojke ali hlače. Te popolnoma vodoodporne nadhlače iz črne laminirane tkanine imajo po 2 žepa spredaj in zadaj, nastavljiv pas in robove ter stranske zadrge za zračenje. Za popolno opravo v videzu urbane mobilnosti se lahko hlače kombinirajo tudi z Yamahino motoristično jakno za skuter in motorističnimi rokavicami.
description.en: A must-have for urban commuting in all weathers, the stylish Scooter Men’s Riding pants offer ventilation and comfort and are designed to fit over jeans and trousers. Fully waterproof in black laminated fabric, these over pants feature 2 pockets front and back, adjustable waist and hems, and side zips for breathability. The pants also pair with Yamaha Scooter Riding Jacket and Riding Gloves for the complete urban mobility outfit.
Protection plate to be placed under the engine.

description.en: Fitting neatly in the R9 cockpit, this high quality vibration-resistant bracket is ideal for mounting a USB charger so you can always have your phone or other electronic devices charged up as you ride.

This cover provides the ultimate protection against fading and the elements. It comes with the Vacu-Hold strapless tow system, eliminating billowing and buffeting. Therefore, the cover conforms to the shape of your WaveRunner. Moreover, the EZ Release Dual 304 Stainless Steel Ratchet Tightening System is pre-tensioned and ready to ratchet upon an easy installation.

description.sl-SI: V svoj TRACER 9 prinesite zaščito v pustolovskem slogu s robustnimi ščitniki motorja. Konstrukcija jeklenih cevi zagotavlja močan okvir, ki zmanjša poškodbe v primeru padca.
description.en: Bring adventure-style protection to your TRACER 9 with the sturdy Engine Guards. Steel tube construction delivers a strong frame that minimises damage in case of a fall.

name.sl-SI: Moška motoristična jakna kolekcije Hyper Naked

description.sl-SI: Moška motoristična jakna kolekcije Hyper Naked, prežeta z duhom cestne vožnje, je prefinjen in privlačen izdelek v dveh odtenkih sive barve s poudarki v cian modri. Trpežen zunanji sloj iz poliestra in poliuretana ima ščitnike za ramena in komolce za brezskrbnost na cesti, z odsevnimi trakovi na rokah in snemljivo kapuco za dodatno vidljivost na cesti. Štirje zunanji in dva notranja žepa ponujajo dovolj prostora za bistvene stvari, medtem ko odstranljiva toplotna podloga z mrežico pod pazduho omogoča udobje v spreminjajočih se podnebjih. Prezračevalne zaplate omogočajo dodatno udobje na sedežu, natisnjeni logotipi Yamaha, MT in DSOJ pa krepko poudarijo urbani slog te privlačne jakne.
description.en: Infused with the street riding spirit, the Hyper Naked Men’s Riding Jacket is a subtle and striking item in two-tone grey with cyan highlights. A durable polyester-polyurethane shell features shoulder and elbow protectors for peace of mind on the road, with reflective strips on the arms and detachable hood for extra road visibility. Four outer and two inner pockets offer ample room for essentials, while the removable thermal lining with underarm mesh allows comfort in changing climates. Ventilation panels allow further comfort in the saddle, while printed Yamaha, MT and DSOJ logos add a flourish of urban style to this super-cool jacket.

Izdelane so iz najlona in elastana, kar zagotavlja čvrstost in trpežnost, imajo pa tudi nastavljiv pas in brezšivno sedežno površino za dodatno udobje. A mix of nylon and elastane ensures strength and durability, with an adjustable waist band and seamless seat area for extra comfort. Zip pockets let you carry essentials, with Yamaha and Alpinestars branding in iconic racing blue and white.

name.sl-SI: Dirkalni komplet GYTR® prve stopnje – modelno leto 2016–2018

description.en:
The GYTR® Racing Kit Stage 1 (MY16-MY18) includes all mandatory equipment based on the FIA (Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile) T4 regulations for Side-by-Sides. Equipped with this kit, the YXZ1000R is ready to compete in most competitions under National Sports Authorities and FIM.
Thanks to the plug-and-play design, no welding or modifications to the chassis are required. Together with the full assembly instructions, this allows any Yamaha SSV dealer or experienced mechanic to finish installation in about 16 hours.
The GYTR Racing Kit opens up a new world of Rally racing and offers a strong base for further improving skills and vehicle performance, for entry-level and experienced drivers.
This Stage 1 kit is developed for models with a front-mounted radiator and is suitable for YXZ1000R models from MY2016 – MY2018.

This kit includes:
description.sl-SI:
Dirkaški komplet GYTR® prve stopnje (modelno leto 2016–2018) vključuje vso potrebno opremo na osnovi FIA (Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile) pogojev T4 za modele Side-by-Side. Model YXZ1000R, opremljen s tem kompletom, je pripravljen za tekmovanje v večini tekmovanj pod okriljem nacionalnih športnih organov in FIM.
Zahvaljujoč preprosti zasnovi ni potrebno varjenje ali izvajanje modifikacij na šasiji. V kompletu s popolnimi navodili za sestavljanje lahko vsak prodajalec Yamahe SSV ali izkušen mehanik zaključi namestitev v približno 16-ih urah.
Dirkaški komplet GYTR odpira nov svet reli dirkanja ter ponuja močno podlago za nadaljnje izboljšanje spretnosti in zmogljivosti vozila, tako začetnikom kot tudi izkušenim voznikom.
Ta komplet prve stopnje je razvit za modele s spredaj nameščenim hladilnikom in je primeren za YXZ1000R od modelnega leta 2016 do modelnega leta 2018.

Ta komplet vključuje:

description.en: Take your Ténéré to next level with the GYTR Performance Kit. Boosting power by up to 9 HP, this upgrade features a lightweight race exhaust system from Akrapovič, as well as the GYTR ECU and air filter kit that further enhance performance. And for improved control in the most challenging terrain, the GYTR footrest set is designed to facilitate grip and reduce mud cumulation. The final component in the Performance kit is a clutch cover upgrade, with a GYTR branded billet aluminium split cover allowing easy access to the clutch's inner workings for quick servicing between rally stages. Easy to install by retaining stock components, it's the must-have enhancement for your off-road racing experience.

description.sl-SI: Ta vizir "double bubble" je višji od standardne izvedbe. Zagotavlja boljšo zaščito pred vetrom in vam prihrani utrujenost na dolgih vožnjah pri velikih hitrostih.

description.en: An essential of any MX rider’s wardrobe, the MX Men’s Jersey is a lightweight and flexible must-have for your days in the dirt. A moisture wicking blend of polyester and elastane ensures constant comfort in all conditions, with mesh inserts for extra air flow and ventilation. Ergonomic sleeves with stretch cuffs give you an optimum riding position, with a seamless taped neck for effortless movement. Sublimated Yamaha, Alpinestars and GYTR branding completes a classic motocross look.
description.sl-SI: Lahkoten in prilagodljiv moški dres MX je nepogrešljiv kos v garderobi vsakega voznika modela MX, ki vas bo spremljal na terenu. Izdelan je iz poliestra in elastana, ki odvajata vlago, zagotavlja nenehno udobje v vseh razmerah ter vključuje mrežaste dele za dodaten pretok zraka. Ergonomski rokavi z raztegljivimi manšetami omogočajo najugodnejši vozni položaj, izrez z lepljenimi šivi pa lahkotno gibanje. Sublimirani logotipi Yamaha, Alpinestars in GYTR dopolnjujejo klasičen motokrosistični videz.

name.en: Öhlins Cartridge Kit NIX30 for R7
name.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX30 za R7

description.en: The Road&Track 30 mm front fork cartridge kit from Öhlins is based on experience gained from World Supersport and  Superstock Championships. It doesn’t matter if you are heading for a National Road Racing title or if you are taking your bike to the local race track. This cartridge kit will give you loads of performance, stable damping characteristics and fantastic comfort. The kit has a unique design with compression damping and the adjustment on the left leg and rebound damping and the adjustment on the right leg – so all adjustments are made at the top together with the spring preload.
description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov za sprednje vilice Road&Track 30 mm Öhlins temelji na izkušnjah, pridobljenih na svetovnem prvenstvu Supersport in prvenstvih Superstock. Ni pomembno, ali se borite za naslov državnega prvaka v motociklizmu ali pa z motornim kolesom dirkate na lokalnem dirkališču. Ta komplet vložkov vam zagotavlja boljše zmogljivosti, zanesljivo blaženje in izredno udobje. Komplet ima edinstveno zasnovo s kompresijskim blaženjem in nastavitvijo za levo nogo ter povratnim blaženjem in nastavitvijo za desno nogo – vse nastavitve lahko prilagajate na zgornjem delu, hkrati z nastavitvijo trdote vzmetenja.

name.en: Storage Cover for the GP Series

description.en: Keep your investment looking its best, and protect it from the elements. This cover provides the ultimate protection against fading and the elements. description.sl-SI: Dež in veter ne bi smela biti ovira pri aktivnostih, prav tako pa ne bi smela vplivati na vaš užitek in udobje pri vožnji. Razvili smo zaščito za sprednji del telesa, ki uporablja posebno tehnologijo varjenja, ki vas ščiti pred mrazom in dežjem, da vam bo tudi v težjih vremenskih pogojih udobno in boste ostali varni.
Z našimi originalnimi pokrovi lahko doživite vrhunsko zaščito vašega Waverunnerja.
description.en: With our genuine covers, you can experience ultimate protection for your Waverunner.
GYTR® Front Sprocket for 520 Chain conversion

description.sl-SI: Če želite svoj MT-03 povzdigniti na višjo raven, se odločite za skrbno izbrano dodatno opremo kompleta Yamaha Sport Pack. Športni paket, ki ga sestavljajo športni vizir, menjalnik za hitro prestavljanje, blazina za rezervoar, nosilec registrske tablice in ščitnik verige, daje vašemu MT-03 še bolj agresiven videz in občutek. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše motorno kolo.
description.en: If you want to take your MT-03 to the next level, the carefully selected accessories of the Yamaha Sport Pack are the way to go. Consisting of a sport screen, quickshifter, tank pad, licence plate holder and chain guard, the Sport Pack gives your MT-03 an even more aggressive look and a sharper feel. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your motorcycle.

name.sl-SI: Nepremočljiva jakna Paddock Blue za ženske

description.en: The jacket you want to be wearing in the rain, the Paddock Blue Women’s Waterproof Jacket offers functionality, protection from the elements and a cosy feel. With a blend of polyester  and elastane in the shell, the jacket features dense fabric and taped seams for 100% waterproofing. Internal mesh panels provide ventilation, with a fixed hood adding layer of weather protection. Yamaha branding on the chest, sleeve and back adds a final flourish of style.
description.sl-SI: Nepremočljiva jakna Paddock Blue za ženske je funkcionalna, ščiti pred vremenskimi vplivi in prinaša prijeten občutek, zato je prva izbira za deževne dni. Zunanji sloj je iz poliestra in elastana, poleg tega se jakna ponaša z gosto tkanino in lepljenimi šivi za 100-odstotno odpornost proti vodi. Notranji mrežasti deli zagotavljajo zračenje, fiksna kapuca pa dodatno zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi. Yamahini logotipi na prsih, rokavih in hrbtu poskrbijo za popoln modni slog.
Omogočite razkošno vožnjo na dolge razdalje s zadnjim udobnim sedežem. Zasnovan izključno za TRACER 7, je obvezen za redne potovalce in pustolovce.
description.en: Enable a luxurious, long-distance pillion ride with the Rear Comfort Seat. Designed exclusively for the TRACER 7, this is a must-have for regular tourers and adventurers.

description.sl-SI: Komplet pokrovov ogledal se odlično ujema z opcijskim levim in desnim ogledalom. Pokrovi, ki jih izdeluje družba Gilles Tooling iz eloksiranega mat črnega aluminija, imajo vgravirane logotipe in zagotavljajo eleganten način za ohranjanje čistega videza po odstranitvi originalnih ogledal.
description.en: The Mirror Cover Set pairs perfectly with the optional left and right mirrors. Made from anodized matte black billet aluminum by Gilles Tooling, with engraved logos, it offers a stylish way to maintain a clean look after removing the original mirrors.
Popular, easy-to-use anchor bag system. Simply fill the anchor bag with heavy objects such as rocks or sand and close with the plastic, non-corrosive zipper.
GYTR Front fork bracket for mounting side mounted steering damper

Offer additional protection from mud and water.
description.sl-SI: Zagotavljajo dodatno zaščito pred blatom in vodo.

description.en: Made out of heavy duty plastic, these bags are designed to hold shape and stand up on their own. After a day of boating, cleanse your engine with fresh water. Just fill the bag until the water passes the intake inlets and idle your engine in neutral for 5 to 10 minutes. Finally, unscrew the drain plug and let the water flow out.
description.sl-SI: Vrečke so izdelane iz trpežne plastike in so zasnovani tako, da ne spremenijo obliko in lahko samostojno stojijo. Po dnevu na vodi očistite motor s sladko vodo. Napolnite vrečko, dokler voda ne pride do sesalnega priključka, in motor pustite v prostem teku od 5 do 10 minut. Nato odvijte odtočni čep in pustite, da voda izteče.

description.sl-SI: Uživajte v vožnji tudi v slabem vremenu z zaščito za sprednji del telesa. Zaščita za sprednji del telesa je nepremočljiva, ima plasti za ohranjanje toplote in pokriva noge, s čimer zagotavlja udobje med vožnjo v mokrem in vetrovnem vremenu.
description.en: Enjoy the ride even in bad weather with the Apron. Water-resistant and layered for warmth, the apron covers your legs, providing comfort during wet and windy rides.
Protects intake from dust and / or after intrusion during cleaning of the bike.

Združljiv je z obstoječimi zvočniki za plovila FX/VX/EX iz leta 2020 in novejšimi ter zvočniki za FX/VX/EX iz leta 2019. Deluje v kombinaciji z globokotonskim zvočnikom iz leta 2021 oz. brez njega.

description.sl-SI: Ekskluzivna zasnova in izdelava iz visokokakovostnih materialov – ta vrhunski udoben sedež poskrbi za še bolj sproščeno in prijetno vožnjo.

Paket Style daje vašemu modelu R7 še privlačnejši profil na cesti in poskrbi za še večje navdušenje nad tem kompaktnim supersport motorjem.  Ta paket originalnih dodatkov vsebuje sistem hitrega prestavljanja, ki omogoča prestavljanje brez sklopke za še hitrejše in enakomernejše pospeševanje. Zatemnjen športni vizir in lahek nosilec registrske tablice dajeta vašemu R7 še bolj dinamičen videz – stranske obloge rezervoarja za gorivo pa omogočajo boljši nadzor nad motociklom. Za osvetlitev poskrbijo natančno zasnovani zaporedni LED-smerniki spredaj in zadaj, ki zagotavljajo boljšo vidljivost in estetsko privlačnost. Ščitnik ročice sprednje zavore v dirkaškem slogu pa kaže na čistokrvno dirkaško DNK. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo v paketu Style za R7 z veseljem namestil na vaše motorno kolo.
description.en: The Style Pack gives your R7 an even sharper profile on the street and increases the thrill factor of this slim-lined Supersport!  This Genuine Accessories pack comes with a quick shifter that enables clutchless gear shifting for even faster and smoother acceleration. The dark-smoked sport screen and lightweight license plate holder give a more dynamic look to your R7 – while the tank side grip pads provide you with extra controllability. Illuminate your journey with precision-engineered Sequential LED Blinker sets on both front and rear, for enhanced visibility and aesthetic appeal. While the racing-style billet front brake lever guard shows its pure race-bred DNA. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit the high quality Genuine Accessories in this R7 Style Pack to your motorcycle.

description.sl-SI: Ta eleganten sedež, zasnovan izključno za model MT-09, vašemu sopotniku zagotavlja dodatno udobje na dolgih vožnjah.
description.en: Exclusively designed for the MT-09, this stylish seat provides your passenger with extra comfort on long-distance rides.

description.sl-SI: Ekskluzivno zasnovan eleganten sedež, ki nadomešča originalnega in vam zagotavlja več udobja na potovanju.
description.en: Exclusively designed, stylish seat - replacing the original - providing extra comfort on your journey.
To be used when the optional racing cover kit is fitted or when passenger footpeg mounts are removed.
description.sl-SI: Za uporabo, ko je nameščen izbirni komplet dirkalnih pokrovčkov ali ko so odstranjene stopalke za sopotnika.
Polnilnik USB-C za hitro polnjenje omogoča napajanje telefona ali drugih elektronskih naprav, da ste lahko vedno povezani in ostanete na tekočem, obenem pa uživate v vožnji.
description.en: The USB-C fast charger gives you the possibility to charge your phone or other electronic devices so you can always stay connected and in touch while enjoying your ride.

name.sl-SI: Adapterski komplet z obročem za namestitev torbe na rezervoar za gorivo

description.sl-SI: Komplet omogoča namestitev izbirne torbe na rezervoar za gorivo vaše Yamahe za dodaten prtljažni prostor.
description.en: Kit that enables you to mount one of the optional Tank Bags on your Yamaha for extra luggage capacity.
GYTR® Rear Sprocket with 43T for 520 Chain conversion for Marchesini wheels

description.sl-SI: Uporabite protivibracijski modul SP Connect™, da dodatno zmanjšate vibracije za različne frekvenčne razpone. Razvoj tega novega izdelka je odziv na kompleksnost novejših modelov pametnih telefonov, pri katerih so fotoaparati sestavljeni iz močno občutljivih sestavnih delov. Posebej razviti elastomer blaži premike v vseh smereh in zaustavi do 60 % vibracij (npr. iz agregata motocikla), ki bi lahko vplivale na mehanski stabilizator slike fotoaparata. Vaš pametni telefon je tako zaščiten in ostaja stabilen ter varno nameščen, tako da lahko med potjo navigacijo preprosto uporabljate.
description.en: Use the SP Connect™ Anti Vibration Module to further reduce vibrations for a variety of frequency ranges. The development of this new product is a reaction to the complexity of newer smartphone models, whose camera systems consist of increasingly sensitive components. The specially developed elastomer inlay dampens in all directions and stops up to 60% of vibrations (e.g. from the motorcycle engine) that could affect the mechanical image stabilizer of the camera. This not only protects your smartphone, but it remains stable and securely mounted so that you can easily navigate while on the road.

name.sl-SI: Komplet za nastavitev šob GYTR za YZ125

description.sl-SI: S tem kompletom za nastavitev šob nastavite svoj serijski uplinjač za boljše delovanje in odzivnost plina pri vseh vrtljajih.
description.en: Adjust your stock carburetor with this jetting kit for improved running performance and throttle response throughout the RPM range.

description.sl-SI: Uživajte v oprijemu in slogu na svoji Yamahi XMAX s ploščami za noge. Ploščici, ki sta izdelani iz anodiziranega aluminija s trpežnimi gumijastimi vložki, se prilegata na spodnji del talne plošče za noge XMAX, ter tako poskrbita za slog in funkcionalnost med vožnjo.
description.en: Enjoy grip and style on your Yamaha XMAX with the foot plates. Made from anodized aluminium with durable rubber inserts, these plates fit to the bottom of the XMAX foot boards and add style and function while riding.

name.sl-SI: Kratka majica Sports Heritage za moške

description.en: An iconic and colourful essential for XSR fans, the Sports Heritage Men’s T-Shirt delivers a relaxed fit in burnt orange and white. An enzyme finish gives this cotton and elastane tee a retro faded look, with Yamaha and Sports Heritage badges on the chest and sleeve combining with a Yamaha print on the back for an all-round, classic look.
description.sl-SI: Kratka majica Sports Heritage za moške je ikonski in barvit kos oblačila za ljubitelje motornih koles XSR ter je oblikovana v ohlapnem kroju v zapečeni oranžni in beli barvi. Zunanji sloj iz encimov majici iz bombaža in elastana omogoča bled retro videz, logotipa Yamaha in Sports Heritage na prsih in rokavih v kombinaciji z Yamahinim potiskom na hrbtu pa ponujata celovit klasičen videz.

description.en: Featuring lateral ribs to prevent you sliding when accelerating, this seat cover features the blue/black MX factory racing finish.
description.sl-SI: Ta prevleka za sedež, ki je ob straneh narebrena, da prepreči zdrs med pospeševanjem, je prevlečena z modro/črno tovarniško tekmovalno prevleko MX.

Pripravite svoj TRACER 9 GT na kilometre asfalta s paketom Explorer. Nabor vrhunskih dodatkov za udobje, shranjevanje in zaščito za izboljšane funkcije.

Vsebuje: potovalni vizir, ogrevane udobne sedeže za voznika in sopotnika, nosilec plošče za zgornji kovček, 45-litrski zgornji kovček brez ključa, enoto za zaklepanje zgornjega kovčka brez ključa, ploščo za zgornji kovček, hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček, komplet ključev za cilindrično ključavnico, nosilec meglenk, komplet meglenk LED, ščitnike agregata in zaščito hladilnika.
description.en:
Prepare your TRACER 9 GT to face miles of asphalt, with the Explorer Pack. A range of premium comfort, storage and protection accessories for improved functions.

Contains: Touring Screen, Heated Seat for Rider & Passenger,  Top Case Mounting Plate, Keyless Top Case 45L, Keyless Top Case Lock Unit, Top Case Plate, Backrest Top Case, Fog Light Stay, LED Fog Light Kit, Engine Guards and Radiator Guard.

description.sl-SI: Ta komplet vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins je potreben za namestitev kompleta vložkov NIX 22 Öhlins, odvisno od teže voznika (brez opreme).

Paket Adventure, ki je idealen za opremljanje vašega Ténéré 700 za osvajanje divjine, vključuje vrhunski izbor dodatkov za shranjevanje in zaščito. Komplet mehkih stranskih torb ponuja kar 44 litrov prostora za vse potrebščine na potovanju, medtem ko 4 mm debela trpežna zaščitna plošča ščiti vaše motorno kolo pred neravnim terenom in drobirjem. Zaščitne cevi Adventure zagotavljajo zanesljivo zaščito v primeru padcev, vodilo verige pa omogoča neprekinjeno delovanje na najtežjih poteh. Za dodaten nadzor, stranske blazinice omogočajo vrhunski oprijem, ko se spopadate z zahtevnim terenom.
description.en:
Contains: Soft Side Bag Set, Side Case Stays, Soft Side Bags Adapter, Heavy Duty Skid Plate, Side Grip Pads, Adventure Panel Guard, Chain Guide.

Ideal for equipping your Ténéré 700 to conquer the wilds, the Adventure Pack includes a premium selection of storage and protection accessories. The Soft Side Bag Set offers an ample 44L capacity for all your journey’s essentials, while the 4mm-thick Heavy Duty Skid Plate shields your bike from rough terrain and debris. Adventure Panel Guard provides reliable protection in case of falls and the Chain Guide ensures uninterrupted performance on the toughest trails. For added control, the Side Grip Pads deliver superior grip when standing to tackle challenging terrain.

With the carefully selected accessories of the Travel Pack you can prepare your TRACER 7 for any journey. Consisting of a comfort seat, high screen, USB adapter, city side cases, left and right, with stays and lock set, the Travel Pack provides increased comfort and added practicality wherever you may go. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your motorcycle.
description.sl-SI: Če redno premagujete dolge razdalje, potem je komplet Travel Pack prava izbira za vas. Kmalu boste cenili prednosti izjemno udobnega sedeža in vetrnega ščita, stranski torbi za mestno vožnjo, ki ju je mogoče zakleniti, pa sta videti odlično ter izboljšata praktičnost motorja pri vsakodnevni uporabi.

description.en: Experience the best of TRACER 9 touring with the Heated Rider Comfort Seat, featuring a firm foam base covered with dual material skin. Integrated heat control is easily accessed for comfort on the move.

description.en: Forged aluminium front wheel with low centre of gravity made for the R1/R6 by Marchesini. The use of multi-directional aluminum alloy forging and the use of shapes optimized for the final geometry of the wheel make it possible to obtain a very light material with exceptional mechanical specifications.

description.sl-SI: Kratek in eleganten vizir za še izrazitejši videz vašega modela MT-09 in boljšo zaščito pred vetrom.
description.en: Short stylish screen to enforce the looks of your MT-09 and increase wind protection.

These Genuine Yamaha Rock Sliders let you explore further - and more easily. They add a super-tough layer of extra protection to the vehicle’s chassis and sides, so you can take on the roughest, most demanding trails with total confidence.
description.sl-SI: Ti originalni Yamahini ščitniki pred udarci kamnov vam omogočajo, da greste v svojem raziskovanju dlje – brez kakršnih koli težav. Zagotavljajo izredno odporno dodatno zaščito za šasijo in bočna dela vozila, zato se lahko na najzahtevnejše poti podate povsem samozavestno.

Avanturistične motoristične rokavice so kot nalašč za sezonsko vožnjo ter zagotavljajo zaščito in udobje na poti. Rokavice so zasnovane v črnih, sivih in rjavih odtenkih, narejene pa so iz mešanice kozjega usnja in funkcionalnih materialov, ki omogočajo gibljivost in okretnost, za večjo brezskrbnost po neravnih terenih pa skrbita brezšivna zaščita za členke in površina iz aramidnih vlaken. Kratka manšeta in perforirana površina zagotavljata dobro zračnost. Rokavice lahko kombinirate tudi z avanturistično motoristično jakno in hlačami, ki dopolnjujejo osupljivo garderobo Yamaha v avanturističnem slogu.
description.en: Perfect for mid-season riding, the Adventure Riding Gloves offer protection and comfort on the move. Designed in tones of black, grey and brown, the gloves are made from a blend of goat leather and technical materials that ensures mobility and dexterity, with seamless knuckle protection and Aramid surface for confidence over rough terrains. A short cuff and perforated surface offer good breathability. The gloves also pair with the Adventure Riding Jacket and Pants to complete the stunning Yamaha Adventure wardrobe!

description.en: Made by racing protection specialists GBRacing, the GBRacing Coolant Hose Cover protects vital coolant parts from accidents and drops. A snug fit with added style and function.
No holes to drill, no tools required, no scratching! Attaches to any clean, smooth, non-porous surface. Dash, console, or windshield mount. Fully adjustable 10,1cm x 20,3cm mirror.
description.sl-SI: Brez vrtanja lukenj, brez orodja in brez prask. Pritrdi se lahko na katero koli čisto, gladko in neporozno površino. Nosilec za armaturno ploščo, konzolo ali vetrobransko steklo. Popolnoma nastavljivo ogledalo velikosti 10,1 x 20,3 cm.

description.en: The ultimate Travel gear for your TRACER 9 to hit the road in full functional style. The High screen, the Add-on Wide Screen and Heated Comfort Seat provide the extra comfort for those long endless roads. The Top Case gives you the perfect tool to take your belongings along with you on your endeavors combined with the stylish Side Cases of the TRACER 9 GT. Charge your phone easily with the USB Charger while you , keep an eye on your tire pressure with the Tire Pressure Monitoring tool. The pack also has a dedicated GPS stay to help you clamp your GPS securely. The Side Stand Extension gives your motorcycle more stability on any surface when parked, the Radiator Guard protects your radiator against those pesky stones and loose gravel that are in your trail, while the Engine guard gives protection against unintended falls. The LED Fog Lights increase visibility in bad weather conditions for optimal safety. While you enjoy your ride, we made sure your passenger is pampered as well. They will enjoy the comfort of the Passenger Comfort Seat and the Backrest.
description.sl-SI: Najboljša potovalna oprema za vaš TRACER 9. Odpravite se na pot z uporabnim slogom. Visok zaščitni vizir, dodaten širok zaščitni vizir, ogrevane ročke in ogrevan udoben sedež za več udobja na dolgih neskončnih cestah. Zgornji kovček je v kombinaciji s stranskima kovčkoma TRACER 9 GT popolno orodje za prevoz lastnine na popotovanjih. Telefon lahko enostavno napolnite s polnilnikom USB med uporabo orodja za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah. Paket ima tudi namenski nosilec za GPS, ki omogoča varno pritrditev navigacije. Zaradi podaljška stranskega nosilca je parkirani motocikel stabilnejši na vseh površinah, zaščita hladilnika ščiti hladilnik pred nadležnimi kamenčki in peskom, ki se znajdejo na poti, zaščita agregata pa nudi zaščito pred neželenimi padci. Za boljšo varnost poskrbijo LED meglenke, ki izboljšajo vidljivost v slabem vremenu. Poskrbeli smo, da med vožnjo ne boste uživali le vi, ampak tudi sopotnik. Sopotniki lahko uživajo v udobju, ki ga nudita udoben sovoznikov sedež in naslonjalo.

description.en: Offering premium style and quality for cold weather riding, the multi-fabric Men’s Winter Gloves feature insulation layers and leather for warmth and protection in two-tone black and grey. Level 1 knuckle protection fits seamlessly for movement and safety, with waterproof layering for extra protection from the elements. Touchscreen material and Amara fabric allow smartphone use and visor cleaning. A perfect item for enjoying and controlling your tide in the cold.
description.sl-SI: Moške zimske rokavice iz več tkanin odlikujeta vrhunski slog in kakovost za vožnjo v hladnem vremenu, izolacijske plasti in usnje pa zagotavljajo toploto in zaščito v dvobarvni črno-sivi kombinaciji. Zaščita za členke 1. stopnje se brezhibno prilega za neovirano gibanje in varnost, vodoodporni sloj pa zagotavlja dodatno zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi. Material, primeren za zaslon na dotik, in tkanina Amara omogočata uporabo pametnega telefona in čiščenje vizirja. Popolna izbira za prijetno vožnjo v hladnem vremenu.

description.en: When fitting this catalytic converter to the optional non street legal slip-on mufflers, these mufflers are transformed into street legal

Lahkotne moške hlače MTB so zasnovane za gorsko kolesarjenje v zahtevnih razmerah ter zagotavljajo veliko udobja in zračnosti. description.en: Designed for mountain biking in tough conditions, the lightweight MTB Men’s Pants offer great comfort and breathability. Constructed from multiple panels in a strong but flexible nylon and elastane blend, the pants feature an adjustable waistband, zip pockets for essentials and a seamless seat area. Yamaha and Alpinestars branding complete this must-have MTB look.

description.en:
Fuel your passion for paddling with the Yamaha Telescopic Paddle. Its adaptable design and effortless adjustment let you focus on the joy of the journey.

Effortlessly adjust your paddle length from 50 to 114 cm with a simple twist for optimal paddling in any situation. 
The lightweight design allows convenient storage under boat seats or in WaveRunner compartments thanks to the aluminium shaft that cleverly hides inside the blade. 
Built to last, the paddle features a corrosion-resistant aluminium shaft, a hassle-free locking mechanism, and a high-impact moulded blade and boat hook handle.
Fully adjustable add-on screen to increase weather protection

Nadgradite svoj TRACER 9 GT+ s 'Travel Pack Pro' za neprimerljivo udobje in funkcionalnost. Visok vizir in dodaten širok zaščitni vizir omogočata boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sedež za sopotnika pa zagotavljata udobno vožnjo. Ostanite obveščeni s sistemom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) in kompletom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah. Zaščitite motorno kolo s ščitnikom hladilnika in zaščito agregata 'Explorer' ter povečajte vidljivost s kompletom meglenk LED. Zavarujte opremo z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, zgornjim kovčkom in naslonom. Ta paket združuje vrhunske funkcije za vrhunsko potovalno izkušnjo.
description.en: Upgrade your TRACER 9 GT+ with the Travel Pack Pro for unmatched comfort and functionality. The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen enhance wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat ensure a cozy ride. Stay informed with the TPMS and Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit. Protect your bike with the Radiator Guard, Explorer Engine Guard, and add visibility with the LED Fog Light Kit. Secure your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Top Case, and Backrest. This pack combines premium features for a superior travel experience.

Ténéré 700 is built to take you off the beaten track and move you over to new horizons. The Explorer Pack contains the complete ensemble of accessories to support this journey of discovery. The aluminium side cases with 72L capacity ensure you have enough space to pack up and go at a moment's notice. To carry even extra luggage, the Explorer Pack features an easily mountable mono seat rack, with flat surface, that allows faster setting up of additional bags. With all that luggage, it's imperative to have good bike stability when parked and that's why the Explorer Pack is equipped with a center stand. For added protection, the pack also features a skid plate and an engine guard, so your Ténéré 700 can withstand those long-distance travels. Are you ready to make the next horizon yours?
description.sl-SI: Ténéré 700 je ustvarjen, da vas odpelje z običajnih cest in vam odpre nove svetove. Paket Explorer vsebuje vso dodatno opremo, ki jo potrebujete za take raziskovalne izlete v neznano. Aluminijasta kovčka s prostornino 72 litrov vam zagotavljata dovolj prostora za prtljago, zato se lahko na pot odpravite brez posebnih priprav. Paket Explorer vsebuje še prtljažnik za dodatno prtljago za enojni sedež, ki ga lahko preprosto namestite, na njegovo ravno površino pa lahko hitro pritrdite dodatne torbe. Vsa ta količina prtljage zahteva tudi stabilno parkiranje, zato je paket Explorer opremljen tudi s sredinskim stojalom. Za dodatno zaščito paket vključuje še ščitno ploščo in ščitnik motorja, da vaš Ténéré 700 prenese tudi najdaljša potovanja. Ste pripravljeni, da osvojite naslednje obzorje?

Poslovite se od hladnih voženj! Ne glede na to, ali se vozite po mestu ali raziskujete nove poti, naš ogrevani sedež poskrbi, da vam je toplo in udobno. Naš ogrevan sedež, ki je kot nalašč za zgodnje jutranje vožnje ali hladna večerna križarjenja, spremeni vaš skuter v prevozno sredstvo za celo leto.
description.en: Say goodbye to chilly rides! Whether you're commuting through the city or exploring new routes, our heated seat keeps you warm and cozy. Perfect for early morning rides or those chilly evening cruises, our heated seat transforms your scooter into a year-round ride.

name.sl-SI: Dirkalni komplet GYTR® druge stopnje FIA

description.en:
The GYTR® Racing Kit Stage 2 FIA is additional to the GYTR Racing Kit Stage 1 (2HCRALLYKT01 / B5HRALLYKT01) and includes those items that are mandatory for the FIA European or World Cross-country cups. With both kits installed, the YXZ1000R complies fully with the FIA T4 requirements. The Stage 2 kit includes plug-and-play fuel cells, an automatic fire extinguisher system and an additional bulkhead section behind the seats.

This kit includes:
description.sl-SI:
Dirkalni komplet GYTR® druge stopnje, skladen s predpisi FIA, je dodatek za dirkalni komplet GYTR prve stopnje (2HCRALLYKT01/B5HRALLYKT01), ki vključuje elemente, obvezne za terenske dirke v okviru evropskega in svetovnega pokala FIA. Po namestitvi obeh kompletov vozilo YXZ1000R ustreza zahtevam FIA T4. Komplet druge stopnje vključuje vtične gorivne celice, samodejni gasilni sistem ter dodaten pregradni del za sedeži.

The waist is adjustable via a buckle, with hip and cargo pockets and a single rear pocket for extra utility. Embroidered Yamaha branding in white creates a stand out look that’s at home everywhere.

Velikost pasu lahko nastavljate z zaponko, na bokih imajo velika žepa in en zadnji žep za večjo uporabnost. Izvezen logotip Yamaha v beli barvi pritegne poglede in ustvarja prijeten videz prav povsod.

The Tricity is an embodiment of convenience, making commuting simple, easy and fun. With such high dose of practicality, the Urban pack is aimed at increasing the options for Customers to offer additional comfort and space through its various accessories. The high screen provides greater protection against wind, meaning your journeys will never be tiring or uncomfortable. To increase the storage space, we included the rear carrier and the new 34L top case, which also increases the style quotient of the Tricity. There’s no style without substance and  we have thought about the passenger’s comfort as well and hence we include the backrest pad for the top case. We wanted to provide an easy way for our customers to recharge their devices on the go, and hence have included the USB charging port. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.
description.sl-SI: Tricity je simbol udobja, zato je vsakodnevna vožnja preprosta in zabavna. Paket 'Urban' je izredno praktičen in z različnimi dodatki uporabniku omogoča boljše udobje med vožnjo in več prostora. Visok vizir poskrbi za boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, kar pomeni, da vaša vožnja nikoli ne bo utrujajoča ali neudobna. Da bi povečali prostor za shranjevanje, smo dodali zadnji nosilec in novi 34-litrski zgornji kovček, ki izboljšata videz vašega skuterja Tricity. Poskrbeli smo, da lahko sopotnik uživa v udobju in se vozi s stilom, zato smo dodali blazino za naslon za zadnji kovček. Strankam smo želeli omogočiti enostaven način polnjenja svojih naprav med vožnjo, zato smo dodali vrata USB za polnjenje. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity.

name.en: Hard Cab Enclosure System Glass Rear Window
name.sl-SI: Stekleno zadnje okno kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi

description.en: Yamaha is offering all the components of the Hard Cab Enclosure System separately for added customer convenience. Accessing the cargo area with ease is one of the key factors in the fully functional Wolverine X4. This glass rear window opens utilizing familiar gas struts like those of a SUV to hold the glass up while the window is open (window must be closed while in drive).The fully lockable window keeps your items secure from unwanted company. When paired with the Rear Cargo Box that maximizes rear cargo space, you get a truly versatile package ready to conquer the outdoors!
description.sl-SI: Yamaha za lažjo uporabo vse sestavne dele kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi ponuja ločeno. Ena ključnih značilnosti polnofunkcionalnega modela Wolverine X4 je preprost dostop do prtljažnega prostora. To stekleno zadnje okno se odpre s pomočjo že poznanih plinskih vzmeti, kot so tiste pri športnih terencih, ki zadržijo steklo v zgornjem položaju, ko je okno odprto (med vožnjo mora biti okno zaprto). Ker se da okno v celoti zakleniti, so vaši predmeti varni pred nepridipravi. Če poleg tega uporabljate še zadnji tovorni kovček, ki poveča prtljažni prostor zadaj, je vaš vsestranski paket opreme pripravljen na dogodivščine na prostem!

description.en: Rain and wind shouldn't stop you from activities, and neither should they affect your riding pleasure and comfort. We developed the Apron, which uses special welding technology, to keep you warm and dry, so you can be more comfortable and safe during harsh weather conditions.
description.sl-SI: Dež in veter ne bi smela biti ovira pri aktivnostih, prav tako pa ne bi smela vplivati na vaš užitek in udobje pri vožnji. Razvili smo zaščito za sprednji del telesa, ki uporablja posebno tehnologijo varjenja, ki vas ščiti pred mrazom in dežjem, da vam bo tudi v težjih vremenskih pogojih udobno in boste ostali varni.

description.en: A must-have for those rugged off-road adventures, the Enduro gloves for men offer protection, ventilation and comfort. A flexible triple black fabric blend assures easy mobility and dexterity, with reinforced palms and knuckle protection that do not hinder movement. A reinforced thumb gives better handlebar grip and comfort, with classic Yamaha branding and racing blue stripes adding a playful splash of colour.

Prožna črna tkanina iz mešanice treh materialov zagotavlja enostavno gibljivost in okretnost, z ojačanimi dlanmi in zaščito za členke, ki ne ovira gibanja. Ojačan palec omogoča boljši oprijem ter udobje pri držanju krmila, klasični Yamahin logotip in modre dirkaške črte pa poskrbijo za igriv barvni poudarek.
