description.en: Ténéré 700 is built to take you off the beaten track and move you over to new horizons. The Explorer Pack contains the complete ensemble of accessories to support this journey of discovery. The aluminium side cases with 72L capacity ensure you have enough space to pack up and go at a moment's notice. To carry even extra luggage, the Explorer Pack features an easily mountable mono seat rack, with flat surface, that allows faster setting up of additional bags. With all that luggage, it's imperative to have good bike stability when parked and that's why the Explorer Pack is equipped with a center stand. For added protection, the pack also features a skid plate and an engine guard, so your Ténéré 700 can withstand those long-distance travels. Are you ready to make the next horizon yours?
description.sl-SI: Ténéré 700 je ustvarjen za to, da vas odpelje z običajnih cest in vam odpre nova obzorja. Paket Explorer vsebuje vso dodatno opremo, ki jo potrebujete za takšne raziskovalne izlete v neznano. Aluminijasta kovčka s prostornino 72 litrov vam zagotavljata dovolj prostora za prtljago, zato se lahko na pot odpravite brez posebnih priprav. Paket Explorer vsebuje še prtljažnik za dodatno prtljago za enojni sedež, ki ga lahko preprosto namestite, na njegovo ravno površino pa lahko hitro pritrdite dodatne torbe. Vsa ta količina prtljage zahteva stabilno parkiranje, zato je paket Explorer opremljen tudi s sredinskim stojalom. Za dodatno zaščito paket vključuje še drsno ploščo in ščitnik motorja, da vaš Ténéré 700 prenese tudi najdaljša potovanja. Ste pripravljeni, da osvojite naslednje obzorje?

description.en: Stylish, black aluminium radiator cover
description.sl-SI: Eleganten, črn aluminijast pokrov hladilnika
Uživajte v vožnjah na dolge razdalje z udobnim sovoznikovim sedežem. Zasnovan izključno za MT-07 slog.
description.en: Enjoy long-distance pilion comfort with the Passenger Comfort Seat. Designed exclusively for MT-07 style.

name.sl-SI: Nepremočljiva jakna Paddock Blue za moške

description.en: The garment you need trackside when the weather turns, the Paddock Blue Men’s Waterproof Jacket offers functionality, comfort and protection from the elements. With a mix of polyester   and elastane in the shell and lining, this jacket is 100% waterproof thanks to dense fabric and taped seams. Internal mesh panels allow good ventilation, while the fixed hood adds another layer of weather protection. Yamaha branding on the chest, sleeve and back adds a final flourish of style.
description.sl-SI: Nepremočljiva jakna Paddock Blue za moške je funkcionalna, zagotavlja udobje in zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi ter jo preprosto morate imeti za takrat, ko se na dirkališču spremeni vreme. Zunanji sloj in obloga sta izdelana iz poliestra in elastana, zaradi goste tkanine in lepljenih šivov pa je jakna popolnoma vodoodporna. Mrežasti deli v notranjosti omogočajo dobro zračenje, fiksna kapuca pa ponuja dodatno zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi. Yamahini logotipi na prsih, rokavih in hrbtu poskrbijo za popoln modni slog.

description.en: Water-resistant case liners to protect your equipment in different weather conditions
description.sl-SI: Vodoodporna podloga kovčka, ki ščiti vašo opremo v različnih vremenskih razmerah

name.sl-SI: Pogonski sklopi za sprednje osi pri ATV-jih

description.en: Should the day ever come that you need to replace a damaged axle assembly, you can now easily order the complete OEM axle assembly with one part number.
description.sl-SI: Če bo kdaj treba zamenjati poškodovan osni sestav, lahko zdaj celoten sklop osi OEM preprosto naročite z eno kataloško številko.

name.sl-SI: Komplet standardnih žarometov, za vozila na plinski pogon

description.sl-SI: Prilagodite svoje vozilo golf Drive2 s sprednjimi žarometi LED, ki jih je zasnovala Yamaha. Standardni komplet dodaja tovarniške žaromete LED in žarnice za zadnje luči, hupo ter stranske odsevnike prek nerazširljivega standardnega kabelskega snopa.
description.en: Customize your Drive2 golf car with Yamaha designed, projector LED headlights. The standard kit adds factory LED headlights and incandescent taillights, horn, and side reflectors via a non-expandable standard harness.

The Öhlins Pressurised Cartridge Kit is a great performance upgrade for your bike. Improved handling, cornering and braking are immediately noticed. Full maintenance capability and alternative spring rates available.
description.sl-SI: Komplet tlačnega vložka Öhlins je odlična nadgradnja zmogljivosti za vaš motocikel. Boljša vodljivost, zavijanje in zaviranje so takoj opazni. Na voljo je popolno vzdrževanje in nastavitev blaženja.
Sistem za hitro menjavo prestav za Ténéré 700 izboljšuje nadzor nad motornim kolesom ter olajša prestavljanje.
description.en: Quick-shift system for Ténéré 700, increasing bike control and making gear change easier.

description.sl-SI: Zagotovite si vse potrebno za vožnjo s kompletom NMAX 'Urban Pack 39L', ki ga sestavljajo visok vizir NMAX, zadnji nosilec NMAX, 39-litrski zgornji kovček s kompletom ključev za cilindrično ključavnico, plošča za zgornji kovček in hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček. Nepogrešljiv paket za vsakodnevne voznike, ki potrebujejo dodaten prostor za shranjevanje in funkcionalnost.
description.en: Own every ride with the NMAX Urban Pack 39L, consisting of the High Screen NMAX, Rear Carrier NMAX, 39L Top Case  with Key Cylinder Set  and Top Case Plate, and Top Case Backrest. An essential pack for the regular commuter that needs extra storage and function.

name.sl-SI: Pokrovček za gorivo iz kovinskega aluminija

description.en: For those who pay attention to the finer details of their sled, this stylish cap replaces stock for a more custom look.
description.sl-SI: Ta eleganten pokrovček nadomešča serijskega za bolj prilagojen videz pri posameznikih, ki opazijo tudi največje podrobnosti na saneh.

description.en: The Factory Yamaha Speed Management Key allows top speed limits to be set to cater for special requirements on job sites or individual operating conditions without affecting acceleration or pulling power. The key can be removed in either restricted or unrestricted mode to allow for owner-controlled operation.
description.sl-SI: : Tovarniški ključ Yamaha za nastavljanje hitrosti omogoča nastavitev najvišje hitrosti, ki ustreza posebnim zahtevam na lokaciji ali individualnim delovnim razmeram brez vpliva na pospešek in moč. Ključ lahko odstranite v omejenem ali neomejenem načinu, ki omogoča upravljanje voznika.

name.en: Drink Holder Kit for the FX Series

description.en: Enhance your experience on the Yamaha FX Series WaveRunners! This kit allows you to keep your beverage in reach while cruising with your loved ones. You can either complement your existing holder, by replacing the speaker/GPS mounting base, or upgrade your machine with a set.
description.sl-SI: Izboljšajte svojo izkušnjo na Yamahinih WaveRunnerjih serije FX! Ta komplet vam omogoča, da imate pijačo na dosegu roke, medtem ko se peljete s svojimi najdražjimi. Obstoječi nosilec lahko dopolnite tako, da zamenjate pritrditveni nosilec za zvočnik/GPS, ali pa skuter nadgradite s kompletom.

description.en: Outlet suitable to charge your electronic equipment such as mobile phones.
description.sl-SI: Vtičnica omogoča polnjenje elektronske opreme, kot je mobilni telefon.

description.en: The city is the XMAX's natural habitat and with the Urban Accessories Pack you can take the practicality of your XMAX a notch higher. Besides providing enhanced wind protection from the high screen, the pack also takes care of your luggage needs with a 34L top case with matching colour plate set and carrier – keeping your belonging safe and secure. And a backrest for the top case makes sure the passenger has an equally comfortable ride. To protect you from the scratches and the scruffs, the city throws up, the pack contains the XMAX scratch protector. Available from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your XMAX.
description.sl-SI: Mesto je XMAX-ovo naravno okolje, s kompletom dodatne opreme Urban pa lahko še bolje izkoristite XMAX-ovo praktičnost. Poleg izboljšane zaščite pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem paket poskrbi tudi za vaše potovalne potrebe s 34-litrskim zgornjim kovčkom z ujemajočim se kompletom barvnih ploščic in nosilcem, ki ščiti vaše osebne predmete. Naslon za zgornji kovček pa poskrbi, da bo tudi sopotnik užival v enako udobni vožnji. Za zaščito pred praskami in odrgninami komplet vključuje zaščito pred praskami XMAX. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše vozilo XMAX.

description.en: Designed to be fitted while using your engine, this cover provides the ultimate protection against scratches and UV rays. The tight fit allows on and off water usage. Perfect on the waves, perfect on the trailer.

description.en: Öhlins fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and as such available as a spring upgrade for most major bike models.

Polsintetično olje Yamalube20W50 je edinstvena mešanica za 4-taktne agregate z vgrajenim menjalnikom ali brez njega. To olje priporočamo posebej za motorje z velikimi vrtinami valjev ali motorna kolesa z velikim številom kilometrov.
description.en: YamalubeSemi-Synthetic 20W50 Oil is a unique blend for 4-stroke engines with or without integrated gearbox. The oil is specially recommended for big bore engines or bikes with high mileage.
Increases the durability of clutch components
description.sl-SI: Izboljša trpežnost sestavnih delov sklopke

description.en:
Yamaha motorcycles are meant to be used all year long and that is why it is important to have accessories that make every day usage a breeze. 
The Urban Pack contains a rear carrier along with a 39L top case, to keep your valuables securely and with ease. While the motorcycle charges you up with energy, the USB outlet is there to charge your electronic devices.
And finally, there is a higher sport screen to protect you from the urban elements the city throws at you!
description.sl-SI:
Yamahina motorna kolesa so namenjena uporabi skozi vse leto, zato je pomembno, da imate dodatno opremo, ki omogoča enostavno vsakodnevno uporabo. 
Paket Urban Pack vključuje zadnji nosilec in 39-litrski kovček, v katerem lahko varno in enostavno shranjujete dragocene predmete. Motocikel z energijo napolni vas, USB-vtičnica pa vaše elektronske naprave. 
Tu je še višji športni vizir, ki vas ščiti pred elementi urbanega okolja!

name.sl-SI: Uniseks majica s kratkimi rokavi za odrasle z motivom MOVE LIVE LOVE
name.en: MOVE LIVE LOVE T-Shirt Unisex Adult

description.sl-SI: Začutite pridih urbane mobilnosti Yamaha z majico s kratkimi rokavi za odrasle (uniseks) s potiskom motiva MOVE LIVE LOVE. Temno siva majica s kratkimi rokavi ima živahno barvito grafiko, ki se ujema z Yamahino serijo skuterjev. Izdelana je iz mešanice bombaža in elastana, zato omogoča maksimalno udobje in gibljivost pri vsakodnevni uporabi. Motiv MOVE LIVE LOVE je dopolnjen z zunanjim slojem iz tkanine z encimi za retro-vintage učinek.
description.en: Capture the Yamaha Urban Mobility spirit with the MOVE LIVE LOVE Unisex Adult’s T-Shirt. Dark grey with a bright, colourful printed aligned with the Yamaha scooter range, this tee’s cotton and elastane blend offers maximum comfort and movement for everyday wear. The MOVE LIVE LOVE print is complimented with an enzyme wash finish for a retro-vintage flourish.

Stylish and at home at the track or outdoors, the two-tone Paddock Blue Men’s Softshell Jacket is ideal for regular active use. A blend of polyester and spandex for comfort and freedom of movement, this jacket features a full-length zip and three external pockets for ease of use. Embroidered Yamaha Racing branding and back stripe graphic add a final premium feel.
description.sl-SI: Dvobarvna softshell jakna Paddock Blue za moške je vedno stilska – doma, na stezi ali na prostem – in je popolna za redno uporabo, ko ste dejavni. Izdelana je iz poliestra in elastana za udobje in večjo svobodo pri gibanju, ima pa tudi zadrgo po celotni dolžini in tri zunanje žepe za preprosto uporabo. Izvezen logotip Yamaha Racing in grafika črte na hrbtu vzbujata pridih vrhunskosti.
Pokrov, ki nadomešča originalni pokrov motorja, za bolj tehnološko dovršen videz.
description.en: Cover to replace the original engine cover for a high-tech look.
Full water-resistant cover, using welding technology, to keep you completely warm and dry during rainy and cold weather conditions.
description.sl-SI: Popolnoma vodoodporna zaščita s tehnologijo varjenja, ki skrbi, da ostanete popolnoma topli in suhi v dežju in hladnem vremenu.

description.en: Specially designed Camshaft for racing, allowing better performance.

description.en: Forged aluminium rear wheel with low centre of gravity made for the R1 by Marchesini. The use of multi-directional aluminum alloy forging and the use of shapes optimized for the final geometry of the wheel make it possible to obtain a very light material with exceptional mechanical specifications.
Improves overall engine performance in combination with GYTR® silencer.

name.sl-SI: Polsintetično Olje Yamalube S4-M 10W40 Za Plovila
name.en: Yamalube S4-M 10W40 Semi Synthetic Marine Oil

description.sl-SI: Sintetično olje Yamalube10W40 za plovila je vsestransko olje vrhunske zmogljivosti, namenjeno za svojstvene zahteve 4-taktnih izvenkrmnih motorjev Yamaha in vodnih skuterjev.
description.en: YamalubeSynthetic 10W40 Marine Oil is a versatile, high-quality performance oil designed for the unique marine demands of Yamaha 4-stroke outboards and WaveRunners.

name.sl-SI: Sončna očala Paddock Blue za odrasle

description.en: A stylish eyewear piece for sunny days, the Paddock Blue sunglasses for adults are Yamaha Racing fashion at its best. The black polycarbonate frame ensures a lightweight but strong build, and tinted blue lenses with UV400 protection help protect the eyes. White Yamaha Racing logos on the contrast-coloured racing blue arms give a cool and sporty look, and a black carry pouch allows easy storage and portability.
description.sl-SI: Sončna očala v barvi Paddock Blue za odrasle so priročen dodatek za sončne dni v videzu, značilnem za Yamaha Racing. Črna polikarbonatna masa zagotavlja lahek, a vzdržljiv okvir, zatemnjene modre leče z zaščito UV400 pa pomagajo zaščititi oči. Bel logotip Yamaha Racing na kontrastno obarvanih dirkalno modrih ročajih poskrbi za kul športen videz, črna vrečka pa omogoča enostavno shranjevanje in prenašanje.

name.sl-SI: Yamalube Marine Care Kit – nega čolna in motorja
name.en: Yamalube Marine Care Kit – Boat & Engine Care

description.sl-SI: Prezimite in zaščitite svoj čoln z zaupanjem. Ta komplet vključuje olje za zameglitev za zaščito vašega motorja, močan čistilni gel za vse površine in likalno mast za mazanje ključnih komponent – bistvena nega za Yamahine izvenkrmne motorje in WaveRunnerje.
description.en: Winterize and protect your boat with confidence. This kit includes fogging oil to safeguard your engine, powerful cleaning gel for all surfaces, and lical grease to lubricate key components — essential care for Yamaha outboards and WaveRunners.

Comfortable, adaptable and stylish, the Paddock Blue Men’s Sweater is a teamwear classic for wearing to race events, the gym and more. A soft blend of polyester  and cotton, it features a full-length zip and fixed hood with a tight closure. Self-fabric hem and cuffs give the sweater a seamless look, with colour contrast black sleeves and external pockets for essentials. Embroidered chest branding and back graphic in white set this garment off.
description.sl-SI: Udobna, prilagodljiva in stilska moška jopa Paddock Blue je klasično oblačilo ekipe za nošnjo na dirkalnih prireditvah, v telovadnici in povsod drugod. Izdelana je iz poliestra in bombaža, ima zadrgo po celotni dolžini in fiksno kapuco, ki jo lahko tesno zapnete. Obšivi in manšete iz enakega materiala poskrbijo za brezhiben videz jope, rokavi so v kontrastni črni barvi, zunanji žepi pa omogočajo prostor za vaše predmete. Izvezen logotip na prsih in bela grafika na hrbtu oblačilo dokončno izpopolnita.

S stranskimi mehkimi torbami, močnimi ščitniki za agregat, dodatnimi meglenkami in ščitnikom hladilnika lahko za svoj TRACER 9 ustvarite bolj privlačen slog za dve vlogi na cesti. Paket Gravel je namenjen tistim, ki avanturistično gredo izven urejenih poti in izzovejo svoj motor na več cestah in poteh.
description.en: Create a more buff dual-road style for your TRACER 9 with soft side bags, strong engine guards, extra fog lights and a radiator guard. The Gravel Pack is meant for those who adventurously go beyond the beaten track and challenge their machine on multiple roads and paths.
Grips to provide proper support and comfort for your passenger

description.en: YamalubeFully Synthetic 0W-30 4-Stroke Snowmobile Oil is the ultimate lubricant for low temperature snow and trail riding. Its fully-synthetic formula is designed to handle extreme conditions, protecting engine parts in sub-zero climates.

Enhance the protection and the usability of your ATV with the Protection Pack. Protection Pack includes:   Front - Middle and Rear Bash Plate, Front and Rear A-Arm Skidplates (set), Heavy-Duty Rear Grab Bar and the Heavy-Duty Front Brush Guard.

description.en: Yamaha Grizzly ATV high performance Rugged Seat Cover, designed to protect your seat in any condition. Whether you are tackling rough trails or using your ATV for work, this seat cover ensures a secure fit with its reinforced elastic base and offers a comfortable riding experience.

A carry pouch makes it easy to attach to keys, bags, bikes and more to keep this incredibly useful tool with you at all times.

45-litrski zgornji kovček brez ključa je ustvarjen za sodobne pustolovce in popotnike ter je sodobna in elegantna rešitev za shranjevanje. Najsodobnejše zaklepanje brez ključa zagotavlja, da so vaše bistvene stvari varne pri vsaki vožnji.
description.en: Made for the modern adventurer and commuter, the Keyless Top Case 45L is a slick and stylish storage solution. Cutting-edge, keyless locking ensures your essentials are kept safe on every ride.

description.sl-SI: Ženska jakna kolekcije REVS, zasnovana za zaščito pred zimskimi vremenskimi razmerami, z zunanjo plastjo in podlogo iz poliestra zagotavlja odpornost proti vodi in vetru ter hkrati udobje. Zasnovana v kontrastu črne in rdeče barve REVS, ta udobna jakna ima zapiranje z zadrgo po celotni dolžini, ščitnik za brado in nastavljive manšete za prilagajanje vremenskim razmeram. Fiksna kapuca, sešita iz treh tretjin, in sprednji žepi z zadrgo ščitijo pred vremenskimi vplivi, izvezeni napis Yamaha na prsih, grafika navpične črte zadaj in obrobe na ramenih pa zajemajo samo bistvo sloga REVS.
description.en: Designed to protect from the winter elements, the REVS Women’s Outerwear Jacket offers water and wind resistance with comfort inside a polyester shell and lining. Designed in REVS black and red colour contrast, this comfort fit jacket features a full-length zip closure, chin guard and adjustable cuffs for adapting to the weather. A 3-panel lined fixed hood and zippered front pockets helps shield you from the elements, while embroidered Yamaha branding on the chest, backstripe graphic and white shoulder piping capture the latest REVS essence.

name.sl-SI: Celoten izpušni sistem Akrapovič za MT-07

description.en: Make your Yamaha look and sound even cooler!

name.sl-SI: Polo majica Paddock Blue za moške

description.en: With a 50/50 blend of cotton  and polyester  in a pique finish, the Paddock Blue Men’s Polo is an iconic item for race paddocks. Featuring a button closure and the collar is specially engineered for comfort, colour contrast arms and embroidered Yamaha branding, this polo is a Paddock Blue classic for wearing out and about.
description.sl-SI: Polo majica Paddock Blue za moške je ikonski izdelek za uporabo v boksu na dirkah, izdelan iz 50 % bombaža in 50 % poliestra z zunanjo plastjo iz dvojno pletenega bombaža (pique). Z izrezom na gumbe, ovratnikom, posebej zasnovanim za udobje, rokavi v kontrastnih barvah ter izvezenim Yamahinim logotipom predstavlja polo majica klasični izdelek linije Paddock Blue, ki ga lahko nosite pri vsakodnevnih opravkih.

name.sl-SI: Moška jopica s kapuco na zadrgo kolekcije REVS

description.sl-SI: Moška jopica s kapuco na zadrgo kolekcije REVS v športnem slogu, izdelana iz mešanice bombaža in poliestra v črni, rdeči in sivi barvi, je hkrati modna in funkcionalna. Zadrga po celotni dolžini ponuja dodatno udobje, s fiksno podstavljeno kapuco in zaščito za brado, ki ščiti pred vremenskimi vplivi, ter sprednjimi žepi z zadrgo, ki ohranjajo vaše roke tople in shranjujejo osnovne potrebščine. Vpadljiv izvezeni napis Yamaha na prsih, grafika navpične črte zadaj in obrobe na ramenih tvorijo privlačen videz v slogu REVS.
description.en: Crafted in black, red and grey from a blend of cotton and polyester, the sports-inspired REVS Men’s Zip Hoodie offers both fashion and function. A full-length zip offers extra comfort, with a fixed lined hood and chin guard to keep the weather out, and zippered front pockets to keep your hands warm and store essentials. Strong embroidered Yamaha branding on the chest, backstripe graphic and shoulder piping combine for an eye-catching REVS look.

Olajšajte si vsakodnevno vožnjo s paketom XMAX 'Keyless Urban', ki vam ponuja dodatno udobje našega 45-litrskega zgornjega kovčka brez ključa, zadnji nosilec, nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, komplet mehanizma za e-zaklepanje in stikala, barvne plošče za zgornji kovček in hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček.
description.en: Ease your commute with the XMAX Keyless Urban Pack, which gives you the added  convenience of our Keyless Top Case 45L along with the Rear Carrier, Top Case Mounting Plate, E-locking Mechanism Kit and Switch, Top Case Coloured Plates and Top Case Backrest.

This heavy-duty, durable cargo box allows you to take along your essentials for the ride or the job. Doubles as a non-insulated cooler with integrated drain plug for those long workdays or outings into the woods. Designed to fit perfectly in-between the bed rails and attaches using OE bed box mounting bolts. Works great with or without Yamaha's bed mat (sold separately).
High quality finished carrier to be mounted to the rear of the unit, to carry a topcase or other luggage.
description.sl-SI: Nosilec s kakovostno površinsko obdelavo, ki se namesti na zadnji del motornega kolesa za prevažanje kovčka ali druge prtljage.

name.sl-SI: Ščitniki pred udarci kamnov za Wolverine X2

description.en: Take on the toughest, gnarliest trails but still protect your Wolverine X2. Yamaha’s accessory Rock Sliders provide frame rail protection for the under-door area. Utilizing a full length, plated substructure, these Rock Sliders provide stylish looks while being robust enough to take on the abuse from trail obstacles. For the utmost protection, pair these Rock Sliders with our accessory Front Bash Plate, Front A-Arm Guards and Skid Plate, all sold separately. A perfect combination to armor up your Wolverine X2 for your next trail or work adventure.
description.sl-SI: Podajte se na najtežje, najbolj zahtevne poti, a svoje vozilo Wolverine X2 zaščitite. Yamahini ščitniki pred udarci kamnov zagotavljajo zaščito območja pod vrati v obliki letev na ogrodju. S kromirano podstrukturo po celotni dolžini ti ščitniki pred udarci kamnov poskrbijo za stilsko dovršen videz, a so hkrati dovolj robustni, da ščitijo pred ovirami na poti. Za najboljšo zaščito poleg ščitnikov pred udarci kamnov uporabite tudi dodatni sprednji ščitnik pred udarci, zaščito sprednje A-roke in ščitno ploščo; vsi omenjeni dodatki so na prodaj ločeno. Odlična kombinacija za ojačanje vašega modela Wolverine X2 za naslednjo pot ali delovno avanturo.

Water resistant and layered for warmth, this apron for your urban mobility scooter will keep you warm and dry so you can be more comfortable and protected during harsh weather conditions.

The Yamaha Trailering Tilt Motor Support has been designed to allow highway transport of your boat with the motor in a tilted position. The trailering support prevents the motor from returning to the vertical position and possible contact with the road surface.

name.sl-SI: Čistilni Robčki Za Čelade In Vizirje

description.sl-SI: Čistilni robčki za čelade in vizirje Yamalube® so idealen pripomoček na vsaki vožnji. Priročni robčki zagotavljajo dolgotrajno prozorno površino brez lis, tako da vizir in ogledala ostanejo brezhibni. Primerni so za vse vrste zunanjosti čelad, vizirjev, vetrobranskih stekel in ogledal.
description.en: Yamalube® Visor & Helmet Wipes are ideal to keep at hand on every ride. These easy-to-use wipes provide a streak-free, clear finish that lasts, leaving your visor and mirrors spotless. They are suitable for all helmet shells, visor types, windscreens, and mirrors.

name.sl-SI: Tekaške hlače Paddock Blue za ženske

description.en: Designed in Yamaha’s classic racing blue with contrasting leg stripes, the Paddock Blue Women’s Jogging Pants are comfortable and great for relaxed daily wear. Made from cotton  and polyester  in a French Terry fabric, the pant legs are highlighted with a white stripe and retro style tape, perfect for pairing with your Streetwear upper garments. With a tapered fit and elastic waist, the legs also feature a subtle zip opening at the ends for breathability. Embroidered Yamaha Racing branding gives a final touch of urban style.
description.sl-SI: Tekaške hlače Paddock Blue za ženske so zasnovane v klasični Yamahini dirkaško modri barvi s črtami na hlačnicah v kontrastni barvi, poleg tega so udobne in naravnost odlične za sproščeno vsakodnevno uporabo. Izdelane so iz bombaža in poliestra v francoskem frotirju, hlačnice so poudarjene z belo črto in trakom v retro slogu, zaradi česar so popolne za združevanje z zgornjimi deli oblačil iz kolekcije Streetwear. Hlače imajo tajliran kroj in elastični pas, na dnu hlačnic je tudi prefinjena odprtina na zadrgo za zračenje. Izvezen logotip Yamaha Racing poskrbi za popoln mestni slog.

Made of heavy duty outside material with advanced coating technology that assures maximum water resistance, UV protection and breath-ability. description.en: Ventilated and designed for moisture wicking, the MTB Men’s T-Shirt is a lightweight item that keeps you on the move. A blend of polyester and cotton, this tee features mesh panels for superior air flow and wicking capabilities to help you keep on biking in comfort.
description.sl-SI: Kratka majica MTB za moške je zračna in zasnovana za odvajanje vlage, s tem lahkim izdelkom se boste lahko preprosto gibali kot še nikoli. Izdelana je iz poliestra in bombaža ter ima mrežaste dele za najboljši pretok in odvod zraka, da lahko med kolesarjenjem uživate v udobju.

Vaša vsakodnevna izbira za nego motornih koles. Essentials Kit združuje naš zaupanja vreden čistilni gel, močno čistilo verige in visoko zmogljivo mazivo za verigo – vse, kar potrebujete za nemoteno in zaščiteno delovanje vašega motornega kolesa.
description.en: Your everyday go-to for motorcycle care. The Essentials Kit combines our trusted cleaning gel, powerful chain cleaner, and high-performance chain lube — everything you need to keep your motorcycle running smoothly and protected.

description.en: Experience ultimate protection for your Waverunner, with our Genuine Yamaha covers

Make sure your watercraft stays in optimal shape during winter storage and transportation.
The pack includes the following accessories: 
YMEJBC250000 JetBlaster COVER: Protects your Power Water Vehicle from scratches during storage and transportation. 
YMEYEC09EU20 YEC-9 CHARGER EU SPEC: Keeps your battery in optimal condition during longer storage. 
MWVFLUSHHSBL REPLACEMENT FLUSH HOSE BLUE: Needed to flush your engine after usage of the WaveRunner.

Poskrbite, da bo vaše plovilo med zimskim skladiščenjem in prevozom ostalo v optimalnem stanju.
Paket vključuje naslednje dodatke: 
YMEJBC250000 - JetBlaster POKRIVALO: Ščiti vaš vodni skuter pred praskami med skladiščenjem in prevozom. 
YMEYEC09EU20 - YEC-9 POLNILNIK, EU SPECIFIKACIJA: Ohranja baterijo v optimalnem stanju med daljšim shranjevanjem. 
MWVFLUSHHSBL - NADOMESTNA CEV ZA SPIRANJE, MODRA: Potrebna za spiranje motorja po uporabi WaveRunner-ja.

Pri družbi Yamaha želimo našim strankam zagotoviti optimalno izkušnjo vožnje z našimi modeli. Za vse, ki jim je standardni sedež na modelih XMAX nekoliko visok, smo ustvarili nizek sedež. Izboljša dostop do tal, tako da lahko brez težav stopite na cesto.
description.en: We, at Yamaha, want to make sure that all our customers have the best experience while riding our products. For those, who find the standard seat on the XMAX a little high, we created the Low seat. It improves access to the ground, so that you can plant your foot comfortably on the road.

description.sl-SI: Spremenite svoje motorno kolo serije R v dirkalno repliko s tem kompletom nalepk GYTR.

description.en: The city is the XMAX's natural habitat and with the Urban Accessories Pack you can take the practicality of your XMAX a notch higher. Besides providing enhanced wind protection from the high screen, the pack also takes care of your luggage needs with a 39L top case and carrier – keeping your belonging safe and secure. And a backrest for the top case makes sure the passenger has an equally comfortable ride. To protect you from the scratches and the scruffs, the city throws up, the pack contains the XMAX scratch protector. Urban Pack Content: High Screen | Rear Carrier | 39L Top Case (incl. Lock Key Set) | Backrest for 39L Top Case | Scratch protector
description.sl-SI: Mesto je XMAX-ovo naravno okolje, s kompletom dodatne opreme Urban pa lahko še bolje izkoristite XMAX-ovo praktičnost. Poleg izboljšane zaščite pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem poskrbi tudi za vaše potovalne potrebe z 39-litrskim kovčkom, v katerem bodo vaše stvari varne in zaščitene. Naslon za kovček pa poskrbi, da bo tudi sopotnik užival v enako udobni vožnji. Za zaščito pred praskami in odrgninami komplet vključuje zaščito pred praskami XMAX. Vsebina kompleta Urban Pack: Visok vizir | Zadnji prtljažnik | 39-l kovček (s ključavnico s ključem) | Naslon za 39-l kovček | Zaščita pred praskami

Ta bela kapa s 5-delno zasnovo ima na sprednji strani ekskluziven logotip ob 70. obletnici, ob strani pa privlačno grafiko. Odprtine za prezračevanje in nastavljiv trak zagotavljajo udobje za vse velikosti.
description.en: Keep the sun from your eyes and show your Yamaha passion with the 70th Anniversary Adult Cap. A 5-panel design, this white cap features exclusive 70th anniversary branding on the front, with stylish side panel graphics. Vent holes and an adjustable strap offer all-over comfort for all sizes.
We introduce for XMAX range of scooters, billet aluminium end grip. Beautifully crafted piece of jewel for your XMAX.

description.en: Keep your Ténéré 700 protected from stones and debris with the Radiator Guard. A high flow mesh ensures constant air flow.

name.sl-SI: Športne hlače Paddock Blue za moške

description.sl-SI: Športne hlače Paddock Blue za moške so neverjetno vsestranske, izdelane so iz poliestra in elastana ter so nepogrešljive za člane dirkaških ekip ali ljubitelje kolekcije oblačil. Velikost pasu lahko nastavljate z zaponko, na bokih imajo velika žepa in en zadnji žep za večjo uporabnost. Izvezen logotip Yamaha v beli barvi pritegne poglede in ustvarja prijeten videz prav povsod.
description.en: Key to any race team member or fan’s apparel collection, the Paddock Blue Men’s Team Pants offer excellent versatility with a mix of polyester  and spandex. The waist is adjustable via a buckle, with hip and cargo pockets and a single rear pocket for extra utility. Embroidered Yamaha branding in white creates a stand out look that’s at home everywhere.
Dedicated racing spark plugs that are suitable for engine tuning.

description.sl-SI: Opremite svojo Yamaho XMAX za zimo z zimskim paketom XMAX, ki vključuje zaščito za spodnji del telesa XMAX in grelnike ročk. Pomembni elementi za vožnjo s skuterjem v zimskem času in udobje v hladnejših mesecih.
description.en: Kit out your Yamaha XMAX for winter with the Winter Pack, featuring the XMAX Apron and Grip Heaters. Essential items for winter weather scooter riding and comfort in colder months.
Featuring an exclusive design and manufactured from high quality materials, this premium Comfort Seat ensures an even more relaxing and enjoyable ride.
description.sl-SI: Ekskluzivna zasnova in izdelava iz visokokakovostnih materialov – ta vrhunski udoben sedež poskrbi za še bolj sproščeno in prijetno vožnjo.

description.en: Forged carbon effect Tank Pad

description.sl-SI: Odklenite celoten dirkalni potencial svojega XSR900 s paketom 'Racer'. Mini komplet oblog, mono sedežna prevleka in nosilec registrske tablice dajejo vašemu motornemu kolesu pravi dirkalni videz, medtem ko kolenske blazine nudijo dodaten oprijem. Sekvenčni smerniki pa dodajo sodoben pridih. Paket 'Racer' je kot nalašč za tiste, ki želijo svoji vožnji dodati dirkaški pridih.
description.en: Unleash the full racing potential of your XSR900 with the Racer Pack. The mini fairing kit, mono seat cover and license plate holder give your motorcycle a true race-inspired look, while the knee pads offer extra grip. Finally the sequential blinkers add a modern touch. The Racer Pack is perfect for those who want to add a racing edge to their ride.

description.sl-SI:
Popoln paket za daljša potovanja z vašim JetBlasterjem. Povečajte in optimizirajte svoje potrebe po shranjevanju, da bo vaš dan na vodi popoln. 
Paket vključuje: 
5PU89A1V000 - JETBLASTER KRMNA TORBA: Dodaten prostor za shranjevanje na hrbtni strani vašega JetBlasterja za sidro ali privezne vrvi in pijačo.
F5PU4976V000 - STRANSKA TORBA ZA JETBLASTER: Ščiti in organizira vaše dragocene izdelke, kot so telefon, sončna očala in ključi, pred praskanjem po vožnji po vodi. 
F5PU3580T000 - JETBLASTER PODLOGE ZA NOGE PRO: Preprečite izgubo oprijema na nogah, ko se zabavate na vodi.
description.en:
The perfect pack to have when making longer trips with your JetBlaster. Enlarge and optimize your storage needs to make your day on the water complete. 
The Pack includes: 
5PU89A1V000 JETBLASTER STERN BAG: Additional storage on the back of your JetBlaster for an ancor or dock lines and drinks.
F5PU4976V000 JETBLASTER SIDE BAG: Protects and organizes your precious products, like your phone, sunglasses and keys from scratching after a ride on the water. 
F5PU3580T000 JETBLASTER FOOTWELL MATS PRO: Avoid loosing grip on our feet when making fun on the water.
Suspension link kit allowing 18mm seat height reduction.

Moški dres ob 70. obletnici več kot pet desetletij od Yamahinega prvega svetovnega prvenstva MXGP obuja spomine v slogu! Dres je ustvarjen v sodelovanju z Alpinestars in ima po celotni površini sublimiran tisk ob obletnici. Dres je optimiziran za vožnjo, brezšivni manšeti, ovratnik in predel pod pazduho zagotavljajo optimalno udobje, odvajanje vlage, mrežasti vložki in brezšivni del pod pazduho pa poskrbijo za zračnost. Dres se odlično obnese pri vožnji po blatu – v Yamahinem slogu!
description.en: Over five decades since Yamaha's first MXGP world championship, the 70th Anniversary Men's Jersey brings the memories back in style! Created in collaboration with Alpinestars, this jersey features all-over sublimated anniversary print. Optimised for riding focus, the jersey's seamless cuffs, neck and underarms offer maximum comfort, with moisture wicking, mesh inserts and stitchless armpits for airflow. A jersey made to rock the dirt, Yamaha style!
High quality finished carrier to be mounted to the rear of the unit, to carry a top case or other luggage.

description.en: A precision fork and shock pump with an easy-to-read dial gauge for accurate pressure readings up to 360 psi / 24.8 bar. An air release button and Pressure-Rite connector makes setting proper pressure easy and eliminates air loss when disconnecting, while the flexible hose takes stress off the valve stem when pumping.
description.sl-SI: Natančne vilice in amortizerji z merilnikom, ki omogoča preprosto odčitavanje, za natančno merjenje tlaka do 360 psi/24,8 bara. Gumb za sprostitev zraka in priključek Pressure-Rite omogočata preprosto nastavitev ustreznega tlaka in odpravljata izgubo zraka pri odklopu, gibljiva cev pa razbremeni steblo ventila pri črpanju.

description.en: Built with robust construction, this carrier effortlessly supports loads up to 27kg. Its solid design ensures easy assembly and enhanced durability. Additionally, it is fully compatible with a wide range of popular MIK accessories.

Prezračevanje ohranja gibanje zraka za udobno, celodnevno uporabo, medtem ko uradni logotipi ekipe poskrbijo za privlačen videz.
description.en: Even exotic racetracks get cold and windy! The MotoGP Replica Men's Windbreaker keeps the chilly climate out, with an internal hood for when things get wet. Ventilation keeps the air moving for comfortable, day-long use while official team logos keep you looking sharp.

With 750ml capacity, the bottle features level markers with motivational text to help you stay topped up throughout the day. A flip up plastic straw makes drinking on the go easy, with Yamaha Racing branding and Racing Blue shades giving an eye-catching look.

With 750ml capacity, the bottle features level markers with motivational text to help you stay topped up throughout the day. Silencer plate to replace the original plate.
description.sl-SI: Ploščica dušilnika, ki nadomešča originalno ploščico.

name.sl-SI: Öhlins komplet vložkov pod tlakom FKR 132

description.sl-SI: Komplet tlačnih vložkov Öhlins FKR 132 je bil razvit s tehnologijo, ki izhaja naravnost iz prvenstev Moto3, Moto2 in World Superbike. Ta komplet, ki je zasnovan za vrhunske dirke v razredih Superstock in Supersport, vam bo zagotovil veliko zmogljivosti. Komplet vložkov FKR 132 ima vzmetni sistem pod tlakom, ki ponuja bolj poenostavljeno in uporabniku prijazno zasnovo, kar omogoča tudi lažje vzdrževanje in spremembe nastavitev. In to je komplet za motoriste, ki od svojega motornega kolesa zahtevajo najboljše zmogljivosti.
description.en: The Öhlins FKR 132 pressurised cartridge kit is developed with technology derived straight from the Moto3, Moto2 and World Superbike championships. Designed for top level racing in Superstock and Supersport classes, this kit will give you loads of performance. The FKR 132 cartridge kit features a spring pressurized system which offers a more simplistic and user friendly design, that also accounts for easier maintenance and setting changes. And is the kit to have, for riders who demand the best performance from their bike.

Keep your ski ropes safe and your WaveRunner or boat engine protected with the Yamaha Rope Float. This ingenious accessory helps prevent ropes from getting tangled in the propeller or ingested by the jet pump. Simply thread the rope through the centre of the closed-cell foam tube before attaching it to the tow eye. The durable nylon cover protects the float and boasts a stylish Yamaha logo silk-screened on one side.
Modern LED tail light which gives your unit a nice touch of modern flavour in combination with an authentic look.
description.sl-SI: Sodobna zadnja LED-luč, ki daje sodoben pridih enoti s pristnim videzom.

description.en: This rugged tubular Front Brush Guard is designed to provide additional protection while you venture on and off the trail. It is designed to seamlessly integrate with the front profile of the UMX while adding tough, aggressive styling. Helps protect the grill, hood and cowl while complementing the bold styling of your Yamaha. Perfectly complements tubular rear brush guard (sold separately). The kit includes front brush guard, mounting hardware, and detailed installation instructions.

name.en: Öhlins Front Fork Spring 9,5N/mm for NIX30 Kit
name.sl-SI: Vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins z 9,5 N/mm za komplet NIX30

description.en: Öhlins front fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge NIX30 kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and option to improve responsiveness and performance of the fork. Öhlins offers a wide range of linear springs to suit each individual type of bike, rider weight and personal preferences for installation into the standard front fork.
description.sl-SI: Vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins so zasnovane posebej za komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX30 in sprednje vilice. Poleg tega poskrbijo tudi za odlično nadgradnjo sprednjega dela ter možnost za izboljšanje odzivnosti in zmogljivosti vilice. Öhlins zagotavlja širok nabor linearnih vzmeti, ki so primerne za vsako posamezno vrsto motornega kolesa, težo voznika in osebne želje za namestitev v standardne sprednje vilice.
Komplet stranskih zaščit iz gume z visoko gostoto za XSR900, ki vam zagotavlja boljši oprijem na motornem kolesu, ko vozite po vijugastih cestah.
description.en: High density rubber Side Pad Set for XSR900, providing you with that extra grip on your bike when handling through the twisty roads.
Engineered to sit on the back, rather than on the neck, and with an added pad, this vest provides increased comfort. Made of high-quality materials it ensures your safety while you enjoy boating.
description.sl-SI: Ta jopič, ki je zasnovan za opiranje na hrbet namesto na vrat in z dodano podlogo, zagotavlja povečano udobje. Narejen je iz visokokakovostnih materialov in zagotavlja vašo varnost, medtem ko uživate v vožnji s čolnom.

name.en: Weather Cover for Yamaha Phone Cases

description.sl-SI: Zaščitite pametni telefon pred dežjem, znojem, prahom ali blatom z uporabo ZAŠČITE PRED VREMENOM skupaj z ovitkom za telefon Yamaha. Poveča odpornost na udarce, zaslon na dotik pa ostane povsem uporaben. Opomba: Debele zaščite za zaslon ali rokavice lahko v kombinaciji z zaščito pred vremenom omejijo uporabnost zaslona na dotik. Zaščita pred vremenom lahko dodatno vpliva na delovanje domačega gumba na mobilnih telefonih iPhone 8, 8 Plus, 7 in 7 Plus. Težavo lahko rešite z vklopom programskega domačega gumba (Assistive Touch).
description.en: Protect your smartphone from rain, sweat, dust or mud by using the WEATHER COVER together with the YAMAHA Phone Case. It adds shock resistance and the touch screen remains fully functional.Note: Thick screen protectors or gloves can limit the usability of your touchscreen in combination with the Weather Cover. The Weather Cover can further affect the homebutton functionality of iPhone 8, 8 Plus, 7 & 7 Plus. This can be compensated by enabling the software homebutton (Assistive Touch).

name.sl-SI: Otroški pulover s kapuco na zadrgo kolekcije REVS

description.sl-SI: Pri otroški jopici s kapuco na zadrgo kolekcije se slog REVS sreča z vsakodnevnim udobjem. Ujema se s sodobno obliko jop s kapuco na zadrgo za odrasle. Izdelana je iz mešanice bombaža in poliestra, ki omogoča udobje in toploto tudi pri aktivnostih na prostem. Fiksna podložena kapuca, zaščita za brado in rebrasti patenti na zapestjih omogočajo še več udobja, pika na i pa sta izvezeni napis Yamaha na prsih in grafika navpične črte zadaj.
description.en: REVS style meets everyday comfort in the REVS Kid’s Zip Hoodie. Aligned with the contemporary shape of the adult zip hoodies, this cotton and polyester mix keeps things comfortable and warm for outdoor use. A fixed lined hood, chin guard and ribbed cuffs add extra comfort, with embroidered Yamaha chest branding and backstripe graphic that tie the garment together.

Higher screen for enhanced wind protection on long-distance touring rides

description.en: Required to install the optional Aluminium Top Cases on the standard Super Ténére.

name.sl-SI: Paket napihljive deske za veslanje Yamaha 10.0

description.sl-SI: Yamaha 10.0 Air SUP je odlična vsestranska deska SUP, na kateri lahko sproščeno veslate, ko zaključite igrivo plovbo z vodnim skuterjem Yamaha WaveRunner. Ta SUP je opremljen z vso najnovejšo tehnologijo, ki jo lahko pričakujete od takega izdelka. Tehnologija toplotnega lepljenja in konstrukcija z navzkrižnimi šivi zagotavljata lahek, a vseeno zelo trden SUP. Z novim sistemom smernika EZ-Lockfin boste na vodi uživali še hitreje. Tako je SUP 10.0 obvezna oprema za vse, ki uživate v vodnih športih.
description.en: The Yamaha 10.0 Air SUP is the perfect all-round SUP on which you can cruise around, after you're done playing with your Yamaha WaveRunner. This SUP comes with all the latest tech which you can expect from a SUP. Heat bonded technology combined with an X-stitching construction make for a lightweight SUP with great stiffness. And with the new EZ-Lockfin on there, you'll be out and enjoying the water in no-time! This makes the 10.0 SUP a necessity for all those who enjoy the water.
The Yamaha GC Wheel Cover offers a classy and shiny final touch for any stock 8" wheel. These wheel covers feature a stem hole  protection system to protect wheels valvestem from damage.
description.sl-SI: Yamahin pokrov platišč GC je elegantna in svetleča izbira za vsa serijska 8-palčna kolesa. Ti pokrovi platišč imajo sistem zaščite z odprtino za ventil, ki ščiti ventile koles pred poškodbami.

description.en: Connector between the cylinder and the optional slip-on muffler.
description.sl-SI: Priključek med valjem in opcijskim dušilnikom.

Zavorna tekočina Yamalubezagotavlja vrhunsko delovanje zavor ali sklopke v vseh pogojih, saj ima edinstveno visoko točko mokrega vrelišča, kar preprečuje nastajanje hlapov. Primerna za vse vrste hidravličnih sistemov za zavore in sklopke.
description.en: YamalubeBrake Fluid guarantees peak brake or clutch operation in all conditions, with a unique high 'wet' boiling point that prevents vapors forming. Suitable for all types of hydraulic brake and clutch systems.

description.sl-SI: Enodelni sedež za reli bo v vas prebudil dirkaški adrenalin na motornem kolesu Ténéré 700. Z boljšim oprijemom in terenskim slogom uživajte v optimiziranem položaju vožnje in boljšem ravnotežju.
description.en: Channel Ténéré 700's rallying adrenaline with the one-piece Rally Seat. With more grip and off-road styling, enjoy an optimised riding position and better balance.

name.sl-SI: GYTR® komplet za večji pretok zraka

description.en: The high air flow kit offers increased air flow to the engine for boost in power.
description.sl-SI: Komplet za visok pretok zraka nudi večji pretok zraka v motor za več moči.

name.sl-SI: Set zaporednih LED utripalk spredaj 220 mm

description.en: Introducing Yamaha's Front Sequential LED Blinker Set – A brilliant symphony of safety and style. Illuminate your journey with precision-engineered LEDs that deliver a captivating sequential light display, enhancing both visibility and aesthetic appeal. Crafted to seamlessly integrate with your Yamaha, this blinker set not only signals your turns but also makes a bold statement on the road. Elevate your riding experience with the perfect blend of innovation and design – Yamaha's Front Sequential LED Blinker Set.
description.sl-SI: Predstavljamo Yamahin komplet sprednjih zaporednih LED smernikov - sijajna simfonija varnosti in sloga. Osvetlite svoje potovanje z natančno izdelanimi diodami LED, ki zagotavljajo očarljiv zaporedni svetlobni prikaz, s čimer izboljšujejo vidljivost in estetski videz. Ta komplet smernikov, ki je zasnovan tako, da se brezhibno ujema z vašo Yamaho, ne signalizira le vaših zavojev, temveč daje tudi drzno izjavo na cesti. Izboljšajte svojo izkušnjo vožnje s popolno kombinacijo inovacij in oblikovanja - Yamahinim kompletom sprednjih sekvenčnih LED smernikov.

Dodajte slog in zaščito svoji Yamahi R9 z zaščitno blazinico visoke gostote za rezervoar. Ta originalna komponenta, izdelana iz trdne in trpežne gumijaste zmesi, ima 3D obliko, zaključeno z logotipom R9, ki izboljša slog vašega motornega kolesa, hkrati pa je opremljena z lepilom 3M VHB, da ostane trdno pritrjena na vaš rezervoar za gorivo.
description.en: Add style and protection to your Yamaha R9 with the High Density Rubber Tank Pad. Engineered from a tough and durable rubber compound, this genuine component features a 3D design finished with an R9 logo to enhance the style of your motorcycle, while being supported by 3M VHB adhesive to remain secure to your fuel tank.

description.sl-SI: Ženska motoristična jakna Sport Touring, zasnovana za delovanje v vseh letnih časih, je tehničen in zelo natančen izdelek za neustrašne raziskovalce. Trdna zunanjost iz poliestra in poliuretana v dvobarvni sivi barvi je vodoodporna in vsebuje odstranljivo podlogo za nastavljivo udobje v mešanih pogojih. Ščitniki za ramena in komolce nudijo samozavest in brezskrbnost pri vožnji, medtem ko 6 žepov ponuja veliko prostora za predmete. Nastavljiv pas in zapestja vam omogočajo, da z lahkoto spremenite prileganje, medtem ko prezračevalne zadrge nudijo odlično zračnost. Za popolno potovalno opravo jo kombinirajte s športno-potovalnimi motorističnimi hlačami in rokavicami.
description.en: Designed to perform in all seasons, the Sport Touring Women’s Riding Jacket is a technical and high-precision item for intrepid explorers. A tough polyester and polyurethane outer in two-tone grey is waterproof and contains a removable lining for adjustable comfort in mixed conditions. Shoulder and elbow protectors offer confidence and peace of mind when riding, while 6 pockets offer substantial space for items. Adjustable waist and wrists allow you to alter the fit with ease, while ventilation zippers offer excellent breathability. Pair with the Sport Touring Riding Pants and Gloves for the perfect road trip outfit.

The Style Pack gives your R7 an even sharper profile on the street and multiplies this compact Supersport’s high thrill factor! This Genuine Accessories pack comes with a quick shifter that enables clutchless gear shifting for even faster and smoother acceleration. The dark-smoked sport screen and lightweight license plate holder give a more dynamic look to your R7 – while the tank side grip pads provide you with extra controllability. And the racing-style billet front brake lever guard shows its pure race-bred DNA.  Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit the high quality Genuine Accessories in this R7 Style Pack to your motorcycle
description.sl-SI: Paket Style daje vašemu R7 še lepši profil na cesti in pomnoži faktor navdušenja tega kompaktnega motocikla razreda Supersport. Ta paket originalnih dodatkov vsebuje sistem hitrega prestavljanja, ki omogoča prestavljanje brez sklopke za še hitrejše in enakomernejše pospeševanje. Zatemnjen športni vizir in lahek nosilec registrske tablice dajeta vašemu R7 še bolj dinamičen videz – stranske obloge rezervoarja za gorivo pa omogočajo boljši nadzor nad motociklom. Ščitnik ročice sprednje zavore v dirkaškem slogu pa kaže na čistokrvni dirkaški DNK.  Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo v paketu Style za R7 z veseljem namestil na vaše motorno kolo.
S kompletom za hitro menjavo prestav uživajte v povsem novi izkušnji prestavljanja in nadzora motornega kolesa. Izhaja iz tehnologije Yamaha Racing za boljši občutek in zmogljivost.
description.en: Enjoy a whole new experience in shifting and bike control with the Quick Shifter Kit. Derived from Yamaha Racing tech for enhanced feel and performance.
Ténéré Top Case Backrest

description.sl-SI: Zagotovite si vse potrebno za mestno vožnjo s kompletom NMAX 'Urban Pack 34L', ki ga sestavljajo visok vizir NMAX, zadnji nosilec NMAX, 34-litrski zgornji kovček s kompletom ključev za cilindrično ključavnico, plošča za zgornji kovček in hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček. Nepogrešljiv paket za vsakodnevne voznike, ki potrebujejo dodaten prostor za shranjevanje in funkcionalnost.
description.en: Conquer every urban ride with the NMAX Urban Pack 34L, consisting of the High Screen NMAX, Rear Carrier NMAX, 34L Top Case  with Key Cylinder Set , Top Case Plate, and Top Case Backrest. An essential pack for the regular commuter that needs extra storage and function.

Colourful, comfortable and easy to throw on, the Paddock Blue Men’s Hoodie is a relaxed piece of Streetwear for everyday wear. Made from cotton and polyester  in a slick French Terry finish, colour blocks of racing blue, black and white set off the garment’s look with retro tape down the arms and shoulders. A lined hood with draw cord, ribbed hem and elastic cuffs offer comfort in all climates, with staple iconic Yamaha Racing branding.
description.sl-SI: Barvit, udoben in preprost pulover Paddock Blue za moške je oblačilo kolekcije Streetwear sproščenega videza za vsakodnevno uporabo. Izdelan je iz bombaža in poliestra z elegantnim zunanjim slojem iz francoskega frotirja, obarvan je z motivi v dirkaško modri, črni in beli barvi, ki oblačilo izpopolnijo s trakom v retro slogu na rokavih in ramenih. Podložena kapuca z vrvico, rebrasti obšivi in elastične manšete zagotavljajo udobje v vseh razmerah, vključen je tudi značilni ikonski logotip Yamaha Racing.

description.en:

description.en: Technical and designed with protection and comfort at the front, the Paddock Blue Women’s Knitted Gloves are stylish and lightweight. Easy to carry around for short rides out, they feature a knitted triple fabric blend in blue and white with ventilated surfaces, thermal layering and knuckle protectors for a reassuring fit. A Lycra cuff and strap closure allow a comfortable fit, with Amara and touchscreen fabric pieces for cleaning visors and smartphone use. A must-have Paddock Blue item for riders.
description.sl-SI: Pletene rokavice Paddock Blue za ženske so stilske in lahkotne, poleg tega so zasnovane tehnično z zaščito in udobjem v ospredju. Preprosto jih lahko vzamete s sabo na kratke vožnje, rokavice se ponašajo s tremi pleteninami v modri in beli barvi, površinami za zračenje, toplotno zaščito in ščitniki za členke za varno prileganje. Zapestnik iz lajkre in trak za zapenjanje poskrbita za udobno prileganje, deli iz tkanine amara in tkanine, primerne za zaslon na dotik, pa omogočajo brisanje vizirja in uporabo pametnega telefona. Pri nakupu dodajte 2 vijaka, da jih vstavite skozi montažne luknje plošče, kar zagotavlja varno in stabilno pritrditev vašega bočnega stojala.

description.en:
The perfect pack to have when making day trips with your GP WaveRunner. Enlarge and optimize your storage needs to make your day on the water complete. 
The pack includes: 
F4NU89A1V000 - VX/GP STERN STORAGE 40L : Additional storage on the back of your GP for clothing, food and drinks.
F4PF841PV000 - GX GLOVEBOX ORGANIZER: Protects and organizes your precious products, like your phone, sunglasses and keys from scratching after a ride on the water. 
F4PU511AV000 - GP UNDER-HATCH BAG: Custom-made storage specifically designed for the bow compartment of all 2021~ GP WaveRunners. Features mesh dock line pockets, 2.2kg weight limit and 8.5L storage capacity.
description.sl-SI:
Popoln paket, ki ga lahko imate na enodnevnih izletih z vašim GP WaveRunner-jem. Povečajte in optimizirajte svoje potrebe po shranjevanju, da bo vaš dan na vodi popoln. 
Paket vključuje: 
F4NU89A1V000 - VX/GP PROSTOR ZA SHRANJEVANJE NA KRMI 40L: Dodaten prostor za shranjevanje na hrbtni strani vašega GP za oblačila, hrano in pijačo.
F4PF841PV000 - GX ORGANIZATOR PREDALA: Ščiti in organizira vaše dragocene izdelke, kot so telefon, sončna očala in ključi, pred praskanjem po vožnji po vodi. 
F4PU511AV000 - GP TORBA POD POKROVOM: Shranjevanje po meri, posebej zasnovano za predal na premcu pri vseh modelih GP WaveRunner od letnika 2021. Ima mrežaste žepe s trakovi za zapenjanje, omejitev teže 2,2 kg in zmogljivost shranjevanja 8,5 l.

name.sl-SI: GYTR pokrov sklopke za Ténéré 700 World Raid
name.en: GYTR Clutch cover for Ténéré 700 World Raid

description.en: KIT: GYTR Clutch pack for Ténéré 700. Contains clutch cover, clutch cable and necessary brackets.
Part of the GYTR® Clutch Components which are precision machined from aerospace-quality aluminum with a unique hard coating.
The easy-to-install silencer repack kit ensures peak power delivery and minimizes noise output.
description.sl-SI: Komplet za ponovno zatesnitev dušilnika je preprost za namestitev in poskrbi za največjo zmogljivost ter zmanjša izhodni hrup.
Sistem za hitro menjavo prestav izboljšuje nadzor nad motornim kolesom ter olajša prestavljanje.
description.en: Quick-shift system, increasing bike control and making gear change easier.

With its off-road credentials, the Ténéré 700 is meant to be ridden dirty! To give you and your motorcycle that edge of the seat adrenaline rush, the Rally Pack offers some of the most exciting and sporty Yamaha Genuine Accessories. Giving you the freedom to change riding position dynamically, the rally seat increases the authentic rally look of your Ténéré 700. To make it also sound like a true rally machine, the Akrapovič slip-on gives a throaty-rich exhaust note. Taking your bike off road can push the drive-train to its edges, and this is why the chain guide, chain guard and radiator protector are there to safeguard important elements of your Ténéré 700. For a sharp and dynamic look, the Rally Pack also includes number plate holder, tank pad and LED blinkers. The Rally Pack is your ticket to the ultimate sideways drifting action!
description.sl-SI: S svojim terenskim značajem je Ténéré 700 ustvarjen za agresivno vožnjo! Paket Rally vsebuje izbor najbolj vznemirljive in športne Yamahine originalne dodatne opreme, da vam bo na polno poganjal adrenalin po žilah. Rally sedež, ki vam omogoča spreminjanje položaja med vožnjo, še dodatno poudarja pristen rally videz vašega motorja Ténéré 700. Da pa bo tudi zvenel kot pravi rally motor, Akrapovičev dušilnik skrbi za grlene tone izpuha. Vožnja po brezpotjih lahko pomeni preizkušnjo samih meja pogonskega sistema, zato vodilo verige, ščitnik verige in ščitnik hladilnika varujejo pomembne dele vašega motorja Ténéré 700. Za drzen in dinamičen videz paket Rally vključuje nosilec registrske tablice, zaščito za rezervoar in LED-smernike. Paket Rally je vaša vstopnica v svet brezkompromisne akcije z bočnim zdrsavanjem!

description.en: Stylish adjustment on your XSR700 / XTribute. Designed for those riders that demand maximum performance from their motorcycle. This exhaust system combines increased engine performance with an exciting sound output.
description.sl-SI: Elegantna prilagoditev vašega modela XSR700/XTribute. Namenjen voznikom, ki od svojega motornega kolesa zahtevajo vrhunske zmogljivosti. Ta izpušni sistem poveča zmogljivosti, hkrati pa poskrbi za vznemirljiv zvok motorja.
Silikonsko pršilo Yamalubeobnovi in osveži vse silikonske, prebarvane ali nebarvane dele, ki jih je načelo sonce, plastične dele pa še dodatno zaščiti.

The YA589 rear shock absorber for R7 is a monotube shock with a hose mounted gas reservoir. The adjustable compression and rebound damping enables you to really change the characteristics of the bike. And with its hydraulic spring preload adjuster you can change the stance of your bike to accommodate for extra weight!
description.sl-SI: Zadnji blažilnik YA589 za R7 je enocevni blažilnik s plinskim rezervoarjem, nameščenim s cevjo. Nastavljiva kompresija in povratno blaženje vam omogočata, da popolnoma spremenite lastnosti motornega kolesa. Z mehanizmom za nastavitev trdote hidravličnega vzmetenja pa lahko spreminjate tudi držo in razporeditev teže na motornem kolesu glede na dodatno težo.

Make sure your watercraft stays in optimal shape during winter storage and transportation.
The pack includes the following accessories: 
YMEGPC010000 GP COVER WAVERUNNER: Protects your Power Water Vehicle from scratches during storage and transportation. 
YMEYEC09EU20 YEC-9 CHARGER EU SPEC: Keeps your battery in optimal condition during longer storage.

Poskrbite, da bo vaše plovilo med zimskim skladiščenjem in prevozom ostalo v optimalnem stanju.
Paket vključuje naslednje dodatke:

Čistilo za zavore Yamalube® je idealno za čiščenje in razmaščevanje zavor in komponent sklopke ter drugih delov. Posebna formula, ki ni jedka, hitro raztopi olje, mast, katran, zavorno tekočino ter umazanijo in je varna za uporabo na gumi, plastiki in barvi.
description.en: Yamalube® Brake Cleaner is ideal for degreasing and cleaning brake, clutch and other components. Its non-corrosive formula rapidly dissolves oil, grease, tar, brake fluid and dirt and is safe to use on rubber, plastic and paint.

description.sl-SI: Prevleka za čoln, svetlo siva

description.en:
There is a reason why there is a word sport in “Sport Touring” - while you can comfortably munch miles on the Tracer 900, you can equally set corners alight with the nimble and agile handling. 
To explore this sporty side of the Tracer 900, we put together the Sport Pack. 
It does so in two ways, a) Looks b) Functionality.  
Step up to the sport dimension!
description.sl-SI:
S športno-potovalnim motornim kolesom Tracer 900 se lahko odpravite na daljšo vožnjo ali pa s spretnim upravljanjem polagate ovinke, saj je ta model zelo okreten. 
Za raziskovanje športne plati modela Tracer 900 smo oblikovali komplet Sport Pack. 
Pri tem je poskrbljeno za videz in funkcionalnost. 
Privoščite si športno vožnjo.

name.en: CAPIT Tire Warmer Suprema Spina M/XL
name.sl-SI: Grelnik pnevmatik Suprema Spina M/XL CAPIT

description.en: Tire warmers allow you to get full performance from your machine right from the starting line, and without having to do several laps to warm up your tires.
description.sl-SI: Grelniki pnevmatik omogočajo popolne zmogljivosti vašega motorja takoj od začetka, brez potrebe po dodatnih vožnjah za ogrevanje pnevmatik.

description.en: The new TRACER 9 Sport Pack provides the right sporty finish for your TRACER 9. The Sport Pack gives your bike that bit extra to personalize your motorcycle to your ideal image. Slide through your gears with the Quick Shifter while the Knee Pads provide the extra grip for your knees when shredding corners. The sleek License Plate Holder sharpens up the rear and the stylishly designed Side Sliders protect your engine from any unfortunate moments.
description.sl-SI: Novi paket Sport za TRACER 9 zagotavlja pravo športno obdelavo vašega TRACER 9. Paket Sport daje motociklu tisto nekaj več, s čimer lahko prilagodite svoj motocikel po svoji želji. Hitro prestavljanje Quick Shifter vam omogoča hitro menjavo prestav, kolenske blazinice pa dajejo dodatni oprijem kolenom med nagibanjem v ovinkih. Z elegantnim nosilcem registrske tablice je zadek videti lepše, moderno zasnovani stranski ščitniki pa ščitijo motor pred neželenimi trenutki.

description.en: Provides protection from wind and trail debris.

description.en: High tech and durable, the MTB Men’s Long Sleeve Jersey offers excellent breathability and comfort for all conditions. Made in a blend of recycled polyester and cotton, this jersey’s fabric is dry release and features vented mesh panels for breathability. Printed Yamaha and Alpinestars branding gives it an iconic finish.
description.sl-SI: Visokotehnološki in trpežen dres z dolgimi rokavi MTB za moške omogoča izjemno zračenje in udobje v vseh razmerah. Izdelan je iz recikliranega poliestra in bombaža, tkanina hitreje odvaja vlago in ima mrežaste dele za zračnost. Natisnjena logotipa Yamaha in Alpinestars izdelek ikonsko zaključujeta.

description.en: The true heritage-styled Racer Pack provides that ultimate finishing touch to your XSR125. Designed in the spirit of the Café Racer,  the Racer Pack contains a Racer Cowl & Stays, Side Tank Pads, aluminium Side Covers and the extra stylish License Plate Holder 2.0.

Paket Racer Pack, ki je zasnovan na podlagi Caferacerja, vsebuje dirkaške pokrove in naslone za noge, stranske obloge rezervoarja za gorivo, aluminijaste stranske zaščitne ploščice in zelo moderen nosilec registrske tablice 2.0.

description.sl-SI: Moška avanturistična motoristična jakna, ki je zasnovana za večsezonsko uporabo, je lahka in zračna ter zagotavlja dovolj zaščite za samozavestno vožnjo. Zasnovana je v klasičnih modrih in zemeljsko rjavih odtenkih, ima vodoodporno membrano Drystar, ki se lahko uporablja kot notranja ali zunanja plast, odstranljive rokave za udobje in zračenje ter več notranjih in zunanjih žepov za nujne potrebščine. Zaščita za ramena in komolce stopnje 2 zagotavlja zaščito, z nastavljivim pasom in rokavi za optimalno udobje. Zložljive sprednje in zadnje prezračevalne zaplate skrbijo za odlično zračenje, dolga zadrga v pasu pa omogoča pritrditev jakne na avanturistične motoristične hlače. Popolna jakna za neustrašnega raziskovalca!
description.en: Designed for multi-season use, the Adventure Men’s Riding Jacket is lightweight and breathable, with ample protection for confident riding. Created in classic blue and earthy brown tones, it features a waterproof Drystar membrane can be used as internal or external layer, removable sleeves for comfort and breathability, and multiple inner and outer pockets for essentials. Level 2 shoulder and elbow protection affords protection, with adjustable waist and sleeves for optimal comfort. Foldable front and back ventilation panels offer excellent breathability, with a long waist zip for attaching the jacket to the Adventure Riding Pants. The perfect jacket for the intrepid explorer!

Fitting neatly in the MT-09 cockpit, this bracket is ideal for mounting a USB charger so you can always have your phone or other electronic devices charged up as you ride.

description.en: Conquer the urban landscape with the TMAX Urban Pack which consists of the most essential accessories to make your ride even more practical. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your TMAX.
description.sl-SI: Osvojite urbano pokrajino s kompletom TMAX 'Urban Pack', ki vključuje najbolj bistvene dodatke, s katerimi bo vaša vožnja še bolj praktična. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model TMAX.

Izboljšajte svoj Ténéré 700 s paketom Sport, ki je popolna mešanica zmogljivosti, zaščite in sloga. Izpuh Akrapovič zagotavlja vznemirljive zvoke agregata, menjalnik za hitro prestavljanje pa omogoča nemoteno menjavo prestav. Za dodatno zaščito sta vgrajena zaščita hladilnika in ščitnik verige, ki ščitita bistvene komponente motornega kolesa pred drobci in poškodbami. Za dopolnitev paketa, nosilec registrske tablice poskrbi za drzen, minimalističen zaključek zadaj, ki vašemu motornemu kolesu daje eleganten in športen videz.
description.en:
Contains: Akrapovič Slip-On Exhaust, Quickshifter, Radiator Guard, Chain Guard, Licence Plate Holder.

Enhance your Ténéré 700 with the Sport Pack, a perfect blend of performance, protection and style. The Akrapovič Slip-On Exhaust delivers exhilarating engine notes, while the Quickshifter ensures seamless gear changes. For added protection, the Radiator Guard and Chain Guard shield essential components of the bike from debris and damage. To complete the package, the Licence Plate Holder adds a sharp, minimalist finish to the rear, giving your bike a sleek, sporty look.
The Yamaha-Spidi is a compact backprotector for male. CE certified for male jackets and for body height between 157 - 193 cm...
description.sl-SI: Yamaha-Spidi je kompakten ščitnik hrbta za moške. Certifikacija CE za moške jakne in za telesno višino 157–193 cm.

Črna moška polo majica kolekcije REVS z vpadljivimi rdečimi in belimi poudarki je športno-eleganten izdelek, ki uteleša slog REVS. Mešanica bombaža in elastana ponuja raztegljivost za udobno prileganje, z ovratnikom z gumbi. Brezšivni rokavi in rob dodajajo izjemen slog, elegantni videz pa dopolnjujejo izvezen napis Yamaha na prsih, grafika navpične črte zadaj in bele obrobe na ramenih.
description.en: Black with striking red and white highlights, the REVS Men’s Polo Shirt is a smart-casual item that embodies the REVS style. A cotton and elastane blend offers stretch for a comfortable fit, with a button closure collar. Seamless sleeves and hem add real style, with embroidered Yamaha chest branding, backstripe graphic and white shoulder piping that offsets this classy look.

Športni paket povzdigne vašo Yamaho XMAX na naslednjo raven sloga skuterja. Športni paket XMAX vsebuje športni vizir XMAX, nosilec registrske tablice in njegov pokrov, sprednje in zadnje zavorne ročice, izdelane izključno za Yamaha XMAX.
description.en: The Sport Pack takes your Yamaha XMAX to the next level of scooter style. The XMAX Sport Pack comprises the XMAX Sport Screen, License Plate Holder and its cover, front and rear brake levers and end grips, all made exclusively for the Yamaha XMAX.

The XMAX is personification of what a sporty scooter should be. However we always trying to push the boundary and with the Sport pack for the XMAX, we aim to take it to an even higher level. Intensify the sporty spirit of your XMAX with the Sports pack. The sports pack contains sports screen, license plate holder, aluminium end grip and aluminium foot panel – the perfect combination of sports style and flair.  And the Sports Pack is just the beginning: truly personalize your XMAX by adding other accessories from the vast selection of XMAX Genuine accessories as well.
description.sl-SI: XMAX je točno tak, kot bi moral biti športni skuter. Vendar pa vedno poskušamo premikati meje in s kompletom Sport za XMAX ga želimo popeljati na še višjo raven. Še intenzivnejši športni duh XMAX-a s kompletom Sport. Komplet Sport vključuje športni vizir, nosilec registrske tablice, aluminijaste ročaje in aluminijaste plošče stopalk – popolna kombinacija športnega sloga in elegance.  Komplet Sport je šele začetek: izbirate lahko med širokim naborom originalne dodatne opreme XMAX in popolnoma personalizirate svoj XMAX.

description.en: Custom handlebar ends enhance the design of the MT-07.

description.sl-SI: Zaščita za rezervoar goriva.
description.en: Protection pad for the fuel tank.

name.sl-SI: Komplet za popravilo GYTR R1 (2020 in novejše različice)
name.en: GYTR Repair Set R1 (2020 and Up)

description.en: This set contains Meter, Switch Handles, Rotor Sensor and Front Wheel Sensor Assembly.

description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj TRACER 7 s športnim paketom za dinamično izkušnjo vožnje, ki združuje slog in zmogljivosti. Zaporedni smerniki LED dajejo vašemu motornemu kolesu sodoben videz, hkrati pa izboljšajo vidljivost na cesti. Sistem za hitro prestavljanje CP2 zagotavlja gladko in hitro menjavo prestav. Zaščitite motorno kolo s stranskimi zaščitami in dopolnite športno estetiko s poenostavljenim nosilcem registrske tablice. Komplet TRACER 7 'Sport Pack' vključuje vse, kar potrebujete za nadgradnjo vožnje z natančnostjo in slogom.
description.en: Upgrade your TRACER 7 with the Sport Pack for a dynamic riding experience that combines style and performance. The Sequential LED Blinkers give your bike a modern look while enhancing visibility on the road. The Quick Shifter CP2 ensures smooth and fast gear changes. Protect your bike with the Side Pads, and complete the sporty aesthetic with the streamlined License Plate Holder. The TRACER 7 Sport Pack delivers everything you need to elevate your ride with precision and style.

This Öhlins cartridge kit consisting of 22 mm piston diameter and 8 mm piston shaft replaces the standard one. It allows for stable damping characteristics thanks to positive pressure build up and a more precise adjustment.
description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins z batom premera 22 milimetrov in 8-milimetrsko batnico nadomešča običajnega. Z nastajanjem nadtlaka in natančnejšo nastavitvijo zagotavlja zanesljivo blaženje.

name.sl-SI: Ploščica s številko XSR na levem delu

description.en: These brushed aluminium side number plates remind you of classic sports bikes and clean up the looks when your carrier bags are not mounted,
description.sl-SI: Ti stranski ploščici s številkami iz brušenega aluminija spominjata na klasične športne motorje in ustvarjata čistejši videz, ko nimate nameščenih nosilcev za torbe.

description.en: Upgrade your Yamaha eBike with our Side Stand Kit, designed for convenience, stability, and easy installation. This kit provides the support you need to park your eBike securely on various surfaces. Make sure to add in your purchase, the Mounting Plate and Main Stand Bolt to install it on the eBike. These components are essential for ensuring your eBike remains stable and upright, no matter where you park.
description.sl-SI:
Nadgradite svoj Yamaha eBike z našim kompletom bočnega stojala, ki je zasnovan za udobje, stabilnost in enostavno namestitev. Ta komplet zagotavlja podporo, ki jo potrebujete za varno parkiranje e-kolesa na različnih površinah.
V vaš nakup vključite montažno ploščo in vijak glavnega stojala, da ga namestite na eBike. Te komponente so ključne za zagotavljanje stabilnosti in pokončnega položaja vašega e-kolesa, ne glede na to, kje parkirate.

description.en:
The natural riding position and excellent fuel range make your MT-09 the perfect bike for weekends away. 
So Yamaha has created the Weekend Pack to make sure that you can enjoy every minute of your time whether you’re on or off the bike.
description.sl-SI:
MT-09 je zaradi naravnega položaja sedenja med vožnjo in odličnega dosega z enim rezervoarjem popoln motocikel za potep ob koncu tedna. 
Zato je Yamaha pripravila paket Weekend Pack, s katerim boste lahko uživali v vsaki minuti, ne glede na to ali jo preživljate na motorju ali ne.

description.en:
Make sure your watercraft stays in optimal shape during winter storage and transportation. 
The pack includes the following accessories: 
YMEGPC010000 GP COVER WAVERUNNER: Protects your Power Water Vehicle from scratches during storage and transportation. 
YMEYEC09UK20 YEC-9 CHARGER UK SPEC: Keeps your battery in optimal condition during longer storage. 
MWVFLUSHHSBL REPLACEMENT FLUSH HOSE BLUE: Needed to flush your engine after usage of the WaveRunner.
description.sl-SI:
Poskrbite, da bo vaše plovilo med zimskim skladiščenjem in prevozom ostalo v optimalnem stanju. 
Paket vključuje naslednje dodatke: 
YMEGPC010000 - GP POKRIVALO WAVERUNNER: Ščiti vaš vodni skuter pred praskami med skladiščenjem in prevozom. 
YMEYEC09UK20 - YEC-9 POLNILNIK, UK SPECIFIKACIJA: Ohranja baterijo v optimalnem stanju med daljšim shranjevanjem. 
MWVFLUSHHSBL - NADOMESTNA CEV ZA SPIRANJE, MODRA: Potrebna za spiranje motorja po uporabi WaveRunner-ja.

description.en: We, at Yamaha, want to make sure that all our customers have the best experience while riding our products. For those, who find the standard seat on the XMAX a little high, we created the Low seat. It improves access to the ground, so that you can plant your foot comfortably on the road.
description.sl-SI: Pri družbi Yamaha želimo našim strankam zagotoviti optimalno izkušnjo vožnje z našimi modeli. Za vse, ki jim je standardni sedež na modelih XMAX nekoliko visok, smo ustvarili nizek sedež. Izboljša dostop do tal, tako da lahko brez težav stopite na cesto.

description.en: Keep your investment looking its best and protected. This cover provides the ultimate defence against fading and the elements. It comes with the Vacu-Hold strapless tow system, eliminating billowing and buffeting. Therefore, the cover conforms to the shape of your unit.

Ima sistem Vacu-Hold za vleko s pripenjanjem brez trakov, ki prepreči napihovanje in plapolanje prevleke. Zato se popolnoma prilega obliki vašega vodnega skuterja.

Formula za vse vremenske razmere poskrbi za izjemno mazanje pri vseh delovnih temperaturah in zagotavlja maksimalne pospeške, nemoteno delovanje in daljšo življenjsko dobo agregata.

Its all-weather formula delivers exceptional lubrication at all operating temperatures with maximum acceleration, smooth performance and prolonged engine life.

name.en: SP Connect™ Bar Clamp Mount Pro
name.sl-SI: Nosilec na krmilu SP Connect™ Pro

description.en:
The SP Connect™ Bar Clamp Mount Pro lets you mount your smartphone to your motorcycle in seconds. The Bar Clamp Mount Pro also has a swiveling and rotating head so your smartphone can always be positioned perfectly. 
Just screw this sleek aluminium mount to the bar clamp of your motorbike and you are ready to mount the SP Connect™ PHONE CASE (or UNIVERSAL INTERFACE) by placing it on the mount and turning it 90° clockwise. Your mobile phone is securely positioned in your field of vision, allowing you to navigate, access your playlists.
description.sl-SI:
Z nosilcem na krmilu SP Connect™ Pro lahko v nekaj sekundah namestite svoj pametni telefon na motocikel. Nosilec na krmilu Pro ima tudi vrtljivo in rotacijsko glavo, tako da je lahko vaš pametni telefon vedno kar najbolje nameščen. 
Samo privijte ta eleganten aluminijasti nosilec na nosilec krmila motocikla in že ste pripravljeni na namestitev ohišja za mobilni telefon SP Connect™ (ali univerzalnega vmesnika) tako, da ga postavite na nosilec in obrnete v smeri urnega kazalca za 90°. Mobilni telefon je varno nameščen v vidnem polju, kar vam omogoča navigacijo in dostop do seznamov predvajanja.

description.en: Offering protection and comfort with a lightweight build, the Paddock Blue Men’s Knitted Gloves are absolutely ideal for shorter rides out on two wheels. A knitted triple fabric blend features ventilated surfaces, with knuckle protectors for extra assurance. A Lycra cuff and strap closure ensure a snug fit for different sizes, with Amara and touchscreen fabric pieces for visor wiping and smartphone use. An essential Paddock Blue item for the committed rider.
description.sl-SI: Pletene rokavice Paddock Blue za moške prinašajo zaščito in udobje zaradi lahkotne sestave ter so popolne za krajšo vožnjo na dvokolesnikih. Rokavice iz treh pletenin se ponašajo z zračno površino in ščitniki za členke za dodatno samozavest. Zapestnik iz lajkre in trak za zapenjanje zagotavljata tesno prileganje različnim velikostim, deli iz tkanine amara in materiala, primernega za zaslon na dotik, pa omogočajo brisanje vizirja in uporabo pametnega telefona. Nepogrešljiv kos linije Paddock Blue za vsakega zagretega voznika.

description.en: The sport screen (medium screen) provides additional wind protection due to seamless integration.

The city is the XMAX's natural habitat and with the Urban Accessories Pack you can take the practicality of your XMAX a notch higher. Besides providing enhanced wind protection from the high screen, the pack also takes care of your luggage needs with a 50L top case and carrier – keeping your belonging safe and secure. And a backrest for the top case makes sure the passenger has an equally comfortable ride. To protect you from the scratches and the scruffs the city throws up, the pack contains the XMAX scratch protector. Urban Pack Content: High Screen | Rear Carrier | 50L Top Case (incl. Lock Key Set) | Backrest for 50L Top Case | Scratch protector
description.sl-SI: Mesto je XMAX-ovo naravno okolje, s kompletom dodatne opreme Urban pa lahko še bolje izkoristite XMAX-ovo praktičnost. Poleg izboljšane zaščite pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem poskrbi tudi za vaše potovalne potrebe s 50-litrskim kovčkom, v katerem bodo vaše stvari varne in zaščitene. Naslon za kovček pa poskrbi, da bo tudi sopotnik užival v enako udobni vožnji. +Za zaščito pred praskami in odrgninami komplet vključuje zaščito pred praskami XMAX. Vsebina kompleta Urban Pack: Visok vizir | Zadnji prtljažnik | 50-l kovček (s ključavnico s ključem) | Naslon za 50-l kovček | Zaščita pred praskami
