description.en: Whether its carving corners, powering along the highway or slicing through city traffic, the MT-09 can handle it. It’s the kind of bike that adapts itself to virtually every situation – and the Urban Pack is designed to give added day-to-day practicality without compromising its legendary Hyper Naked aggression.
description.sl-SI: Ne glede, če želite polagati zavoje, drveti po avtocesti ali se prebijati skozi mestni promet, je MT-09 kos nalogi. Ta motocikel se prilagodi praktično vsaki situaciji – paket Urban Pack pa je zasnovan, da mu doda vsakodnevno praktičnost brez vpliva na njegovo legendarno agresivnost Hyper Naked.

GLAVNO STIKALO AKUMULATORJA z dvojnimi elektrodami je bilo preizkušeno in je združljivo z vsemi izvenkrmnimi motorji Yamaha ter je idealno za uporabo z dvema motorjema ali namestitvijo dvojnega akumulatorja. To zmogljivo stikalo akumulatorja ima naslednje specifikacije: 24 V stikalo z neprekinjeno amperažo 450 A. 24 V z 2500 A DC zagonskih amperov (največ 5 sekund). Ohišje je izdelano iz nerjavečega jekla s premazom iz smole na vrhu, ki zagotavlja visoko odpornost na toploto in mehanske obremenitve. Ima dvojne priključne vijake M10
description.en: The MASTER BATTERY SWITCH with Double electrodes has been tested and is compatible for all Yamaha outboard engines and ideal for twin engine applications or dual battery installation. This heavy-duty battery switch has the following specifications:24V Switch with Continuous Amperage 450A DC. 24V with 2500A DC cranking Ampere  (5 seconds max). The housing is made of stainless steel with paint resin on top, providing high heat and mechanical stress resistance. Features dual M10 terminal bolts

name.en: Monster Energy® Yamaha MotoGP Team Replica Cap

description.en: The ultimate in smart paddock wear, the MotoGP Replica Cap is stylish and ready for action. Featuring stylish sublimated prints and official team logos, this is one for long weekends spent watching the races.

description.sl-SI: Zagotavlja zanesljivo zaščito glavnega okvirja

Komplet TRACER 9 'Travel Pack Pro' je vrhunski sklop opreme za voznike, ki zahtevajo udobje, priročnost in vsestranskost. Visok vizir in dodaten širok zaščitni vizir zagotavljata odlično zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sopotnikov sedež pa prinašata udobje med dolgimi vožnjami. V opremo so vključeni sistem za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) in ogrevane ročke, da lahko vozite samozavestno ne glede na vremenske razmere. Zgornji kovček in stranska kovčka ponujajo dovolj prostora za shranjevanje vseh vaših bistvenih stvari, medtem ko polnilnik USB in vtičnica držala ohranjata vaše naprave pripravljene in dostopne.

Nosilec za GPS omogoča enostavno uporabo navigacije, zaradi ščitnika hladilnika in zaščite agregata 'Explorer' pa je vožnja še bolj brezskrbna. Komplet meglenk LED in nosilec za meglenke zagotavljata optimalno vidljivost v vseh pogojih. Zavarujte vso svojo opremo z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, kompleti nosilcev in kompletom ključev za cilindrično ključavnico za hiter dostop. S paketom TRACER 9 'Travel Pack Pro' je vsaka pustolovščina brezhibna mešanica sloga, udobja in funkcionalnosti.
description.en:
The TRACER 9 Travel Pack Pro is the ultimate setup for riders who demand comfort, convenience, and versatility. The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen provide excellent wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat keep both you and your passenger comfortable during long rides. Equipped with a Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) and Heated Grips, you can ride confidently, no matter the weather. The Top Case and Side Cases offer ample storage for all your essentials, while the USB Charger and Holder Socket keep your devices ready and accessible.

Navigate easily with the GPS Stay, and ride with peace of mind knowing your bike is protected by the Radiator Guard and Explorer Engine Guard. The LED Fog Light Kit and Fog Light Stay ensure optimal visibility in any conditions. Secure all your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Stay Kits, and Key Cylinder Set for quick access. With the TRACER 9 Travel Pack Pro, every adventure is a seamless blend of style, comfort, and function.
Sharpen up your Tricity 300’s dynamic style with this lightweight Licence Plate Holder. This stylish Genuine Accessory is easy to fit and includes all cables for blinkers and the licence plate light.
description.sl-SI: S tem lahkim nosilcem registrske tablice poudarite dinamičen slog svojega vozila Tricity 300. Ta eleganten del originalne dodatne opreme je preprost za namestitev in vključuje vse kable za smernike in za lučko registrske tablice.

name.sl-SI: Zimske rokavice Hyper Naked za moške

description.en: Inspired by the iconic and cutting-edge Yamaha MT motorcycle line-up, the MT Men’s Winter Gloves are technical and sophisticated for cold climate riding. Made from a multi-fabric blend in black with grey and blue highlights, these gloves feature thermal layering, waterproofing and knuckle protection combine to ensure comfort and protection on the road. Touchscreen material and Amara fabric allow smartphone use and visor cleaning. Ideal gloves for powering your MT with style and control.
description.sl-SI: Tehnične in dovršene moške zimske rokavice MT za vožnjo v hladnem vremenu je navdihnila legendarna vrhunska linija Yamahinih motornih koles MT. Rokavice so izdelane iz mešanice več tkanin v črni barvi s sivimi in modrimi deli ter ponujajo toplotno zaščito, vodoodpornost in zaščito členkov za zagotovljeno udobje in varnost na cesti. Material, primeren za zaslon na dotik, in tkanina Amara omogočata uporabo pametnega telefona in čiščenje vizirja. Popolne rokavice za obvladovanje motornega kolesa MT v slogu.

description.sl-SI: Replika moške polo majice uradne ekipe Yamaha WorldSBK je ikona pitlane in je nepogrešljiv kos za ekipo in njene navijače. Ta polo je zaradi mehke mešanice bombaža in poliestra lahek, zračen in udoben ter zasnovan za redno aktivno uporabo na stezi. Njegov pleten črn ovratnik se zapenja z gumbi. Na prsih, desni roki in hrbtu so natisnjeni logotipi Yamaha WorldSBK in sponzorjev, ki dopolnjujejo to repliko moštva.
description.en: An iconic pitlane sight, the Yamaha WorldSBK Official Team Men’s Replica Polo is an essential item for the team and their fans. Lightweight, breathable and comfortable thanks to its soft cotton and polyester blend, this polo is designed for regular active use at the track. Its knitted black collar also features a button closure. The chest, right arm and back feature printed Yamaha WorldSBK and sponsor logos to complete this team replica design.
Exclusively designed, stylish 2-piece seat - replacing the original - providing extra comfort on your journeys.

description.en: YamalubeMineral 20W50 4-Stroke Oil is designed for 4-stroke motorcycles with oil-soaked clutches. By creating a unique film it decreases friction and prolongs engine life, protecting against corrosion, foaming and oxidation.

description.en: An essential item for warmer days at race tracks and events, the Paddock Blue Essentials Adult Cap Blue features iconic Yamaha Racing branding. Made from 100% cotton and fitted for adults, an adjustable strap and inner sweatband offer comfort to suit you, with breathing holes for ventilation. 3D and printed logos finish off the cap to help you standout trackside.

The innovative FX RecDeck is a first of its kind platform, that extends the usable space on the stern and pairs with a multi-use rack and related lifestyle accessories for all new experiences on the water. Packages include JetFish and Lounging so whether you want to catch the next big one or chill in style and comfort, this brand new line of accessories powers a new passion for what you can do on the water.
description.sl-SI: RecDeck za FX je inovativna ploščad, kot je še ni bilo. Zagotavlja razširitev uporabnega prostora na krmi ter združljivost z večnamenskim nosilcem in sorodno dodatno opremo za nove, bogate izkušnje na vodi. Ne glede na to, ali želite uloviti svojo največjo ribo ali uživati v slogu in udobju, vam bo ta povsem nova linija dodatne opreme s paketi, kot sta JetFish in Lounging, odprla vrata v nov svet zabave na vodi.

description.en: Ready for some serious off road riding? Then you are in the right place. Take your Ténéré 700 World Raid to the next level with the Enduro Pack and enjoy the adrenaline rush.
description.sl-SI: Ali ste pripravljeni na resno terensko vožnjo? Potem ste na pravem mestu. Popeljite svoj model Ténéré 700 World Raid na novo raven s paketom Enduro in uživajte v navalu adrenalina.

Priključite svoj ovitek za telefon SP Connect ali druge naprave, združljive s sistemom SP ConnectTM, na motocikel z Moto Mount Pro. Nosilec je narejen iz aluminija, primernega za letalsko industrijo in izrezanega na CNC stroju ter se prilega standardnim in velikim krmilom. Za dodatno zaščito vašega pametnega telefona ima nosilec tudi edinstven sistem za blaženje tresljajev, ki zmanjša G-sile za do 40 % (odvisno od modela motocikla in telefona). Namestite lahko nosilec z roko ali neposredno kot objemko z nosilcem – obe različici omogočata 360° vrtenje, da najdete popoln položaj.
description.en: Attach your SP Connect phone case, or other SP ConnectTM compatible devices to your motorbike with the Moto Mount Pro. The mount is CNC milled out of aircraft-grade aluminum and fits standard and oversized handlebars. To further protect your smartphone, the mount also has a unique vibration dampening system that cuts G-forces by up to 40% (depending on bike & phone model). You can mount it with the positioning arm or as a direct clamp mount - both versions allow 360° rotation to find the perfect position.

description.sl-SI: Hidravlični sistemi upravljanja tipa LS 125 PRO. Popoln komplet (standardni sistem, vključno s cilindrom, helm pumpo z zaklepno ventilom, vsemi priključki, lijakom za polnjenje in 10 m cevi)
description.en: Hydraulic steering systems type LS 125 PRO. Complete kit (standard system incl. cylinder, helm pump with lock valve, all fittings, filling funnel and 10m hose)
Lightweight and resistant to corrosion, they insure you can continue your journey.
description.sl-SI: Lahka vesla, odporna na korozijo, zagotavljajo, da boste lahko nadaljevali svojo pot.

Preprosta, elegantna in praktična kapa za odrasle kolekcije REVS je izdelana iz rebrastega bombaža v sodobnem dizajnu in jo lahko vzamete povsod, z debelim pletenjem pa ohranja toploto v hladnejših dneh. Na voljo je kot uniseks model v črni barvi z rdečimi in belimi kontrastnimi črtami ter je izjemno praktična zaradi univerzalne velikosti. Vezena značka Yamaha doda zadnji pridih slogu REVS.
description.en: Simple, stylish and practical, the REVS Adult’s Beanie is made from ribbed cotton in a contemporary design that you can take everywhere, with thick knitting to keep in the warmth on colder days. Black with red and white contrast stripes, its unisex fit is also one-size-fits-all for ultimate practicality. An embroidered Yamaha badge adds a final touch of REVS style.
These overfenders feature a tough, aggressive look and a custom formed design that helps protect you from water, mud, and other trail debris.
description.sl-SI: Ti razširjeni blatniki imajo robusten, agresiven videz in so oblikovani po meri, da zagotavljajo zaščito pred vodo, blatom in drugimi delci s poti.

description.en: The ideal Travel gear for your TRACER 9 GT to hit the road in full functional style. The high screen and Comfort Seat provide the extra comfort for those long endless roads. The Top Case give you the perfect tool to take your belongings along with your endeavors together with the TRACER 9 GT Side Cases. Charge your phone easily with the USB Charger and it's Holder Socket. Your passenger will enjoy the comfort of the Backrest.
description.sl-SI: Idealna potovalna oprema za vaš TRACER 9 GT. Odpravite se na pot z uporabnim slogom. Visok zaščitni vizir in udoben sedež nudita več udobja na neskončnih cestah. Zgornji kovček je v kombinaciji s stranskima kovčkoma za TRACER 9 GT odličen za prevoz lastnine na popotovanjih. Telefon enostavno napolnite s polnilnikom USB in vtičnico na nosilcu. Vaš potnik bo užival v udobju naslonjala.

description.en: Lightweight, high-tech race style protector that protects the existing crank case cover and engine from accidental damages.
description.sl-SI: Lahka, tehnološko dovršena dirkalna zaščita, ki varuje obstoječi pokrov ohišja agregata in motor pred nenamernimi poškodbami.

description.en: Full race system for dedicated track use. The integrated mid muffler system brings the noise level within acceptable limits.

The Universal Phone Clamp is designed to fit your smartphone with or without standard phone cases. Engineered with high-quality materials, the Universal Phone Clamp will ensure a tight and secure grip on your device while you focus on the road.
description.sl-SI: Univerzalna objemka za telefon je zasnovana za pametni telefon s standardnim ovitkom ali brez njega. Univerzalna objemka za telefon je izdelana iz visokokakovostnih materialov ter zagotavlja tesen in varen oprijem vaše naprave, medtem ko se osredotočate na cesto.

Za takrat, ko morate stvari hitro shraniti in jih imeti pri roki, smo razvili torbo Console. Postavljena je med sedežem in ščitom za noge, je priročna, preprosta za uporabo in točno tam, kjer jo potrebujete.
description.en: For times when you need to store and retrieve things quickly, we developed the Console bag. Placed between the seat and the leg shield, it is convenient, easy and there when you need it.
Glossy resin-type with Dark-side of Japan exclusive logo and design.
description.sl-SI: Sijajen videz z ekskluzivnim logotipom in dizajnom Dark-side of Japan.

description.en: These slides reduce friction and protect the aluminium rails from track wear.
description.sl-SI: Drsniki zmanjšujejo trenje in ščitijo aluminijasta vodila pred obrabo.

description.en: Kit out your TMAX for winter with the Winter Pack, featuring the Apron and Grip Heater . Essential items for winter weather scooter riding and comfort in colder months.
Gives your XSR700 a vintage look.

description.sl-SI: Vrhunski potovalni paket za vaš TRACER 9 za udobno in elegantno raziskovanje odprte ceste. Visok vizir in udoben sedež prinašata največje možno udobje na daljših potovanjih. 45-litrski zgornji kovček in stranski torbi so idealna rešitev za shranjevanje vseh vaših potrebščin. S polnilnikom USB in vtičnico na nosilcu enostavno poskrbite, da so vaše naprave napolnjene in dostopne. Vse varno pritrdite z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček ter kompleti spodnjih in zgornjih nosilcev, poleg tega pa lahko uporabite še komplet ključev za cilindrično ključavnico za hiter dostop do potrebščin.
description.en: The ultimate Travel Pack for your TRACER 9 to explore the open road in comfort and style. The High Screen and Comfort Seat deliver maximum comfort on those extended journeys. With the 45L Top Case and Side Cases, you have the ideal storage solutions to carry all your gear. The USB Charger and Holder Socket make it easy to keep your devices powered and accessible. Mount everything securely with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Lower and Upper Stay Kits, and enjoy the convenience of the Key Cylinder Set for quick access to your belongings.

The powerful CP4 engine and lightweight chassis that deliver the ultimate balance between power, agility and stability make the MT-10 the perfect bike for a weekend away filled with adrenaline and torque.
So we have created the Weekend Pack to make sure you enjoy every moment whether you're on or off the bike. 
Gear up for a revving weekend trip!
description.sl-SI:
Zmogljiv motor CP4 in lahka šasija zagotavljata popolno ravnovesje med močjo, okretnostjo in stabilnostjo, zato je MT-10 popoln motor za vikend, poln adrenalina in navora.
V ta namen smo ustvarili dodatno opremo 'Weekend Pack', da boste uživali v vsakem trenutku, ko ste na motorju ali pa tudi ne. 
Pripravite se na vikend izlet "pri višjih obratih"!

name.sl-SI: Stikalo za preklop med kratkimi in dolgimi lučmi

description.en: The High/Low headlight switch offers the options for high- or low-beam lighting with our Headlight High/Low Switch. while being rugged and easy to install. Dual Seal Protection seals out water, dust, and debris ( IP66/68-rated).
description.sl-SI: Naše stikalo za preklop med kratkimi in dolgimi lučmi zagotavlja možnost osvetlitve s kratkimi ali dolgimi lučmi, obenem pa je čvrsto in enostavno za namestitev. Zaščita z dvojnim tesnilom zagotavlja tesnjenje pred vdorom vode, prahu in umazanije (stopnja zaščite IP66/68).
Za tople roke med vožnjo v mrzlem vremenu izberite grelce ročk. Ta par električno ogrevanih ročk nadomešča standardne ročke Yamaha XMAX za ogrevanje na zahtevo, skozi vse leto.
description.en: Choose the Grip Heaters for warm hands in cold riding conditions. This pair of electrically heated hand grips replaces the standard Yamaha XMAX scooter grips for heat on demand, all year round.

Specially formulated to meet Yamaha’s own very high standards, this advanced oil features additives to guard against friction, wear, foam and corrosion. The result is consistent protection for the suspension and the delivery of safer and more precise handling.
description.sl-SI: Posebej izdelano čistilo, ki izpolnjuje lastne visoke standarde družbe Yamaha. Napredni aditivi z lastnostmi olja preprečujejo trenje, obrabo, penjenje in korozijo. Rezultat je dosledna zaščita za vzmetenje in zagotavljanje bolj varnega ter natančnega delovanja.

description.en: Covers for either side of the radiator - replacing the existing ones.
description.sl-SI: Pokrovi za vse strani hladilnika, ki bodo zamenjali obstoječe.

Zaščitite se pred soncem in pokažite svojo podporo do Fabia s kapo za odrasle Quartararo! Ta 5-delna kapa v modri in črni barvi Yamaha ima ikonično rdečo "20" znamke "El Diablo" na sprednji strani, na vrhu pa Yamaha Racing. Natisnjena grafika na stranskem delu in beli robovi dodajo svoje, z odprtinami za prezračevanje in nastavljivim trakom za popolno udobje.
description.en: Keep the sun at bay and show your love for Fabio with the Quartararo Adult Cap! This 5-panel cap in Yamaha blue and black features 'El Diablo's' iconic red '20' on the front, with Yamaha Racing on the peak. Printed side panel graphics and white piping add extra touches, with vent holes and an adjustable strap for all-over comfort.

description.sl-SI: Olje YamalubeRS4GP 10W40 je visokozmogljivo motorno olje za štiritaktna dirkalna motorna kolesa, razvito z enako tehnologijo kot Yamahino olje za tekmovanja v razredu MotoGP. Zagotavlja odlično zaščito in zmogljivost motorja v normalnih in ekstremnih pogojih vožnje.
description.en: YamalubeRS4GP 10W40 Oil is a high-performance 4-stroke racing oil developed with the cutting-edge technology of the Yamaha Factory Racing MotoGP oil. Provides excellent engine protection and performance under normal and extreme riding conditions.
Stylish licence plate holder to replace the original.
description.sl-SI: Eleganten nosilec registrske tablice, ki nadomešča originalnega.
Komplet nalepk z avtentično grafiko Yamaha Off Road Racing, ki vašemu motociklu daje dirkaški videz GYTR.
description.en: Set of stickers with authentic Yamaha Off Road Racing graphics that give your bike the GYTR racing look.

description.sl-SI:
'Sport Pack Pro', ki je zasnovan za izboljšanje zmogljivosti, sloga in funkcionalnosti vašega MT-07, ponuja vrhunsko izbiro Yamahine dodatne opreme. Nova zasnova ekskluzivnega sistema Akrapovič zagotavlja izboljšan zvok in večjo moč, medtem ko kombinacija ogledal na koncu krmila, vsestranskega nosilca na krmilu in kratkega vizirja poskrbi za bolj drzen videz sprednjega dela. Medtem ko blazinica za rezervoar ščiti rezervoar pred praskami, zaporedni LED utripalci v vaš MT-07 prinašajo pridih vrhunske prefinjenosti. 

Vsebuje: Celoten izpušni sistem Akrapovič MT-07, večnamenska osnova, vetrobransko steklo, zaščitna blazinica za rezervoar, ogledala na koncu krmila v obliki diamanta, sekvenčne LED utripalke, nosilec registrske tablice.
description.en:
Crafted to enhance the performance, style and function of your MT-07, the Sport Pack Pro features the ultimate selection of Yamaha accessories. The newly designed exclusive Akrapovič system provides enhanced sound and power, while the Bar-End Mirrors together with the Multi-Mount Base and Fly Screen combo give your front end a bold new look. And while the Tank Pad protects the tank from scratches, the Sequential LED Blinkers bring a touch of cutting-edge sophistication to your MT-07. 

Contains: MT-07 Full Akrapovič Exhaust System, Multi-Mount Base, Fly Screen, Tank Pad, Diamond Bar-end Mirrors, Sequential LED Blinkers, Licence Plate Holder.

With its compact dimension, the lightweight and dual leaning front wheels, Tricity represents the best solution for every day commuting. But who said that can’t go hand in hand with a sporty experience? The Sport pack adds a sleek look, while the Tricity loses none of its convenience. The smoke-tinted sport screen comes in a short dynamic shape. This is further enhanced by the backrest base alongside the cushion to ensure passengers are comfortable, while the sportier silhouette heightens the dynamic nature of the scooter.
Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.
description.sl-SI:
Model Tricity s kompaktnimi merami, lahkim ogrodjem in dvojnima nagibnima sprednjima kolesoma predstavlja najboljšo rešitev za vsakodnevno vožnjo. Te lastnosti pa se lepo skladajo tudi s športno vožnjo. Paket Sport poskrbi za eleganten videz, medtem pa Tricity ohrani svoje udobje. Zatemnjen športni vizir je kratke, dinamične oblike. Za udobje potnikov je še dodatno poskrbljeno z nosilcem za naslon poleg blazine, športna oblika pa poveča dinamičnost skuterja.
Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity.

description.en: Attractive LED Fog Light KIT

description.sl-SI:
TRACER 9 GT 'Travel Pack Pro' je zasnovan za voznike, ki iščejo maksimalno udobje, varnost in funkcionalnost na dolgih razdaljah. Visok vizir v kombinaciji z dodatnim širokim zaščitnim vizirjem omogoča boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sopotnikov udoben sedež pa vozniku in sopotniku prinašata toploto in sproščenost. Ohranite nadzor s kompletom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah in sistemom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) na krmilu, nosilec za GPS pa omogoča jasen pregled nad navigacijo. Zgornji kovček in naslon zagotavljata veliko prostora za shranjevanje in udobje sopotnika, s polnilnikom USB z vtičnico na nosilcu pa poskrbite, da so vaše naprave vedno napolnjene.

Za dodatno zaščito pred kamenčki na cesti se namestita ščitnik hladilnika in zaščita agregata 'Explorer', komplet meglenk LED z nosilcem za meglenke pa zagotavlja vidljivost v vseh pogojih. Ta paket je popoln spremljevalec za vsako pustolovščino na vašem TRACER 9 GT.
description.en:
The TRACER 9 GT Travel Pack Pro is built for riders seeking maximum comfort, safety, and functionality on long-distance rides. The High Screen, paired with the Add-On Wide Screen, enhances wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Comfort Seat ensure warmth and relaxation for both rider and passenger. Stay in control with the Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit and TPMS on the handlebar, while the GPS Stay keeps your navigation in clear view. The Top Case and Backrest provide ample storage and comfort for your passenger, and the USB Charger with Holder Socket ensures your devices remain powered.

For added protection, the Radiator Guard and Explorer Engine Guard shield your bike from road debris, and the LED Fog Light Kit with Fog Light Stay ensures visibility in all conditions. This pack  is the ultimate companion for every adventure on your TRACER 9 GT.

description.sl-SI: Vse, kar potrebujete, da bo vaš motocikl pripravljen na dirko. Ta komplet vključuje visoko zmogljiva čistila, krpo za odstranjevanje umazanije in umazanije ter vrhunsko mazivo za verigo za gladko in zanesljivo vožnjo pred, med in po vsakem tekmovanju.
description.en: Everything you need to keep your motorcycle race-ready. This complete kit includes high-performance cleaners, a cloth to remove dirt and grime, and premium chain lube for smooth, reliable riding before, during, and after every competition.
Protects the frame, steering stem sleeve, engine and chassis components

Preprečite neželene poškodbe na svoji Yamahi XMAX z zaščitnim paketom, ki vsebuje zaščito konzole, ter sprednjo in zadnjo zaščito pred praskami.

description.en: To easily dock your WaveRunner get the Yamaha dock-line, made of floating multi filament polypropylene, oil, gas, UV, mildew &salt water resistant. Black, 1 [cm] diameter line.

The WaveRunner Floating Wrist Lanyard is a safety accessory that keeps your WaveRunner stop switch key afloat and easily accessible while you're on the water. It comes in various colors and features a comfortable wrist strap, a coiled cord and the clip that attaches to the stop switch.

description.sl-SI: Sprednji razširjeni blatniki Wolverine® RMAX™ 1000 zagotavljajo dodatno zaščito pred blatom in vodo tako s serijskimi kot tudi z dodatnimi kolesi in pnevmatikami.
description.en: Wolverine® RMAX™ 1000 Front Overfenders provide additional protection from mud and water with both stock and accessory wheels and tyres.

description.en: Keep your investment looking its best, and protect it from the elements. This cover provides the ultimate protection against fading and the elements. It comes with the Vacu-Hold strapless tow system, eliminating billowing and buffeting. Therefore, the cover conforms to the shape of your WaveRunner.
description.sl-SI: Ohranite svojo naložbo v najboljšem stanju in jo zaščitite pred vremenskimi vplivi. Ta prevleka zagotavlja neprekosljivo zaščito pred bledenjem in posledicami vremenskih dejavnikov. Ima sistem Vacu-Hold za vleko s pripenjanjem brez trakov, ki prepreči napihovanje in plapolanje prevleke. Zato se popolnoma prilega obliki vašega vodnega skuterja WaveRunner.

Kakovostno in elegantno anodizirane nizke koničaste ročke za krmilo v mat črni barvi za bolj športen vozni položaj.

description.en:
If you want to take your TRACER 7 to the next level, the carefully selected accessories of the Yamaha Sport Pack are the way to go.
Consisting of  a chain guard, full radiator cover, side pads and a short licence plate holder – generation 2, the Sport Pack gives your TRACER 7 an even more aggressive look and a sharper feel. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your motorcycle.
description.sl-SI: Komplet Sport Pack z lahkim ščitnikom verige in čudovitim pokrovom celotnega hladilnika ter stranskimi zaščitami in kompaktnim nosilcem registrske tablice poudari dinamični videz in ulični značaj tega radikalnega srednjekategornika TRACER 7.

description.en: Designed for pure performance, the MX Adult Socks offer superior comfort and ventilation to help you stay focused on the racing. A combination of mesh layering and ribbing allows both breathability and flexion, with durable materials allowing regular use on track.
description.sl-SI: Nogavice MX za odrasle, ki so zasnovane popolnoma zmogljivo, omogočajo največje udobje in zračenje, da lahko ostanete osredotočeni na dirkanje. Kombinacija mrežaste in rebraste plasti omogoča zračnost ter prilagodljivost, zaradi trpežnih materialov pa jih boste lahko redno nosili na stezi.

name.sl-SI: Ženska majica REVS s kratkimi rokavi

description.sl-SI: Ženska majica s kratkimi rokavi kolekcije REVS je nepogrešljiv kos oblačila za vsak dan ter združuje sodoben slog z Yamahinim kultnim videzom. Ta črna majica s kratkimi rokavi udobnega kroja je izdelana iz bombaža in elastana v enojnem džersiju ter ima vpadljive rdeče stranske dele in bele obrobe na ramenih. Okrogel izrez in raglan rokavi ponujajo enostavno udobje, natisnjeni napis Yamaha na prsih in grafika navpične črte zadaj pa prinašata vrhunski izdelek kolekcije REVS.
description.en: Essential for everyday life, the REVS Women’s T-Shirt blends modern style with iconic Yamaha design. Made from cotton and elastane in single jersey, this comfort fit black T-shirt is offset with striking red side panels and white shoulder piping. A round neck and raglan sleeves offer easy comfort, with printed Yamaha chest branding and backstripe graphic combining for a class REVS item.
Large screen for improved wind protection when riding

Multifunctional and perfect for changing weather, the Paddock Blue Men’s Hybrid Jacket is a 2-in-1 item for day to day wear. 100% polyester throughout in two-tone blue, the puffer jacket body is padded inside and features removable softshell sleeves to transform the jacket into a bodywarmer. Printed Yamaha branding on the chest and back complete a classic Paddock Blue look.
description.sl-SI: Hibridna jakna Paddock Blue za moške združuje dva izdelka v enem, primernem za vsakodnevno nošnjo, poleg tega je večnamenska in kot nalašč za prehodno vreme. Izdelana je iz 100-odstotnega poliestra v dveh odtenkih modre barve, puhovka je znotraj podložena in ima snemljive rokave iz mehkoščitne tkanine softshell, zaradi česar jo lahko spremenite v brezrokavnik. Natisnjeni Yamahin logotip na prsih in hrbtu dopolnjuje klasični videz linije Paddock Blue.

Yamahina motorna kolesa so namenjena uporabi skozi vse leto, zato je pomembno, da imate dodatno opremo, ki omogoča enostavno vsakodnevno uporabo.
Paket Urban Pack vključuje zadnji nosilec in 45-litrski kovček, v katerem lahko varno in enostavno shranjujete dragocene predmete. Motorno kolo z energijo napolni vas, USB-vtičnica pa vaše elektronske naprave. Kratek in eleganten vizir pa vas ščiti pred vetrom in vsem, kar se znajde na vaši poti!
description.en:
Yamaha motorcycles are meant to be used all year long and that is why it is important to have accessories that make every day usage a breeze.
The Urban Pack contains a rear carrier along with a 45 L top case to keep your valuables securely and with ease. While the motorcycle charges you up with energy, the USB outlet is there to charge your electronic devices. And finally, there is a stylish short screen to protect you from wind or whatever the city throws at you!
Provides rigid protection of the a-arms from rocks and tree
description.sl-SI: Zagotavlja zanesljivo zaščito A-rok pred kamni in drevesi

description.sl-SI: Komplet za sprednje vpetje za vitel vključuje vse, kar potrebujete za namestitev vitla serije AXON.

Vrhunski potovalni paket za vaš TRACER 9 za udobno in elegantno raziskovanje odprte ceste. Visok vizir in udoben sedež prinašata največje možno udobje na daljših potovanjih. 45-litrski zgornji kovček in stranski torbi so idealna rešitev za shranjevanje vseh vaših potrebščin. S polnilnikom USB in vtičnico na nosilcu enostavno poskrbite, da so vaše naprave napolnjene in dostopne. Vse varno pritrdite z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček ter kompleti spodnjih in zgornjih nosilcev, poleg tega pa lahko uporabite še komplet ključev za cilindrično ključavnico za hiter dostop do potrebščin.
description.en: The ultimate Travel Pack for your TRACER 9 to explore the open road in comfort and style. The High Screen and Comfort Seat deliver maximum comfort on those extended journeys. With the 45L Top Case and Side Cases, you have the ideal storage solutions to carry all your gear. The USB Charger and Holder Socket make it easy to keep your devices powered and accessible. Mount everything securely with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Lower and Upper Stay Kits, and enjoy the convenience of the Key Cylinder Set for quick access to your belongings.

Keep your outboard engine protected from dirt and scratches when the boat is docking at the harbor or during winter storage. Made of heavy duty outside material with advanced coating technology that assures maximum water resistance, UV protection and breath-ability. The soft inner felt lining avoids scratches during fitting and transportation while the Twin Rope Cleat  and elasticized hem keeps the cover in place.

description.en: Made from durable rubber material and specifically designed for the MT-09, these tank side pads ensure you have excellent knee grip for total control.
description.sl-SI: Te stranske zaščite za rezervoar so izdelane iz trpežnega gumijastega materiala in posebej zasnovane za model MT-09 ter zagotavljajo odličen oprijem kolen za popoln nadzor.

description.en: Use the SP Connect™ Brake Mount to mount your SP Connect™ Phone Case or Universal Interface to your motorcycle in seconds. You can easily attach the Brake Mount to your maxi scooter by screwing it onto the lid of the brake fluid reservoir. This is also a great mounting solution for other motorcycles with limited access to the handlebars. Due to the multiple adjustment possibilities, your mobile phone is securely positioned in your field of vision, allowing you to navigate, access your playlists or use other apps without taking your eyes off the road.
description.sl-SI: Z zavornim nosilcem SP Connect™ na motorno kolo v nekaj sekundah namestite svoje ohišje za mobilni telefon SP Connect™ ali univerzalni vmesnik. Zavorni nosilec lahko preprosto pritrdite na svoj maksi skuter tako, da ga privijete na pokrov rezervoarja zavorne tekočine. To je tudi odlična rešitev za montažo pri drugih motornih kolesih z omejenim dostopom do krmila. Zaradi več možnosti prilagajanja je vaš mobilni telefon varno nameščen v vidnem polju, kar vam omogoča navigacijo, dostop do seznamov predvajanja ali uporabo drugih aplikacij, ne da bi pri tem pogled umaknili s ceste.

name.sl-SI: Modri obesek za ključe Paddock AirTag

description.sl-SI: Z obeskom za ključe Paddock Blue AirTag nikoli več ne izgubite ključev. Obesek za ključe je zasnovan za namestitev in zaščito sledilne naprave Apple AirTag ter ima silikonsko oznako Yamaha Racing, ki jo lahko zamenjate z oznako AirTag ali pa jo pustite, da dobite preprost in eleganten obesek za ključe Paddock Blue. PU usnje in konstrukcija iz nerjavečega jekla pomagata preprečiti praske in poškodbe ključka AirTag.
description.en: Never lose your keys again with the Paddock Blue AirTag Keyring. Designed to accommodate and protect the Apple AirTag tracking device, the keyring features a silicone Yamaha Racing tag that can be replaced with an AirTag or left in for a simple and stylish Paddock Blue keyring. PU leather and stainless steel construction help avoid scratches and damage to your AirTag.
Wire harness to simplify installation of LED blinkers.

name.sl-SI: Motoristične rokavice Sports Touring za moške

description.en: Giving Sport Touring riders protection and comfort with a stylish black-blue finish, the Sport Touring Men’s Riding Gloves are ideal for shorter mid-season rides. A triple fabric blend features thermal insulation and knuckle protection for assurance, with Amara fabric for visor wiping and smartphone use.  An essential for Tracer riders who want to feel every moment.
description.sl-SI: Motoristične rokavice Sport Touring za moške voznikom motornih koles Sport Touring zagotavljajo zaščito in udobje s stilsko izdelavo v črni in modri barvi ter so tako popolne za krajše vožnje v sezoni. Rokavice iz treh tkanin se ponašajo s toplotno izolacijo in ščitnikom za členke, kar omogoča zanesljivost. Poleg tega vključujejo tkanino amara za brisanje vizirja in uporabo pametnega telefona.  Nepogrešljiv kos za voznike modela Tracer, ki želijo izkusiti vsak trenutek.

description.en: Stylish and adaptable for daily wear, the Paddock Blue Women’s Sweater/Hoodie is a comfy classic for wearing to race events, the gym and more. Made from a soft blend of polyester   and cotton , this garment features a full-length zip and fixed hood ensure a snug fit. Self-fabric hem and cuffs give a seamless look, with colour contrast black sleeves and external pockets for essentials. Embroidered chest branding and back graphic in white give a classic teamwear look.
description.sl-SI: Ženska jopa Paddock Blue je stilsko in prilagodljivo vsakdanje klasično oblačilo, ki ga lahko udobno nosite na dirkalnih prireditvah, v telovadnici ali kjer koli drugje. Izdelana je iz mehkega poliestra in bombaža, ima zadrgo po celotni dolžini ter fiksno kapuco, ki zagotavlja tesno prileganje. Obšivi in manšete iz enakega materiala poskrbijo za brezhiben videz, rokavi so v kontrastni črni barvi, zunanji žepi pa omogočajo prostor za vaše predmete. Zaradi izvezenega logotipa na prsih in grafike na hrbtu v beli barvi ima jopa klasičen videz oblačila ekipe.

description.sl-SI: Popestrite slog Yamahinega skuterja NMAX z zavorno ročico. Nastavljiva ročica je izdelana iz eloksiranega aluminija pri družbi Gilles Tooling in omogoča preprosto namestitev. Prilagodite jo po svojih željah z dodajanjem izbirnih barvnih obročkov.
description.en: Inject a dose of style to your Yamaha NMAX with the brake lever. Made from anodized aluminium by Gilles Tooling, this adjustable levers is easy to fit. Customize it to your liking by adding optional colored rings.

Made out of heavy duty plastic, these bags are designed to hold shape and stand up on their own. After a day of boating, cleanse your engine with fresh water. Just fill the bag until the water passes the intake inlets and idle your engine in neutral for 5 to 10 minutes. Finally, unscrew the drain plug and let the water flow out.
description.sl-SI: Vrečke so izdelane iz trpežne plastike in so zasnovani tako, da ne spremenijo obliko in lahko samostojno stojijo. Po dnevu na vodi očistite motor s sladko vodo. Napolnite vrečko, dokler voda ne pride do sesalnega priključka, in motor pustite v prostem teku od 5 do 10 minut. Nato odvijte odtočni čep in pustite, da voda izteče.

Zaščitni paket GYTR Protection optimizira zaščito vašega ATV-ja za dirkaške potrebe. Paket zajema: aluminijasto zaščitno ploščo nihajne roke, aluminijasto zaščitno ploščo dvojne roke, aluminijasto zaščitno ploščo okvirja, sprednje držalo GYTR Sport, posebno izvedbo prostorov za noge, črno zaščito za noge GYTR in mrežo.
description.en: The GYTR Protection pack optimises the protection of your ATV for racing purposes. This pack consists of: Aluminium Swingarm Skidplate, Aluminium A-Arm Skid Plate, Aluminium Frame Skid Plate, GYTR Sport Front Grab Bar, Special Edition Footwells, Black GYTR Nerfbar and Webbing.

S stranskimi zaščitami za rezervoar izboljšajte oprijem med vožnjo in zaščito rezervoarja. Par gumiranih lepilnih blazinic z ekskluzivno blagovno znamko MT za dodaten slog in funkcionalnost.

description.en: XSR700 specific soft side bag carrier, can be paired with a right side carrier or used in a stand alone situation. Optional are the heritage-styled number plates that can be used to cover the carrier when not in use with the soft side bags.
description.sl-SI: Nosilec za mehko stransko torbo, posebej zasnovan za model XSR700, je mogoče uporabljati skupaj z nosilcem na desni strani ali samostojno. Izbirna ploščica s številko, oblikovana v značilnem slogu, ki črpa navdih iz dediščine, se lahko uporablja za pokrivanje nosilca, kadar ni v uporabi z mehkimi stranskimi torbami.

Elegantna moška softshell jakna kolekcije REVS v gladki črni barvi z rdečimi poudarki je izdelana iz mešanice poliestra in elastana ter je za večje udobje na prostem podložena s flisom. Je udobnega kroja z raglan rokavi in zadrgo po celotni dolžini, na voljo pa sta tudi sprednja žepa z zadrgo, ki ponujata dovolj prostora. Fiksna kapuca, sešita iz treh tretjin, ščiti pred vremenskimi vplivi, izvezeni napis Yamaha na prsnem košu in grafika navpične črte zadaj pa se dopolnjujeta z belo obrobo na ramenih in poudarjata klasičen videz kolekcije REVS.
description.en: Produced in slick black with red highlights, the stylish REVS Men’s Softshell Jacket is a polyester elastane blend, fleece-lined to keep you comfortable outdoors. A relax fit with raglan sleeves and a full-length zip, it also features two front zip pockets offering ample space. A 3-panel fixed hood keeps the elements out, while embroidered Yamaha chest branding and backstripe graphic combine with white shoulder piping for a classic REVS outdoor look.

description.sl-SI: Ustvarite športni videz Yamahinega skuterja XMAX s športnim vizirjem, s kratko in zatemnjeno zasnovo za elegantno in dinamično podobo.
description.en: Give your Yamaha XMAX scooter a sporty look with the Sport Screen, a short screen with dark smoke finish for a stylish dynamic look.

name.sl-SI: Lahki dušilnik Akrapovič za XMAX 125 iz titana

description.en:
Street legal Akrapovič muffler to improve the performance, sound and looks of your XMAX 125. 
This is a non Yamaha branded product and is fully developed and produced by Akrapovic. 
Important note: Installation requires cutting of standard muffler. We advise you to visit your Yamaha dealer for proper installation.
description.sl-SI:
Homologirani dušilnik Akrapovič za boljše zmogljivosti, zvok in videz vašega XMAX 125. 
To ni izdelek Yamahe. V celoti ga je razvilo in izdelalo podjetje Akrapovič. 
Pomembno: Namestitev zahteva rezanje standardnega dušilnika. Svetujemo vam, da za pravilno namestitev obiščete svojega prodajalca Yamaha.

description.en: Rim Stickers Set for 1 Wheel - Rear

description.sl-SI: Yamaha WorldSBK Official Team Adult Replica Cap je priljubljen kos oblačila med Yamahinimi vozniki in oboževalci, zato je nujen za toplo podnebje in sončne vikende. Ta 5-panelna uniseks kapa, izdelana iz 100% bombaža v modri barvi Paddock Blue s črnim vrhom, ustreza vsem, s tiskanimi in 3D logotipi Yamahe in sponzorjev pa je klasičen dodatek za ob pit stezo.
description.en: Popular with both Yamaha riders and fans, the Yamaha WorldSBK Official Team Adult Replica Cap is a must-have for warm climates and sunny weekends. Made from 100% cotton in Paddock Blue with a black peak, this 5-panel unisex cap fits all, featuring printed and 3D Yamaha and sponsor logos for a classic pit lane accessory.

A flexible blend of leather and polyester materials ensures mobility and dexterity, with softshell knuckle protection for peace of mind. Touch screen material allows easy smartphone use, while the short cuff and polar fleece lining offer comfort in all urban conditions.

description.en:
The Tricity is an embodiment of convenience, making commuting simple, easy and fun. With such high dose of practicality, the Urban pack is aimed at increasing the options for Customers to offer additional comfort and space through its various accessories. The high screen provides greater protection against wind, meaning your journeys will never be tiring or uncomfortable. To increase the storage space, we included the rear carrier and the 39L top case. The passenger’s comfort is also of upmost importance and hence we include the backrest pad for the top case. 
Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.
description.sl-SI:
Tricity je simbol udobja, zato je vsakodnevna vožnja preprosta in zabavna. Paket Urban je izredno praktičen in z različnimi dodatki uporabniku omogoča boljše udobje v vožnji in več prostora. Visok vizir poskrbi za boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, kar pomeni, da vaša vožnja nikoli ne bo utrujajoča ali neudobna. Vključen zadnji nosilec in 39-litrski kovček priskrbita več prostora za shranjevanje. Zelo pomembno pa je tudi udobje potnika, zato smo zgornjemu kovčku priložili tudi blazino za naslon. 
Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity.

description.en: Front axle bolt for all Yamaha eBikes
description.sl-SI: Vijak za prednjo os za vsa e-kolesa Yamaha

Mast YamalubeLical je univerzalna mast, ki združuje lastnosti litija in kalcija, razpršenih v visoko prečiščenih osnovnih oljih, kar zagotavlja vrhunsko zmogljivost in mazanje pri ekstremnih tlakih in temperaturah.
description.en: YamalubeLical Grease is a universal grease that combining the qualities of lithium and calcium dispersed in highly refined base oils, a formulation that delivers superior performance and lubrication in extreme pressures and temperatures.

Vizir srednje višine v kombinaciji s ščitniki členkov povečuje zaščito pred vetrom, tako da je vsaka vožnja bolj gladka, udobni sedeži za voznika in sopotnika pa še dodatno izboljšujejo celotno izkušnjo vožnje. 

Vsebuje: Večnamenska osnova, vizir srednje višine, osnova zaključka krmila, zaščita rok, udoben voznikov in sovoznikov sedež.
description.en:
Embrace the best of both worlds with the Comfort Pack, designed to combine the bold and aggressive look of the MT-07 with the extra comfort needed for longer rides. The Middle Screen paired with the Knuckle Deflectors enhance wind protection making every ride smoother, while Comfort Seats for both rider and passenger add to that experience. 

Contains: Multi-Mount Base, Middle Screen, Bar End Base, Knuckle Deflectors, Rider and Passenger Comfort Seats.

name.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX 30 za R9 (FGK 244)
name.en: Öhlins NIX 30 Cartridge Kit for R9  (FGK 244)

description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov za sprednje vilice Road&Track 30 mm Öhlins temelji na izkušnjah, pridobljenih na svetovnih prvenstvih Supersport in Superstock. Posebej za R9 je Öhlins razvil komplet vložkov FGK 244 NIX 30. S kompresijskim in povratnim blaženjem v ločenih krakih, nastavitve enega ne vplivajo na delovanje drugega. Ta tehnologija zagotavlja stabilne značilnosti blaženja z nastajanjem pozitivnega tlaka. Z namenskim kompletom R9 boste imeli koristi od izboljšane vodljivosti, blaženja udarcev in predvsem 'prednjega dela', ki vam bo dal občutek samozavesti.
description.en: The Road & Track 30mm front fork cartridge kits from Öhlins are based on experience gained from World Supersport and  Superstock Championships. Specifically for R9, Öhlins have developed the FGK 244 NIX 30 cartridge kit. Featuring compression and rebound damping in separate legs, the circuits don’t affect each other while making fine tuning adjustments. This technology further gives stable damping characteristic through positive pressure build up. And with the R9 dedicated kit you’ll benefit from improved handling, bump absorption, and crucially a positive, confidence inspiring feeling from the ‘front end’.

Cushion for the Passenger Backrest Stay.
Giving a 20mm increase in seat height, the High Seat Foam delivers improved ergonomics and greater controllability for taller riders.
description.sl-SI: Z debelo peno sedeža se višina sedeža za 20 mm dvigne, izboljšata se udobje in stopnja nadzora za višje voznike.

Naši ščitniki zavornih ročic so zasnovani tako, da nudijo neprekosljivo zaščito vaših ročic. Ne glede na to, ali se vozite po ostrih ovinkih ali se soočate z nepričakovanimi neravninami, naši ščitniki zagotavljajo, da vaše zavorne ročice ostanejo nedotaknjene.
description.en: Our brake lever guards are designed to offer unbeatable protection for your levers. Whether you’re navigating tight turns or facing unexpected bumps, our guards ensure your brake levers stay intact.

description.sl-SI: Univerzalni pulover REVS Essentials s klasičnimi Yamahinim logotipom v črno-beli barvi je popoln izdelek za nošenje v prostem času. Izdelan je iz bombaža in poliestra s česano tkanino na notranji strani, prav tako ima podloženo kapuco z vrvico. Rebrasti obšivi in manšete zagotavljajo prijetno prileganje, kengurujski žep pa poskrbi, da so vaši predmeti spravljeni.
description.en: With a classic Yamaha branded white-on-black style, the REVS Essentials Unisex Hoodie is an ideal item for casual wear. Made of an cotton and  polyester blend, brushed inside, this hoodie features a lined hood with drawstring cords. A ribbed hem and cuffs ensure a good fit, with a kangaroo pocket for carrying essentials.

description.sl-SI: Olajšajte vsako mestno vožnjo s paketom TMAX 'Urban Pack 34L', ki ga sestavljajo zadnji nosilec TMAX, 34-litrski zgornji kovček s kompletom ključev za cilindrično ključavnico, plošča za zgornji kovček in hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček. Nepogrešljiv paket za vsakodnevne voznike, ki potrebujejo dodaten prostor za shranjevanje in funkcionalnost.
description.en: Make light work of every urban ride with the TMAX Urban Pack 34L, consisting of the Rear Carrier TMAX, 34L Top Case  with Key Cylinder Set  and Top Case Plate, and Top Case Backrest. A must-have pack for regular commuters needing extra storage and function.

description.en: Giving Sport Heritage riders protection and comfort with a stylish finish, the Sport Heritage Men’s Riding Gloves are ideal for shorter mid-season rides. A triple fabric blend features thermal insulation and knuckle protection for assurance, with Amara fabric for visor wiping and smartphone use.  An essential for XSR riders who want to feel every moment.
description.sl-SI: Motoristične rokavice Sports Heritage za moške omogočajo voznikom motornih koles Sport Heritage zaščito in udobje v elegantnem videzu ter so popolne za krajše sezonske vožnje. Rokavice iz treh tkanin se ponašajo s toplotno izolacijo in ščitnikom za členke, kar omogoča zanesljivost. Poleg tega vključujejo tkanino amara za brisanje vizirja in uporabo pametnega telefona.  Nepogrešljiv kos za voznike modela XSR, ki želijo izkusiti vsak trenutek.

description.en:
Protect your smartphone from rain, sweat, dust or mud by using the weather cover together with the Yamaha Phone Case. It adds shock resistance and the touch screen remains fully functional. 
Note: Thick screen protectors or gloves can limit the usability of your touchscreen in combination with the Weather Cover. The Weather Cover can further affect the home button functionality of the iPhone 8, 8 Plus, 7 & 7 Plus. This can be compensated by enabling the software home button (Assistive Touch).

description.en: Engineered specifically for WaveRunners, this fender hinges in the center to better protect hulls from docks designed for bigger boats. It hooks under the rub rail with a molded acetyl hook integrated into the back of the fender. Connect the top of the fender to a cleat or ski eye with the adjustable strap and vinyl dipped steel hook provided, or simply thread the strap through the rubber block provided and place it inside the storage compartment, then close the lid.
description.sl-SI: Ta bokobran, oblikovan posebej za vodne skuterje WaveRunner, se obesi na sredino za boljšo zaščito trupa na pomolih, zasnovanih za večja plovila. Pričvrsti se pod robnico z ulitim acetilnim kavljem, vgrajenim na zadnjo stran bokobrana. Vrh bokobrana pritrdite na bitev ali kljuko za smuči s priloženim prilagodljivim trakom in jeklenim kavljem s prevleko iz vinila ali pa trak preprosto povlecite skozi priloženi gumijasti blok in ga pospravite v prostor za shranjevanje ter nato zaprite pokrov.

Pripravite svoj TRACER 9 na kilometre asfalta s paketom Explorer. Nabor vrhunskih dodatkov za udobje, shranjevanje in zaščito za izboljšane funkcije.

Vsebuje: potovalni vizir, ogrevane udobne sedeže za voznika in sopotnika, nosilec plošče za zgornji kovček, ploščo za zgornji kovček, 45-litrski zgornji kovček, hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček, komplet ključev za cilindrično ključavnico, nosilec meglenk, komplet meglenk LED, ščitnike agregata in zaščito hladilnika.
description.en:
Prepare your TRACER 9 to face miles of asphalt, with the Explorer Pack. A range of premium comfort, storage and protection accessories for improved functions.

Contains: Touring Screen, Heated Seat for Rider & Passenger, Top Case Mounting Plate, Top Case Plate, Top Case 45L, Backrest Top Case, Key Cylinder Set, Fog Light Stay, LED Fog Light Kit, Engine Guards and Radiator Guard.

description.en: The Ténéré GYTR Handling Kit has been meticulously engineered to get your bike's chassis ready for rally. Featuring race-developed 48mm KYB closed cartridge forks with DLC coated tubes and increased stroke, alongside a GYTR triple clamp assembly and fully adjustable steering damper manufactured by Scotts Performance, this kit ensures superior stability and control over rough terrain. Paired with a Paioli shock absorber, GYTR rally wheels prepared by Haan Wheels, upgraded braking system with Brembo calipers and GYTR ECU for ABS system deletion, these enhancements improve the off-road capability of your Ténéré. Complete with a lightweight chain and sprocket set, new radiator assembly with oil cooler and GYTR radiator guard, as well as a high front fender, this kit equips you to conquer any off-road challenge with confidence and precision.

Commute and explore with comfort and protection in the Scooter Women’s Riding Jacket. Designed in a stylish two-tone grey combo, this fully waterproof jacket offers level 2 shoulder and elbow protection, a removable thermo lining and neoprene-lined collar for both peace of mind warmth in all weathers. A detachable hood offers comfort, with straps to adjust the arm fit. Ventilation on the arms and back keep you cool in warm weather. The jacket also pairs with Yamaha Scooter Riding Gloves for the complete urban mobility outfit.
Maximize your top-end horsepower with this Performance Camshaft Kit.

description.en: Kit out your Yamaha XMAX for winter with the Winter Pack, featuring the XMAX Apron, Heated Seat and Grip Heaters. Essential items for winter weather scooter riding and comfort in colder months.

With its compact dimensions and the excellent fuel efficiency the NMAX thrives in the hustle and bustle of the urban environment. To ensure space and comfort, the Urban pack offers the best experience for riding in those built-up areas. The high screen provides robust protection against wind, while it remains resistant to scratches and impact damage thanks to its hard-coated polycarbonate design. The 39L top case offers all the extra space you need and rests on a beautiful piece of alloy rear carrier, with its integrated design and rigorous testing guaranteeing year-after-year security and peace of mind while riding. The lockset for the top case comes included in the pack, while the back rest provides the rear passenger with optimum comfort. The Urban pack will make the NMAX your best friend in the city. 
Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your NMAX.
description.sl-SI:
S kompaktnimi dimenzijami in odličnim izkoristkom goriva je model NMAX popolna izbira za uporabo v vrvežu urbanega okolja. Paket Urban zagotavlja dovolj prostora in udobja, zato omogoča kar najboljšo vožnjo po gosto pozidanih območjih. Visok vizir zagotavlja zanesljivo zaščito pred vetrom, zaradi polikarbonatne zasnove s trdo prevleko pa je odporen tudi na praske in poškodbe ob trku. 39-litrski zgornji kovček poskrbi za dodaten prostor, nameščen pa je na čudovitem zadnjem nosilcu iz zlitine. Z integrirano zasnovo in po izvedbi striktnih testov zagotavlja varnost in brezskrbnost med vožnjo. Komplet ključavnice za zgornji kovček je priložen, naslon sedeža pa potniku zadaj omogoča optimalno udobje. S paketom Urban bo model NMAX postal vaš najboljši prijatelj za vožnjo po mestu. 
Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model NMAX.

A standout item for road riding, the Road Racing Men’s Jersey is in line with the latest Paddock Blue design. Lightweight polyester offers excellent ventilation and quick drying, with a full-length zip for easy combination with a bib. Backside pockets give room for the essentials while printed Yamaha branding highlights the two-tone blue body.

Lahkoten poliester omogoča odlično zračenje in hitro sušenje, zadrgo po celotni dolžini pa lahko preprosto kombinirate s poddresom. description.en: The ultimate commuter combined with the perfect pack to roam the streets. The Street Pack contains a Fly Screen, Engine Protectors, Sub-cowl Covers, XSR-styled Radiator Side Covers and the extra stylish License Plate Holder 2.0.
description.sl-SI: Vrhunski motocikel za dnevne vožnje v kombinaciji s popolnim paketom za potepanje po cestah. Paket Street vsebuje zaščitni vizir, zaščite agregata, zaščite sprednje plastike, stranske zaščite hladilnika v slogu XSR in izredno moderen nosilec registrske tablice 2.0.

description.en: The Sport Pack adds a touch of sportiness to your MT-125 with its mix of accessories. The Fly Screen adds an aggressive, yet dynamic look for a true Dark Side of Japan feel. The sleek License Plate Holder sharpens up the rear, while stylish Engine Protectors make sure your engine is safeguarded while you ride as a true Master of Torque! Finally, the Tank Pad protects the tank of the bike from scratches. Are you ready to take the roads by storm?
description.sl-SI: Paket Sport Pack vsebuje razno dodatno opremo in vašemu modelu MT-125 doda pridih športnosti. Kratek vizir dodaja agresiven, a še vedno dinamičen videz, da resnično doživite temno plat Japonske. Vitek nosilec registrske tablice poskrbi za izrazitejši videz zadnjega dela, elegantni ščitniki agregata pa varujejo vaš motor med vožnjo kot resničen gospodar navora! Zaščita rezervoarja pa varuje rezervoar kolesa pred praskami. Ste pripravljeni, da osvojite ceste?

name.sl-SI: Uniseks jopica s kapuco za odrasle kolekcije Hyper Naked

description.sl-SI: S puloverjem s kapuco za odrasle (uniseks) kolekcije Hyper Naked v nočno črni barvi boste naredili vtis na ulici, poleg tega ima elegantne podrobnosti, ki izstopajo kot klasični navdih linije MT. Jopica, ki je izdelana iz mehke mešanice bombaža in poliestra za optimalno udobje, ima fiksno obloženo kapuco za zaščito pred zunanjimi vplivi, spredaj pa žepa z zadrgo za shranjevanje nujnih potrebščin. Izvezeni napisi znamk na prsih in rokavih dopolnjujejo osupljive podrobnosti v cian modri barvi, ta izdelek z videzom temne plati Japonske pa zaokrožuje zanimiv grafični tisk na hrbtni strani.
description.en: Ready to rock the streets, the Hyper Naked Unisex Adult’s Hoodie in stealth black features stylish details that stand out as classic MT inspiration. Made from a soft cotton-polyester blend for optimal comfort, this hoodie features a fixed lined hood to keep the elements out, with front zip pockets for essentials. Embroidered branding on the chest and arms add stunning cyan blue details,  with a statement graphic print on the back to tie this Dark Side of Japan item together.
Durable and portable, the halkey pump helps maintain correct inflation pressure.
description.sl-SI: Trpežna in prenosna tlačilka Halkey pomaga vzdrževati ustrezen tlak polnjenja.

description.en: An absolute classic of Yamaha aesthetic, the Paddock Blue Essentials Men’s Polo is a cotton and elastane relaxed fit construction with a textured pique finish for extra premium feel. A button closure neck gives multiple comfort levels, with a ribbed collar and sleeve ends. Printed Yamaha branding on the chest and arm complete the classic racer’s polo look.

Izrez z zapenjanjem na gumbe zagotavlja vsestransko udobje, ovratniki in robovi rokavov pa so rebraste oblike. Natisnjena Yamahina logotipa na prsih in rokavu dopolnjujeta polo videz klasičnega dirkača.

description.sl-SI: Moška majica s kratkimi rokavi kolekcije REVS je nepogrešljiv kos oblačila za vsak dan ter združuje sodoben slog z Yamahinim kultnim videzom. Ta črna majica s kratkimi rokavi udobnega kroja je izdelana iz bombaža in elastana v enojnem džersiju ter ima vpadljive rdeče stranske dele in bele obrobe na ramenih. Okrogel izrez in raglan rokavi ponujajo enostavno udobje, natisnjeni napis Yamaha na prsih in grafika navpične črte zadaj pa prinašata vrhunski izdelek kolekcije REVS.

Odlična je za vsakodnevno aktivno uporabo, saj je zaradi mešanice bombaža in poliestra zračna tudi v toplem vremenu. Na prsih, desni roki in hrbtu so natisnjeni logotipi sponzorjev WorldSBK in beli logotipi Yamaha Racing, medtem ko dvobarvni črno-modri vratni izrez in črni robovi rok združujejo celoten videz replike ekipe.
description.en: An essential part of the Yamaha WorldSBK Official Team wardrobe, the Men’s Replica T-Shirt is comfy and lightweight.  Perfect for daily active use, the cotton and polyester blend makes it breathable in warm weather. The chest, right arm and back feature printed WorldSBK sponsor logos and white Yamaha Racing logos, while the two-tone black and blue neckline and black arm hems bring the full team replica look together.

description.en: High density 50.4V/19.2Ah lithium-ion battery giving a range of 37km*– and range can be extended by purchasing this optional extra battery. Two batteries can be installed on NEO’s simultaneously, extending the riding range up to 68km*.  For more convenience, you can also keep a spare battery at home. This 8kg battery is designed to maintain a high level of efficiency for 1000 cycles/10,000km, and charging can be carried out with batteries fitted to the scooter or when removed. (*Tested in WMTC Class 1 in STD mode, fully charged battery at a temperature of 25°C.)
description.sl-SI: Litij-ionska baterija s 50.4 V/19.2 Ah z visoko gostoto omogoča doseg do 37 km*, ki ga lahko še povečate, če kupite izbirno dodatno baterijo. V vozila NEO's je mogoče namestiti dve bateriji hkrati ter s tem podaljšati doseg za vožnjo do 68 km*.  Za več udobja pa lahko dodatno baterijo hranite tudi doma. Ta 8-kilogramska baterija je zasnovana tako, da ohranja visoko raven učinkovitosti 1000 ciklov/10.000 km, polnjenje pa se lahko izvaja, ko je baterija nameščena v skuter ali ko je odstranjena. (*Testirano v WMTC razred 1, v načinu STD, s popolnoma napolnjeno baterijo pri temperaturi 25 °C.)

The MX Glide Plate is a flexible, lightweight and low drag coefficient alternative to aluminum glide plates when needing a smooth surface for “gliding” over obstacles. Drsna plošča MX je prilagodljiva in lahka, z nizkim koeficientom upora pa predstavlja alternativo za aluminijaste drsne plošče, ko se zahteva gladka površina za "premagovanje" ovir. Moška jakna kolekcije REVS, zasnovana za zaščito pred zimskimi vremenskimi razmerami, z zunanjo plastjo in podlogo iz poliestra zagotavlja odpornost proti vodi in vetru ter hkrati udobje. Zasnovana v kontrastu črne in rdeče barve REVS, ta udobna jakna ima zapiranje z zadrgo po celotni dolžini, ščitnik za brado in nastavljive manšete za prilagajanje vremenskim razmeram. Fiksna kapuca, sešita iz treh tretjin, in sprednji žepi z zadrgo ščitijo pred vremenskimi vplivi, izvezeni napis Yamaha na prsih, grafika navpične črte zadaj in obrobe na ramenih pa zajemajo samo bistvo sloga REVS.
description.en: Designed to protect from the winter elements, the REVS Men’s Outerwear Jacket offers water and wind resistance with comfort inside a polyester shell and lining. Designed in REVS black and red colour contrast, this comfort fit jacket features a full-length zip closure, chin guard and adjustable cuffs for adapting to the weather. A 3-panel lined fixed hood and zippered front pockets helps shield you from the elements, while embroidered Yamaha branding on the chest, backstripe graphic and white shoulder piping capture the latest REVS essence.

name.sl-SI: Paket 'Sport Pack Pro Black' za MT-09

description.sl-SI: Vrhunski videz in zmogljivosti so za MT-09 standardne, zdaj pa ga lahko nadgradite s paketom 'Sport Pack Pro Black', ki je zasnovan tako, da bo vaš motocikel še bolj izstopal. Za dopolnitev hitre in vznemirljive izkušnje vožnje z modelom MT-09, črni popolni izpušni sistem Akrapovič poudarja ikonično rjovenje agregata CP3 ter čisti adrenalin, ki ga doživljamo z vsakim zasukom plina. Skupaj z ogledali na krmilu v obliki romba, črno obarvanim kratkim vizirjem in elegantnim nosilcem registrske tablice ti skrbno izbrani dodatki izboljšajo agresiven in športen videz vašega motornega kolesa. Blazinice za rezervoar in stranski oprijem – zasnovane posebej za MT-09 – izboljšajo nadzor in stabilnost pri vožnji v ovinkih, hkrati pa ščitijo rezervoar pred praskami. Ste pripravljeni, da svojo vožnjo popeljete na naslednjo raven?
description.en: Class-leading looks and performance are standard on the MT-09, but now you can take it to the next level with the Sport Pack Pro Black, designed to make your bike stand out from the crowd even more. To complement the fast and thrilling experience of riding the MT-09, the black Akrapovič Full Exhaust System accentuates the CP3’s iconic roar, emphasising the pure adrenaline delivered with every twist of the throttle. Together with the diamond-shaped bar end mirrors, black-tinted fly screen and a sleek licence plate holder, these carefully selected accessories enhance your bike’s sharp and sporty looks. Finally, the tank pad and side grip pads—designed specifically for the MT-09—improve control and stability when tackling corners, while also protecting the tank from scratches. Are you ready to push your ride to the next level?

description.sl-SI: Prtljažnik s kakovostno površinsko obdelavo, ki se namesti na zadnji del motornega kolesa na ploščo za namestitev zgornjega kovčka.
description.en: High quality finished carrier to be mounted to the rear of the unit, to fit the top case mounting plate.
GYTR® Rear Sprocket 40T (Marchesini Wheels)

The new Bed Rack fits all Wolverine RMAX2/RMAX4 1000 models. Solid steel construction provides 44% more cargo space above the bed, reinforced whip flag mounts, integrated pod light mounts, and integrated MOLLE pattern for additional side storage.

Give the next generation of Yamaha fans the perfect start with the Paddock Blue Baby Giftpack. Featuring two bodysuits in blue/white, made from a soft and comforting cotton and elastane blend, and a fabric plush rattle inspired by the cartoon Paddock Blue character.
description.sl-SI: Za popolno dobrodošlico podarite naslednji generaciji Yamahinih navdušencev otroški darilni paket Paddock Blue. Vključuje dva bodija v modri in beli barvi, ki sta izdelana iz mehkega, udobnega bombaža in elastana, ter plišasto ropotuljico, navdihnjeno po podobi lika linije Paddock Blue.

description.en: Consisting of front & lateral number plates, an exclusive XSR headlight cover, led blinker sets & wire connectors, as well as the license plate holder 2.0 for a neat and sharp tail, the Tracker Pack gives the XSR125 a genuine racing heritage look and charm.
description.sl-SI: Komplet 'Tracker', sestavljen iz sprednjih in stranskih ploščic s številkami, ekskluzivnega pokrova žarometov za XSR, kompleta LED-smernikov, kabelskih priključkov in nosilca registrske tablice 2.0 za privlačen ter izrazit zadnji del, daje modelu XSR125 pristen videz tekmovalne dediščine in šarm.

description.en: Block off plates to allow removal Air Induction System

description.sl-SI: Dvobarvne ženske motoristične hlače Sport Touring, ki so nujne za potovanje v vseh vremenskih razmerah, ponujajo udobje, zaščito in vzdržljivost, kamor koli vas pot popelje. Vodoodporne hlače so izdelane iz funkcionalnega zunanjega sloja iz mešanice poliestra in poliuretana ter imajo odstranljivo izolacijsko podlogo za spremenljive temperature, ščitniki za boke in kolena pa zagotavljajo samozavest in brezskrbnost na poti. Dva zunanja žepa omogočata shranjevanje nujnih stvari in sta za dodatno zračenje skrita v prezračevalnih zadrgah. Snemljive naramnice, trakovi na ježka za gležnje in elastični patenti na zapestjih, stegnih in kolenih poskrbijo za izjemno udobje na dolgih vožnjah, zadrga pa omogoča, da se hlače združijo z žensko športno-potovalno motoristično jakno.
description.en: A must-have for all-weather touring, the two-tone Sport Touring Women’s Riding Pants offer comfort, protection and durability wherever the road takes you. Made with a technical outer layer blend of polyester and polyurethane, the waterproof pants feature a detachable insulation lining for changing temperatures, will hip and knee protectors provide confidence and peace of mind on the move. Two outer pockets allow you to carry essentials and are hidden inside ventilation zips for extra breathability. Detachable suspenders, Velcro ankle straps and elasticated wrist, thighs and knees offer excellent comfort for long rides, with a zipper to allow the pants to connect to the Sport Touring Women’s Riding Jacket.

The quick shifter system increases bike control and makes gear change easier. Derived from Yamaha Racing technology, the system allows for quicker and effortless shifting.

description.en: Yamaha is offering all the components of the Hard Cab Enclosure System separately for added customer convenience. The doors feature full keyed locks, sliding windows with locks, and an open door feature allowing doors to self-close. These hybrid steel, composite, and glass doors provide the perfect balance of quality, features, and function.
description.sl-SI: Yamaha za lažjo uporabo vse sestavne dele kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi ponuja ločeno. Na vratih so ključavnice za popolno zaklepanje, tudi drsna okna so opremljena s ključavnicami, vključen pa je tudi mehanizem za odpiranje vrat, kar omogoča, da se vrata sama zaprejo. Ta vrata iz hibridnega jekla, kompozita in stekla predstavljajo popolno ravnotežje kakovosti, lastnosti in funkcionalnosti.

Rezultat je zanesljiva zaščita za vzmetenje in zagotavljanje bolj varnega ter natančnega delovanja. Na voljo v treh stopnjah viskoznosti: 5W (majhna), 10W (srednja), 15W (velika).
description.en: Specially formulated to meet Yamaha's own very high standards, Yamalube® Fork Oil features additives to guard against friction, wear, foam, and corrosion. The result is consistent protection for the suspension and the delivery of safer and more precise handling. Available in three viscosities: 5W (Light), 10W (Medium), 15W (Heavy).

Nadgradite svoj TRACER 9 GT+ s 'Travel Pack Pro' za neprimerljivo udobje in funkcionalnost. Visok vizir in dodaten širok zaščitni vizir omogočata boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sedež za sopotnika pa zagotavljata udobno vožnjo. Ostanite obveščeni s sistemom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) in kompletom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah. Zaščitite motorno kolo s ščitnikom hladilnika in zaščito agregata 'Explorer' ter povečajte vidljivost s kompletom meglenk LED. Zavarujte opremo z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, zgornjim kovčkom in naslonom. Ta paket združuje vrhunske funkcije za vrhunsko potovalno izkušnjo.
description.en: Upgrade your TRACER 9 GT+ with the Travel Pack Pro for unmatched comfort and functionality. The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen enhance wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat ensure a cozy ride. Stay informed with the TPMS and Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit. Protect your bike with the Radiator Guard, Explorer Engine Guard, and add visibility with the LED Fog Light Kit. Secure your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Top Case, and Backrest. This pack combines premium features for a superior travel experience.

TTX GP je najnovejši amortizer za športna motorna kolesa. Opremljen je s tehnologijo TTX in je bil razvit z najnovejšo tehnologijo iz bogatih izkušenj Öhlins v MotoGP. TTX GP ima vrsto ventila, ki daje vozniku odlične povratne informacije. Zasnova bata in obroča, ki skupaj z ventili GP izboljšuje oprijem, stabilnost, povratne informacije in doslednost. Gumbi za nastavitev olajšajo hitro spreminjanje z orodjem ali brez njega. TTX GP izboljša zmogljivosti v ovinkih, kar prispeva k samozavesti voznika, zaradi česar boste hitrejši po stezi.
description.en: The TTX GP is the latest shock absorber for hyper sport and sport bikes. It features the TTX technology and has been developed with the latest technology from Öhlins vast experiences in MotoGP. The TTX GP features a type of valve which gives excellent feedback to the rider. The piston and band design which together with the GP valves enhances grip, stability, feedback, and consistency. The adjuster knobs make it easy to make changes on the fly with or without tools. The TTX GP enhances cornering performance contributing to rider confidence, making you go faster around the track.

description.sl-SI: Drzno oblikovan in udoben pulover Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team Women's Replica nudi toploto in vsestranskost za spreminjajoče se razmere ob progi. Pulover je oblikovan po ikonični modro-črni barvi dirkalnika YZ450FM in ima bele poudarke na hrbtni strani in ob straneh. Tesno prilegajoča se kapuca zagotavlja dodatno udobje, zadrga po celotni dolžini in zunanji žepi pa nudijo prostor za osebne predmete. Robovi in manšete iz samosvoje tkanine zagotavljajo tesno prileganje, izvezeni oznaki Yamaha Racing in Monster Energy® pa združujeta ta ekipni izdelek.
description.en: Boldly designed and comfortable, the Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team Women’s Replica Sweater offers warmth and versatility for changing trackside conditions. Styled after the iconic blue and black livery of the YZ450FM race bike, the sweater features white highlights on the back and side. A tight-fitting hood offers extra comfort, with a full-length zip and external pockets with room for personal items. Self-fabric hem and cuffs ensure a snug fit, with embroidered Yamaha Racing and Monster Energy® branding bringing this team item together.
