description.sl-SI: Podajte se na naslednjo pustolovščino z našim kompletom mehkih stranskih torb, ki so zasnovani za popotnike, ki cenijo funkcionalnost in slog. Ta komplet vodotesnih torb združuje robustno vzdržljivost in elegantno, sodobno estetiko ter zagotavlja, da bodo vaše stvari ostale varne in suhe – ne glede na to, kam vas pelje vaše potovanje.
description.en: Embark on your next adventure with our Soft Side Bag Set, designed for travelers who value both functionality and style. This watertight luggage set combines rugged durability with a sleek, modern aesthetic, ensuring your belongings stay safe and dry, no matter where your journey takes you.

description.sl-SI: Pričarajte športni videz Yamahinega skuterja NMAX s kompletom NMAX 'Sport Pack', ki vsebuje športni vizir NMAX, ročico sprednje in zadnje zavore NMAX ter ploščice za zgornji in spodnji del talne plošče NMAX. Izboljšajte linije, slog in funkcionalnost svojega NMAX-a ter osvojite ulice.
description.en: Give your Yamaha NMAX the sporty look with the NMAX Sport Pack, containing the Sport Screen NMAX, Front and Rear Brake Lever MAX, and Top and Floor Footplates NMAX. Enhance the lines, style and function of your NMAX and own the streets.

description.sl-SI: Pripravite se na naslednjo pustolovščino s paketom Explorer Pack Black, ki vsebuje nujne potrebščine za dolga potovanja. Črna stranska kovčka zagotavljata veliko skupno prostornino 74 l, medtem ko glavno stojalo omogoča stabilno parkiranje, tudi če je motorno kolo popolnoma naloženo. Ščitnik agregata zagotavlja zanesljivo zaščito ključnih komponent med osvajanjem terenskih poti.
description.en:
Contains: Side Cases, Side Case Stays, Engine Guard, Main Stand.

Prepare for your next adventure with the Explorer Pack Black, featuring the must-have essentials for long journeys. The black Side Cases provide a generous 74L total capacity, while the Main Stand ensures stable parking, even when fully loaded. Finally, the Engine Guard offers reliable protection for vital components as you conquer off-road trails.

name.sl-SI: Komplet pokrovov GB Racing za R1
name.en: GB Racing Cover set for R1 2015 >

description.sl-SI: Zaščita agregata BG Racing za primer trčenja ali padca motornega kolesa.
description.en: BG Racing engine protection in case of crash or bike drop.

description.sl-SI: Zaščitite svojo Yamaho R9 pred poškodbami s temi čudovito oblikovanimi, a vseeno funkcionalnimi ščitniki okvirja. Te trdne visokokakovostne komponente, ki so zasnovane tako, da dopolnjujejo lastnosti modela R9, nudijo zaščito, ne da bi vplivale na nagibni kot motornega kolesa.
description.en: Protect your Yamaha R9 from damage with these beautifully sculpted yet functional Frame Sliders. Designed to complement the asthestics of the R9, these tough high quality components offer protection while not affecting the banking angle of the bike.
The Genuine Yamaha Sliding Glass Rear Window keeps the elements out, maximizes airflow and allows easy cargo access from inside the cab.
description.sl-SI: Originalno Yamahino drsno stekleno zadnje okno zagotavlja zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi, izboljšan pretok zraka in preprost dostop do prtljažnega prostora iz notranjosti kabine.

S svojim drznim in agresivnim videzom je MT-09 prava paša za oči, 'Sport Pack Black' pa to samo še nadgradi. Nosilec za zaključek krmila in ščitnika členkov zagotavljajo večjo zaščito pred vetrom, hkrati pa prispevajo k agresivnemu videzu sprednjega dela MT-09, skupaj z zatemnjenim kratkim vizirjem. Na zadnji strani preoblikovan nosilec registrske tablice izboljša drzen profil motornega kolesa. Zaključek zagotavljajo stranske blazinice za oprijem na rezervoarju, ki ne le ščitijo pred praskami, temveč nudijo tudi dodaten oprijem za samozavestno vožnjo v ovinkih.
description.en: With its bold and aggressive design, the MT-09 is already a real head-turner and the Sport Pack Black takes it even further. The bar end base and knuckle deflectors provide increased wind protection, while also enhancing the aggressive look of the MT-09’s front end alongside the black-tinted fly screen. At the rear, the streamlined licence plate holder enhances the bike’s sharp profile. The finishing touch is provided by the side tank grip pads that not only protect against scratches but also offer extra grip for confident cornering.

The REVS collection is inspired by vintage Yamaha motorcycles. The design of our REVS Beluga Relax Shorts also embraces the concept of Yamaha's nostalgia. It is perfect to slide in when you are doing exercise or jogging outdoors..
description.sl-SI: Kolekcija REVS je navdih našla pri Yamahinih starodobnih motorjih. Zasnova kratkih hlač REVS Beluga Relax zajema tudi koncept Yamahine nostalgije. So odlične za vadbo ali tek na prostem.

name.sl-SI: Prednje dvižno stojalo GYTR Paddock – linija PRO
name.en: GYTR Paddock Stand Front - PRO Line

description.en: Lightweight GYTR front paddock stand from the PRO line.

description.sl-SI:
S paketom 'Adrenaline' za R9 nadgradite svojo vožnjo. Dodajte nabor visokokakovostne dodatne opreme, ki izboljša videz in zvok vašega R9. 

Vsebuje: Celoten izpušni sistem R9 Akrapovič, drsniki okvirja, nosilec registrske tablice, ščitnik kovinske ročice sprednje zavore, prevleka zadnjega sedeža, zatemnjen vizir.
description.en:
Rev up your ride with the R9 Adrenaline Pack. Add a range of high-quality accessories to enhance the look and sound of your R9. 

Contains: R9 Akrapovič Full System, Frame Sliders, License Plate Holder, Billet Front Brake Lever Guard, Rear Seat Cover, Smoke Windscreen.

description.sl-SI: Hidravlični sistemi upravljanja tipa LS 125 PRO. Popoln komplet (standardni sistem, vključno s cilindrom, helm pumpo z zaklepno ventilom, vsemi priključki, lijakom za polnjenje in 10 m cevi)
description.en: Hydraulic steering systems type LS 125 PRO. Complete kit (standard system incl. cylinder, helm pump with lock valve, all fittings, filling funnel and 10m hose)
Stylish sticker set for the rims of 17" wheels.
Custom oil filler cap - replacing the original - for an extra stylish touch to your Yamaha.
description.sl-SI: Po meri izdelan pokrov posode za motorno olje, ki nadomešča originalnega – za dodaten pridih elegance vaše Yamahe.

Dvobarvne moške športno-potovalne motoristične hlače, ki so nepogrešljive za vožnje v vseh vremenskih razmerah, ponujajo udobje, zaščito in trpežnost, kjer koli ste. Vodoodporne hlače so izdelane iz funkcionalnega zunanjega sloja iz mešanice poliestra in poliuretana ter imajo odstranljivo izolacijsko podlogo za spremenljive temperature, ščitniki za boke in kolena pa zagotavljajo samozavest in brezskrbnost na poti. Dva zunanja žepa omogočata shranjevanje nujnih stvari in sta za dodatno zračenje skrita v prezračevalnih zadrgah. Snemljive naramnice, trakovi na ježka za gležnje in elastični patenti na zapestjih, stegnih in kolenih poskrbijo za izjemno udobje na dolgih vožnjah, zadrga pa omogoča, da se hlače združijo z moško športno-potovalno motoristično jakno.
description.en: A must-have for all-weather touring, the two-tone Sport Touring Men’s Riding Pants offer comfort, protection and durability wherever the road takes you. Made with a technical outer layer blend of polyester and polyurethane, the waterproof pants feature a detachable insulation lining for changing temperatures, will hip and knee protectors provide confidence and peace of mind on the move. Two outer pockets allow you to carry essentials and are hidden inside ventilation zips for extra breathability. Detachable suspenders, Velcro ankle straps and elasticated wrist, thighs and knees offer excellent comfort for long rides, with a zipper to allow the pants to connect to the Sport Touring Men’s Riding Jacket.

name.sl-SI: Nosilci za poltrde stranske torbe ABS

description.en: Stays system required to mount the optional Soft ABS Side Cases
description.sl-SI: Sistem nosilcev omogoča namestitev izbirnih poltrdih stranskih torb ABS

Izberite iz naše nove široke ponudbe vlečnih tub ter uživajte z družino in prijatelji na svoji naslednji dogodivščini na vodi! Ta vodna tuba z zavihki za 1 osebo ima vrhnjo plast iz najlona s 420 denom in PVC-jem, debeline 0,81 mm, za optimalno trpežnost.
description.en: Choose from our new large range of towables to have fun with family and friends on your next trip on the water! This 1 person wing tube was made with 420 denier nylon cover and 20 gauge PVC for optimal durability.

name.sl-SI: Lahki dušilnik Akrapovič za XMAX 125 v črni barvi

description.en:
Street legal Akrapovič muffler to improve the performance, sound and looks of your XMAX 125. 
This is a non Yamaha branded product and is fully developed and produced by Akrapovic. 
Important note: Installation requires cutting of standard muffler. We advise you to visit your Yamaha dealer for proper installation.
description.sl-SI:
Homologirani dušilnik Akrapovič za boljše zmogljivosti, zvok in videz vašega XMAX 125. 
To ni izdelek Yamahe. V celoti ga je razvilo in izdelalo podjetje Akrapovič. 
Pomembno: Namestitev zahteva rezanje standardnega dušilnika. Svetujemo vam, da za pravilno namestitev obiščete svojega prodajalca Yamaha.

name.en: Twin air pre-oiled dual layer air filter
name.sl-SI: Dvojni vnaprej naoljen dvoslojni zračni filter Twin Air

description.en: Improved air flow and filtration.
description.sl-SI: Izboljšan pretok zraka in filtriranje

description.en: Specially designed exhaust camshaft for racing purposes and improves performance in conjunction with intake camshaft.

description.sl-SI: Lahka in aerodinamična krilca po navdihu iz MotoGP prinašajo nove ravni pritiska navzdol v že zmagovalni rodovnik. Ta krilca so oblikovana tako, da dopolnjujejo ostre linije R1 in so nameščena ob oklepu, skrbijo za maksimalne učinke elektronike proti dvigovanju prednjega kolesa, hkrati pa povečujejo občutek sprednjega dela med zaviranjem in zavijanjem ter izboljšujejo stabilnost pri visokih hitrostih.
description.en: MotoGP-inspired lightweight and aerodynamic winglets bring new levels of downforce to an already race-winning pedigree. Sculpted to complement the razor-sharp lines of the R1 and positioned perfectly against the fairing, these winglets maximise the effects of the bike’s anti-wheelie electronics while increasing front-end feel during braking and cornering, and improving high-speed stability.

description.sl-SI: Ženska polo majica REVS, v črni barvi z izrazitimi rdečimi in belimi poudarki, je eleganten priložnostni izdelek, ki uteleša slog REVS. Mešanica bombaža in elastana ponuja raztegljivost za udobno prileganje, z ovratnikom z gumbi. Brezšivni rokavi in rob dodajajo izjemen slog, elegantni videz pa dopolnjujejo izvezen napis Yamaha na prsih, grafika navpične črte zadaj in bele obrobe na ramenih.
description.en: Black with striking red and white highlights, the REVS Women’s Polo Shirt is a smart-casual item that embodies the REVS style. A cotton and elastane blend offers stretch for a comfortable fit, with a button closure collar. Seamless sleeves and hem add real style, with embroidered Yamaha chest branding, backstripe graphic and whit shoulder piping that offsets this classy look.
GYTR® Rear Sprocket with 44T for 520 Chain conversion

description.sl-SI: Opremite se za pustolovščine ob koncu tedna s paketom TRACER 7 'Weekend Pack'. Izkusite izboljšano zaščito pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem in zaščitite rezervoar z zaščito za rezervoar »Road to Fuji«, medtem ko je vaša prtljaga varno shranjena v poltrdih stranskih torbah ABS. Ta paket združuje funkcionalnost s slogom za popoln vikend oddih.
description.en: Gear up for your weekend adventures with the TRACER 7 Weekend Pack. Enjoy enhanced wind protection with the High Screen, and protect your tank with the Road to Fuji Tank Pad while having your belongings secured in the Soft ABS Side Cases. This pack combines functionality with style for the perfect weekend break.

Svoji Yamahi XMAX zagotovite dodaten športni slog z utežmi krmila, izdelanimi iz anodiziranega aluminija z vgraviranimi detajli.
description.en: Add extra sporty style to your Yamaha XMAX with the end grips, made from anodized aluminium with engraved details.
A set of springs with a higher spring rate
2nd Pinion kit C for GYTR® gear.

The FJR Radiator Cover is designed to prevent cable damage and reduce the impact of stones and debris on radiator. Besides its functional design, the stainless steel mesh in black anodised aluminium frame gives a dynamic look to your sport touring motorcycle.
description.sl-SI: Pokrov hladilnika FJR preprečuje poškodbe kablov in hladilnik ščiti pred udarci kamnov in drugih delcev. Funkcionalno zasnovana mreža iz nerjavečega jekla v črnem anodiziranem aluminijastem okvirju daje vašemu športno-potovalnemu motornemu kolesu dinamičen videz.

description.en: Protect your WaveRunner or boat from bumps and scrapes with these high-quality fenders. Featuring 4 feet of rope for easy attachment, the fenders provide a safe and secure buffer when docked or alongside another vessel.
Backrest to fit to the front side of the optional 50L top case city.
description.sl-SI: Naslon, ki se prilega sprednji strani izbirnega 50-litrskega zgornjega kovčka City.

Otroške kopalke Paddock Blue so namenjene otrokom, ki uživajo v vodi, in so odličen kos kolekcije Streetwear za na plažo ali bazen. Izdelane so iz 100-odstotnega poliamida, so v dirkaški modri barvi s kontrastno belo črto in trakom v retro slogu. Znotraj imajo mrežasto oblogo za udobje v vodi in še elastičen pas z vrvico za prilagajanje velikosti. Kopalke se ponašajo z izvezenim logotipom Yamaha Racing za celovit Yamahin slog.
description.en: Made for kids that love the water, the Paddock Blue Kid’s Swim Shorts is a cool Streetwear item that they’ll to wear at the beach or pool. Made from 100% polyamide in racing blue with contrasting white stripe and retro-style tape, the shorts have a mesh inner lining for comfort in the water and a draw cord elastic waist for comfort. Embroidered Yamaha Racing branding gives a final touch of Yamaha style.

Exclusive and high quality finished chain guard, replacing the original.

description.en: Öhlins fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and as such available as a spring upgrade for most major bike models.
description.sl-SI: Vzmeti za vilice Öhlins so zasnovane posebej za mehanizem Öhlins in sprednje vilice. Poleg tega poskrbijo tudi za odlično nadgraditev sprednjega dela in so zato na voljo kot nadgradnja vzmeti za večino modelov motorjev.

description.en: Super functional and stylish blind covers for the licence plate holder mounts and rear view mirror mounts when you have removed these items for riding on the circuit.
description.sl-SI: Izjemno funkcionalni in elegantni slepi pokrovčki za nosilce registrske tablice in vzvratnega ogledala, če ste jih odstranili za vožnjo na dirkalni stezi.

description.en: The indicator provides a clear view of the charge condition of the battery.

Rain and wind shouldn't stop you from activities, and neither should they affect your riding pleasure and comfort. We developed the Apron, which uses special welding technology, to keep you warm and dry, so you can be more comfortable and safe during harsh weather conditions.
description.sl-SI: Dež in veter ne bi smela biti ovira pri aktivnostih, prav tako pa ne bi smela vplivati na vaš užitek in udobje pri vožnji. Razvili smo zaščito za sprednji del telesa, ki uporablja posebno tehnologijo varjenja, ki vas ščiti pred mrazom in dežjem, da vam bo tudi v težjih vremenskih pogojih udobno in boste ostali varni.

description.en: Fixes to the front or back of the vehicle for when it is needed to be towed
description.sl-SI: Pritrdi se na sprednji ali zadnji del vozila, kadar ga je treba vleči

name.sl-SI: Popoln dirkalni sistem z dušilnikom iz titana

description.en: This Full Racing System with Titanium Muffler is especially developed for the YZF-R1 for racing purposes only.
description.sl-SI: Ta popoln dirkaški izpušni sistem je razvit posebej za model YZF-R1, izključno za dirkanje.

name.sl-SI: Komplet za sprednje vpetje za vitel

description.en: Introducing the Front Winch Mount Kit that includes everything you need to install one of these winch systems on your Wolverine.
description.sl-SI: Predstavljamo komplet za sprednje vpetje za vitel, ki vključuje vse potrebno za namestitev enega od sistemov z vitlom na vozilo Wolverine.

description.en: With a striking, faded look in retro burnt orange and white, the Sports Heritage Unisex Hoodie is perfect for casual wear to show your Sport Heritage pride. Made from a cotton and  polyester blend, this hoodie features a lined hood with knotted cords, with eye-catching red Yamaha and Sports Heritage badges on the chest, back and arm. An elastic hem and cuffs ensure a good fit for all.
description.sl-SI: Univerzalni pulover Sports Heritage osupljivega bledega videza v zapečeni oranžni in beli barvi je popoln za vsakodnevno nošenje, s čimer izkažete ponos nad linijo Sport Heritage. Izdelan je iz bombaža in poliestra, ima podloženo kapuco s prepleteno vrvico ter privlačne rdeče logotipe Yamaha in Sports Heritage na prsih, hrbtu in rokavu. Elastični obšivi in manšete se prijetno prilegajo prav vsem.

Komplet 2 pokrival iz blaga, za pokrivanje rezervoarja za glavni valj sprednje zavore.

GYTR Rear Sprocket with 40T for 520 Chain conversion for Marchesini wheels

description.sl-SI: Komplet stranskih blazinic za rezervoar, ki je bistvenega pomena za zaščito pred praskami in boljši oprijem, ščiti vaš rezervoar TRACER 7 pred praskami in odrgninami. Ta eleganten komplet, izdelan iz gume visoke gostote, je obvezen za voznika TRACER.
description.en: Essential for scratch protection and enhanced grip, the Side Tank Pad Set keeps your TRACER 7 tank from scuffs and scrapes. Made from high density rubber, this stylish set is a must for the TRACER rider.

description.sl-SI: Priključni kabel za enostavno priključitev izbirnega pretvornika USB na enoto.
description.en: Connector cable to easily plug in the optional USB converter on your unit.
Impact body fully made of CNC machined POM

description.en: Part of the GYTR® Clutch Components which are precision machined from aerospace-quality aluminum with a unique hard coating.
description.sl-SI: Del sestavnih delov sklopke GYTR®, ki so natančno izdelani iz aluminija letalske kakovosti, z edinstveno trdo prevleko.

description.en: Black anodised framed, stainless mesh radiator cover.
description.sl-SI: Pokrov hladilnika z mrežo iz nerjavečega jekla in anodizirano obrobo v črni barvi.

description.en: Weather protection cover
description.sl-SI: Prevleka za zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi

Komplet TRACER 9 'Travel Pack Pro' je vrhunski sklop opreme za voznike, ki zahtevajo udobje, priročnost in vsestranskost. Visok vizir in dodaten širok zaščitni vizir zagotavljata odlično zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sopotnikov sedež pa prinašata udobje vam kakor tudi sopotniku med dolgimi vožnjami. V opremo so vključeni sistem za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) in ogrevane ročke, da lahko vozite samozavestno ne glede na vremenske razmere. Zgornji kovček in stranska kovčka ponujajo dovolj prostora za shranjevanje vseh vaših bistvenih stvari, medtem ko polnilnik USB in vtičnica držala ohranjata vaše naprave pripravljene in dostopne.

Nosilec za GPS omogoča enostavno uporabo navigacije, zaradi ščitnika hladilnika in zaščite agregata 'Explorer' pa je vožnja še bolj brezskrbna. Komplet meglenk LED in nosilec za meglenke zagotavljata optimalno vidljivost v vseh pogojih. Zavarujte vso svojo opremo z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, kompleti nosilcev in kompletom ključev za cilindrično ključavnico za hiter dostop. S paketom TRACER 9 'Travel Pack Pro' je vsaka pustolovščina brezhibna mešanica sloga, udobja in funkcionalnosti.
description.en:
The TRACER 9 Travel Pack Pro is the ultimate setup for riders who demand comfort, convenience, and versatility. The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen provide excellent wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat keep both you and your passenger comfortable during long rides. Equipped with a Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) and Heated Grips, you can ride confidently, no matter the weather. The Top Case and Side Cases offer ample storage for all your essentials, while the USB Charger and Holder Socket keep your devices ready and accessible.

Navigate easily with the GPS Stay, and ride with peace of mind knowing your bike is protected by the Radiator Guard and Explorer Engine Guard. The LED Fog Light Kit and Fog Light Stay ensure optimal visibility in any conditions. Secure all your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Stay Kits, and Key Cylinder Set for quick access. With the TRACER 9 Travel Pack Pro, every adventure is a seamless blend of style, comfort, and function.
Wind deflectors for your feet, providing extra comfort and wind protection on long-distance journeys.

XSR700 is the perfect blank canvas for you to make your dream machine and the Street pack can be the first step to give it a classy and sharp look. 5 accessories, 1 style: the starting point to your creativity.
description.sl-SI: XSR700 je popolno prazno platno za izdelavo vašega sanjskega motorja, paket Street pa je lahko prvi korak, ki bo poskrbel za njegov eleganten in oster videz. 5 dodatkov, 1 slog: izhodišče za vašo ustvarjalnost.

Yamalube čistilo za verigo je prvi korak do popolnoma čiste verige. Učinkovito odstranjuje trdovratne ostanke lepila, zmanjšuje nalaganje in obrabo verige. Nadaljujte z Yamalube Chain Lube za optimalno delovanje in dolgotrajno zaščito.
description.en: YamalubeChain Cleaner offers excellent adhesion and penetration with reduced 'throw-off', guarding against rust and ensuring a smooth-running, longer-lasting chain.

Enjoy the beach and the sun while showing your Yamaha passion with the REVS beach sliders. A footwear essential, these sliders are contemporary and shaped for maximum comfort with an EVA & PU mix. Raised edges and moulded toe imprints ensure a firm hold, with strong Yamaha branding in a simple and clean style.
description.sl-SI: Uživajte na plaži in soncu ter pokažite svojo pripadnost Yamahi z natikači za plažo REVS. Natikači, ki vedno pridejo prav, so za maksimalno udobje izdelani iz mešanice materialov EVA & PU. Dvignjen rob in anatomska oblika zagotavljata dober oprijem, Yamahina grafika pa je dodana v preprostem in čistem slogu.

name.sl-SI: GYTR® komplet odmične gredi za večjo zmogljivost

description.en: Maximize your top-end horsepower with this performance camshaft kit.
description.sl-SI: S tem kompletom za zmogljive odmične gredi povečajte končno moč pri visokih vrtljajih.

description.sl-SI: S kompletom Yamahinih rezervnih cevi za spiranje vašega WaveRunner-ja vsakič poskrbite za čist in delujoč motor. Ta komplet, ki je enostaven za uporabo, vam omogoča izpiranje sveže vode skozi motor po vsaki uporabi, kar preprečuje kopičenje soli in mineralov. Ima vrtljiv cevni priključek in ustreza vsem novejšim modelom WaveRunner, ki so opremljeni s tovarniškimi kompleti za spiranje. Na voljo v rdeči ali modri barvi.
description.en: Ensure a clean running engine every time with the Yamaha Spare Flush Hose kit for your WaveRunner. This easy-to-use kit allows you to flush fresh water through the engine after every use, preventing salt and mineral build-up. It features a swivel hose fitting and fits all late-model WaveRunners equipped with factory flush kits. Available in red or blue.

It supports up to three shelves and side panels, allowing a customizable storage setup. Strong, corrosion-resistant, and easy to install, it ensures secure gear transport for any off-road adventure.

description.en: Yamalube Multi-Use Spray is a high-performance penetrating oil spray designed for all-purpose maintenance and protection. It lubricates moving parts, repels moisture, helps water dispersion, and prevents water intrusion, reaching even the tightest spots with excellent creeping properties.
Ideal for storage and protection from the elements, this cover prolongs the life of your boat.

description.en: Colour matched with the latest generation of Yamaha Racing motorcycles, the Paddock Blue Men’s Jog Pants are made to withstand regular activity and wear. Blended from cotton  and polyester , these pants are supremely comfortable. A self-fabric waistband allows an easy fit, with two side and one rear pockets for convenience. Subtle Yamaha branding pulls together this eye-catching garment.
description.sl-SI: Tekaške hlače Paddock Blue za moške, ki se barvno ujemajo z zadnjo generacijo motornih koles ekipe Yamaha Racing, so narejene za redno aktivnost in uporabo. Izdelane so iz bombaža in poliestra ter so neverjetno udobne. Pas iz enakega materiala omogoča prijetno prileganje, dva stranska in zadnji žep pa priročnost. Prefinjen Yamahin logotip to privlačno oblačilo lepo poveže.

description.en: Protect your feet and lower legs in wet weather conditions from water splashing up from underneath the front wheels with the Mud Flaps. The flexible material ensures the flaps do not damage when leaving a higher curb,
description.sl-SI: Zaščitite stopala in spodnji del nog v mokrih vremenskih razmerah pred tem, da bi voda pod sprednjimi kolesi pljuskala na vas, z zavesicami koles. Prilagodljiv material zagotavlja, da se zavesice ne poškodujejo, ko prečkate višji robnik

description.en: Take your TMAX to the next level with the Sport pack. Containing all the must-have sport accessories, the pack gives an even sportier look to your TMAX. Make it truly yours by adding optional Gilles , Akrapovič and Ohlin’s parts. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your TMAX.
description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj model TMAX s kompletom 'Sport'. Komplet vsebuje vso športno dodatno opremo, ki jo preprosto morate imeti in ki vašemu modelu TMAX zagotavlja še bolj športen videz. Svojemu modelu TMAX dodajte dele družb Gilles, Akrapovič in Ohlin ter ga tako povsem prilagodite svojemu okusu. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model TMAX.

description.en: Without sacrificing any style, the Heavy Duty Front Grab Bar protects the front of the Kodiak 450.  Guards the front end, fenders and headlights from brush and trail obstacles while complimenting the  ATV styling
description.sl-SI: Trpežno sprednje držalo ščiti sprednji del modela Kodiak 450, a brez kakršnegakoli vpliva na njegov specifičen izgled. Ščiti sprednji del, blatnike in žaromete pred praskami in ovirami na poti, pri tem pa dopolnjuje slog vašega modela ATV.

description.en: Ideal for young riders getting to grips with their bike on track, the MX Kid’s Body Armour offers superior and lightweight chest and back protection. Impact absorbing polymer shells are mated to a flexible jersey undershirt, allowing full range of movement without compromising safety. The front and back shells are perforated for ventilation, with a naturally contoured back shell to follow the spine. A kidney belt helps ease the load on the back, while a full zip and auto lock closure ensures a solid protection shell for your child.
description.sl-SI: Ščitnik telesa MX za otroke je popoln za mlajše voznike, ki se šele seznanjajo z motornim kolesom na stezi, ter ponuja vrhunsko in lahkotno zaščito prsi in hrbta. Polimerni drsniki, ki blažijo udarce, v kombinaciji s fleksibilno spodnjo majico omogočajo celostno gibanje, ne da bi pri tem ogrozili varnost. Sprednji in zadnji drsniki imajo odprtine za zračenje, poleg tega je zadnji drsnik oblikovan tako, da se naravno prilega hrbtenici. Ledvični pas lajša obremenitev hrbtenice, zadrga po celotni dolžini in samodejno zapenjanje pa zagotavljata popolno zaščitno opremo za vašega otroka.

description.en: Part of the GYTR® Clutch Components which are precision machined from aerospace-quality aluminum with a unique hard coating.

description.en: Keep your investment looking its best, and protect it from the elements. This cover provides the ultimate protection against fading and the elements. It comes with the Vacu-Hold strapless tow system, eliminating billowing and buffeting. Therefore, the cover conforms to the shape of your WaveRunner. Moreover, the EZ Release Dual 304 Stainless Steel Ratchet Tightening System is pre-tensioned and ready to ratchet upon an easy installation.

Ima sistem Vacu-Hold za pripenjanje brez trakov, ki odpravlja napihovanje in plapolanje prevleke. Zato se popolnoma prilega obliki vašega WaveRunnerja. Poleg tega je zaskočni zatezni sistem Dual 304 iz nerjavnega jekla z enostavnim sproščanjem vnaprej pripravljen, da ga lahko po enostavni namestitvi takoj uporabite.

description.en: Öhlins is one of the most respected names in the industry, and its race-developed suspension systems are used by many leading race teams and professional riders. Manufactured with premium race-developed components, the Öhlins Rear Shock YA819 gives you full adjustability and takes your Ténéré 700 World Raid to the next level.
description.sl-SI: Öhlins je eno najbolj spoštovanih imen v industriji, njihov sistem vzmetenja, razvit za dirke, pa uporabljajo številne vodilne dirkalne ekipe in profesionalni dirkači. Zadnji blažilnik Öhlins YA819, ki je izdelan z vrhunskimi komponentami za dirke, je popolnoma prilagodljiv in odlično dopolni vaš Ténéré 700 World Raid.

Perfect for longer trips as you can charge your smartphone on the go.

description.en: Dedicated brake line set for front and rear

description.sl-SI: Zima je čas zabav, praznikov in praznovanj, paket Winter pa zagotavlja, da enak občutek veselja doživite tudi s svojim modelom Tricity. Da bodo vaše roke prijetno tople, ne glede na vremenske pogoje, smo vključili grelnike ročk. V paket je vključen tudi ščitnik za členke, ki tok dohodnega zraka preusmeri stran od rok ter skupaj z grelniki ročk poskrbi za kar najboljšo zaščito pred hladnim vetrom. Zaščita za sprednji del telesa odlično varuje spodnji del telesa pred mrazom, vetrom in dežjem. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity.
description.en: Winter is a time for festivity, holiday and celebration, and the Winter pack ensures that you experience that same feeling of joy with your Tricity. To keep your hands warm and toasty, whatever the condition, we have included the grip heaters. Also included are knuckle visors that channel incoming airflow away from your hands, and combined with the grip heaters, provide optimum protection against wind chill. The Apron does an excellent job of protecting your lower body from the cold, wind and rain. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.

V dolgih dneh na stezi ali pri delu na nogah nič ne prinese več udobja kot dolge nogavice Paddock Blue. Izdelane so iz bombaža, poliamida in elastana ter so trpežne, udobne in raztegljive, kar bo vašim stopalom prineslo izredno ugodje. Nogavice so za oba spola in so na voljo v dveh velikostih, ponašajo se tudi z logotipom Yamaha Racing, s čimer bo hoja prav neverjetna.
description.en: For long days at the track or work spent on your feet, nothing says comfort like the Paddock Blue Crew Socks. A blend of cotton, polyamide and elastane delivers a combination of durability, comfort and stretch that your feet will love. With a unisex fit available in two sizes, these socks carry Yamaha Racing branding that help you walk the walk.

name.en: Hard Cab Enclosure System Glass Front Windshield with Wiper
name.sl-SI: Steklen sprednji vizir z brisalcem kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi

description.en: Yamaha is offering all the components of the Hard Cab Enclosure System separately for added customer convenience. When rain, snow, dust and/or dirt start flying, a glass front windshield keeps you and your riders protected. Designed for simple installation and a perfect fit, this integrated pre-installed windshield features both a wiper and washer system. A fluid bottle for the washer system is nestled nicely under the hood area for easy filling and no loss of precious storage space.
description.sl-SI: Yamaha za lažjo uporabo vse sestavne dele kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi ponuja ločeno. Ko ste vi in vaši potniki izpostavljeni dežju, snegu, prahu in/ali umazaniji, vas zaščiti steklen sprednji vizir. Ta vgrajeni prednameščeni vizir je zasnovan tako, da je nameščanje preprosto in da se popolnoma prilega vozilu, vključuje pa tudi sistem za brisanje in pranje stekel. Vsebnik s tekočino za sistem pranja stekel je vgrajen pod pokrovom za lažje polnjenje, pri tem pa ne izgubite dragocenega prostora za shranjevanje.
Popolnoma vodoodporna zaščita vas z varjenimi šivi in izolirano podlogo greje ter poskrbi, da ostanete suhi v vseh vremenskih pogojih, zato se lahko udobno vozite vse leto.
description.en: Featuring welded seams and an insulated lining, the fully-water resistant Apron keeps you warm and dry in all kinds of weather, enabling you to commute in comfort throughout the year.

Dodaten dirkaški slog je dodan z ikoničnimi oznakami Yamaha Racing in Monster Energy® na prsih, hrbtu in rokah.
description.en: An essential layer of the Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team wardrobe, the Women’s Replica T-Shirt captures the passion and energy of the MX team. Designed for comfortable, every-day wear at races and home, the tee features YZ450FM-inspired colour contrast blue and black with white detailing and a V-neck for breathability. Extra racing style is added with iconic Yamaha Racing and Monster Energy® branding on the chest, back and arms.

Fiksna kapuca nudi dodatno zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi, z dvema sprednjima žepoma z zadrgo in dvema notranjima žepoma za nošenje osnovnih potrebščin. Notranja pritrjena torbica omogoča tudi, da lahko jakno zložite za enostavno prenašanje in shranjevanje. Obvezno za motoriste na poti!
description.en: Lightweight and easy to pack, the Adventure Men’s Puffer Jacket is an ideal travel item for cold weather. 100% nylon in earthy, Ténéré-inspired brown and blue tones, its down and feather filling ensures warmth and comfort. A fixed hood offers extra protection from the elements, with two front zip pockets and two inner pockets for carrying essentials. The inside-attached bag also means you can fold away the jacket for easy carry and storage. Essential for on-the-go riders!

Paket TRACER 9 GT 'Travel Pack' vsebuje ustrezne dodatke, ki poskrbijo za večje udobje na dolgih vožnjah. Visok vizir še bolje ščiti pred vetrom in drugimi vplivi ter vozniku zagotavlja prijeten položaj. Udoben sedež poskrbi za večje udobje pri daljšem sedenju, zato je to dobra izbira za dolge vožnje. Zgornji kovček in vsi dodatki, potrebni za namestitev, zagotavljajo neverjeten 45-litrski dodatni prostor za shranjevanje, kamor lahko shranite dve integralni čeladi. Kovček lahko dodatno prilagodite tako, da se barvna plošča ujema z barvo modela TRACER 9 GT.
description.en: For added comfort during long distance Touring, the TRACER 9 GT Travel Pack provides your motorcycle with just the right extra touches. The High Screen deflects even more wind and elements to provide the rider a pleasant protected position. The Comfort Seat is there to increase the comfort of seating for a longer period of time, making it an excellent addition for longer rides. The Top Case and all accessories needed to mount it provide an incredible 45 L extra storage space that can house two full face helmets if needed. The case can also be detailed to perfection with a color plate to match the color of your TRACER 9 GT.

The TTX GP is the latest shock absorber for hyper sport and sport bikes. It features the TTX twin tube technology and has been developed with the latest technology from Öhlins vast experiences in MotoGP. The compression and rebound damping adjustments are improved by a new adjustment needle with better guidance and different flow restriction behavior. It gives a more precise adjustment and constant function. The adjustment range is also wider and variations between shock absorbers are reduced. And improved chassis feedback as well as improved performance for the rider have been obtained. The new main piston gives the rider much better traction and feeling which means improved control. The TTX GP is further optimized and shares all other benefits with the TTX36 shock absorber.
With the GYTR Cylinder Head Gasket, you can increase compression ratio because of the lower thickness

Moške športno-potovalne motoristične rokavice, ki so vodoodporne in idealne za sezonsko vožnjo, zagotavljajo prožnost, zaščito in udobje. Tribarvne rokavice so izdelane iz mešanice kozjega usnja in funkcionalnih materialov, izboljšano vidljivost in slog pa zagotavljajo vbrizgana zaščita členkov, sistem proti zasuku za preprečevanje poškodb prstov, drsniki na dlani iz TPR in odsevni vstavki. Material, primeren za zaslone na dotik, omogoča uporabo pametnega telefona, na levi rokavici pa je za jasen pogled všita plast za brisanje vizirja.
description.en: Waterproof and ideal for mid-season riding, the Sport Touring Men’s Riding Gloves provide flexibility, protection and comfort. Made from a blend of goat leather and technical materials, the three-tone gloves feature injected knuckle protection, an anti-twist system to prevent figure injury, TPR palm sliders and reflective inserts for improved visibility and style. Touch screen material allows smartphone use, with a visor wipe on the left hand to keep vision clear.

S 3D-logotipom spredaj in elegantnimi dirkaškimi črtami na strani je ta kapa odlična izbira za prave dirkače.
description.en: Designed to match the latest Yamaha MX line-up, the Paddock Blue Snapback Cap is a piece of stylish headwear perfect for race days. Made from 100% cotton  and one size fits all, it features an adjustable plastic strap, ventilation holes and sweatband for comfort in all climates. With 3D branding on the front and sleek racing stripes on the side, this is a true racer’s snapback cap.

name.sl-SI: Čelada IXS Trigger (MIPS) za MTB/neutrjene poti

description.en:
Designed for MTB and Gravel riders, TRIGGER AM from iXS represents the very latest in open face helmet design and technology. 
Featuring a lower back and a 3-level adjustable visor, this modern goggle-compatible design is an ideal choice for Moro 07 and Wabash owners. For a high level of all-round head protection its ultra-light construction features a tough external shell fused directly to the internal EPS material using patented double inmould shell technology. 
The Vortex™ molded aeration system features numerous interconnected internal and external air flow channels for highly efficient cooling – and with its full range of horizontal and vertical adjustment the Ergofit™ Ultra system makes it easy to find the most comfortable setting while the Fidlock™ magnetic closure system ensures precision locking. 
Equipped with MIPS Multi-directional Impact Protection System technology and featuring EN1078, CPSC, KC certification, the TRIGGER AM provides high levels of protection and comfort on every ride.
description.sl-SI:
Čelada TRIGGER AM podjetja iXS je zasnovana za kolesarje MTB in kolesarje po neutrjenih poteh ter predstavlja najnovejšo zasnovo in tehnologijo odprtih čelad. 

Ta moderna zasnova je popolna izbira za lastnike modelov Moro 07 in Wabash, saj je združljiva z očali, ima nižji hrbtni del in tristopenjsko nastavljivi ščitnik. Za visoko raven vsestranske zaščite glave ima njena ultra lahka konstrukcija trdo zunanjo lupino, pritrjeno neposredno na notranji material EPS z uporabo patentirane tehnologije lupine z dvojnim kalupom. 

Vdelan prezračevalni sistem Vortex™ ima številne medsebojno povezane notranje in zunanje kanale za pretok zraka za zelo učinkovito hlajenje, sistem Ergofit™ Ultra s celotnim naborom vodoravnih in navpičnih nastavitev omogoča enostavno iskanje najbolj udobne nastavitve, magnetni sistem zapiranja Fidlock™ pa zagotavlja natančno zaklepanje. 

Čelada TRIGGER AM je opremljena s tehnologijo sistema večsmerne zaščite pred udarci (MIPS), ima certifikate EN1078, CPSC in KC ter zagotavlja visoko raven zaščite in udobja na vsaki vožnji.

description.en: Versatile riding gear rack with space to store your helmet, riding gear and other associated items safely, but easily accessible at all times. The hooks can be placed in any desired configuration to suit your usage. The upper part contains recesses at the bottom where clothes hangers can be placed, and the helmet support can be adjusted to center the motorcycle or bicycle helmet.
description.sl-SI: Vsestranski prtljažnik za opremo zagotavlja prostor za varno shranjevanje čelade, opreme in drugih predmetov, hkrati pa tudi njihovo preprosto dostopnost. Kljuke lahko postavite v katero koli želeno konfiguracijo, ki ustreza vašim zahtevam. Zgornji del ima vdolbine na dnu, kamor lahko vstavite obešalnike za oblačila, podpora za čelado pa se lahko prilagodi tako, da centrira motoristično ali kolesarsko čelado.

description.en: Base for back support for your passenger providing a comfortable ride.

description.en: Upgrade your Side-by-Side with the Hard Cabin Pack for the Wolverine® RMAX™4 1000. Pack includes: Front Glass Windshield with Wiper, Flip up Glass Rear Window, Hard Cabin Front and rear Doors and Cabin Heating Kit.

 zadnje okno, trda sprednja in zadnja vrata ter komplet za ogrevanje kabine.

Zaščitite hladilnik vašega R9 pred udarci cestnih odpadkov z aluminijastim ščitnikom hladilnika. Ta natančno prilegajoč se dodatek z lahkotnim dizajnom in posebnim mat črnim premazom, ki zagotavlja trpežnost, omogoča brezskrbnost pred udarci majhnih kamnov in drugih delcev, ko se odpravite na cesto ali stezo.
description.en: Protect your R9's radiator against road debris impact with the Aluminium Radiator Guard. Lightweight in design and equipped with a special matt-black coating to ensure durability, this precise-fitting accessory offers peace of mind against small stone and debris impact as you take to the road or the track.

name.en: Öhlins Cartridge Kit Race - NIX 22 USD
name.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov za dirkanje Öhlins – NIX 22 USD

description.en: The Öhlins NIX 22 USD cartridge kit comes directly from experience gained in the World Supersport 300 championship. It doesn’t matter if you are heading for a World Championship title or if you are taking your bike to the local race track. This cartridge kit will give you loads of performance, stable damping characteristics and fantastic comfort. The kit has a unique NIX design with compression damping and pre-load adjustment on the left leg, rebound damping and pre-load adjustment on the right leg, while all adjustments are easily made at the top cap.
description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX 22 USD je neposreden odraz izkušenj, pridobljenih na prvenstvu World Supersport 300. Ni pomembno, ali se borite za naslov svetovnega prvaka ali pa s kolesom dirkate na lokalnem dirkališču. Ta komplet vložkov vam zagotavlja boljše zmogljivosti, zanesljivo blaženje in izredno udobje. Komplet ima edinstveno zasnovo NIX s kompresijskim blaženjem in nastavljivo predobremenitvijo za levo nogo ter povratnim blaženjem in nastavljivo predobremenitvijo za desno nogo, vse nastavitve pa lahko enostavno prilagajate na zgornjem pokrovčku.

description.en: Stronger cover than original version, provides limited risk of loosening oil cap and eliminates timing plugs during a race.
description.sl-SI: Pokrov, močnejši od prvotne različice, zagotavlja manjše tveganje za razrahljanje pokrova za olje in preprečuje razrahljanje vtičev za nastavitev agregata med dirko.

description.en: The Genuine Yamaha Soft Rear Window – designed to fit your Wolverine perfectly, while providing protection from the elements for your precious cargo. Works with the soft side enclosure, suntop and poly windshields for a complete  enclosure.
description.sl-SI: Originalno Yamahino mehko zadnje okno je zasnovano tako, da se odlično prilega vozilu Wolverine, hkrati pa vaš dragoceni tovor ščiti pred vremenskimi vplivi. Lahko se kombinira z mehkimi stranskimi pokrovi, zaščito pred soncem in polikarbonatnimi vetrobranskimi stekli za celovito zaščito.

Izboljšajte zadnji del svoje Yamahe R9 s tem originalnim nosilcem za registrsko tablico. Ta nadomestni del ima kovinsko zaključno obdelavo, luč LED za osvetlitev registrske tablice, moderen logotip R9, kable in priključke, potrebne za namestitev dodatnih delov dodatne opreme.

Prosimo, upoštevajte, da v skladu s predpisi EMC originalnih smernikov ni mogoče namestiti s tem nosilcem registrske tablice. Za uporabo so odobreni samo smerniki Arrow iz uradnega programa dodatne opreme Yamaha.
description.en:
Enhance the rear-end of your Yamaha R9 with this genuine License Plate Holder. With a smooth metallic finish, this smart-looking direct replacement for the standard unit includes a LED license plate light and a stylish R9 logo, plus the cables and connectors required to fit optional accessory parts. 

Please note, In accordance with EMC regulations, the original blinkers cannot be installed with this license plate holder. Only Arrow blinkers from the official Yamaha Accessories Program are approved for use.

Featuring a body manufactured from forged aluminium, the VX trail pedal combines a low weight with high levels of durability, making this a perfect option for mountain terrain and gravel trails. Its CNC machined chromoly steel axle is fitted with double sealed cartridge bearings and full roller bearings for highly efficient operation with superior longevity – and the heat treated VX bindings give a precise and predictable fit. Supplied with one pair of SPD compatible cleats.
description.sl-SI:
Terenski pedal VX s kovanim aluminijastim ohišjem združuje nizko težo z visoko stopnjo trpežnosti, zaradi česar je popolna izbira za gorske terene in neutrjene poti. 

Njegova gred iz krom-molibden jekla, izdelana s strojem CNC, je opremljena z dvojno zatesnjenimi ležaji in polnimi valjčnimi ležaji za visoko učinkovito delovanje z vrhunsko življenjsko dobo – toplotno obdelane vezi VX pa se natančno in predvidljivo prilegajo. Priložen je en par bitev, združljivih s SPD.

Vztrajnik GYTR izravna moč vozila in poskrbi za manj agresivno pospeševanje, kadar dodate plin. Povečana vztrajnostna masa pomaga pri ohranjanju zagona skozi zavoje in tako je motor bolj uporaben – še posebej v blatnih in peščenih pogojih.
description.en: By smoothing out the power delivery the GYTR Flywheel delivers a less aggressive hit when you twist the throttle. Its increased inertia mass helps to keep momentum through corners and makes the bike more usable – especially in muddy and sandy conditions.

Komplet samolepilnih podlog za pomorsko uporabo poskrbi za nedrseče oblazinjenje v prostoru za noge JetBlaster-ja, kar zagotavlja dodaten oprijem in udobje za noge voznika.
description.en: Marine stick on mat kit adds non-skid padding to the JetBlaster footwells, providing extra grip and comfort for the rider's feet.

Športni vizir s kratko in zatemnjeno zasnovo ustvari eleganten, športen videz Yamahinega skuterja NMAX.
description.en: The Sport Screen adds a true sporting look to your Yamaha NMAX with its short, dark smoke finish for a sleek, sporty look.

description.sl-SI: Lahek moški flis, ki je popoln kot športni drugi sloj, je zasnovan za nošenje pod motoristično jakno v hladnejših podnebjih. Izdelan iz mešanice poliestra in elastana v rjavih in modrih odtenkih, ki jih je navdihnil Ténéré, se flis hitro suši in ima zadrgo po celotni dolžini za nastavljivo udobje. Potisk »Ténéré« na prsih, napis Yamaha na hrbtu in sublimacijski tisk na notranji strani se združijo v eleganten pustolovski videz.
description.en: Perfect as a sporty second layer, the lightweight Adventure Men’s Fleece is designed for wear under a riding jacket in chillier climates. Made from a blend of polyester and elastane in Ténéré-inspired brown and blue tones, the fleece is quick drying and features a full-length zip for adjustable comfort. A Ténéré chest print, Yamaha back branding and a sublimated inner print combine for a stylish adventure look.

name.sl-SI: Komplet nalepk za zaščito pred praskami

description.en: Set of 2 stickers fitting Tour and Slim side cases to protect top area against scratches
description.sl-SI: Komplet 2 nalepk, ki se prilegata stranskima kovčkoma Tour in Slim za zaščito zgornjega območja pred praskami

description.en: The PW50 little champ pack is perfect for new riders. Equip your bike with this pack, containing training wheels, seat cover and sticker kit, and start creating some great memories and family fun!
description.sl-SI: Komplet za male prvake PW50 je kot nalašč za nove voznike. Opremite kolo s tem kompletom, ki vsebuje pomožna kolesa, prevleko za sedež in komplet nalepk, ter začnite ustvarjati lepe spomine in družinsko zabavo!

Moške hlače MX so optimizirane in do potankosti tehnično dodelane za neusmiljeno dirkanje na modelu MX, poleg tega so trpežne in kot nalašč za drvenje po terenu. Lahkotna večdelna sestava zagotavlja dobro zaščito in obenem omogoča svobodno gibanje, na sedežni površini pa imajo hlače tkanino, izjemno odporno proti hrapavim površinam. Nastavljiv pas s silikonskim delom omogoča udobno prileganje vsem voznikom, ko so na nogah. Sublimirani logotipi Yamaha, Alpinestars in GYTR zagotavljajo ikonski videz dirkača na modelu MX.
description.en: Optimised and technically detailed for relentless MX racing, the MX Men’s Pants are hard-wearing and perfect for cutting through the ruts. A lightweight, multi-panel construction gives good protection while allowing freedom of movement, with high abrasion fabric on the seat. An adjustable waist with silicon grip allows the pants to fit all riders comfortably when they get their legs down. Sublimated Yamaha, Alpinestars and GYTR branding ensures an iconic MX racer look.
Designed to prevent breakage during crashes

description.en: Stylish chromed hard plastic cover to embellish the fuel tank.

Designed for track use only, the Adrenaline Pack is the quickest way to get increased performance from your R7. The full Akrapovič titanium exhaust system boosts power and saves weight – and the quick shifter enables clutchless gear shifting for racing-style, full-throttle acceleration. The R7 Adrenaline Pack also comes with a set of special racing covers and GB Racing crankcase protector as well as a billet front brake lever guard, tank side grip pads and smoked sports screen – and the rear seat cover and foot pedal adjuster kit enhance your racetrack potential even further. Are you ready for the track?
description.sl-SI: Paket Adrenaline je namenjen le za uporabo na stezi in je najhitrejši način, kako lahko iz svojega R7 dosežete boljše zmogljivosti. Celotni Akrapovičev izpušni sistem iz titana dvigne moč in zniža težo – sistem za hitro prestavljanje pa omogoča prestavljanje brez sklopke za pospeševanje s polnim plinom v dirkaškem slogu. Paket Adrenaline za R7 vsebuje tudi posebne dirkaške pokrove in ščitnik ohišja ročične gredi GB Racing ter ščitnik ročice zavore, stranske obloge rezervoarja za gorivo in zatemnjen športni vizir – pokrov zadnjega sedeža in komplet za nastavitev stopalke pa še dodatno povzdigneta vaš dirkaški potencial. Ste pripravljeni za stezo?

description.en: Specially designed Camshaft for racing, allowing better performance.

description.sl-SI: Izberite iz naše nove široke ponudbe vlečnih tub ter uživajte z družino in prijatelji na svoji naslednji dogodivščini na vodi! Ta vodna tuba z zavihki za 1 osebo ima vrhnjo plast iz najlona s 420 denom in PVC-jem, debeline 0,81 mm, za optimalno trpežnost.
description.en: Choose from our new large range of towables to have fun with family and friends on your next trip on the water! This 1 person wing tube was made with 420 denier nylon cover and 20 gauge PVC, for optimal durability.

With a spacious capacity of 20 liters, Yamaha’s Adventure Backpack is a must-have accessory when you’re heading out into the mountains or trails for a longer ride. Its ergonomic design features a padded strap harness and adjustable chest and waist bands to ensure a perfect fit with a high level of comfort – and an integrated CE approved back protector provides added safety.  Multiple internal compartments provide plenty of storage for food, drink and more – and a centrally located padded battery compartment gives you the opportunity to enjoy longer rides.
description.sl-SI:
Yamahin pustolovski nahrbtnik je s prostornino 20 litrov obvezna dodatna oprema, ko se odpravite v gore, na pot ali na daljšo vožnjo. Njegova ergonomska zasnova ima podložene naramnice in nastavljiva pasova čez prsa in trebuh, da zagotovi popolno prileganje z visoko stopnjo udobja, dodatno varnost pa zagotavlja integriran ščitnik hrbta s certifikatom CE. 

Več notranjih žepov nudi veliko prostora za shranjevanje hrane, pijače in še več, podložen predal za baterijo, ki se nahaja na sredini, pa vam daje priložnost, da uživate na daljših vožnjah.

Sestavljen je iz vseh ključnih sestavnih delov za nastavitve, ki pomagajo doseči zmogljivost, s katero se zmaguje na dirkah. Komplet je preprost za namestitev in predstavlja najhitrejšo pot do zmage.

Nadgradite motorno kolo TRACER 9 GT+ s potovalnim kompletom 'Travel Pack', ki prinaša udobje in priročnost. Visok vizir ponuja odlično zaščito pred vetrom, medtem ko zgornji kovček z naslonjalom zagotavlja dovolj prostora za shranjevanje in udobje za dolge vožnje. Ta komplet je kot nalašč za vsako potovanje, saj združuje praktičnost in slog.
description.en: Enhance your TRACER 9 GT+ with the Travel Pack, designed for comfort and convenience. The High Screen offers excellent wind protection, while the Top Case with Backrest provides ample storage and comfort for long rides. Perfect for every journey, this pack combines practicality with style.
Dedicated GYTR Air Funnel Set for improved performance.

description.sl-SI: Uživajte v oprijemu in slogu na svoji Yamahi XMAX s ploščami za noge. Ploščici, ki sta izdelani iz anodiziranega aluminija s trpežnimi gumijastimi vložki, se prilegata na spodnji del talne plošče za noge XMAX, ter tako poskrbita za slog in funkcionalnost med vožnjo.
description.en: Enjoy grip and style on your Yamaha XMAX with the foot plates. Made from anodized aluminium with durable rubber inserts, these plates fit to the bottom of the XMAX foot boards and add style and function while riding.
Drive Axle Assembly which contains Drive Axle, Bearing, Collar and Circlip

description.sl-SI: Izboljšajte zmogljivost, zvok in slog svoje Yamahe TMAX z osupljivim sistemom Akrapovič Full – Titanium. Izpušni kolektorji iz nerjavnega jekla so povezani z dušilnikom iz titana, logotip TMAX pa je lasersko vgraviran za eleganten videz skuterja.
description.en: Enhance the performance, sound and style of your Yamaha TMAX with the stunning Akrapovič Full System - Titanium. Stainless steel header pipes connect to the titanium muffler, laser engraved TMAX logo for sleek scooter styling.

Povzdignite svoje motorno kolo MT-125 na višjo raven s kompletom Sport Pack, ki vključuje izbor dodatkov, posebej zasnovanih za izboljšanje zmogljivosti in sloga. Ta komplet, poleg izboljšanega oprijema in zaščite pred praskami, ki ju omogočajo stranske obloge rezervoarja, poskrbi tudi za bolj agresiven videz, saj vključuje namensko izdelan zatemnjen vizir, črne ročice ter nosilec registrske tablice. Nadgradite svojo vožnjo in izkusite 'temo'.
description.en: Elevate your MT-125 with the Sport Pack, a selection of accessories specifically designed to enhance both performance and style. Allowing you to experience improved grip and scratch protection thanks to the side tank pads, this pack also provides a more aggressive aesthetic through a purpose-built smoked fly screen, black levers and a licence plate holder. Upgrade your ride and feel the Darkness.

A perfect gift for Yamaha Sport Touring fans, the Sport Touring Tracer 9 GT Keyring is ideal for keeping your keys together and easy to find. Made from PVC with a Tracer 9 GT side profile design, it’s guaranteed to catch attention!

name.en: YAMALUBE GL4 SAE90 MARINE GEAR OIL

description.en: YAMALUBE GL4 Gear Oil has been developed for professional and leisure boating, offering outstanding universal oil suitable for all outboard motor and sterndrive gear cases.

name.sl-SI: GYTR cev za plin s kratkim hodom

description.en: The GYTR short stroke throttle tube decreases the stroke for faster acceleration.

description.sl-SI: Zaščita pred prodom, ki motor varuje pred poškodbami zaradi padca, je izdelana iz trpežne konstrukcije jeklenih cevi v avanturističnem slogu.
description.en: Gravel shield to protect the engine from fall damage, made from a strong steel tube construction in full adventure style.

description.sl-SI: MT-09 je utelešenje vsestranskosti. Ta urbana ikona s športno dušo je namenjena več kot le mestnim vožnjam – ustvarjena je za resno zabavo na ovinkastih gorskih cestah.  Zato smo izdelali 'Touring Pack', ki vam zagotavlja, da imate na voljo vse bistvene stvari za daljše vožnje z vašim motociklom MT-09. Srednji vizir in ščitnika členkov zagotavljajo boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, hkrati pa ohranjajo temeljno agresivno podobo modela MT-09. Za večje udobje paket vključuje udobne sedeže za vas in vašega sopotnika. Potrebujete tudi prtljažni prostor? Mehki stranski torbi s skupno prostornino 28 l, ki jo je mogoče razširiti do 42 l, sta opremljeni z vodoodporno notranjostjo in omogočata dovolj prostora za pakiranje vsega, kar potrebujete za oddih konec tedna.
description.en: The MT-09 is the embodiment of versatility. This urban icon with a sporty soul is meant for more than just city rides—it’s built for serious fun on twisty mountain roads.  That’s why we crafted the Touring Pack, ensuring you have all the essentials for longer rides on your MT-09. The middle screen and knuckle deflectors provide enhanced wind protection, while still maintaining the core aggressive look of the MT-09. For increased comfort, the pack includes comfort seats for both you and your passenger. Need luggage space as well? The soft side bags, offering a total capacity of 28L and expandable up to 42L, come with waterproof inner bags, giving you plenty of room to pack everything you need for a weekend getaway.

description.sl-SI: Nadgradite motorno kolo TRACER 9 GT+ s potovalnim kompletom 'Travel Pack', ki prinaša udobje in priročnost. Visok vizir ponuja odlično zaščito pred vetrom, medtem ko zgornji kovček z naslonjalom zagotavlja dovolj prostora za shranjevanje in udobje za dolge vožnje. Ta komplet je kot nalašč za vsako potovanje, saj združuje praktičnost in slog.
description.en: Enhance your TRACER 9 GT+ with the Travel Pack, designed for comfort and convenience. The High Screen offers excellent wind protection, while the Top Case with Backrest provides ample storage and comfort for long rides. Perfect for every journey, this pack combines practicality with style.
Protected your Yamaha outboard with this precision-cast lock. Highly corrosion resistant, and with ratlle prevention, this highly compact lock can be used with all portable outboard engines.
Speicial GYTR Sprocket for Tenere 700 World Raid

The sixpack cooler gives you the ability to store away beverages and keep them cool whatever the weather. Comes with all necessary mounting hardware to install on either left or right side. Fits side by side with the Sand Bottle (sold separately).
description.sl-SI: V hladilni torbi za šesterček lahko pijače ne glede na vreme hranite na hladnem. Priložena je vsa potrebna oprema za namestitev na levo ali desno stran. Namestite jo lahko vzporedno s steklenico za pesek (naprodaj ločeno).
Izkusite novo raven prestavljanja in nadzora nad motornim kolesom s kompletom za hitro prestavljanje. Izhaja iz tehnologije Yamaha Racing za vrhunsko doživetje na motornem kolesu TRACER 9.
description.en: Access a new level of shifting and bike control with the Quick Shifter Kit. Derived from Yamaha Racing tech for supreme feel on your TRACER 9.
Custom-made storage specifically designed for the bow storage of FX Series WaveRunners.
description.sl-SI: Po meri izdelan prostor, posebej zasnovan za shranjevanje v premcu vodnih skuterjev WaveRunner serije FX.

description.en: Take your JetBlaster storage capacity to the next level with our JetBlaster Stern Mounted Storage. Mounts with no drilling required. Durable, weather-resistant compression-molded black EVA foam.

Nosilec s kakovostno površinsko obdelavo, ki se namesti na zadnji del Yamahe za prevažanje kovčka ali druge prtljage.

description.sl-SI: Popolnoma sintetično olje Yamalube15W50 za štiritaktne motorje je visoko zmogljiva rešitev za športna, cestna in terenska motorna kolesa, skuterje, ATV-je ter štirikolesnike s štiritaktnim motorjem. Odlična vsestranska zaščita ločenih in vgrajenih menjalnikov ter mokrih sklopk, tudi pri ekstremnih vrtljajih in temperaturah.
description.en: YamalubeFully Synthetic 15W50 4-Stroke Oil is the high-performance solution for 4-stroke sports, road and off-road motorcycles, scooters, ATVs and quads. Excellent all-round protection for separate and integrated gearboxes and wet clutches, even at extreme revs and temperatures.
Functional sport-style foldable rear brake lever.
description.sl-SI: Funkcionalna zložljiva ročica zadnje zavore v športnem slogu.

name.sl-SI: Nosilec registrske tablice za TRACER 9 GT+

description.sl-SI: Nosilec registrske tablice, ustvarjen za Yamahino ultimativno športno-potovalno motorno kolo, se ponaša z elegantno minimalistično zasnovo. Je lahek in zasnovan za prileganje radarsko povezanemu zavornemu sistemu, ki je edinstven za model TRACER 9 GT+.
description.en: Created for the ultimate Yamaha Sport Tourer, the Licence Plate Holder has a stylishly minimalist design. Lightweight and engineered to fit the radar-linked braking system unqiue to the TRACER 9 GT+.

description.sl-SI: Aluminijast spojler za motor za avanturistično vožnjo se namesti neposredno na zaščito motorja Explorer in ščiti motor pred kamenčki, ki priletijo s sprednjega kolesa na avanturističnih poteh.
description.en: Adventure style aluminium engine spoiler, mounts directly on Explorer Engine Guards, shields the engine partly from gravel from the front wheel when taking the adventurous route.

name.sl-SI: Ploščice za spodnji del talne plošče NMAX

description.sl-SI: Uživajte v boljšem oprijemu in slogu na Yamahinem skuterju NMAX s ploščicama za spodnji del talne plošče NMAX. Ploščici sta izdelani iz anodiziranega aluminija s trpežnimi gumijastimi vložki in se prilegata na spodnji del talne plošče za noge NMAX, ter tako poskrbita za slog in funkcionalnost v mestni vožnji.
description.en: Enjoy grip and style on your Yamaha NMAX with the Foot Plates Floor NMAX. Made from anodized aluminium with durable rubber inserts, these plates fit onto the bottom of the NMAX footboards, adding both style and functionality for urban riding.

description.sl-SI: Komplet 5-voltnega izhoda USB-A za enote s kabelsko predpripravo.
description.en: USB-A 5 Volt outlet kit with moisture-proof connector for pre-wired units, ideal for charging smartphones and similar devices.

description.sl-SI: Zaščitite svoj TRACER 7 pred kamni in odpadki z zaščito hladilnika. Stalen pretok zraka je zagotovljen z mrežo iz nerjavečega jekla z visokim pretokom, znotraj močnega aluminijastega okvirja za dodatno varnost.
description.en: Keep stones and debris from your TRACER 7  with the Radiator Guard. Constant air flow is deivered by a high flow stainless steel mesh, inside a strong aluminium frame for extra safety.
GYTR sprocket nut is advised to be used each time you use a new sprocket.
Improves overall engine performance in combination with GYTR® exhaust pipe.

description.en: Durable protection for tight approaches, high stumps or rocks on the trail.

To trpežno in prožno vodilo ščiti verigo in podaljša njeno življenjsko dobo.
description.en: Durable and flexible, this guide protects the chain and extends chain life.

We know how annoying and difficult it can be to store small items in the underseat storage. The trunk organizer helps you with storing them, so you can find them easily and have your underseat storage organized.
description.sl-SI: Vemo, kako nadležno in težko je lahko shranjevanje majhnih predmetov v prostoru pod sedežem. Organizator prostora vam pomaga pri shranjevanju stvari, da jih lahko enostavno najdete in imate prostor pod sedežem urejen.

description.en: Thanks to its seamless integration, this middle height screen provides additional wind protection.
description.sl-SI: Zaradi brezhibne integracije ta vizir srednje višine zagotavlja dodatno zaščito pred vetrom.

Otroške rokavice MX, ki so nepogrešljive v kompletu za mlade voznike modela MX, omogočajo popoln nadzor nad motornim kolesom ter kombinacijo udobja in zaščite. Zračna raztegljiva tkanina zagotavlja celovito zračenje, podložen del na dlaneh pa oprijem in dodatno hrapavo površino pri padcu. Na členkih je neoprenska in termoplastična guma za zaščito pred udarci, nastavljivi zapestniki pa prinašajo udobno prileganje, ki ustreza vsem velikostim.
description.en: An essential part of a young MX riders kit, the MX Kid’s Gloves allow full control of their bike with a combination of comfort and protection. Breathable stretch fabric offers all over ventilation, while the padded palm delivers grip and extra surface abrasion in a fall. The knuckles feature neoprene and thermoplastic rubber for impact protection, and adjustable wrists allow a comfort fit for all sizes.
Sport screen, 30% transparency. Non DOT version.
Base for back support for your passenger to provide a confortable ride.
The handlebar switch can be used as pit limiter, mode change, map change and rear light activation.
Fog light stay for mounting without engine guard

Čistilo za zavore Yamalubeje idealno za čiščenje in razmaščevanje zavor in komponent sklopke ter drugih delov. Posebna formula, ki ni jedka, hitro raztopi olje, mast, katran, zavorno tekočino ter umazanijo in je varna za uporabo na gumi, plastiki in barvi.
description.en: YamalubeBrake Cleaner is ideal for degreasing and cleaning brake, clutch and other components. Its non-corrosive formula rapidly dissovles oil, grease, tar, brake fluid and dirt and is safe to use on rubber, plastic and paint.

description.en: Made of Hi-Vis orange Ripstop nylon, this bag is designed for  trailering and long term storage. As more and more countries are mandating the coverage of the propeller, during the transportation of a boat, this high quality bag is a necessity for  any boating enthusiast. The padding, the adjustability and the ease of installation, also make it an obvious choice.
Designed and engineered with the capability to tow E1-certified trailers.
description.sl-SI: Zasnovano in narejeno za vleko prikolic s certifikatom E1.

description.en: Offers greater protection and a better riding position, providing more grip during racing.
description.sl-SI: Nudi več zaščite in boljši položaj vožnje, kar omogoča boljši oprijem med dirkanjem.

description.en:
Evoke the soul of the Dark Side of Japan with the new Sport Pack for the MT-10.
Created to give you a full on immersive experience with your MT-10, the Sport Pack will take your ride to the next level.
Did we mention the looks? Containing all must-have sport accessories, the pack gives an even sportier and more aggressive look, worthy of the definitive Master of Torque.
description.sl-SI:
Z novim kompletom dodatne opreme 'Sport Pack' za MT-10 prebudite temno plat Japonske. 
Ustvarjen, da vam zagotovi popolno popotniško izkušnjo z motorjem MT-10, zato Sport Pack predstavlja še korak naprej. 
Ali smo že omenili izgled? Z vsemi športnimi dodatki, ki jih morate imeti, paket zagotavlja še bolj športen in bolj agresiven videz, vreden resničnega gospodarja navora.

description.en: Front Wheel Assembly, including brake disk, bearings and seals

The Öhlins NIX 30 Cartridge Kit for standard KYB fork was developed in racing series such as World Supersport and Superstock championships, and offers loads of performance, stability and suppleness. This kit has a unique design, with the compression damping in the left fork leg while the right leg controls rebound damping. This allows not only for a more precise function and better stability, but also the ease of having all adjustments conveniently placed at the top of the fork.
description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX 30 za standardne vilice KYB je bil razvit v sklopu dirkaške serije, kot so svetovno prvenstvo Supersport in prvenstva Superstock, ter omogoča izredno zmogljivost, stabilnost ter okretnost. Ta komplet ima edinstveno zasnovo s kompresijskim blaženjem v levem kraku vilic, medtem ko desni krak nadzoruje povratno blaženje. To omogoča bolj natančno delovanje in boljšo stabilnost, vse prilagoditve pa so priročno nameščene na vrh vilic.

description.en: A cool blue eyewear for young ones, the Paddock Blue sunglasses make a real statement of Yamaha passion. A polycarbonate frame ensures a lightweight but strong build, and tinted blue lenses with UV400 protection help protect the eyes.
description.sl-SI: Kul modra sončna očala za otroke Paddock Blue izražajo navdušenje nad Yamaho. Polikarbonatna masa zagotavlja lahek, a vzdržljiv okvir, zatemnjene modre leče z zaščito UV400 pa pomagajo zaščititi oči. Bel Yamahin logotip ob straneh poskrbi za jasno identifikacijo, črna zaščitna vrečka pa omogoča enostavno shranjevanje in prenašanje.

name.sl-SI: Motoristična softshell jakna 2-v-1 Paddock Blue za ženske

description.en: Technical and stylish for Paddock Blue fans that ride, the blue and black Paddock Blue Women’s Riding Softshell offers 2-in-1 functionality for comfort on all roads. A softshell outer with protection pockets and hydro repellent treatment covers the removable armoured riding mesh, featuring Warrior Lite armour for the elbows and shoulders. A fixed hood with snap closure prevents it from moving during the ride, while two outer pockets and one inner pocket give ample room for essential items. A Paddock Blue classic for regular use on two wheels in all weathers.
description.sl-SI: Tehnična in stilska motoristična softshell jakna Paddock Blue za ženske v modri in črni za voznice, ki se navdušujejo nad linijo Paddock Blue, združuje dva izdelka v enem za funkcionalnost in udobje na vseh poteh. Mehkoščitna tkanina softshell je odporna na vodo, na zunanji strani so zaščitni žepi, v notranjosti pa snemljiva zaščitna mrežica, poleg tega jakna vključuje ščitnike Warrior Lite za komolce in ramena. Fiksna kapuca na zapenjanje s pritiskači preprečuje plapolanje med vožnjo, dva zunanja žepa in en notranji pa omogočajo dovolj prostora za vse pomembne predmete. Klasični izdelek linije Paddock Blue za redno uporabo, ko ste na dveh kolesih v vseh vremenskih razmerah.

description.sl-SI: Modularne stranske plošče so izdelane iz 4 mm prašno lakiranega aluminija. Ima več točk za pritrditev dodatne opreme in se zlahka namesti brez predelav, zato je vsestranska rešitev za terensko vožnjo.
description.en: The modular rack side panels are made from 4mm powder-coated aluminum. It features multiple mounting points for accessories and installs easily without modifications, making it a versatile solution for off-road transport.

description.sl-SI: Kabel USB za polnjenje pametnega telefona in povezljivost z njim.
description.en: USB cable for smartphone charging and connectivity.

description.sl-SI: Občutite zmogljivost in slišite moč svojega TRACER 9 s celotnim izpušnim sistemom Akrapovič. Izboljša športni videz, prihrani težo in ponuja nepozaben zvok.
description.en: Feel the performance and hear the power of your TRACER 9 with the Akrapovič Full Exhaust System. Enhances the sporty look, saves weight and delivers an unforgettable sound.

name.en: Yamaha Single Sand Bottle Kit with Handle
name.sl-SI: Yamahin komplet z eno posodo za pesek z ročajem

description.en: Always have sand on hand with our updated sand bottle kits. These reconfigured kits have bottles that include comfortably integrated handholds (making them easy to grip with gloves), have larger square openings allowing for quick filling without removing the bottom lid, as well as an even flow of sand to fill divots more effectively.
description.sl-SI: Z našimi posodobljenimi kompleti posod za pesek imate pesek vedno pri roki. Ti na novo zasnovani kompleti vključujejo posode z udobno integriranimi ročaji (za preprosto prijemanje z rokavicami), večjimi kvadratnimi odprtinami za hitro polnjenje brez odstranjevanja spodnjega pokrova in enakomernim tokom peska za učinkovitejše popravilo poškodovanih zelenic.

description.en: Functional racing-style foldable brake lever, replacing the original.
description.sl-SI: Funkcionalna, dirkalna zložljiva zavorna ročica, ki nadomešča originalno.

Opremite svojo Yamaho Tricity za zimo z zimskim paketom Tricity 125, ki vsebuje zaščito za sprednji del telesa in grelce ročk. Nepogrešljiv za vožnjo s skuterjem v hladnem vremenu, saj zagotavlja dodatno udobje v zimskih mesecih.
description.en: Equip your Yamaha Tricity for winter with the Tricity 125 Winter Pack, containing the apron and grip heaters. A must-have for cold-weather scooter riding and providing extra comfort during the winter months.
Use the CABLE WIRELESS CHARGER to connect the Wireless Charging Module directly to a power source (i.e. motorcycle battery / ignition)​
description.sl-SI: S kablom od brezžičnega polnilnika povežite polnilni modul neposredno na električni vir (denimo akumulator motocikla/vžig).

description.sl-SI: Ta originalna Yamaha trda sprednja vrata so zasnovana za najvišjo stopnjo trpežnosti, udobja in funkcije.
description.en: These Genuine Yamaha Hard Cab Rear Doors are designed to deliver the highest levels of durability, comfort and function.

description.sl-SI: Živahen lonček kolekcije Hyper Naked s prostornino 350 ml, ki zaradi zasnove 2-v-1 tudi sveti, je idealen za uporabo doma ali v službi. Zasnova sledi v cian modri barvi se aktivira na neposredni sončni svetlobi, za osupljiv učinek temne plati Japonske ponoči pa ima površino, ki sveti v temi. Dvostenska konstrukcija iz nerjavečega jekla ohranja pijačo toplo, s hitrim pokrovom za požirek, da se prepreči razlitje.
description.en: Super-cool and perfect for the home or workplace, the 350ml Hyper Naked Glowing Cup is a 2-in-1 design. Activating the cyan clue design in direct sunlight, it also features a glow in the dark surface for a striking Dark Side of Japan look after hours. Double-walled stainless-steel construction keeps drinks warm, with a quick sip lid to avoid spillage.

name.sl-SI: Krmilni kabel 18YSC za mehanski krmilni sistem s 150 KM
name.en: Yamaha Easy Connect Rotary Steering System 150HP

description.sl-SI: Yamaha Easy Connect Rotary Steering System 150HP je zasnovan za graditelje čolnov in nudi enostaven in zanesljiv način usmerjanja čolna. Sistem je sestavljen iz več ključnih komponent, ki sodelujejo, da zagotovijo gladko in odzivno usmerjanje. Tukaj je pregled omenjenih komponent: Easy Connect Steering Helm (Single Helm) - YMEH10015000 Steering Cable - YMESC16XXXXX Bezel Kit - YMEB1B009000 Steering Wheel - naročite posebej.
description.en: Yamaha Easy Connect Rotary Steering System 150HP is designed for boat builders and provides a straightforward and reliable way to steer a boat. The system is composed of several key components that work together to ensure smooth and responsive steering. Here's a breakdown of the components mentioned: Easy Connect Steering Helm (Single Helm) - YMEH10015000 Steering Cable - YMESC16XXXXX Bezel Kit - YMEB1B009000 Steering Wheel - order separately.

description.sl-SI: Izboljšajte svoj MT-07 slog z visokokakovostnim aluminijastim ščitnikom verige. Dvobarvna zasnova in logotip MT poudarita edinstven, kul videz.
description.en: Enhance your MT-07 style with the high quality aluminium Chain Guard. A two-tone colour design and MT logo branding add a unique, cool look.
Stylish and high-quality finished rider foot rests replacements.

description.en: Lower seat - replacing the original - allowing for better ground access

description.en: Stylish blue front brake reservoir cover to replace the original cover.

description.en: Defend yourself and your UMAX against mud, water, and debris with this four-piece fender kit. This kit is made of highly durable materials and made to integrate perfectly with the hard-work-ready look and feel of your UMAX.

Lahka, kompaktna in prilagodljiva, vsestranska torba za čelado REVS je idealna za nošenje čelade, živil ali drugih predmetov. Torba je izdelana iz črnega 100% poliestra in ponuja 15 litrov prostora za shranjevanje, ima rdeče vrvice, mehko podlogo, ki preprečuje, da bi se čelada opraskala, in notranji žep, ki se zapira z ježkom, da predmeti ne izpadejo. Nastavljiv ramenski trak je udoben za vsakogar, za pridih sloga REVS pa poskrbi natisnjeni napis Yamaha.
description.en: Light, compact and adaptable, the REVS Versatile Helmet Bag is ideal for carrying your helmet, groceries or other items. Made from black 100% polyester offering 15-litres of storage, the bag has red drawstrings, a soft lining to prevent helmets getting scratched, and a Velcro closure inner pocket to prevent items falling out. An adjustable shoulder strap makes it comfortable for everyone, with printed Yamaha branding for a touch of REVS style.

Yamalube® Synthetic Marine Oil is a versatile, premium performance oil specially developed for Yamaha 4-stroke outboards and personal watercrafts. Available in 10-30 and 20-40 viscosity grades.

description.en: Make going off trail a breeze with this 12-Spoke J-Series All-Terrain Alloy Wheel Assembly that offers increased traction in a ready-to-rumble package!

description.en: Prewired grip heater with unit display/control function
