name.sl-SI: Rebrasta kapa Paddock Blue za odrasle

description.en: Chunky, colourful and made for warmth, the Paddock Blue Adult Ribbed Beanie offers a cosy unisex fit wherever life takes you. Knitted from 100% cotton, this beanie’s thick two-tone ribbing ensures comfort and a strong shape. A turn up hem features an embroidered Yamaha Racing badge for an unmistakable fashion item.
description.sl-SI: Debela, barvita in topla rebrasta kapa Paddock Blue za odrasle omogoča udobno prileganje za oba spola na prav vseh poteh. Pletena je iz 100-odstotnega bombaža, debela rebrasta plast, obarvana v dva odtenka, pa prinaša udobje in trdno obliko. Na zavihanem robu je izvezen logotip Yamaha Racing, s čimer je to nezamenljiv modni izdelek.

Polnilnik za vse vrste akumulatorjev.  Nova trpežna zasnova za enostavno upravljanje, z edinstvenim sistemom namestitve na hrbtni strani za hitro povezavo z dodatki CS. Med vzdrževalnim polnjenjem lahko ostane varno povezan tudi dalj časa.
description.en: Charger for all types of batteries.  New durable design to make it easy to handle, with unique mounting system on the back for quick connection to CS accessories. It can be left safely connected for long periods during maintenance charging.

name.en: Plastic Transom Flange for the XTO

description.sl-SI: Priključek za prirobnico, ki vstopa v trup za namestitev 2,5-palčne cevi.
description.en: Transom flange connector entering the hull for fitment of the 2.5 inch rigging hose.
GYTR Rear Sprocket with 42T for 520 Chain conversion for Marchesini wheels

name.sl-SI: Sklop objemk za ohišje plina GYTR

description.en: For easy maintenance and servicing

description.sl-SI: Originalni Yamahin nosilec rezervne pnevmatike se varno namesti na prtljažnik vozila Wolverine prek tovarniških pritrdišč in lahko nosi do 32-palčno pnevmatiko.
description.en: The Genuine Yamaha Spare Tyre Mount securely installs to the bed of the Wolverine using all factory mounting points to hold up to a 32” tyre size.
Race handlebar set which allows you to change riding position.
Durable protection for tight approaches, high stumps or rocks on the trail.
description.sl-SI: Trpežna zaščita za vožnjo po ozkih območjih, visoke štore ali kamenje po poti.

description.en: Custom handlebar ends to enhance the design of your Yamaha.
description.sl-SI: Po meri izdelani konci krmila za še lepši videz vaše Yamahe.

description.en: We know how it feels to be left wanting for more space to stow away essentials, so we equipped the Urban Pack with an integrated rear carrier and beautifully designed 39L top case that gobbles up your helmet, extra luggage or anything else that you throw at it. An integral back rest pad gives your passenger a comfortable ride – and the high screen provides added wind protection while keeping your line of sight clear. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Poznamo občutek, ko zmanjka prostora za shrambo nujnih potrebščin, zato smo Urbani paket opremili z vgrajenim zadnjim nosilcem in čudovito oblikovanim 39-litrskim kovčkom, ki sprejme vašo čelado, dodatno prtljago ali karkoli drugega, kar želite spraviti vanj. Vgrajen zadnji naslon skrbi za udobno vožnjo potnika – visok zaslon pa deluje kot dodatna zaščita pred vetrom in obenem omogoča čist pogled. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity 300.

description.en: This dark smoked short screen gives your X-MAX a sporty look.

description.sl-SI: Popestrite slog Yamahinega skuterja z zaključkom krmila, izdelanim iz eloksiranega aluminija, z vgraviranimi podrobnostmi za dodaten športni pridih.
description.en: Add new style to your Yamaha scooter with the Handlebar Ends, made from anodized aluminium and featuring engraved details for an extra sporty touch.
Durable Knuckle guard kit with integrated MT design and including wind deflectors.
description.sl-SI: Komplet trpežnih ščitnikov za členke z vgrajeno MT zasnovo in vključno z odbojniki vetra.

name.en: Ténéré 700 World Raid Enduro Pack White
name.sl-SI: Paket Enduro za model Ténéré 700 World Raid

description.en: Ready for some serious off road riding? Then you are in the right place. Take your Ténéré 700 World Raid to the next level with the Enduro Pack and enjoy the adrenaline rush.
description.sl-SI: Ali ste pripravljeni na resno terensko vožnjo? Potem ste na pravem mestu. Popeljite svoj model Ténéré 700 World Raid na novo raven s paketom Enduro in uživajte v navalu adrenalina.

description.en: We know how annoying and difficult it can be to store small items in the underseat storage. The trunk organizer helps you with storing them, so you can find them easily and have your underseat storage organized.
description.sl-SI: Vemo, kako nadležno in težko je lahko shranjevanje majhnih predmetov v prostoru pod sedežem. Organizator prostora vam pomaga pri shranjevanju stvari, da jih lahko enostavno najdete in imate prostor pod sedežem urejen.

Športni paket povzdigne vašo Yamaho XMAX na naslednjo raven sloga skuterja. Športni paket XMAX vsebuje športni vizir XMAX, nosilec registrske tablice in njegov pokrov, sprednje in zadnje zavorne ročice ter ščitnike, ki so izdelani izključno za Yamaha XMAX Tech MAX.
description.en: The Sport Pack takes your Yamaha XMAX to the next level of scooter style. The XMAX Sport Pack comprises the XMAX Sport Screen, License Plate Holder and its cover, front and rear brake levers and guards, all made exclusively for the Yamaha XMAX Tech MAX.

name.en: GYTR Marchesini R6 Aluminium Rear Wheel (Gold)

description.en: Forged aluminium rear wheel with low centre of gravity made for the R1 by Marchesini. The use of multi-directional aluminum alloy forging and the use of shapes optimized for the final geometry of the wheel make it possible to obtain a very light material with exceptional mechanical specifications.
Completely built front wheel

name.sl-SI: Avanturistični uniseks platneni klobuk za odrasle

description.sl-SI: Avanturistični platneni klobuk za odrasle (uniseks) klasične oblike iz 100% bombaža, ki je uporaben obojestransko, je obvezen dodatek k potovalni garderobi. Izbirate lahko med kamuflažnim zemljevidom sveta ali modro barvo s privlačnim tiskanim logotipom Ténéré in vezenim logotipom Yamaha. Klobuk je univerzalne velikosti in ima vrvico za prilagajanje velikosti. Je nepogrešljiv dodatek za poletna popotovanja in raziskovanje.
description.en: A must-have addition to a traveller’s wardrobe, the 100% cotton Adventure Unisex Adult’s Bucket Hat is a classic shape with a reversible design. Choose from a camouflage-style world map design or blue with an eye-catching printed Ténéré logo and embroidered Yamaha logo. One-size-fits-all, this hat features a drawstring for adjusting to fit. Essential for summer days of riding and exploration.
DC Outlet Kit for the front pocket of your scooter
description.sl-SI: Komplet vtičnic za enosmerni tok za sprednji žep skuterja

description.en: Make your Yamaha look even cooler!
description.sl-SI: Za še bolj izpopolnjen videz vaše Yamahe!

S Touring vizirjem omejite veter in povečate udobje, kjer koli se vozite. Izjemno širok in enostaven za montažo na TRACER 7, ima preoblikovan srednji in spodnji del za zmanjšanje turbulence. Opremljen z logotipom TRACER za dodaten slog.
description.en: Limit the wind and enhance comfort wherever you ride with the Touring Screen. Extra wide and easy to mount on the TRACER 7, it features a reshaped mid and bottom sections for reduced turbulence. Branded with the TRACER logo for extra style.

description.sl-SI: Neopazna, a funkcionalna zaščita šasije pri padcu. Narejena po meri agregata in šasije. Poleg tega pa ti stranski drsniki okrepijo robustni videz vašega R125.
description.en: Discrete, yet functional, chassis protection in case of a fall. Made to fit the engine and chassis layout. These side sliders also provide an added look of toughness to your R125.

name.en: Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Kit for the Ténéré 700
name.sl-SI: Yamahin komplet zadnjih sekvenčnih LED utripalk za model Ténéré 700

description.en: Introducing Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Kit for the Ténéré 700 – Redefining safety and elegance on the road. Elevate your Ténéré 700 experience with a captivating sequence of LEDs meticulously designed to improve visibility and showcase the distinctive style of your Yamaha. Crafted for seamless integration, this rear blinker set not only signals every move but also makes a bold statement. Ride with confidence as the sequential LED display adds an extra layer of sophistication to your Ténéré 700, ensuring you make a lasting impression on every journey. Immerse yourself in the perfect fusion of safety and style with Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Ensemble tailored for the Ténéré 700.
description.sl-SI: Predstavljamo Yamahin komplet zadnjih sekvenčnih LED utripalk za Ténéré 700 - na novo opredeljuje varnost in eleganco na cesti. Izboljšajte svoje doživetje pri Ténéréju 700 z očarljivim zaporedjem diod LED, ki so skrbno oblikovane za izboljšanje vidljivosti in predstavitev značilnega sloga vaše Yamahe. Ta komplet zadnjih utripalnikov, izdelan za brezhibno integracijo, ne signalizira le vsakega giba, temveč daje tudi drzno izjavo. Vozite samozavestno, saj zaporedni prikaz LED dodaja vašemu Ténéréju 700 dodatno plast prefinjenosti in zagotavlja, da boste na vsakem potovanju naredili nepozaben vtis. Potopite se v popolno združitev varnosti in sloga z Yamahinim kompletom zadnjih sekvenčnih LED-blinkerjev, ki je prilagojen za Ténéré 700.

name.sl-SI: Popolnoma Sintetično Olje Yamalube RS2 Za Dvotaktnike 1 L
name.en: Yamalube RS2 Fully Synthetic 2 Stroke Oil

description.sl-SI: Olje za tekmovalne terenske pogoje Yamalube2R je vrhunsko olje za izredne zmogljivosti za teren. Motokros, enduro in štirikolesniki – to mazivo s pripravljeno mešanico, ki temelji na estru, se odlično obnese pri ekstremnih temperaturah in v najtežjih dirkaških pogojih.
description.en: Yamalube RS2 Off-Road Racing Oil is the ultimate in off-road performance oil. From Motocross and Enduro, to Trials and Quad racing, this ester-based, 100% synthetic premix lubricant delivers in extreme temperatures and the toughest racing conditions.

name.sl-SI: Stikalo za zaklepanje zgornjega kovčka brez ključa – skuterji
name.en: Keyless Top Case Locking Switch - Scooters

description.sl-SI: S stikalom za zaklepanje zgornjega kovčka zavarujte svojo prtljago na skuterju. S pritiskom zaklenite in odklenite zgornji kovček brez ključa
description.en: Secure your Scooter luggage with the Top Case Locking Switch. Push to lock and unlock your Keyless Top Case

name.sl-SI: Izpuh Full System z dušilnikom iz titana

description.en: Make your Tracer 700 look and sound even cooler!
description.sl-SI: Za še bolj izpopolnjen izgled in zvok vašega modela Tracer 700!

description.en: Part of the GYTR® Clutch Components which are precision machined from aerospace-quality aluminum with a unique hard coating.
description.sl-SI: Del sestavnih delov sklopke GYTR®, ki so natančno izdelani iz aluminija letalske kakovosti, z edinstveno trdo prevleko.
Komplet grelnikov ročk s predpripravljenimi kabli za preprosto namestitev zagotavlja tople roke in prilagodljivost pri vožnji v hladnejšem vremenu. Enostaven za namestitev in nadzor za udobno vožnjo.
description.en: Prewired and ready to connect, the Grip Heater Set ensures warm hands and flexibility on colder rides. Easy to install and control for comfort riding.

You can also enjoy riding your XMAX during the cold and rainy days with the Winter Pack.  To keep your hands warm , whatever the condition, we have included the grip heaters, which are seamlessly integrated into the design. We also included the hand muffs to amp up the protections which by combining with the grip heaters, provide optimum protection against wind chill.  The Apron does an excellent job of protecting your lower body from the cold, wind and rain, including an integrated seat cover and a zip to detach the apron in warmer weather.   Available from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your XMAX.
description.sl-SI: Z zimskim paketom lahko v vožnji z vozilom XMAX uživate tudi v hladnih in deževnih dneh.  Grelniki ročk, ki so neopazno vgrajeni v zasnovo, ohranjajo vaše roke tople, ne glede na razmere. Vključili smo tudi mufe za roke za boljšo zaščito, ki s kombinacijo grelnikov ročk zagotavljajo optimalno zaščito pred hladnim vetrom.  Zaščita za sprednji del odlično zaščiti spodnji del telesa pred mrazom, vetrom in dežjem, vključno s prevleko za sedež in zadrgo, s katero lahko zaščito v toplejših vremenskih razmerah odstranite.   Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše vozilo XMAX.

description.en: GYTR® fuel cap tool for the GYTR® Fuel cap (Screw type)

description.sl-SI: Zasnovan je za sodobne voznike, saj omogoča priročno zaklepanje in odklepanje brez težav s klasičnimi ključi. Preprosto imejte pametni ključ pri sebi, da zagotovite (od)zaklepanje stranskega kovčka, kadarkoli greste mimo motocikla.
description.en: Ideated for the modern riders, to enable convenient locking & unlocking without the hassle of traditional keys. Simply have your unit smart key with you to ensure the side case is (un)locked whenever you walk by your vehicle.
Machined triple clamp to improve drivability and stiffness. And provide a higher riding position when combined together with the handlebar clamps.
description.sl-SI: Strojno obdelana trojna objemka za izboljšanje vodljivosti in togosti. V kombinaciji z objemkami za krmilo zagotavlja tudi višji položaj med vožnjo.

OM COVER F80D in F100F sta več kot le zaščitna pokrova; sta popolna mešanica sloga, vzdržljivosti in vrhunske zmogljivosti. Ne glede na to, ali želite zaščititi zunanje pohištvo, opremo ali druge dragocene predmete, ta pokrivala zagotavljajo popolno zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi. Ne sklepajte kompromisov glede kakovosti. Izberite OM COVER F80D in F100F za zanesljivo, elegantno in dolgotrajno zaščito.
description.en: The OM COVER F80D and F100F are more than just protective covers; they are a perfect blend of style, durability, and superior performance. Whether you need to shield your outdoor furniture, equipment, or other valuable items, these covers deliver the ultimate defense against the elements. Don’t compromise on quality. Choose OM COVER F80D and F100F for reliable, stylish, and long-lasting protection.
Left and right pedal set manufactured to OE quality.
description.sl-SI: Komplet levega in desnega pedala, izdelan v skladu s kakovostjo OE.
Ekskluzivna zasnova, nizek sedež, ki omogoča, da voznik lažje doseže stik s podlago.
description.en: Exclusively designed, low seat providing additional space to improve ground access for the rider.

name.sl-SI: Popoln dirkaški izpušni sistem iz titana

description.en: This system provides more power and weight reductions to suite racing requirements
description.sl-SI: Ta sistem zagotavlja več moči in zmanjšanje teže, da se prilagodi tekmovalnim zahtevam.
Potnike ščiti pred dežjem, vetrom, blatom in delci s tal za bolj sproščujočo in udobno vožnjo.
description.en: Protects occupants against rain, wind, mud and light trail debris for a more relaxing and comfortable ride.
Ohlins Cartridge kit NIX 30 for standard or Ohlins FGRT200  Front Fork. Used on R6/R1/MT10
description.sl-SI: Mehanizem Öhlins NIX 30 za standardne sprednje vilice ali vilice Öhlins FGRT200. Uporabljeno pri modelu R6/R1/MT10

description.en: Protects the handlebar grips from dirt and water while waiting in paddock or starting grid. And also looks very nice when bike is parked in the workshop. Be like a pro!
description.sl-SI: Ščiti ročaje pred umazanijo in vodo med čakanjem v boksih ali na štartnem položaju. Pa tudi videti je lepo, ko je motocikel parkiran v delavnici. Bodite kot profesionalec!

description.en: Provides more grip compared to the standard seat option.
description.sl-SI: Zagotavlja boljši oprijem v primerjavi z običajno možnostjo sedeža
Preprečite poškodbe na Yamahinem skuterju NMAX s ščitnikom oklepa pred praskami – parom ščitnikov, ki omogočata enostavno namestitev in preprečujeta praske na oklepu.
description.en: Avoid damage to your Yamaha NMAX with the Fairing Scratch Protector - a pair of easy-to-install protectors that prevent scratches to your cowling.
All GYTR® parts are precision machined from aerospace-quality aluminium alloys with a unique hard coating.
description.sl-SI: Vsi deli GYTR® so natančno strojno obdelani iz aluminijevih zlitin letalske kakovosti z edinstveno trdo prevleko

name.sl-SI: Kratka majica Paddock Blue Essentials za moške

description.en: Simple and eye-catching, the Paddock Blue Essentials Men’s T-Shirt is a must for every Yamaha fan’s wardrobe. Made from 100% cotton for a consistent soft feel, this tee’s regular fit and crew neck ensure a comfortable fit for any wearer. Printed Yamaha chest and arm branding give an iconic paddock style.
description.sl-SI: Preprosta in privlačna kratka majica Paddock Blue Essentials za moške je nepogrešljiva v garderobi vsakega Yamahinega navdušenca. Izdelana je iz 100-odstotnega bombaža za mehek občutek, sešita je v običajnem kroju in ima okrogli izrez, kar zagotavlja udobno prileganje. Yamahina logotipa na prsih in rokavu poskrbita za ikonski dirkaški slog.

description.en: The Accessory Power Lead Kit wires your preferred accessories to the unit’s five pre-wired switched 12vdc power couplers which are located under the dash of all Wolverine models.
description.sl-SI: Komplet Accessory Power Lead poveže vaše priljubljene dodatke na eno od pet spojk, ki so povezane na enosmerni tok napetosti 12 V, ki se nahajajo pod armaturno ploščo na vseh modelih Wolverine.
Ohranite svojo Yamaho NMAX 'nedotaknjeno' z zaščito konzole, naborom trdih nalepk, ki ščitijo konzolo pred praskami in vašemu skuterju dodajo športni pridih.
description.en: Keep your Yamaha NMAX pristine with the Console Protection, a set of hard-layer stickers that protect the console from scratches and add sporty style to your scooter.

description.en: Complete replacement kit including seal closed KOYO bearings, seals, distance collar and circlip

description.en: Catalytic Convertor to be used for different exhaust systems to fulfil EU4 regulations
description.sl-SI: Katalizator se uporablja za različne izpušne sisteme, da izpolnjujejo predpise EU4.

name.sl-SI: Notranja torba za stranska kovčka City

description.en: Inner bag set fitting luggage in the City Side cases
description.sl-SI: Komplet notranjih torb, ki se prilegajo stranskim kovčkom City

description.en: Two zinc D-rings can be easily connected to a suitable lifting mechanism.
description.sl-SI: Obroča v obliki črke D iz cinka je mogoče preprosto pritrditi na primeren dvižni mehanizem.

description.en: The bracket allows mounting of optional fog lights below the main headlight.
description.sl-SI: Nosilec omogoča namestitev dodatnih meglenk pod glavni žaromet.

description.en: Yamaha also takes our young and small water fanatics' safety into consideration. Our Yamaha Lifestyle 100N can ensure our kids' safety while having fun on the water. The bright orange colour featuring the retro-reflecting tapes can be seen clearly on the water and from the shore.
description.sl-SI: Yamaha poskrbi tudi za varnost svojih mladih in majhnih vodnih navdušencev. Rešilni jopič Yamaha 100N zagotavlja varnost otrok med zabavnimi aktivnostmi v vodi. Svetlo oranžno barvo z retro-odsevnimi trakovi lahko vidite tako iz vode, kot tudi z obale.

Z elegantnim paketom 'Street' stilsko dopolnite videz svojega motornega kolesa XSR900. Paket poskrbi za vrhunski končni izgled, s katerim se vaš XSR prelevi v kultno urbano motorno kolo. Sprednji del polepšajte s športnim vizirjem za nadzorno ploščo z zračnikom, ščitnikom žarometa in črnim aluminijastim sprednjim blatnikom. Izboljšajte oprijem na rezervoarju s kolenskimi blazinicami za gladko vožnjo skozi zavoje in vrhunski nadzor ter z nosilcem registrske tablice pričarajte čist in še bolj športen videz zadnjega dela.
description.en: Providing your XSR900 with an extra sleek look is easy with the stylish Street Pack. The pack ensures an extra premium finish that easily customizes your XSR into an urban hero. Style the front end with the sporty air-vented cockpit visor, headlight guard and black aluminum front fender. Increase your grip on the tank with the knee grips pads for those faster corners and ultimate riding control while the license plate holder cleans up the rear end with an even sportier look.

description.sl-SI: S svojim drznim in agresivnim videzom je MT-09 prava paša za oči, 'Sport Pack Silver' pa to samo še nadgradi. Nosilec za zaključek krmila in ščitnika členkov zagotavljajo večjo zaščito pred vetrom, hkrati pa prispevajo k agresivnemu videzu sprednjega dela MT-09, skupaj z aluminijastim vizirjem. Na zadnji strani preoblikovan nosilec registrske tablice izboljša drzen profil motornega kolesa. Zaključek zagotavljajo stranske blazinice za oprijem na rezervoarju, ki ne le ščitijo pred praskami, temveč nudijo tudi dodaten oprijem za samozavestno vožnjo v ovinkih.
description.en: With its bold and aggressive design, the MT-09 is already a real head-turner and the Sport Pack Silver takes it even further. The bar end base and knuckle deflectors provide increased wind protection, while also enhancing the aggressive look of the MT-09’s front end alongside the aluminium visor. At the rear, the streamlined licence plate holder enhances the bike’s sharp profile. The finishing touch is provided by the side tank grip pads that not only protect against scratches but also offer extra grip for confident cornering.

Conquer the urban landscape with the Tricity 300 Urban Pack which consists of the most essential accessories to make your ride even more practical. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Osvojite urbano pokrajino s kompletom Tricity 300 'Urban Pack', ki vključuje najbolj bistvene dodatke, s katerimi bo vaša vožnja še bolj praktična. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model Tricity 300.

description.en: Cover to replace the original belt cover for added style.
description.sl-SI: Pokrov, ki nadomešča originalni pokrov jermena za elegantnejši videz.

name.en: GYTR® heavy duty front grab bar

description.en: The “Bull Horn” design helps protect the shocks and radiator while offering a large and secure hand-hold to help manoeuvre the machine in mud.
description.sl-SI: Zasnova v obliki 'rogov' pomaga pri zaščiti amortizerjev in hladilnika, ob tem pa tudi deluje kot veliko in varno držalo, ki pripomore pri manevriranju vozila v blatu.

name.en: GYTR YZ125 High Performance Race Kit
name.sl-SI: Dirkalni komplet za visoke zmogljivosti GYTR® YZ125

description.en: Designed for competitive riders who want to progress quickly through the ranks and make a name for themselves. This state of the art tuning kit comes with everything you need to take your race performance to the next level.
description.sl-SI: Zasnovan za tekmovalce, ki bi radi po lestvici z uvrstitvami hitro napredovali navzgor ter si ustvarili ime. Izvrsten komplet za prilagajanje je opremljen z vsem, kar potrebujete, da svoje tekmovalne uspehe ponesete na novo raven.

description.en: Higher screen to replace standard windscreen, offering improved wind protection for more comfortable touring ride.
These deflectors improve the protection of the knuckle and arm area against wind, as well as give your bike a distinctive look.
description.sl-SI: Ti ščitniki zagotavljajo boljšo zaščito členkov in roke pred vetrom ter dajejo motornemu kolesu značilen videz.

Moška športno-potovalna motoristična jakna, ki je zasnovana za uporabo v vseh letnih časih, je funkcionalen in natančno oblikovan kos za neustrašne raziskovalce. Trpežen zunanji sloj iz poliestra in poliuretana v dveh odtenkih sive barve vsebuje odstranljivo podlogo za prilagodljivo nošenje v spremenljivih vremenskih razmerah. Ščitniki za ramena in komolce nudijo samozavest in brezskrbnost pri vožnji, medtem ko 6 žepov zagotavlja veliko prostora za predmete. Nastavljiv pas in zapestja vam omogočajo, da z lahkoto spremenite prileganje, medtem ko prezračevalne zadrge nudijo odlično zračnost. Za popolno potovalno opravo jo kombinirajte s športno-potovalnimi motorističnimi hlačami in rokavicami.
description.en: Designed to perform in all seasons, the Sport Touring Men’s Riding Jacket is a technical and high-precision item for intrepid explorers. A tough polyester and polyurethane outer in two-tone grey contains a removable lining for adjustable comfort in mixed conditions. Shoulder and elbow protectors offer confidence and peace of mind when riding, while 6 pockets offer substantial space for items. Adjustable waist and wrists allow you to alter the fit with ease, while ventilation zippers offer excellent breathability. Pair with the Sport Touring Riding Pants and Gloves for the perfect road trip outfit.

description.sl-SI: Komplet notranjih torb za stranske kovčke, ki ustrezajo modeloma TOUR in CITY (z zadrgo za spreminjanje velikosti). Komplet leve in desne torbe. Preprosto, ko želite nesti prtljago brez kovčkov.

Ideal for storage and protection from the elements, this cover prolongs the life of your boat.

name.sl-SI: Dežnik kolekcije REVS, ki spreminja barvo

description.sl-SI: Dežnik kolekcije REVS je stilski in privlačen izdelek s trpežno poliestrsko prevleko, ki spreminja barvo pri mokrih oziroma suhih razmerah. Ko je popolnoma suh, je črne barve, ob stiku z dežjem pa se spremeni v rdeče-črn vzorec, s čimer dobite dva sloga v enem in s tem zajamete bistvo REVS. Okvir iz jeklene zlitine in aluminija zagotavlja trdnost v vetru.
description.en: A cool and eye-catching item, the REVS Changing Umbrella features a durable polyester canopy that changes colour between wet and dry conditions. Black when fully dry, it changes to a red-black pattern when rain hits it, giving you a two-in-one style that captures the REVS essence. A steel alloy and aluminium frame ensure strength in the wind.

description.sl-SI:
Pripravite svoj TRACER 9 GT+ na kilometre asfalta s paketom Explorer. Nabor vrhunskih dodatkov za udobje, shranjevanje in zaščito za izboljšane funkcije.

Vsebuje: potovalni vizir, ogrevane udobne sedeže za voznika in sopotnika, nosilec plošče za zgornji kovček, 45-litrski zgornji kovček brez ključa, enoto za zaklepanje zgornjega kovčka brez ključa, ploščo za zgornji kovček, hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček, komplet ključev za cilindrično ključavnico, nosilec meglenk, komplet meglenk LED, ščitnike agregata in zaščito hladilnika.
description.en:
Prepare your TRACER 9 GT+ to face miles of asphalt, with the Explorer Pack. A range of premium comfort, storage and protection accessories for improved functions.

Contains: Touring Screen, Heated Seat for Rider & Passenger,  Top Case Mounting Plate, Keyless Top Case 45L, Keyless Top Case Lock Unit, Top Case Plate, Backrest Top Case, Fog Light Stay, LED Fog Light Kit, Engine Guards and Radiator Guard.
Gives a more unique appearance to the unit
description.sl-SI: Enoti daje še bolj edinstven videz

description.sl-SI: Required kit to make the optional WARN Vantage 3000 winch work when installed.

description.sl-SI: Funkcionalna, dirkalna zložljiva zavorna ročica, ki nadomešča originalno.

name.sl-SI: Vsestranski nosilec na krmilu za MT-07

description.sl-SI: Začnite s prilagajanjem MT-07 z vsestranskim nosilcem. Namestite več dodatkov hkrati in izboljšajte svojo vsakodnevno vožnjo.
description.en: Start your MT-07 customisation with the multi-mount base. Mount multiple accessories at once and enhance your everyday riding.

description.sl-SI: Z Akrapovičevim snemljivim dušilnikom povečajte zmogljivosti ter izboljšajte zvok in slog svoje Yamahe Tricity 300. Izdelan je iz visokokakovostnega, toplotno odpornega nerjavečega jekla in vašemu Tricity-ju doda eleganten pridih.
description.en: Give your Yamaha Tricity 300 a boost of performance, sound and style with the Akrapovič slip-on muffler. Made of high quality, heat resistant stainless steel it adds a stylish touch to your Tricity.

description.sl-SI: Elegantne temne moške avanturistične motoristične hlače so nepogrešljive za pustolovščine v vseh vremenskih razmerah ter zagotavljajo udobje, zaščito in vzdržljivost, kamor koli vas pustolovščina popelje. Hlače so izdelane iz funkcionalne zunanje plasti iz mešanice poliestra, elastana in kozjega usnja, zato imajo vodoodporno membrano Drystar, ki se lahko popolnoma zloži, zaščito stopnje 1 na bokih in kolenih ter ojačana območja nog in sedalnega dela. Velika žepa omogočata shranjevanje nujnih potrebščin, prezračevalne zaplate na stegnih pa zagotavljajo učinkovito zračenje v vročem vremenu. Snemljive naramnice in ramenski pas pomagajo ohranjati hlače v položaju, medtem ko dolga zadrga za pas omogoča združitev z avanturistično motoristično jakno, za učinek vrhunske pustolovske oprave.
description.en: Essential for adventuring in all weathers, the stylish, dark-toned Adventure Men’s Riding Pants offer comfort, protection and durability wherever the adventure takes you. Made with a technical outer layer blend of polyester, elastane and goat leather, the pants feature a waterproof Drystar membrane that can be folded back on itself, level 1 hip and knee for protection, and reinforced leg and seat areas. Cargo pockets let you carry essential items, while thigh ventilation panels afford good breathability in hot weather. A detachable suspender and shoulder belt help keep the pants in position, while a long waist zip allows them to connect with the Adventure Riding Jacket for the ultimate adventure apparel outfit.

description.sl-SI: Majica s kratkimi rokavi za odrasle (uniseks) posebne izdaje v kolekciji REVS je izdelana iz debelejšega, a mehkega 100% bombažnega džersija ter je nepogrešljiv kos za vsak dan. Zasnovana je z vpadljivo barvno kombinacijo črne, rdeče in bele, ima rebrast ovratnik in raglan rokave ter zagotavlja udobje za vse velikosti. Klasični, minimalistični videz v slogu REVS zaokrožuje izvezen napis Yamaha na prsih.
description.en: Made from heavy yet soft 100% cotton jersey, the REVS Adult Unisex Special Edition T-Shirt is an essential everyday item. Designed with a striking tricolor of black, red and white, it features a ribbed collar and raglan sleeves, offering comfort for all sizes. Embroidered Yamaha chest branding finishes off a classic, minimal REVS look.

name.sl-SI: Yamahin komplet z vedrom za pesek

description.en: large opening with scoop to easily retrieve sand/seed. Quick and easy to re-fill for the next round. Lid features lip to keep the rain out. Secure lid for a rattle-free operation. High UV package for extreme durability. Includes all necessary mounting hardware to install on the left or right side. Fits all G29 and DRIVE2 cars.
description.sl-SI: velika odprtina z lopatko za preprosto zajemanje peska/semen. Hitro in preprosto ponovno polnjenje za naslednji krog. Pokrov je opremljen z robom, ki preprečuje vdor dežja. Zaščiten pokrov za uporabo brez ropotanja. Komplet z visoko stopnjo UV-zaščite za izjemno vzdržljivost. Vključuje vso potrebno opremo za namestitev na levo ali desno stran. Primeren za vsa vozila G29 in DRIVE2.

Engineered for comfort, protection and ventilation, the MX Men’s Gloves offer maximum control of your bike. A triple fabric blend features breathable stretch material, with a synthetic padded palm for grip and abrasion. A neoprene and thermoplastic rubber combination on the knuckles offer strong impact protection, with adjustable wrists for refining comfort when the track ruts up.
description.sl-SI: Moške rokavice MX, zasnovane za udobje, zaščito in zračenje, omogočajo maksimalen nadzor nad motornim kolesom. Izdelane so iz mešanice treh tkanin z zračnim raztegljivim materialom in sintetično podlogo na delu dlani za oprijem in hrapavost. Kombinacija neoprenske in termoplastične gume na členkih ponuja dobro zaščito pred udarci, nastavljivi zapestniki pa izboljšajo udobje, ko je čas, da zdrvite po stezi.

description.en: Weatherproof rain jacket constructed from 90% polyester with 10% polyurethane coating. Featuring convenient outside pockets, this packable jacket incorporates reflective areas for safety. Matching pants available.

The ideal pack that allows you to take the XSR700 a bit further on your leisurely travel over the weekend. The pack contains everything you need to go the extra mile.

description.sl-SI:
Izboljšajte svojo vožnjo s paketom 'Sport Pack Black', ki vključuje osnovno dodatno opremo, zasnovano za poudarjanje sloga in funkcionalnosti modela MT-07. Vsestranski nosilec v kombinaciji z elegantnim vetrobranskim steklom daje sprednjemu delu agresiven videz. Ščitniki členkov ne le dopolnjujejo videz, temveč zagotavljajo tudi dodatno zaščito pred vetrom, medtem ko stranske obloge za rezervoar omogočajo boljši oprijem in nadzor. Videz dopolnjuje nosilec registrske tablice, ki na zadnjem delu poskrbi za drzen pridih.

Vsebuje: Večnamenska osnova, vetrobransko steklo, osnova na koncu krmila, zaščita za roke, stranske obloge za rezervoar, nosilec registrske tablice.
description.en:
Elevate your ride with the Sport Pack Black, offering the essential accessories designed to enhance both the style and functionality of your MT-07. The Multi-Mount Base paired with the sleek Fly Screen gives the front end an aggressive edge. Knuckle Deflectors not only complement the look but also provide added wind protection, while the Tank Side Pads ensure improved grip and control. Completing the look, the Licence Plate Holder adds a sharp, bold finish to the rear.

Contains: Multi-Mount Base, Fly Screen, Bar End Base, Knuckle Deflectors, Tank Side Pads, Licence Plate Holder.

name.en: GYTR Handle bar switch kit - Right

description.en: Handle switch kit for right hand side, for Tenere 700 GYTR World Raid
Protects occupants against rain, wind, mud and light trail debris for a more relaxing and comfortable ride.
description.sl-SI: Potnike ščiti pred dežjem, vetrom, blatom in delci s tal za bolj sproščujočo in udobno vožnjo.

description.en: Stylish "Shark fin" rear sprocket guard to enhance the looks of your Yamaha.
description.sl-SI: Eleganten ščitnik zadnjega zobnika v obliki plavuti morskega psa poskrbi za še lepši videz vaše Yamahe.

description.en: Complete replacement kit including seal closed KOYO bearings, seals, distance collar and circlip

description.en: Stylish protectors to protect the clutch and brake levers.
description.sl-SI: Moderni ščitniki za zaščito ročic za sklopko in zavoro.
Za tople roke med vožnjo v mrzlem vremenu izberite grelce ročk. Ta par električno ogrevanih ročk nadomešča standardne ročke Yamaha XMAX za ogrevanje na zahtevo, skozi vse leto.
description.en: Choose the Grip Heaters for warm hands in cold riding conditions. This pair of electrically heated hand grips replaces the standard Yamaha XMAX scooter grips for heat on demand, all year round.

description.sl-SI: Pomembno je samo dirkanje.
description.en: When racing is all that matters.

name.sl-SI: Čistilo za čelade in vizirje Yamalube®

description.en: The residues from dust, dirt and countless insects are the penalty we pay for our riding enjoyment – and not just on our helmets and visors, but on headlights, windscreens and body parts too! These residues can be a visibility and safety issue as well as detracting from the visual appeal of our machines. This special cleaner solves the problem quickly – keep it in your backpack!
description.sl-SI: Ostanki prahu, umazanija in nešteto žuželk – ne samo na čeladah in vizirjih, ampak tudi na žarometih, vetrnih ščitih in delih telesa – so cena, ki jo plačujemo za naš užitek v vožnji. Omenjeni ostanki lahko otežijo vidljivost in predstavljajo varnostno tveganje, poleg tega pa negativno vplivajo na videz naših vozil. To posebno čistilo omenjene težave hitro reši – pospravite ga kar v nahrbtnik!

name.en: Ténéré 700 World Raid Öhlins Cartridge Kit FKA116
name.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins FKA116 za Ténéré 700 World Raid

description.en: With over 45 years’ experience in motorcycle suspension design, Öhlins is recognized as a leader in its field. The World Raid’s 43mm KYB front forks are already amongst the best in class – and now you can upgrade your Yamaha to full Rally Raid specification with the addition of the Öhlins Cartridge Kit FKA116.
description.sl-SI: Öhlins ima več kot 45 let izkušenj z oblikovanjem vzmetenja za motorna kolesa, zato je priznan kot vodilni na tem področju. Sprednje vilice 43mm KYB za World Raid so že med najboljšimi v razredu – in zdaj lahko nadgradite svojo Yamaho na celotno specifikacijo Rally Raid s kompletom vložkov Öhlins FKA116.

description.en: Yamaha Kodiak ATV high performance Rugged Seat Cover, designed to protect your seat in any condition. Whether you are tackling rough trails or using your ATV for work, this seat cover ensures a secure fit with its reinforced elastic base and offers a comfortable riding experience.
Those who want to go for a scrambler look, this high-quality aluminium front number plate adds just that to your XSR.
description.sl-SI: Ta kakovostna aluminijasta sprednja ploščica s številko bo na vašem modelu XSR poskrbela za videz urbanega bojevnika.

description.en: Keep your outboard engine protected from dirt and scratches when the boat is docking at the harbor or during winter storage. Made of heavy duty outside material with advanced coating technology that assures maximum water resistance, UV protection and breath-ability. The soft inner felt lining avoids scratches during fitting and transportation while the Twin Rope Cleat  and elasticized hem keeps the cover in place.
Durable protection for tight approaches, high stumps or rocks on the trail.

name.sl-SI: Yamaha WorldSBK Official Team Replica Sweater Moški
name.en: Yamaha WorldSBK Official Team Replica Sweater Men

description.sl-SI: Moški replika pulover, ki je nepogrešljiv izdelek za ljubitelje uradne ekipe Yamaha WorldSBK, je vsestranski in udoben na dirkališču ali doma. Narejen je iz mešanice bombaža in poliestra v ikonični modri barvi Paddock, ima tri sprednje žepe in tesno prilegajočo se kapuco za toploto v hladnem vremenu. Natisnjeni logotipi sponzorjev odlično posnemajo ekipna oblačila in prikazujejo osupljivo belo blagovno znamko Yamaha Racing na prsih, desni roki in hrbtu za klasičen videz Yamaha Racing.
description.en: A must-have racing item for fans of the Yamaha WorldSBK Official Team, the Men’s Replica Sweater is versatile and comfortable at the race track or home. Made from a blend of cotton and polyester in iconic Paddock Blue, it features three front pockets and a tight-fitting lined hood for warmth in cold weather. Printed sponsor and sponsor logos replicate the teamwear perfectly, showing striking white Yamaha Racing branding on the chest, right arm and back for a classic Yamaha Racing look.

description.sl-SI: Bombažna kapa za odrasle kolekcije REVS, ki ščiti oči pred soncem v stilu, je zasnovana za neprekosljivo udobje, kjer koli ste. Sešita je iz šestih šestin ter je črne barve z belimi črtastimi vstavki in vpadljivim ščitnikom v kontrastni rdeči barvi. Nastavljiva kovinska sponka omogoča udobno prileganje za različne velikosti, medtem ko notranji trak in luknje za dihanje poskrbijo za dodatno uporabnost v toplih pogojih. Izvezeni napis Yamaha na sprednji strani kape je pika na i sloga REVS.
description.en: Keeping the sun out of your eyes with fashion, the cotton REVS Adult’s Cap is designed for absolute comfort wherever you go. This 6-panel is black with white stripe inserts highlight and a striking sandwich contrast red peak. An adjustable metal clip allows a comfortable fit for different sizes, while an inner sweatband and breathing holes add extra usability in warm conditions. Embroidered Yamaha branding on the front finishes off the cap in REVS style.

Izdelana je iz bombaža in poliestra z raglan rokavi v kontrastni barvi, okroglim izrezom in Yamahinimi logotipi na več mestih ter je tako preprosto in uporabno oblačilo za vsakdan.

description.sl-SI: Ta opora za prikolico, ki je zasnovana tako, da omogoča prevoz vašega čolna in motorja po avtocesti, preprečuje, da bi se motor vrnil v navpičen položaj in morebiten stik s cestiščem.

ÖHLINS YA818 rear shock for Ténéré 700
description.sl-SI: Zadnji blažilnik Ohlins T7 YA818
S ščitnikom žarometa za Ténéré 700 zaščitite sprednjo luč pred kamenčki, delci in umazanijo. Robusten zaščitni pripomoček s stilom in funkcijo.
description.en: Keep gravel, debris and dirt off your Ténéré 700 light with the Headlight Guard. A sturdy protective accessory with style and function.

description.sl-SI: Vozite se in raziskujte udobno in zaščiteno z moško motoristično jakno za skuter. Ta popolnoma nepremočljiva jakna, zasnovana v kombinaciji modre in sive barve, ponuja zaščito za ramena in komolce 2. stopnje, odstranljivo toplotno podlogo in ovratnik z neoprensko plastjo, s čimer poskrbi za brezskrbnost in toploto v vseh vremenskih razmerah. Snemljiva kapuca ponuja nastavljivo udobje s trakovi za prilagoditev prileganja rokava. Prezračevanje na rokavih in hrbtnem delu vas hladi v toplem vremenu. Za popolno opravo v videzu urbane mobilnosti se lahko jakna kombinira tudi z Yamahinimi motorističnimi hlačami za skuter in motorističnimi rokavicami.
description.en: Commute and explore with comfort and protection in the Scooter Men’s Riding Jacket. Designed in a slick blue-grey colour combo, this fully waterproof jacket offers level 2 shoulder and elbow protection, a removable thermo lining and neoprene-lined collar for both peace of mind and warmth in all weathers. A detachable hood offers adjustable comfort, with straps to adjust the arm fit. Ventilation on the arms and back keep you cool in warm weather. The jacket also pairs with Yamaha Scooter Riding Pants and Riding Gloves for the complete urban mobility outfit.
Safety guard for the standard and optional Billet Front Brake Lever.
description.sl-SI: Ščitnik za standardno in dodatno kovinsko ročico sprednje zavore.

description.en: Improved durable protection during tight approaches and during high stumps or from rocks on the trail.

description.en: Fine-tune how power is delivered in different terrains and conditions by upgrading your Wolverine RMAX 1000 with this illuminated D-Mode switch. Sport Mode provides the most exciting experience, while Trail Mode smooths out the ride for greater comfort and Crawl Mode transfers the power to the ground with maximum efficiency - for optimal traction.
description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj Wolverine RMAX 1000 s tem osvetljenim stikalom D-Mode in določite fine nastavitve podajanja moči na različnih terenih in v različnih pogojih. Način Sport zagotavlja najvznemirljivejšo izkušnjo, način Trail ublaži vožnjo za več udobja, način Crawl pa prenaša moč na tla z najvišjo stopnjo učinkovitosti – za najboljši oprijem.

Elegantna kapa za odrasle kolekcije TMAX, izdelana iz prijetnega 100% bombaža, ima nastavljiv trak, prezračevalne luknje in notranji trak za vpijanje znoja za enostavno nošenje kjer koli. 3D-logotip TMAX na sprednji strani je dopolnjen z natisnjenim napisom Yamaha na ščitniku. Ščitnik z obrobo v kontrastni barvi pa zaokroži celotno podobo te minimalistične in privlačne kape.
description.en: Made from 100% cotton to ensure comfort, the stylish TMAX Adult’s Cap features an adjustable strap, ventilation holes and an inner sweatband for easy wear wherever you are. 3D TMAX branding on the front is highlighted with printed Yamaha branding on the peak. A colour contrast sandwich peak gives the finishing touch to a minimal and striking cap.

description.sl-SI: S sedežem za udobje voznika si zagotovite pridih razkošja pri vožnji na dolge razdalje. Ekskluzivno zasnovano za slog motornega kolesa TRACER 9.

The MT-07 with its radical design grabs eyeballs for all the right reasons. 
With the Sport Pack, we want to give you that extra edge to make your motorcycle more you. 
The fly screen gives the front an unmistakably strong look, while the sequential blinkers carry the theme forward. 
The sleek license plate holder sharpens up the rear and finally, the side tank pad set not only protects the tank from scratches, but also gives that extra grip when attacking corners.

description.en: The MT-09 invented the Hyper Naked category. The breath-taking combination of its high torque CP3 engine and a dynamic sports chassis is designed to get your adrenaline pumping. And since day one it’s been the bike of choice for every rider who appreciates what real motorcycling is all about. In standard trim it’s the most impressive bike in the class – but when you want to take the aggressive looks to the next level the Sport Pack is surely the way to go.
description.sl-SI: Model MT-09 je izumil kategorijo Hyper Naked. Dih jemajoča kombinacija visokega navora agregata CP3 in dinamične športne šasije je zasnovana tako, da vam požene adrenalin. In že od prvega dne je bil ta motocikel prva izbira vsakega voznika, ki ceni bistvo pravega motociklizma. V različici z osnovno opremo je najbolj impresiven motocikel v svojem razredu – če pa želite agresiven videz dvigniti na naslednjo raven, pa je Sport Pack zagotovo prava izbira.

description.sl-SI: Replika moške polo majice Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team je prefinjen izdelek, ki je zasnovan v dirkaškem duhu. Črn trup je poudarjen z dirkaško modrimi rokami, oblikovanimi po vzoru stroja YZ450FM, z belimi črtami na hrbtu in straneh. Posebej izdelan ovratnik z gumbom zagotavlja udobno prileganje, z izvezenima blagovnima znamkama Yamaha Racing in Monster Energy® pa je prava klasika na stezi.
description.en: A smart-casual essential for race days, the Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team Men’s Replica Polo Shirt is a sophisticated item designed with racing spirit. A black torso is highlighted with racing blue arms styled on the YZ450FM machine, with white stripe details on the back and sides. A specially engineered button closure collar ensures a comfort fit, with embroidered Yamaha Racing and Monster Energy® branding for a true pit lane classic.

description.en: Stem Mount lets you mount your smartphone to your Supersports motorcycle in seconds. Just screw this sleek aluminum mount into the stem of your motorbike and you can easily mount the Yamaha phone case or SP ConnectTM compatible devices, by placing it on the mount and turning it 90 clockwise.
description.sl-SI: Z nosilcem Stem lahko namestite svoj pametni telefon na superšportni motocikel v nekaj sekundah. Le privijte tanek aluminijasti nosilec na krmilo motocikla in z lahkoto lahko namestite ovitek na telefon SP Connect TM tako, da ga položite na nosilec in zavrtite za 90° v smeri urinega kazalca. Vaš telefon je varno pritrjen v vašem vidnem polju.

description.en: This additional bolt-on skid plate offers superior protection from rocks, roots, and trail debris. Integrated mounting points provide simple installation as it was designed to keep your service access points accessible.
description.sl-SI: Ta dodatna ščitna plošča za enostavno namestitev poskrbi za vrhunsko zaščito pred kamni, koreninami in drugimi ovirami na stezi. Integrirana pritrdišča omogočajo preprosto namestitev, saj je oblika zasnovana tako, da so vse servisne točke dostopne.
Ščitnika za roke s smernikom dopolnjujeta agresiven videz motorja MT-10, zato sta nujen dodatek, ki zagotavlja popolno ravnovesje med slogom, zaščito, udobjem in funkcionalnostjo.
description.en: Complementing the aggressive look of the MT-10, the new blinker handguards are a must-have, providing perfect balance between style, protection, comfort and functionality.

name.en: Ténéré 700 World Raid Explorer Pack Black
name.sl-SI: Paket Explorer za model Ténéré 700 World Raid

description.en: Ténéré 700 World Raid is built to fill your life with new horizons and that's why the Explorer Pack contains carefully selected accessories to support this journey of discovery.
description.sl-SI: Ténéré 700 World Raid je zasnovan, da vaše življenje zapolni z novimi obzorji, zato paket Explorer vsebuje skrbno izbrane dodatke za to potovanje do novih spoznanj.

Vrhunska večnamenska mast, ki združuje prednosti litija in kalcija, ki sta pomešana v visokorafiniranem baznem olju. To visokokakovostno formulo so razvili, striktno testirali in odobrili inženirji družbe Yamaha Motor.
description.en: Premium multi-purpose grease which combines the advantages of both lithium and calcium, dispersed in highly refined base oils.This high quality formulation has been developed, rigorously tested and approved by Yamaha Motor engineers.

description.sl-SI: Stranske obloge za oprijem so trpežne in zasnovane za vrhunski oprijem, s čimer zagotavljajo boljši nadzor nad motornim kolesom in zaščitijo stranske pokrove pred praskami. Preprosto se namestijo in prinašajo zagotovljeno korist motornemu kolesu Ténéré 700.
description.en: Durable and designed for supreme grip, the Side Grip Pads offer better bike control and protect side panels from scratches. Easy to apply and guaranteed to benefit your Ténéré 700.

Upgrade your Side-by-Side with the Hard Cabin Pack for the Wolverine® RMAX™2 1000. Pack includes: Front Glass Windshield with Wiper, Rear Sliding Glass Window, Hard Cabin Front Doors and Cabin Heating Kit.
description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj model Side-by-Side s paketom za trdo kabino za model Wolverine® RMAX™2 1000. Paket vključuje: sprednje vetrobransko steklo z brisalcem, drsno stekleno zadnje okno, trda sprednja vrata in komplet za ogrevanje kabine.

description.en: Featuring lateral ribs to prevent you sliding when accelerating, this seat cover features a blue/black MX factory racing finish.
description.sl-SI: Ta prevleka za sedež, ki je ob straneh narebrena, da prepreči zdrs med pospeševanjem, je prevlečena z modro/črno tovarniško dirkaško prevleko MX.

name.sl-SI: Komplet pokrovov za jermen GB Racing za model R1
name.en: GB Racing Generator Alternator Cover for R1 2015 >

description.sl-SI: Zaščita agregata GB Racing za primer trčenja ali padca motornega kolesa.
description.en: GB Racing engine protection in case of crash or bike drop.
Ohlins TMAX rear shock STX46.
description.sl-SI: Zadnji blažilnik Ohlins TMAX STX46

description.en: Increases durability of clutch components
description.sl-SI: Izboljša trpežnost sestavnih delov sklopke

description.en: Protection pad for the fuel tank, in textured carbon look.
description.sl-SI: Zaščitna blazinica za rezervoar s karbonskim videzom.

description.en: Race-inspired kit containing high-quality finished, components to protect the front axle ends in case your Yamaha is accidentally dropped.
description.sl-SI: Dirkalni komplet s kakovostnimi površinsko obdelanimi komponentami za zaščito koncev sprednje osovine, če vaša Yamaha po nesreči pade.
S ščitnikom vpetja zaščitite zadnje vzmetenje modela Ténéré 700 pred delci in praskami. Doda slog in funkcionalnost za pustolovsko vožnjo.
description.en: Keep your Ténéré 700 rear suspension protected from debris and scratches with the Linkage Guard. Adds style and function for adventure riding.

name.sl-SI: Kratka majica Paddock Blue Essentials za ženske

description.en: Simple and striking, the Paddock Blue Essentials Women’s T-Shirt is an essential item for every Yamaha fan’s wardrobe. Made from 100% cotton for a soft feel, this tee’s relaxed fit and V-neck ensure a comfy fit for all wearers. Printed Yamaha chest and arm branding complete a classic racing blue Yamaha look.
description.sl-SI: Preprosta in očarljiva kratka majica Paddock Blue Essentials za ženske je nepogrešljiv kos v garderobi vsake ljubiteljice Yamahe. Izdelana je iz 100-odstotnega bombaža za mehek občutek, ohlapen kroj majice in V-izrez pa zagotavljata udobno prileganje vsem uporabnicam. Natisnjena Yamahina logotipa na prsih in rokavu izpopolnjujeta klasični Yamahin dirkaški videz v modrem.

description.en: With its compact dimensions and the excellent fuel efficiency the NMAX thrives in the hustle and bustle of the urban environment. To ensure space and comfort, the Urban pack offers the best experience for riding in those built-up areas. The high screen provides robust protection against wind, while it remains resistant to scratches and impact damage thanks to its hard-coated polycarbonate design. The 39L top case offers all the extra space you need and rests on a beautiful piece of alloy rear carrier, with its integrated design and rigorous testing guaranteeing year-after-year security and peace of mind while riding. The lockset for the top case comes included in the pack, while the back rest provides the rear passenger with optimum comfort. The Urban pack will make the NMAX your best friend in the city. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your NMAX.
description.sl-SI: S kompaktnimi dimenzijami in odličnim izkoristkom goriva je model NMAX popolna izbira za uporabo v vrvežu urbanega okolja. Paket Urban zagotavlja dovolj prostora in udobja, zato omogoča kar najboljšo vožnjo po gosto pozidanih območjih. Visok vizir zagotavlja zanesljivo zaščito pred vetrom, zaradi polikarbonatne zasnove s trdo prevleko pa je odporen tudi na praske in poškodbe ob trku. 39-litrski zgornji kovček poskrbi za dodaten prostor, nameščen pa je na čudovitem zadnjem nosilcu iz zlitine. Z integrirano zasnovo in po izvedbi izjemno strogih testov zagotavlja varnost in brezskrbnost med vožnjo. Komplet ključavnice za zgornji kovček je priložen, naslon sedeža pa potniku zadaj omogoča optimalno udobje. S paketom Urban bo model NMAX postal vaš najboljši prijatelj za vožnjo po mestu. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model NMAX.

description.en: Light weight Sporty license plate holder to replace the original, to clean up the looks of your XSR to a more sportive finish.
description.sl-SI: Lahek športen nosilec registrske tablice za zamenjavo originala za bolj športen končni videz modela XSR.

Opremite svoje motorno kolo TRACER 7 s kompletom 'Urban Pack' za vrhunsko mestno udobje. Nosilec zgornjega kovčka in zgornji kovček zagotavljata dovolj prostora za shranjevanje, medtem ko naslonjalo za potnika poskrbi za udobje. S kompletom 'Urban Pack', ki je dopolnjen z visokim vizirjem za dodatno zaščito pred vetrom, nadgradite mestno vožnjo s praktičnostjo in slogom.
description.en: Equip your TRACER 7 with the Urban Pack for ultimate city convenience. The Top Case Carrier and Top Case provide ample storage, while the Backrest adds comfort for your passenger. Completed with a High Screen for added wind protection, the Urban Pack enhances your urban ride with practicality and style.
GYTR Pinion gear for GYTR Gear box

description.sl-SI: Z univerzalnim ovitkom za telefon lahko uporabite vsak pametni telefon (največja velikost telefona je navedena spodaj) na kateri koli SP Connect™.  Namestite, da bi lahko z vrtljivim zaklepnim mehanizmom svoj telefon varno pritrdili na kolo, v avtomobil, na vozilo za golf itd. Preprosto potisnite pametni telefon v ovitek, zavihajte odprtino in zaprite zavihek. Tako bo vaš telefon zaščiten pred dežjem, znojem, blatom in prahom, uporabnost zaslona na dozik pa ostane enaka.
description.en: With the Universal phone case, you can use just about any smartphone (max phone size indicated) on any of the mounts to secure your phone to your motorcycle or scooter. With its twist-lock mechanism to install. Simply push the smartphone into the case and roll up the opening and close the tab. This way your phone remains protected from rain, sweat, mud, and dust, still offering the same touchscreen usability.​

name.sl-SI: Športna kapa Paddock Blue za odrasle

description.en: Simple and stylish, the Paddock Blue Team Cap is a classic addition to every Yamaha fan’s collection. Made from 100% cotton, the cap is one size fits all and presented in racing blue with a colour contrast peak. Breathing holes allow ventilation, with an adjustable strap for comfort. Printed Yamaha branding on the front and sides ensures an iconic style.
description.sl-SI: Preprosto in stilsko športno kapo Paddock Blue si lahko nadene prav vsak navdušenec za klasičen dodatek Yamahini kolekciji. Izdelana je iz 100-odstotnega bombaža, na voljo je v univerzalni velikosti in je obarvana v dirkaško modro s kontrastno barvo na vrhu. Odprtine omogočajo zračenje, nastavljiv trak pa udobje. Natisnjeni Yamahini logotipi spredaj in na strani zagotavljajo ikonski slog.

name.sl-SI: Komplet za podaljševanje podstavka stranskega stojala

description.en: Kit that enables to extend the base of the original side stand
description.sl-SI: Komplet, ki omogoča podaljševanje podstavka originalnega stranskega stojala

description.en: This cover set provides superior impact and wear protection of engine.

description.en: Finishing Grommet for mechanical steering cable use up to 177 mm.

name.sl-SI: Lahki dušilnik Akrapovič za Tricity 300 iz titana

description.en: Street legal Akrapovič muffler to improve performance, sound and looks of your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Dušilnik Akrapovič, primeren za cestno vožnjo, za boljše zmogljivosti, zvok in videz vašega vozila Tricity 300.

description.en: Plugs to customise your accessory footpegs
description.sl-SI: Vtič za prilagajanje dodatnih stopalk

Omogočite naslednji generaciji idealen začetek, da postane ljubitelj Yamahe, z darilnim paketom za dojenčke kolekcije REVS. Komplet pižame z mešanico bombaža in elastana ter kratkimi hlačami s potiski "First Ride" je izjemno mehak za udoben spanec. Noge malčka greje par nogavic iz bombaža, poliestra in elastana.
description.en: Give the next generation the ideal start to becoming a Yamaha fan with the REVS Baby Giftpack. Featuring a cotton-elastane blended pyjama top and shorts with ‘First Ride’ prints, the pyjama set is extremely soft for a comfortable sleep. A pair of cotton, polyester and elastane socks also offer warmth for a toddler’s feet.

description.sl-SI: Kapa za odrasle Jonathan Rea je nepogrešljiva za sončne dni dirkanja in je obvezna oprema za ljubitelje šestkratnega prvaka. 100-odstotni bombaž v modri barvi Paddock Blue, kapa unisex z ukrivljenim črnim vrhom, mrežastim zadnjim delom, nastavljivim trakom in prezračevalnimi odprtinami za celodnevno udobje.  Videz dopolnjujeta izvezena napisa "65" na sprednji strani in "JR" na zadnji strani. Natisnjeni logotipi Yamaha zaključujejo podrobnosti, ki jih v svoji zbirki potrebuje vsak Jonnyjev navijač!
description.en: Essential for sunny race days, the Jonathan Rea Adults Cap is a must-have accessory for fans of the 6-time Champion. 100% cotton in Paddock Blue, the unisex cap features a curved black peak, mesh back, adjustable strap and ventilation holes for day-long comfort.  The look is completed with an embroidered ‘65’ on the front and ‘JR’ on the back. Printed Yamaha logos on finish off the detailing that every Jonny fan needs in their collection!

Make sure your watercraft stays in optimal shape during winter storage and transportation.
The pack includes the following accessories: 
YMEVXC010000 VX COVER WAVERUNNER: Protects your Power Water Vehicle from scratches during storage and transportation. 
YMEYEC09EU20 YEC-9 CHARGER EU SPEC: Keeps your battery in optimal condition during longer storage. 
MWVFLUSHHSBL REPLACEMENT FLUSH HOSE BLUE: Needed to flush your engine after usage of the WaveRunner.
description.sl-SI:
Poskrbite, da bo vaše plovilo med zimskim skladiščenjem in prevozom ostalo v optimalnem stanju.
Paket vključuje naslednje dodatke: 
YMEVXC010000 - VX POKRIVALO WAVERUNNER: Ščiti vaš vodni skuter pred praskami med skladiščenjem in prevozom. 
YMEYEC09EU20 - YEC-9 POLNILNIK, EU SPECIFIKACIJA: Ohranja baterijo v optimalnem stanju med daljšim shranjevanjem. 
MWVFLUSHHSBL - NADOMESTNA CEV ZA SPIRANJE, MODRA: Potrebna za spiranje motorja po uporabi WaveRunner-ja.

Izboljšajte svoj TRACER 7 s športnim paketom. Zaporedni smerniki LED izboljšajo vidljivost in slog, sistem za hitro prestavljanje CP2 pa zagotavlja gladko in hitro menjavo prestav. Dopolnite videz s poenostavljenim nosilcem registrske tablice.
description.en: Elevate your TRACER 7 with the Sport Pack. Sequential LED Blinkers enhance visibility and style, while the Quick Shifter CP2 ensures smooth, fast gear changes. Complete the look with the streamlined License Plate Holder.
Grille designed to reduce the risk of damage to the radiator by debris and small objects. Styled to match the timeless XSR700.

Attractive knee grip with Sport Heritage look.
Product not compatible with matte finish XSR900.

description.en: This stylish handle mount base reinforces the good looks of your bike and allows you to further customize it.
description.sl-SI: Ta elegantni nosilec za pritrditev na krmilo prinaša še privlačnejši videz motornega kolesa in vam omogoča, da ga še dodatno prilagodite.

description.en: The WaveRunner Storage Pack mounts with a self-adhesive hook-and-loop fastener above the floor in a storage compartment so it won't be submersed if any water inadvertently gets in the compartment. Easy to remove when you get back to shore. Fits all WaveRunner models.
description.sl-SI: Torba za shranjevanje za WaveRunner se pritrdi na ježka nad tlemi v prostoru za shranjevanje, zato se ne potopi, če v prostor vstopi voda. Ko se vrnete na obalo, jo lahko preprosto odstranite. Primerna za vse modele vodnih skuterjev WaveRunner.

description.en: Protects intake from dust and / or after intrusion during cleaning of the bike.
description.sl-SI: Varuje vsesani zrak pred prahom in/ali po vdoru med čiščenjem motorja.Prilega se na: WR250F 03-14WR450F 03-15
Zadnji blažilnik izboljšuje vodljivost, stabilnost in zavijanje, da bo vaša vožnja še boljša in samozavestnejša.
description.en: This rear shock gives you improved handling, stability and cornering which improves overall performance and rider confidence.
Durable fork gaitors contribute to the classic scrambler look of your XSR.
description.sl-SI: Trpežna zaščita za vilice, ki vašemu modelu XSR zagotavlja videz klasičnega bojevnika.

description.en: Durable protection for tight approaches, high stumps, rocks and other trail debris.
description.sl-SI: Trpežna zaščita za vožnjo po ozkih območjih, visokih štorih, kamenju in drugih ovirah na poti.
Velik kakovosten kovček za več prostora za prtljago/shranjevanje in posebej oblikovan za dolga potovanja.
description.en: Large high-quality top case for extra luggage/storage capacity and specifically designed for long-distance journeys.

Evoke the soul of the Dark Side of Japan, with the Sport Pack for the MT-10. 
Created to give you a full on immersive experience with your MT-10, the Sport Pack will catch your attention, while the Genuine accessories give your bike the sharp look.
Akrapovič exhaust takes the already attractive exhaust note and turns into aural delight. Did we mention the clean looks, increase in performance and the reduction in weight? Well those can also be attributed to the exhaust!
description.sl-SI:
S kompletom Sport Pack za vozilo MT-10 prebudite temno plat Japonske. 
Komplet Sport Pack je bil ustvarjen za zagotavljanje popolne vozne izkušnje z vašim modelom MT-10 in bo pritegnil vašo pozornost, originalna dodatna oprema pa bo poskrbela za agresiven videz vozila.
Akrapovičev izpuh pa že tako prijeten zvok izpuha ponese na popolnoma novo raven. Ali smo omenili čiste linije, boljšo učinkovitost in manjšo težo? Tudi te značilnosti lahko pripišemo omenjenemu izpuhu.

Vodoodporne in izolirane ženske motoristične rokavice Sport Touring so idealne za vožnjo v hladnem vremenu. Tribarvne rokavice so izdelane iz mešanice kozjega usnja in funkcionalnih materialov, varnost in toploto pa zagotavljata zaščita členkov in izolacija Primaloft. Neoprenski zavihki in deli za prste poskrbijo za odlično prožnost, udobje zapestja v vseh položajih pa omogoča prilagodljivo zapenjanje z ježkom. Za popolno potovalno opravo jih kombinirajte s športno-potovalno motoristično jakno in hlačami.
description.en: Waterproof and insulated, the Sport Touring Women’s Riding Gloves are ideal for cold weather riding. Made from a blend of goat leather and technical materials, the three-tone gloves feature shell knuckle protection and Primaloft insulation for safety and warmth. Neoprene cuffs and finger parts allow excellent flexibility, with Velcro wrist adjustment for changeable comfort. Pair with the Sport Touring Riding Jacket and Pants for the essential touring outfit.

description.sl-SI: Trpežna, zračna in zelo funkcionalna zemeljsko rjava in modra moška jakna kolekcije ATV je kot nalašč za podvige na prostem in terensko vožnjo. Vodoodporna jakna, izdelana iz poliestrske tkanine ripstop Dynax, ima odstranljive rokave in prezračevanje v podlogi in na hrbtu za vrhunsko udobje v toplih ali hladnih podnebjih. Dva notranja in trije zunanji žepi ponujajo prostor za bistvene predmete, z nastavljivimi manšetami za večje udobje vožnje. Odsevni trak na hrbtni strani izboljša vidljivost za dodatno varnost in brezskrbnost na poteh.
description.en: Durable, ventilated and highly functional, the earth brown-blue ATV Men’s Riding Jacket is perfect for outdoor exploits and off-roading. Made from polyester ripstop Dynax fabric, the water-resistant jacket features removable sleeves and ventilation in the liner and on the back for superior comfort in warm or cold climates. Two inner and three outer pockets offer space for essential items, with adjustable cuffs for enhanced riding comfort. Reflective tape on the back improve visibility for extra safety and peace of mind on the trails.
Replacement engine cover for Yamaha eBikes.
description.sl-SI: Nadomestno pokrivalo motorja za e-kolesa Yamaha.

description.en: Keep your outboard engine protected from dirt and scratches when the boat is docking at the harbor or during winter storage. Made of heavy duty outside material with advanced coating technology that assures maximum water resistance, UV protection and breath-ability. The soft inner felt lining avoids scratches during fitting and transportation while the Twin Rope Cleat  and elasticized hem keeps the cover in place.

name.sl-SI: Izpuh "Full System" z dušilnikom v črni barvi

description.en: Enhance the sportiness of your Yamaha!
description.sl-SI: Poudari športnost vaše Yamahe!
Izkusite vrhunsko zaščito svojega Waverunnerja z našimi originalnimi Yamahinimi pokrovi
description.en: Experience ultimate protection for your Waverunner, with our Genuine Yamaha covers

description.sl-SI:
»S potovalnim paketom pripravite svoj TRACER 9 GT na vožnjo po odprtih cestah. Zbirka vrhunskih izdelkov za udobje in shranjevanje za uživanje v vsakem trenutku vožnje. 

Vsebuje: Potovalni vizir, udoben sedež za voznika, udoben sedež za sopotnika, nosilec plošče za zgornji kovček, ploščo za zgornji kovček, 45-litrski zgornji kovček brez ključa, hrbtni naslon za zgornji kovček, komplet ključev za cilindrično ključavnico.«
description.en:
"Get your TRACER 9 GT ready for the open road with the Travel Pack. A collection of premium comfort and storage items for enjoying every moment riding. 

Contains: Touring Screen, Comfort Seat Rider, Comfort Seat Passenger,  Top Case Mounting Plate, Top Case Plate, Keyless Top Case 45L, Backrest Top Case and Key Cylinder Set."
Enhance the coolness of your Yamaha
description.sl-SI: Izboljša odličen videz vaše Yamahe.
Zagotovite maksimalno zaščito svojega motornega kolesa Ténéré 700 z zaščitnimi cevmi Adventure. Varno se prilega okoli rezervoarja, radiatorja in ohišja za varnost na zahtevnih vožnjah.
description.en: Give your Ténéré 700 maximum protection with the Adventure Panel Guard. Fits securely around the tank, radiator and body for safety on rugged rides.

name.sl-SI: Komplet LS3500PRO s predhodno stisnjenimi priključki

description.sl-SI: Hidravlični sistemi za krmiljenje tip LS 3500 PRO. Kompletni kit (standardni sistem vključuje cilindar, črpalka s ključavnico ventilom, vsi priključki, tok za polnjenje in 12m cev)

name.sl-SI: Prevleka za shranjevanje za VX in VX DeLuxe

description.en: Yamaha‘s WaveRunner covers are designed to help protect your watercraft‘s appearance. Each cover features superior construction and materials to help provide long life as well as a custom fit. Features include Vacu-Hold® design, which creates a vacuum inside the cover during transit to draw the cover down snugly to the WaveRunner. Benefits include reduced air-induced stress on the seams, and less aerodynamic drag.
description.sl-SI: Yamahine prevleke za WaveRunner so namenjene za zaščito videza vašega plovila. Vsaka prevleka je natančno zasnovana in izdelana iz materialov, ki zagotavljajo dolgotrajno uporabo in popolno prileganje. Lastnosti prevleke vključujejo tehnologijo VACU-Hold®, ki znotraj prevleke med transportom ustvarja vakuum, da se prevleka lahko tesno prilega WaveRunnerju. Prednosti vključujejo zmanjšano obrabo šivov zaradi ujetega zraka in manjši aerodinamični upor.

description.en: Connector between the cylinder and the optional slip-on muffler.
description.sl-SI: Priključek med valjem in izbirnim dušilnikom.
