name.sl-SI: Yamahini ščitniki za roke za Grizzly

description.sl-SI:
Predstavljamo naše ekskluzivne ščitnike za roke, ki so skrbno izdelani z mislijo na dinamičnega kolesarja. Ti ščitniki so zasnovani za najbolj aktivne navdušence in se ponašajo z ergonomsko zasnovo, ki zagotavlja popolno prileganje. Ne le da zagotavljajo optimalno zaščito pred vetrom, temveč njihov stil zaprte zanke zagotavlja tudi izboljšano zaščito in vzdržljivost pred drobci. Izboljšajte svojo izkušnjo vožnje s popolno kombinacijo sloga in funkcionalnosti
 - še danes izberite naše edinstvene ščitnike za roke!
description.en:
Introducing our exclusive handguards, meticulously crafted with the dynamic rider in focus. Engineered for the most active enthusiasts, these handguards boast ergonomic design to ensure a perfect fit. Not only do they provide optimal wind protection, but their closed loop style also delivers enhanced safeguarding and durability against debris. Elevate your riding experience with the perfect blend of style and functionality
 – choose our unique handguards today!

description.sl-SI: Vozni položaj na motornem kolesu Ténéré 700 lahko preprosto znižate s kompletom za znižanje. Preprost jekleni komplet za povečanje dostopa do tal in prilagajanje vašega udobja.
description.en: Lower your Ténéré 700 riding position easily with the Low Link. A simple steel kit for increasing ground access and tailoring your comfort.

description.sl-SI: Mazivo za verigo Yamalubeje idealno za cestna motorna kolesa, saj formula z visoko stopnjo oprijema ustvarja odporen mazalni film, ki lahko vzdrži ekstremne pritiske. Nepogrešljiv dodatek za daljšo življenjsko dobo verige, vrhunsko zmogljivost in učinkovito porabo goriva. Priročna 56-mililitrska embalaža je priročna na daljših poteh in jo lahko napolnite s 300-mililitrsko pločevinko.
description.en: YamalubeChain Lube is ideal for road motorcycles, with a high-adhesion formula that creates a 'throw-off' resistant lubricating film able to withstand extreme pressures. Essential for longer chain life, peak performance and fuel efficiency. The 56ml Chain Lube is handy for longer rides and is refillable from the 300ml size.

Kit that extends the base of the original Ténéré 700 side stand. Provides larger 'footprint' for stable parking, especially on soft ground. Extra convenient when using the optional Side Cases (sold separately).
description.sl-SI: Komplet, ki razširja podstavek izvirnega stranskega stojala Ténéré 700. Zagotavlja večjo »površino stojala« za stabilno parkiranje, še posebej na mehkih tleh. Izjemno priročen pri uporabi izbirnih stranskih kovčkov (naprodaj posebej).

name.sl-SI: Vodotesna torba na rezervoarju za gorivo

description.en: Rugged adventure tank bag with highly water-resistant zippers and strap attachment.
description.sl-SI: Robustna pustolovska torba na rezervoarju za gorivo z vodoodpornimi zadrgami in pritrditvijo s trakovi.

description.en: Wheels built for champions! Exclusive high performance Kite front wheel like used by Yamaha factory racing teams.
description.sl-SI: Kolesa, izdelana za prvake! Ekskluzivno, visokozmogljivo sprednje kolo Kite, kakršnega uporabljajo v Yamahinih tovarniških dirkalnih ekipah.
Izboljšajte slog in zaščito Yamahinega modela TMAX z zaščito za konzolo – trdimi nalepkami, ki konzolo ščitijo pred praskami, skuterju pa dodajo športni pridih.
description.en: Add style and protection to your Yamaha TMAX with the Console Protection, hard-layer stickers that protect the console from scratches and add a sporty finish to your scooter.

name.sl-SI: Komplet za podaljševanje podstavka stranskega stojala

description.sl-SI: Komplet, ki omogoča podaljšanje podstavka originalnega stranskega stojala.
description.en: Kit that enables the extension of the original side stand base.
Gives a more unique appearance to the unit
description.sl-SI: Enoti daje še bolj edinstven videz

description.en: Weatherproof unisex rain pants with reflective front and back areas. Featuring a comfortable elastic waistband and with handy adjustable straps, these packable pants are designed to be used with the matching rainwear jacket..
description.sl-SI: Uniseks dežne hlače z odsevnimi predeli spredaj in zadaj. Te zložljive hlače z udobnim elastičnim pasom in priročnimi nastavljivimi trakovi so zasnovane za uporabo z ujemajočo se dežno jakno.

name.sl-SI: Ohišje pokrovčka za odtok z O-ringom

description.sl-SI: Ohišje pokrovčka za odtok z O-ringom, nadomestni del
description.en: Float O-Ring Drain Cap Case replacement part

name.sl-SI: Kratka majica Paddock Blue Essentials za oba spola

description.sl-SI: Kratka majica REVS Essentials za oba spola je zasnovana za vse Yamahine navdušence ter omogoča udobno prileganje in privlačno zasnovo. Izdelana je iz 100-odstotnega bombaža za mehek občutek, primerna je za oba spola in ima okrogel izrez, zaradi česar se vsestransko podaja prav vsakomur.
description.en: Designed for every Yamaha fan, the REVS Essentials Unisex T-Shirt offers a comfortable fit and an eye-catching design. Made from 100% cotton for a soft feel, unisex fit and crew neck combine for an all-round fan pleasing garment.
Custom-made glove box organizer specifically designed for the FX Series WaveRunners.
description.sl-SI: Po meri izdelan organizator predala za shranjevanje, posebej zasnovan za vodne skuterje WaveRunner serije FX.

name.sl-SI: Ploščad RecDeck za VX in GP

description.en: VX & GP RecDeck for versatile space to enhance your experience on the water.
description.sl-SI: Ploščad RecDeck za modele VX in GP zagotavlja vsestranski prostor za še boljša doživetja na vodi.

description.en: USB mounting bracket that fits neatly in the XSR900 cockpit. Ideal for mounting a USB charger to always have your phone or navigation charged up as you ride.
description.sl-SI: Vgradni nosilec za USB, ki se lepo prilega nadzorni plošči XSR900. Popolna izbira za namestitev polnilnika USB, da sta lahko vaš telefon ali navigacija vedno napolnjena med vožnjo.

description.en: A simple and staple Yamaha item, the REVS Unisex Essential T-Shirt is a must-have base garment, perfect for regular wear.

Defend yourself and your UMX against mud, water, and debris with this four-piece kit. Designed to integrate perfectly with the hard-work-ready look and feel of the UMX. Kit includes all four (4) overfenders, mounting hardware and detailed installation instructions.

Conquer the urban landscape with the Tricity 300 Urban Pack which consists of the most essential accessories to make your ride even more practical. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Osvojite urbano pokrajino s kompletom Tricity 300 'Urban Pack', ki vključuje najbolj bistvene dodatke, s katerimi bo vaša vožnja še bolj praktična. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model Tricity 300.

description.en:
Make sure your watercraft stays in optimal shape during winter storage and transportation.
The pack includes the following accessories: 
YMEFXC010000 FX CRUISER COVER WAVERUNNER: Protects your Power Water Vehicle from scratches during storage and transportation. 
YMEYEC09EU20 YEC-9 CHARGER EU SPEC: Keeps your battery in optimal condition during longer storage. 
MWVFLUSHHSBL REPLACEMENT FLUSH HOSE BLUE: Needed to flush your engine after usage of the WaveRunner.
description.sl-SI:
Poskrbite, da bo vaše plovilo med zimskim skladiščenjem in prevozom ostalo v optimalnem stanju.
Paket vključuje naslednje dodatke: 
YMEFXC010000 - FX CRUISER POKRIVALO WAVERUNNER: Ščiti vaš vodni skuter pred praskami med skladiščenjem in prevozom. 
YMEYEC09EU20 - YEC-9 POLNILNIK, EU SPECIFIKACIJA: Ohranja baterijo v optimalnem stanju med daljšim shranjevanjem. 
MWVFLUSHHSBL - NADOMESTNA CEV ZA SPIRANJE, MODRA: Potrebna za spiranje motorja po uporabi WaveRunner-ja.

description.en: Quality foot panels for an added stylish look. Anodized Aluminum with rubber pads.
description.sl-SI: Kakovostne plošče stopalk za elegantnejši videz. Anodiziran aluminij z gumijasto oblogo.

description.en: Made from shatter-resistant polycarbonate, the Yamaha Genuine Windshield is 300% more scratch resistant due to hard-coating on both sides.
description.sl-SI: Yamahino originalno vetrobransko steklo iz polikarbonata, ki se ne razbije, je za 300 % bolj odporno na praske zaradi trde prevleke na obeh straneh.

description.en: Keyless racing fuel cap
Kit contents are for a complete set of two levers.
description.sl-SI: Vsebina kompleta je za celoten sklop dveh vzvodov

Komplet platformnih pedalov VICE, ki jih po Yamahinih specifikacijah izdeluje podjetje VP Components, omogoča boljši prenos moči ter večji razpon položajev stopal in telesa za izboljšano stabilnost, kakor tudi večjo zmogljivost pri spuščanju po hribih ali vožnji po stezah. Ti pedali s plosko površino, ki imajo na vsaki strani 12 zatičev za oprijem, omogočajo, da kar najbolje izkoristite model Moro 07. Komplet platformnih pedalov VICE zagotavlja večjo zmogljivost in odlično vzdržljivost, saj ima trpežno aluminijasto ohišje, izdelano s strojem CNC, ter zatesnjene kroglične ležaje in ležaje LSL.
description.en: Manufactured to Yamaha’s specification by VP components, the VICE platform pedal set gives you better power transfer and a greater range of foot and body positions for enhanced stability and stronger performance on the downhill or trail. With a flat surface equipped with 12 replaceable grip pins per side, these pedals enable you to get the most out of your Moro 07. Featuring a durable extruded and CNC machined aluminum body with LSL and sealed ball bearings, the VICE platform pedal set provides increased performance with superb durability.

description.sl-SI: Udoben rešilni jopič z zapiranjem z zadrgo in nastavljivo velikostjo z dvema zaponkama vam daje občutek varnosti na vodi.
description.en: Comfortable zipper closed safety vest with adjustable size due to its 2 buckles, which will give you a safe feeling on the water.

Take your audio experience to the next level with this FX Subwoofer, which delivers a nice punch, enhancing your audio experience. While it quickly connects, via Bluetooth,  to the EcoXGear Speakers, it is powered by the WaveRunner battery.
description.sl-SI: Zagotovite si vrhunsko izkušnjo zvoka z globokotonskim zvočnikom za FX, ki omogoča močne zvočne učinke in izboljšano izkušnjo poslušanja. Z zvočniki EcoXGear se hitro poveže prek Bluetootha, napaja pa ga akumulator skuterja WaveRunner.

name.sl-SI: Stopalke za voznika, iz obdelanega ulitka

description.en: Bolt-on, lightweight and high-strength replacement for the standard rider footpegs, machined from billet aluminium.
description.sl-SI: Lahke, trdne stopalke, izdelane iz obdelanega aluminijevega ulitka, ki jih preprosto privijete in nadomeščajo standardne stopalke za voznika.

name.sl-SI: Ploščica s številko XSR na desnem delu

description.en: These minimalist brushed aluminium side number plates remind you of classic sports bikes and clean up the looks when your carrier bags are not mounted,
description.sl-SI: Ti minimalistični stranski ploščici s številkami iz brušenega aluminija spominjata na klasične športne motorje in ustvarjata čistejši videz, ko nimate nameščenih nosilcev za torbe.
Komplet hidravlične sklopke za zamenjavo originalne mehanske sklopke in za izboljšanje nadzora sklopke.
description.en: Hydraulic clutch kit to replace the original mechanical clutch and to improve clutch control.
Exclusively designed stylish seat replacing the original and providing extra comfort on your journeys
description.sl-SI: Ekskluzivno zasnovan eleganten sedež, ki nadomešča originalnega in vam zagotavlja več udobja na potovanjih

description.en: Debossed MT-07 logo in the screen surface.
description.sl-SI: Vgraviran logotip MT-07 v vizir.

description.en: Robust, technical and striking, the Paddock Blue Backpack has been precisely designed to let you carry essential items with Yamaha style. Made from polyester in Paddock Blue’s staple two-tone blue, this backpack offers 35 litres of storage. Comfortably accommodating a laptop and more in the main compartment, it also carries a welded front pocket for smaller items. Adjustable straps and foam with 3D mesh padding allow comfort for all wearers.
description.sl-SI: Robusten, tehničen in vpadljiv nahrbtnik Paddock Blue smo natančno zasnovali, da vam omogočimo nošenje najnujnejšega v Yamahinem slogu. Nahrbtnik iz poliestra v modri barvi linije Paddock Blue v dveh odtenkih zagotavlja 35 litrov prostora za shranjevanje. V glavni predal lahko varno pospravite prenosni računalnik in drugo, ima pa tudi sprednji žep z varjenimi spoji za manjše predmete. Nastavljive naramnice in pena s 3D-mrežasto oblogo zagotavljajo udobje vsakemu uporabniku.

description.en: GYTR® sticker kit to give your unit the Race replica look.

name.en: GP Series Mooring Cover with RecDeck

description.sl-SI: Ščiti enote in ploščad RecDeck med shranjevanjem in prevozom. Vključuje posodobljeno grafiko "GP Series".
description.en: Protects the units and the RecDeck during storage and transportation. Features updated "GP Series" graphics.

name.sl-SI: Zadnje dvižno stojalo Paddock GYTR – linija STREET/RACE
name.en: GYTR Paddock Stand Rear - STREET/RACE Line

description.en: Lightweight GYTR rear paddock stand from the STREET/RACE line.

name.en: XSR900 GP Racer Pack - Legend Red
name.sl-SI: 'Racer Pack' za XSR900 GP - Legend Red

description.en: If a full fairing is your memory of the 80's, the Racer Pack is the perfect cure for the longing! With a lower fairing matching the unit colours, plus a tinted dark screen, the Racer Pack enhances the XSR 900 GP retro look. The pack also includes a license plate holder to sharpen up the rear and a beautifully crafted Akrapovič exhaust to add to the 80's nostalgia.
description.sl-SI: Če pogrešate 80-a leta, je 'Racer Pack' popolna rešitev za to! S spodnjo oblogo, ki se ujema z barvami enote, in temnim vizirjem bo 'Racer Pack' dopolnil retro videz modela XSR 900 GP. Paket vključuje tudi nosilec registrske tablice za dodaten učinek na zadnjem delu in dovršeno izdelan izpuh Akrapovič, ki dopolnjuje pridih 80-ih.

name.sl-SI: Wolverine® X2 850 – paket za mehko kabino

description.en: Upgrade your Side-by-Side with the Soft Cabin Pack for the Wolverine® X2 850. Pack includes: Fixed Poly Windshield, Soft Cover Rear Window and Soft Side Covers.
description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj model Side-by-Side s paketom za mehko kabino za model Wolverine® X2 850. Paket vključuje: fiksno polikarbonatno vetrobransko steklo, mehko prevleko za zadnje okno in mehke stranske pokrove.

name.en: Soft Side Bag Sport Heritage Inner Bag
name.sl-SI: Notranja torba mehke stranske torbe "Sport Heritage"

description.en: Fitting soft bag to put inside the optional Soft Side Bag Sport Heritage.
description.sl-SI: Mehka torba, ki jo namestite v izbirno mehko stransko torbo "Sport Heritage".

description.en: GYTR Spoke Rear Wheel.

description.sl-SI: Paket TRACER 9 GT 'Travel Pack' vsebuje ustrezne dodatke, ki poskrbijo za večje udobje na dolgih vožnjah. Visok vizir še bolje ščiti pred vetrom in drugimi vplivi ter vozniku zagotavlja prijeten položaj. Udoben sedež poskrbi za večje udobje pri daljšem sedenju, zato je to dobra izbira za dolge vožnje. Zgornji kovček in vsi dodatki, potrebni za namestitev, zagotavljajo neverjeten 45-litrski dodatni prostor za shranjevanje, kamor lahko shranite dve integralni čeladi. Kovček lahko dodatno prilagodite tako, da se barvna plošča ujema z barvo modela TRACER 9 GT.
description.en: For added comfort during long distance Touring, the TRACER 9 GT Travel Pack provides your motorcycle with just the right extra touches. The High Screen deflects even more wind and elements to provide the rider a pleasant protected position. The Comfort Seat is there to increase the comfort of seating for a longer period of time, making it an excellent addition for longer rides. The Top Case and all accessories needed to mount it provide an incredible 45 L extra storage space that can house two full face helmets if needed. The case can also be detailed to perfection with a color plate to match the color of your TRACER 9 GT.
Radiator guard for Ténéré 700 World Raid GYTR

Rain and wind shouldn't stop you from activities, and neither should they affect your riding pleasure and comfort. We developed the Apron, which uses special welding technology, to keep you warm and dry, so you can be more comfortable and safe during harsh weather conditions.
description.sl-SI: Dež in veter ne bi smela biti ovira pri aktivnostih, prav tako pa ne bi smela vplivati na vaš užitek in udobje pri vožnji. Razvili smo zaščito za sprednji del telesa, ki uporablja posebno tehnologijo varjenja, ki vas ščiti pred mrazom in dežjem, da vam bo tudi v težjih vremenskih pogojih udobno in boste ostali varni.

name.sl-SI: Komplet Sport Pack Pro za MT-07

description.sl-SI: Za voznike, ki želijo maksimalno izkoristiti svoje motorno kolo MT-07, smo pripravili komplet Sport Pack Pro. Poleg vseh prednosti, ki jih ponuja komplet Sport Pack, Sport Pack Pro vključuje še nekaj pozorno izbranih dodatkov iz naše ponudbe. Celoten izpušni sistem Akrapovič zagotavlja večje zmogljivosti in vrhunsko izkušnjo zvoka, za izjemno upravljanje pa je dodano še zadnje vzmetenje Öhlins. Skupaj s hitrim menjalnikom, stranskim oblazinjenjem rezervoarja, nosilcem registrske tablice in zaporednimi smerniki, ta paket popelje vašo vožnjo na vrhunsko raven in daje vašemu MT-07 značilen športni videz.
description.en: For riders who want the maximum out of their MT-07, we put together the Sport Pack Pro. Along with all the goodies that the Sport Pack has to offer, the Sport Pack Pro adds in a few more carefully selected accessories from our range. The full system Akrapovič exhaust provides increased performance and a visceral sound experience, whereas the Öhlins rear suspension has been added for superior handling. Together with the quickshifter, side tank pads, licence plate holder and sequential blinkers, this pack takes your ride to the ultimate level and gives your MT-07 a distinctive sporty look.

description.sl-SI: YamalubePower Trim & Steering Fluid je natančno uravnoteženo olje, ki združuje lastnosti proti koroziji in proti obrabi s stabilizatorji viskoznosti, zasnovano za podaljšanje življenjske dobe, kakovosti in zmogljivosti krmilnega sistema vaše ladje.
description.en: YamalubePower Trim & Steering Fluid is a finely balanced oil combining anti-corrosion and anti-wear qualities with viscosity stabilizers, designed to extend the life, quality and performance of your boat's steering system.
2nd Pinion kit for GYTR® gear.
Kit required when fitting the High Screen.
description.sl-SI: Za namestitev visokega vizirja je zahtevan komplet.

description.en: Stylish flashers to replace the standard ones.
description.sl-SI: Moderni smerniki za zamenjavo standardnih.

RMAX modularni prtljažnik predstavlja trpežen 4-milimetrski aluminijasti okvir, prašno barvan, zasnovan za maksimalno prilagodljivost tovora. Podpira do tri police in stranske plošče, kar omogoča prilagodljivo nastavitev shranjevanja. Močan, odporen proti koroziji in enostaven za namestitev, zagotavlja varen prevoz opreme za vsako terensko pustolovščino.
description.en: The RMAX Modular Rack is a durable 4mm powder-coated aluminum frame designed for maximum cargo flexibility. It supports up to three shelves and side panels, allowing a customizable storage setup. Strong, corrosion-resistant, and easy to install, it ensures secure gear transport for any off-road adventure.

A must-have in extra racing safety, the MX Adult Body Armour is a technical and reassuring item for every racer. Built with protection and flexibility in mind, this upper armour covers the shoulders, elbows and back with impact-absorbing shells on top of a lightweight and breathable stretch undershirt. Adjustable all over for comfort, the armour fits perfectly with the MX Men’s Jersey to keep the racing look and heighten protection.
description.sl-SI: Ščitnik telesa MX za odrasle je nepogrešljiv tehnični in zanesljiv kos opreme za dodatno varnost na dirkah. Ščitnik za zgornji del telesa je izdelan z ozirom na zaščito in fleksibilnost ter pokriva ramena, komolce in hrbet. Opremljen je z drsniki, ki blažijo udarce, pod njimi pa je lahka in zračna spodnja majica. Ker je nastavljiv, omogoča vsestransko udobje, poleg tega se povsem prilega moškemu dresu MX, zaradi česar lahko ohranite dirkaški videz in okrepite zaščito.

Ključni kos garderobe oboževalcev "El Diablo", moška majica Quartararo v črni in modri barvi, na kateri prevladuje Fabiova ikonična rdeča številka "20". Logotipi Yamaha Racing dopolnjujejo zasnovo, da je majica pripravljena za dirkalno akcijo.
description.en: The staple of the 'El Diablo' fan's wardrobe, the Quartararo Men's T-Shirt in black and blue is dominated by Fabio's iconic red '20'. Yamaha Racing logos complete the design to make it ready for racing action.

Unveiling Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Set – Redefining safety and elegance on the road. Elevate your ride with a mesmerizing sequence of LEDs designed to enhance visibility and showcase your Yamaha's distinctive style. Meticulously engineered for seamless integration, these rear blinkers not only signal your every move but also make a powerful statement. Ride with confidence as the sequential LED display adds an extra layer of sophistication to your Yamaha, ensuring you leave a lasting impression wherever your journey takes you. Experience safety and style harmoniously with Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Set.
description.sl-SI: Predstavitev Yamahinega kompleta zadnjih sekvenčnih LED utripalk - nova definicija varnosti in elegance na cesti. Svojo vožnjo povzdignite s hipnotičnim zaporedjem diod LED, zasnovanim za izboljšanje vidljivosti in predstavitev značilnega sloga vaše Yamahe. Ti zadnji utripalniki, skrbno izdelani za brezhibno integracijo, ne sporočajo le vsakega vašega koraka, temveč dajejo tudi močno izjavo. Vozite samozavestno, saj zaporedni prikaz LED dodaja vaši Yamahi dodatno plast prefinjenosti in zagotavlja, da boste pustili trajen vtis, kamorkoli vas bo pot zanesla. Doživite varnost in slog v harmoniji z Yamahinim kompletom zadnjih sekvenčnih utripalnikov LED.

description.en: The Sport Pack adds a touch of sportiness with its mix of accessories. The fly screen gives the front an unmistakably understated yet strong look, while the LED lights (front and rear) add to the equation. The sleek license plate holder sharpens up the rear. Finally, the side tank pad set not only protects the tank from scratches, but also gives that extra grip when you are setting the corners on fire! Are you ready to take the roads by storm?
description.sl-SI: Paket Sport Pack vsebuje razno dodatno opremo in doda pridih športnosti. Vizir daje sprednjemu delu komaj opazen in razpoznaven, vendar hkrati močan videz, za kar še dodatno poskrbijo LED-žarometi (sprednji in zadnji). Vitek nosilec registrske tablice poskrbi za izrazitejši videz zadnjega dela. Stranska zaščita za rezervoar varuje rezervoar pred praskami, poleg tega pa nudi dodaten oprijem pri premagovanju ovinkov! Ste pripravljeni, da osvojite ceste?
Izboljšajte športni videz svoje Yamahe R9 z zatemnjenim vizirjem. Enostavna zamenjava standardnega vizirja, zasnovanega z UV zaščito z elegantnim vgraviranim logotipom R.
description.en: Enhance the sporty look of your Yamaha R9 with the Smoke Windscreen. An easy replacement of the standard screen engineered with UV-protection treatment featuring an elegant debossed R logo.

description.sl-SI: Nizki sedež v črni barvi, ekskluzivno zasnovan za Ténéré 700, omogoča boljši dostop do tal za večjo varnost voznika. Ujema se z zasnovo originalnega sedeža za brezhibno oblikovanje.
description.en: Designed exclusively for the Ténéré 700, the Low Seat Black improves ground access for enhanced rider safety. Matches the design of the original seat for seamless styling.
Aluminum radiator cover
description.sl-SI: Aluminijast pokrov hladilnika

description.en: Enhance the coolness of your Yamaha!
description.sl-SI: Izboljša videz vaše Yamahe.

description.en: 4th Wheel kit for GYTR® gears.

description.sl-SI: Naši ščitniki zavornih ročic so zasnovani tako, da nudijo neprekosljivo zaščito vaših ročic. Ne glede na to, ali se vozite po ostrih ovinkih ali se soočate z nepričakovanimi neravninami, naši ščitniki zagotavljajo, da vaše zavorne ročice ostanejo nedotaknjene.
description.en: Our brake lever guards are designed to offer unbeatable protection for your levers. Whether you’re navigating tight turns or facing unexpected bumps, our guards ensure your brake levers stay intact.

name.sl-SI: Pokrov zračne komore GYTR YZ450F / YZ250F

description.sl-SI: Pokrov zračne komore GYTR so zasnovale in uporabljale ekipe Yamaha YZ Factory Racing, zagotavlja pa izboljšano hlajenje kot tudi zmogljivosti.
description.en: The GYTR airbox cover is designed and used by the Yamaha YZ Factory Racing teams and provides improved cooling and performance.

Built from Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene (UHMWPE), this Skid Plate resists damage and helps the Wolverine easily slide over rocks. Steel or aluminum skid plates are loud and can bend and gouge while tackling rugged terrain, but these UHMWPE plates provide expectational protection while maintaining their integrity.
description.sl-SI: Ta ščitna plošča, ki je narejena iz polietilena z ultra visoko molekularno težo (UHMWPE), ščiti pred poškodbami in pomaga Wolverinu, da enostavno zdrsne čez skale. Jeklene ali aluminijaste ščitne plošče so glasne in se lahko zvijejo ali upognejo pri vožnji čez neraven teren, plošče iz UHMWPE pa zagotavljajo izredno zaščito in obenem ohranijo svojo integriteto.

description.sl-SI: Oblikovan z vpadljivim minimalističnim videzom, nahrbtnik REVS ponuja 26 litrov prostora za shranjevanje v obliki, ki jo je enostavno prenašati za prostočasne dejavnosti. Izdelan je iz črnega 100% poliuretanskega umetnega usnja ter ima rdeče in bele poudarke z natisnjenim napisom Yamaha. Velik glavni predal, sprednji in stranski žepi ponujajo dovolj prostora, na voljo pa je tudi oblazinjen žep za shranjevanje in zaščito prenosnega računalnika.
description.en: Designed with a striking minimalist look, the REVS Backpack offers 26 litres of storage capacity in an easy-to-carry shape for leisurely activities. Made from black 100% polyurethane imitation leather, it carries red and white highlights with printed Yamaha branding. A large main compartment, front and side pockets offer ample space, with a foam-padded laptop pocket to keep your computer protected.

The lightweight and stylish Tricity 300 comes with best-in-class specifications which make it a fashionable and dynamic 3-wheel scooter. For an extra dose of dynamism and even sportier looks, the Sport Pack consists of a scratch-resistant sports screen, minimalistic license plate holder with LED rear license plate light, and aluminium lower foot boards with high-grip rubber pads. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Lahek in eleganten Tricity 300 ima najboljše specifikacije v svojem razredu, zaradi česar je ta 3-kolesni skuter moden in dinamičen. Za dodatno dozo dinamičnosti in še bolj športen videz poskrbi Športni paket, ki vsebuje na praske odporen športni zaslon, minimalističen nosilec za registrsko tablico z LED lučko in aluminijaste plošče za noge z blazinicami iz gume. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity 300.

description.en:
The perfect pack to have when making day trips with your FX Waverunner. Enlarge and optimize your storage needs to make your day on the water complete. 
The pack includes: 
F3XU89A1V000 FX STERN STORAGE 50L: Additional storage on the back of your FX for clothing, food and drinks. 
F5GF841PV000 FX GLOVE BOX ORGANIZER: Protects and organizes your precious products, like your phone, sunglasses and keys from scratching after a ride on the water. 
F5GU511AV000 FX UNDERHATCH STORAGE: Custom-made  organizer under the hatch specifically designed for the FX WaveRunners.
description.sl-SI:
Popoln paket, ki ga lahko imate na enodnevnih izletih s svojim FX Waverunner-jem. Povečajte in optimizirajte svoje potrebe po shranjevanju, da bo vaš dan na vodi popoln. 
Paket vključuje: 
F3XU89A1V000 - FX PROSTOR ZA SHRANJEVANJE NA KRMI 50L: Dodaten prostor za shranjevanje na hrbtni strani vašega FX za oblačila, hrano in pijačo. 
F5GF841PV000 - FX ORGANIZATOR PREDALA: Ščiti in organizira vaše dragocene izdelke, kot so telefon, sončna očala in ključi, pred praskanjem po vožnji po vodi. 
F5GU511AV000 - FX PROSTOR ZA SHRANJEVANJE POD POKROVOM: Po meri izdelan organizator pod pokrovom, posebej zasnovan za FX WaveRunner.

description.sl-SI: Lahka in aerodinamična krilca iz ogljikovih vlaken po navdihu iz MotoGP prinašajo nove ravni pritiska navzdol v že zmagovalni rodovnik. Nova krilca so oblikovana tako, da dopolnjujejo ostre linije R1 in so nameščena ob oklepu, skrbijo za maksimalne učinke elektronike proti dvigovanju prednjega kolesa, hkrati pa povečujejo občutek sprednjega dela med zaviranjem in zavijanjem ter izboljšujejo stabilnost pri visokih hitrostih.
description.en: MotoGP-inspired lightweight carbon fibre aerodynamic winglets bring new levels of downforce to an already race-winning pedigree. Sculpted to complement the razor-sharp lines of the R1 and positioned perfectly against the fairing, the new winglets maximise the effects of the bike’s anti-wheelie electronics while increasing front-end feel during braking and cornering, and improving high-speed stability.

Created from a mix of polyester and nylon in blue, its ripstop pattern allows lightweight strength while the single outer pocket features a zip with an additional removable keyring for extra utility.

name.sl-SI: Čistilni robčki za čelade in vizirje Yamalube®
name.en: Yamalube® Visor and Helmet Cleaner Wipes

description.sl-SI: Ostanki prahu, umazanija in nešteto žuželk – ne samo na čeladah in vizirjih, ampak tudi na žarometih in vetrnih ščitih – so cena, ki jo plačujemo za naš užitek v vožnji. Omenjeni ostanki lahko otežijo vidljivost in predstavljajo varnostno tveganje, vendar ti priročni vlažni robčki (z vključeno krpo za poliranje) to težavo hitro rešijo – pospravite jih kar v nahrbtnik!
description.en: The residues from dust, dirt and countless insects are the penalty we pay for our riding enjoyment – and not just on our helmets and visors, but on headlights and windscreens too! This can be a visibility and safety issue, but these handy wipes (with the polishing cloth included) solve the problem quickly – so keep them in your backpack!

name.en: Hard Cab Enclosure System Glass Rear Window
name.sl-SI: Stekleno zadnje okno kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi

description.en: Yamaha is offering all the components of the Hard Cab Enclosure System separately for added customer convenience. Accessing the cargo area is one of the key factors in the fully functional Wolverine X4. This glass rear window opens utilizing familiar gas struts like those of a SUV to hold the glass up while the window is open (window must be closed while in drive).The fully lockable window keeps your items secure from unwanted company. When paired with the Rear Cargo Box to maximize rear cargo space, you have a truly versatile package ready to conquer the outdoors!
description.sl-SI: Yamaha za lažjo uporabo vse sestavne dele kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi ponuja ločeno. Ena ključnih značilnosti polnofunkcionalnega modela Wolverine X4 je dostop do prtljažnega prostora. To stekleno zadnje okno se odpre s pomočjo že poznanih plinskih vzmeti, kot so tiste pri športnih terencih, ki zadržijo steklo v zgornjem položaju, ko je okno odprto (med vožnjo mora biti okno zaprto). Ker se da okno v celoti zakleniti, so vaši predmeti varni pred nepridipravi. Če uporabljate zadnji tovorni kovček, ki poveča prtljažni prostor zadaj, je vaš vsestranski paket opreme pripravljen na dogodivščine na prostem!

Stranska ogledala, ki jih je zasnovala, razvila in preizkusila Yamaha, zagotavljajo odličen pogled in najboljšo vzdržljivost. Širokokotno stekleno območje za pogled brez popačenja zagotavlja veliko jasnost in vidnost zadaj. Zlaganje v avtomobilskem slogu zagotavlja dodatno udobje pri vleki zaprtih prikolic ali na tesnih poteh, saj po ponovnem odpiranju ogledal ni treba znova prilagajati vidnega polja. Izjemno trpežne tlačno lite aluminijaste osi zagotavljajo trpežnost, ki jo pričakujete od Yamahe.
description.en: The Yamaha-designed, developed, and tested Side View Mirrors provide an excellent view and unmatched durability. The wide-angle, distortion-free glass viewing area provides great clarity and rearward visibility. Automotive-style fold-away action provides added convenience when pulling in enclosed trailers or on tight trails by reducing the need to readjust the viewing area after folding back. Ultra-tough die-cast aluminum pivots provide the durability you come to expect from Yamaha.

Our FusionFit™ Bed Attachment Kit will help keep your tools always at-the-ready. Yamaha's FusionFit™ accessory system provides a tool-less design that allows you to "click and go" with only a quarter turn. An integrated padlock slot gives you the option to easily secure your cargo and go

name.sl-SI: Olje Za Menjalnike Plovil Yamalube GL5 SAE90
name.en: Yamalube GL5 SAE90 Marine Gear Oil

description.sl-SI: Olje za menjalnik YamalubeGL5 je vrhunsko olje, posebej razvito za zmogljive izvenkrmne motorje, ki delujejo pod izjemnimi pritiski in velikimi obremenitvami. Zlasti primerno za izvenkrmne motorje Yamahinih linij High Power in Premium – V6 in V8.
description.en: YamalubeGL5 Gear Oil is a premium oil specially developed for powerful outboard engines, performing under extreme pressure and heavy loads. Particularly suited to Yamaha High Power and Premium V6 and V8 outboards.
Safety guard for use with standard and billet front brake levers.

description.en: Öhlins front fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge NIX30 kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and option to improve responsiveness and performance of the fork. Öhlins offers a wide range of linear springs to suit each individual type of bike, rider weight and personal preferences for installation into the standard front fork.
description.sl-SI: Vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins so zasnovane posebej za komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX30 in sprednje vilice. Poleg tega poskrbijo tudi za odlično nadgradnjo sprednjega dela ter možnost za izboljšanje odzivnosti in zmogljivosti vilice. Öhlins zagotavlja širok nabor linearnih vzmeti, ki so primerne za vsako posamezno vrsto motornega kolesa, težo voznika in osebne želje za namestitev v standardne sprednje vilice.

Durable, stylish and easy to handle, the Paddock Blue Race Trolley is perfect for trips to race tracks around the world and everywhere in between. A tough 100% polyester outer in iconic Racing Blue is branded with the Yamaha Racing logo, with 123 litres of storage ideal for long-haul travel. A telescopic pull handle and wheels make for easy use, with top and side handles for carrying. Adjustable straps and buckles allow you to accommodate for storage.

description.en: Standard Top Case 45L without colour plates.

Convert your XSR900 to a ideal long-trip Roadster with the Weekend Pack. Fitting your bike with two 13,5 litre soft bags holding up to 5 kilograms each will allow you to pack your traveling essentials and go the extra mile. Easily fitting the bags with waterproof liners will protect your luggage from unfortunate weather conditions. The pack comes with an USB charger to charge your navigation or phone during the trip.
description.sl-SI: S kompletom 'Weekend Pack' pretvorite svoj XSR900 v popolno cestno motorno vozilo za dolga potovanja. Če na motorno kolo namestite dve 13,5-litrski mehki torbi z največjo obremenitvijo 5 kilogramov, boste lahko spakirali osnovne stvari za potovanja in se zapeljali še dlje. Z enostavno namestitvijo vodoodpornih oblog zaščitite svojo prtljago v slabih vremenskih razmerah. V kompletu je na voljo tudi polnilnik USB, s katerim boste med potovanjem lahko polnili navigacijski sistem ali telefon.

description.en: Give your Yamaha TMAX a boost of performance, sound and style with the Akrapovič Full System - Black. The stainless steel header pipes connect to the black-finished titanium muffler, with a laser engraved TMAX logo for a stylish addition.
Ohlins rear shock YA570 S46DR1  for MT09/XSR900

name.sl-SI: Kratka majica Sports Heritage za ženske

description.en: A must-have for Yamaha’s Sport Heritage fans, the Sports Heritage Women’s T-Shirt is a striking and cool piece of vintage-style apparel. Made from cotton and elastane with a faded look in classic burnt orange and white, this V-neck tee features Sports Heritage badges on the sleeves and a Yamaha print on the chest. A casual, easy wearing item for every day style.
description.sl-SI: Kratka majica Sports Heritage za ženske je očarljivo in odlično oblačilo v starinskem slogu, ki ga navdušenke Yamahinih vozil v segmentu Sport Heritage preprosto morajo imeti. Izdelana je iz bombaža in elastana z bledim videzom v klasični zapečeni oranžni in beli barvi, V-izrezom, oznako Sports Heritage na rokavih in potiskom Yamaha na prsih. Lahkoten izdelek za prosti čas v vsakodnevnem slogu.

description.en: Special transom plate for load distribution in the area of the motor mount. Made from milled aluminium and coated with an anodizing layer to protect against corrosion. The YAMAHA logo is engraved on the front of the transom plate.

name.en: Storage Cover for the EX Series
name.sl-SI: Prevleka za shranjevanje za serijo EX

description.en: Keep your investment looking its best, and protect it from the elements. This cover provides the ultimate protection against fading and the elements. It comes with the Vacu-Hold strapless tow system, eliminating billowing and buffeting. Therefore, the cover conforms to the shape of your WaveRunner.
description.sl-SI: Ohranite svojo naložbo v najboljšem stanju in jo zaščitit pred vremenskimi vplivi. Ta prevleka zagotavlja neprekosljivo zaščito pred bledenjem in posledicami vremenskih dejavnikov. Ima sistem Vacu-Hold za pripenjanje brez trakov, ki odpravlja napihovanje in plapolanje prevleke. Zato se popolnoma prilega obliki vašega WaveRunnerja.

name.sl-SI: Kovinski zadnji pokrov agregata v dveh barvnih odtenkih

description.en: Cover to replace the original engine cover for an extra stylish look.
description.sl-SI: Pokrov, ki nadomešča originalni pokrov agregata, za bolj eleganten videz.
Za tople roke med vožnjo v mrzlem vremenu izberite grelce ročk. Ta par električno ogrevanih ročk nadomešča standardne ročke Yamaha TMAX za ogrevanje na zahtevo, skozi vse leto.
description.en: Choose the Grip Heater for warm hands in cold riding conditions. This pair of electrically heated hand grips replaces the standard Yamaha TMAX scooter grips for heat on demand, all year round.

description.sl-SI:
TRACER 9 GT 'Travel Pack Pro' je zasnovan za voznike, ki iščejo maksimalno udobje, varnost in funkcionalnost na dolgih razdaljah. Visok vizir v kombinaciji z dodatnim širokim zaščitnim vizirjem omogoča boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sopotnikov udoben sedež pa vozniku in sopotniku prinašata toploto in sproščenost. Ohranite nadzor s kompletom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah in sistemom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) na krmilu, nosilec za GPS pa omogoča jasen pregled nad navigacijo. Zgornji kovček in naslon zagotavljata veliko prostora za shranjevanje in udobje sopotnika, s polnilnikom USB z vtičnico na nosilcu pa poskrbite, da so vaše naprave vedno napolnjene.

Za dodatno zaščito pred kamenčki na cesti se namestita ščitnik hladilnika in zaščita agregata 'Explorer', komplet meglenk LED z nosilcem za meglenke pa zagotavlja vidljivost v vseh pogojih. Ta paket je popoln spremljevalec za vsako pustolovščino na vašem TRACER 9 GT.
description.en:
The TRACER 9 GT Travel Pack Pro is built for riders seeking maximum comfort, safety, and functionality on long-distance rides. The High Screen, paired with the Add-On Wide Screen, enhances wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Comfort Seat ensure warmth and relaxation for both rider and passenger. Stay in control with the Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit and TPMS on the handlebar, while the GPS Stay keeps your navigation in clear view. The Top Case and Backrest provide ample storage and comfort for your passenger, and the USB Charger with Holder Socket ensures your devices remain powered.

For added protection, the Radiator Guard and Explorer Engine Guard shield your bike from road debris, and the LED Fog Light Kit with Fog Light Stay ensures visibility in all conditions. This pack  is the ultimate companion for every adventure on your TRACER 9 GT.

name.sl-SI: Kovček na kolesih Paddock Blue za otroke

description.en: Perfect for holidays and trips long or short, the Paddock Blue Kids Ride-on Suitcase is a fun and quirky bag that little Yamaha fans will love. Featuring a special R1-inspired graphic, kids can ride their unique wheeled luggage and imagine being on two wheels. Offering a spacious 19 litres of space with a cool interior lining, a divider and straps make it easy for parents to help their kids pack while the shoulder strap doubles as a carrying strap. Easy movement is afforded by 360° front wheels. A must-have luggage item for kids that love to ride and travel.
description.sl-SI: Otroški kovček na kolesih Paddock Blue je zabaven in poseben kos prtljage, ki bo osvojil najmlajše Yamahine navdušence, ter je popolna izbira za počitnice in krajše ali daljše izlete. Na tem edinstvenem kovčku na kolesih, ki ga krasi grafika po vzoru modela R1, se otroci lahko vozijo in si predstavljajo, da so na dvokolesniku. Kovček ima prostornih 19 litrov s trendovsko notranjo podlogo, pregrado in pasove za lažje pakiranje, naramni trak pa se lahko uporabi tudi kot trak za nošenje. Sprednja 360-stopinjska kolesa omogočajo preprosto premikanje. To je obvezen kos prtljage za otroke, ki imajo radi vožnjo in potovanja.

name.sl-SI: Uniseks pulover s kapuco za odrasle iz posebne izdaje kolekcije REVS
name.en: REVS Special Edition Hoodie Adult Unisex

description.sl-SI: Pulover s kapuco za odrasle (uniseks) posebne izdaje kolekcije REVS iz mehke mešanice bombaža in poliestra je zasnovan s privlačno barvno kombinacijo črne, rdeče in bele. Pulover s kapuco, ki je namenjen za udobno vsakodnevno nošenje, ima fiksno kapuco z vrvico ter žepa z zadrgo za ohranjanje toplote in shranjevanje osnovnih potrebščin. Rebrasti patenti na zapestjih in spodnjem robu zagotavljajo udobno prileganje za vse velikosti, izvezeni napis Yamaha na prsih pa prinaša eleganten in sodoben videz v slogu REVS.
description.en: Made from a soft cotton and polyester blend, the REVS Adult Unisex Special Edition Hoodie is designed with an eye-catching tricolor of black, red and white. Made for daily comfort, this pullover hoodie features a fixed drawstring hood and zip pockets for warmth and for carrying essentials. Ribbed cuffs and hem ensure a comfortable fit for all sizes, with embroidered Yamaha chest branding creating a stylish and contemporary REVS look.
Comfort seat designed to increase the riding comfort over long distances for the TRACER 9. The firm foam base and the soft surface pouches make sure you can enjoy Touring at its best.

Paket Adventure, ki je idealen za opremljanje vašega Ténéré 700 za osvajanje divjine, vključuje vrhunski izbor dodatkov za shranjevanje in zaščito. Komplet mehkih stranskih torb ponuja kar 44 litrov prostora za vse potrebščine na potovanju, medtem ko 4 mm debela trpežna zaščitna plošča ščiti vaše motorno kolo pred neravnim terenom in drobirjem. Zaščitne cevi Adventure zagotavljajo zanesljivo zaščito v primeru padcev, vodilo verige pa omogoča neprekinjeno delovanje na najtežjih poteh. Za dodaten nadzor, stranske blazinice omogočajo vrhunski oprijem, ko se spopadate z zahtevnim terenom.
description.en:
Contains: Soft Side Bag Set, Side Case Stays, Soft Side Bags Adapter, Heavy Duty Skid Plate, Side Grip Pads, Adventure Panel Guard, Chain Guide.

Ideal for equipping your Ténéré 700 to conquer the wilds, the Adventure Pack includes a premium selection of storage and protection accessories. The Soft Side Bag Set offers an ample 44L capacity for all your journey’s essentials, while the 4mm-thick Heavy Duty Skid Plate shields your bike from rough terrain and debris. Adventure Panel Guard provides reliable protection in case of falls and the Chain Guide ensures uninterrupted performance on the toughest trails. For added control, the Side Grip Pads deliver superior grip when standing to tackle challenging terrain.
GYTR® Rear Sprocket with 41T for 520 Chain conversion
Strong and safe fixation system that allows mounting/removal of the tank bags Tour and City to the tank.

description.en: Protect yourself from the sun in style with the  Sports Heritage Adult Cap. Made from 100% cotton, this unisex, one-size-fits-all cap features a retro burnt orange and white design. Yamaha and Sports Heritage badges on the front and side give an iconic look, with an adjustable strap and breathing holes for comfort.
description.sl-SI: S kapo Sports Heritage za odrasle boste zaščiteni pred soncem v slogu. Izdelana je iz 100-odstotnega bombaža v univerzalni velikosti, primerna je za oba spola ter se ponaša z zapečeno oranžno in belo zasnovo v retro slogu. Logotipa Yamaha in Sports Heritage od spredaj in ob strani prinašata ikonski videz, nastavljiv trak in odprtine za zračenje pa udobje.

description.sl-SI: Usmerite svojega notranjega voznika MotoGP s pokrovom izpušnih plinov MotoGP, ki ga navdihujejo najhitrejši dirkalniki na svetu. Obvezna oprema za športnega voznika modela MT-07.
description.en: Channel your inner MotoGP rider with the MotoGP-stye Exhaust Cover, inspired by the fastest race motorcycles in the world. A must-have for the sporty MT-07 rider.

description.en: Get your Yamaha R9 "luggage ready" with the sleek and discrete Side Soft Bag Stays. Easy to fit, these genuine components can be installed and removed instantly thanks to the quick-lock system, while keeping the optional Side Soft Bags safely in place during your ride.

description.en: Bright, easy to wear and stylish, the Paddock Blue Women’s Hoodie is a piece of Streetwear designed for your everyday. Constructed from cotton and polyester in a French Terry finish, this sweater/hoodie is set off in colour blocks of racing blue, black and white, with retro style tape on the arms and shoulders. A lined draw cord hood, ribbed hem and elastic cuffs provide comfort in changing climates, with iconic Yamaha Racing branding in white.
description.sl-SI: Svetel, lahkoten in stilski pulover Paddock Blue za ženske je del kolekcije Streetwear, zasnovan za vsakodnevno uporabo. Izdelan je iz bombaža in poliestra z zunanjo plastjo iz francoskega frotirja, obarvan v dirkaško modre, črne in bele motive ter na rokah in ramenih opremljen s trakom v retro slogu. Vključuje podloženo kapuco z vrvico, rebraste obšive in elastične manšete za udobje v spremenljivem vremenu ter ikonski logotip Yamaha Racing v beli barvi.

name.sl-SI: Motoristična softshell jakna Paddock Blue za moške

description.en: Specially designed for Paddock Blue fans that love to ride, the two-tone blue Paddock Blue Men’s Riding Softshell offers 2-in-1 functionality for comfort on the road. Under the softshell outer with protection pockets and hydro repellent treatment sits a removable armoured riding mesh, featuring Warrior Lite armour on the elbows and shoulders. A fixed hood with snap closure prevents it flapping on the move, while two outer pockets and one inner pocket give ample room for essential items. A Paddock Blue classic for use on two wheels.
description.sl-SI: Motoristična softshell jakna Paddock Blue za moške v dveh odtenkih modre barve je posebej zasnovana za ljubitelje linije Paddock Blue, ki uživajo v vožnji, in ponuja dve funkcionalnosti v enem za udobje na cesti. Mehkoščitna tkanina softshell je odporna na vodo, na zunanji strani so zaščitni žepi, v notranjosti pa snemljiva zaščitna mrežica, poleg tega jakna vključuje ščitnike Warrior Lite na komolcih in ramenih. Fiksna kapuca na zapenjanje s pritiskači preprečuje plapolanje med gibanjem, dva zunanja žepa in en notranji pa omogočajo dovolj prostora za vse pomembne predmete. Klasično oblačilo linije Paddock Blue za uporabo, ko ste na dveh kolesih.

name.sl-SI: Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team Replica pulover Moški
name.en: Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team Replica Sweater Men

description.sl-SI: Moški pulover Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team Replica je lahek, udoben in nepogrešljiv za vikende na dirkah in po njih, zato je idealen za vsakodnevno nošenje. Pulover v modrih in črnih tonih z belimi poudarki in grafiko črte na hrbtni strani, ki jih navdihuje YZ450FM, ima tesno prilegajočo se kapuco za toploto in udobje, zadrgo po celotni dolžini in zunanje žepe za zaščito pred elementi in prostor za osebne predmete. Robovi in manšete iz samosvoje tkanine zagotavljajo popolno prileganje, izvezeni oznaki Yamaha Racing in Monster Energy® pa dopolnjujeta klasično oblačilo za člane ekipe.
description.en: Lightweight, comfortable and essential for race weekends and beyond, the Monster Energy® Yamaha Factory MXGP Team Men’s Replica Sweater is an ideal daily wear garment. Featuring YZ450FM-inspired blue and black tones with white highlights and back stripe graphic, the sweater features a tight-fitting hood for warmth and comfort, with a full-length zip and external pockets for protection from the elements and room for personal items. Self-fabric hem and cuffs ensure a snug fit all over, with embroidered Yamaha Racing and Monster Energy® branding completing a classic team member garment.
This plate is designed to improve clutch feeling and durability.

name.sl-SI: Črna poslovna torba s kolesi Yamaha

description.en: Finished in black, this Yamaha's lightweight business cabin trolley weighs just 2.95kg and gives a capacity of 38 liters. Featuring a special MicroShield™ shock-resistant and high-quality ABS construction. The trolley is equipped with 2 TSA approved locks and a LaunchPad™ outer pocket to protect your laptop. Including wheels and a telescopic handle.
description.sl-SI: Ta Yamahina lahka poslovna torba s kolesi v črni barvi tehta le 2,95 kg in ima prostornino 38 litrov. Ima posebno konstrukcijo iz visokokakovostne plastike ABS in MicroShield™-a, ki je odporna na udarce. Torba s kolesi je opremljena z 2 ključavnicama TSA in zunanjim žepom LaunchPad™ za zaščito vašega prenosnika. Vključno s kolesi in teleskopsko ročico.

Zemeljsko rjave in modre moške hlače ATV, ki so bistvenega pomena za terensko vožnjo v mešanih pogojih, so ultra lahke za udobje in delovanje. Hlače so narejene iz trdne poliestrske tkanine ripstop Dynax z vodoodpornostjo, imajo nastavljiv pas in spodnji del nogavic za optimalno udobje. Prezračevanje na zadrgi in raztegljiva tkanina Cordura omogočata lažje gibanje, velika vodoodporna žepa pa sta namenjena za nujne potrebščine. Silikonski trak na zadnji strani izboljšuje oprijem v sedežu. Obvezen kos za voznike ATV-jev, ki jih zanima terenska vožnja v slogu.
description.en: Essential for off-road riding in mixed conditions, the earth brown-blue ATV Men’s Riding Pants are ultra-light for comfort and function. Made from tough polyester ripstop Dynax fabric with water resistance, the pants feature an adjustable waist and leg bottoms for optimal comfort. Ventilation at the zipper and Cordura stretch fabric enhance movement, with two waterproof cargo pockets for essential items. A silicone strip on the rear improves grip in the saddle. A must-have for ATV riders looking to off-road in style.

description.sl-SI: Zimske rokavice za krmilo ohranijo vaše roke tople in suhe v hladnem in mokrem vremenu ter imajo mehko podlogo iz materiala, podobnega flisu, za izolacijo med vožnjo pozimi. Kombinirajte z ujemajočo se zaščito za sprednji del telesa za vrhunsko zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi med vožnjo z Yamahinim skuterjem.
description.en: The Hand Muffs keep your hands warm and dry in cold and wet weathers, with a soft fleece-style lining for winter riding insulation. Pair with the design-matched Apron for the ultimate weather protection when riding your Yamaha Scooter.

description.sl-SI: Izpopolnite slog svojega MT-07 z minimalističnim in športnim nosilcem registrske tablice. Je lahek ter enostaven za sestavljanje in namestitev, vključuje pa ekskluziven logotip MT in osvetlitev LED.
description.en: Enhance the style of your MT-07 with the minimalist and sporty licence plate holder. Lightweight and easy to assemble, with exclusive MT branding and LED lighting.

Delivers extra warmth and comfort without sacrificing any cargo space. This great accessory produces heat via the engine coolant, using a new thermostat-bypass system. The heater vents, electrical fittings and mounting are all designed for a stylish look and feel.
description.sl-SI: Nudi dodatno toploto in udobje brez vpliva na prtljažni prostor. Ta odlični dodatek proizvaja toploto iz hladilne tekočine motorja z uporabo novega sistema obvodnega termostata. Zračniki grelca, električni nastavki in nosilci so zasnovani, da vzbujajo moderen videz in občutek.

description.en: Offering kids comfort, warmth and style in winter, the Paddock Blue Kid’s Jacket is ideal for active youngsters. Kontrastna modra in temno modra barva ter natisnjen logotip Yamaha sta privlačna za oči.

description.en: Introducing the OM COVER F50F and F60C, the perfect solution for those seeking stylish and durable protection for their valuable items.

Contains: Side Cases, Side Case Stays, Engine Guard, Main Stand.

Prepare for your next adventure with the Explorer Pack, featuring the must-have essentials for long journeys. The Side Cases provide a generous 74L total capacity, while the Main Stand ensures stable parking, even when fully loaded. Finally, the Engine Guard offers reliable protection for vital components as you conquer off-road trails.
